GP10bhp1-12u:29: āpannaḥ saṃsṛtiṃ ghorāṃ yannāma vivaśo gṛṇan /

GP10bhp1-12u:36: brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānāṃ līlayā dadhataḥ kalāḥ // BhP_01.01.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:40: yacchṛṇvatāṃ rasajñānāṃ svādu svādu pade pade // BhP_01.01.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:41: kṛtavān kila karmāṇi saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:66: notpādayedyadi ratiṃ śrama eva hi kevalam // BhP_01.02.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:68: nārthasya dharmaikāntasya kāmo lābhāya hi smṛtaḥ // BhP_01.02.009 //

GP10bhp1-12u:100: sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ kṣemāya kalpante ye 'nu tān iha // BhP_01.02.025 //

GP10bhp1-12u:129: sa eva prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargam āśritaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:133: tṛtīyam ṛṣisargaṃ vai devarṣitvam upetya saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:134: tantraṃ sātvatam ācaṣṭa naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ // BhP_01.03.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:150: dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ // BhP_01.03.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:152: apāyayat surān anyān mohinyā mohayan striyā // BhP_01.03.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:158: triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥkṣatrām akaron mahīm // BhP_01.03.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:160: cakre vedataroḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // BhP_01.03.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:170: yathāvidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ // BhP_01.03.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:172: kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhP_01.03.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:173: ete cāṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇastu bhagavān svayam /

GP10bhp1-12u:175: janma guhyaṃ bhagavato ya etat prayato naraḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:186: sampanna eveti vidurmahimni sve mahīyate // BhP_01.03.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:187: evaṃ ca janmāni karmāṇi hyakarturajanasya ca /

GP10bhp1-12u:189: sa vā idaṃ viśvam amoghalīlaḥ sṛjatyavatyatti na sajjate 'smin /
GP10bhp1-12u:190: bhūteṣu cāntarhita ātmatantraḥ ṣāḍvargikaṃ jighrati ṣaḍguṇeśaḥ //

GP10bhp1-12u:192: nāmāni rūpāṇi manovacobhiḥ santanvato naṭacaryām ivājñaḥ // BhP_01.03.037
GP10bhp1-12u:193: sa veda dhātuḥ padavīṃ parasya durantavīryasya rathāṅgapāṇeḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:196: kurvanti sarvātmakam ātmabhāvaṃ na yatra bhūyaḥ parivarta ugraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:200: tadidaṃ grāhayām āsasutam ātmavatāṃ varam // BhP_01.03.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:202: sa tu saṃśrāvayām āsamahārājaṃ parīkṣitam // BhP_01.03.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:208: so 'haṃ vaḥ śrāvayiṣyāmi yathādhītaṃ yathāmati // BhP_01.03.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:209: BhP_01.04.001/0 vyāsa uvāca iti bruvāṇaṃ saṃstūya munīnāṃ dīrghasatriṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:210: vṛddhaḥ kulapatiḥ sūtaṃ bahvṛcaḥ śaunako 'bravīt // BhP_01.04.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:211: BhP_01.04.002/0 śaunaka uvāca sūta sūta mahābhāga vada no vadatāṃ vara /
GP10bhp1-12u:212: kathāṃ bhāgavatīṃ puṇyāṃ yadāha bhagavāñ chukaḥ // BhP_01.04.002 //

GP10bhp1-12u:222: saṃvādaḥ samabhūt tāta yatraiṣā sātvatī śrutiḥ // BhP_01.04.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:226: tasya janma mahāścaryaṃ karmāṇi ca gṛṇīhi naḥ // BhP_01.04.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:227: sa samrāṭ kasya vā hetoḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ mānavardhanaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:232: jīvanti nātmārtham asau parāśrayaṃ mumoca nirvidya kutaḥ kalevaram //
GP10bhp1-12u:233: tat sarvaṃ naḥ samācakṣva pṛṣṭo yadiha kiñcana /
GP10bhp1-12u:234: manye tvāṃ viṣaye vācāṃ snātam anyatra chāndasāt // BhP_01.04.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:235: BhP_01.04.014/0 sūta uvāca dvāpare samanuprāpte tṛtīye yugaparyaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:236: jātaḥ parāśarādyogī vāsavyāṃ kalayā hareḥ // BhP_01.04.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:237: sa kadācit sarasvatyā upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuciḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:240: yugadharmavyatikaraṃ prāptaṃ bhuvi yuge yuge // BhP_01.04.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:241: bhautikānāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ śaktihrāsaṃ ca tatkṛtam /

GP10bhp1-12u:248: itihāsapurāṇaṃ ca pañcamo veda ucyate // BhP_01.04.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:250: vaiśampāyana evaiko niṣṇāto yajuṣām uta // BhP_01.04.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:253: ta eta ṛṣayo vedaṃ svaṃ svaṃ vyasyann anekadhā /
GP10bhp1-12u:256: evaṃ cakāra bhagavān vyāsaḥ kṛpaṇavatsalaḥ // BhP_01.04.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:259: iti bhāratam ākhyānaṃ kṛpayā muninā kṛtam // BhP_01.04.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:260: evaṃ pravṛttasya sadā bhūtānāṃ śreyasi dvijāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:263: vitarkayan viviktastha idaṃ covāca dharmavit // BhP_01.04.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:268: tathāpi bata me daihyo hyātmā caivātmanā vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:270: kiṃ vā bhāgavatā dharmā na prāyeṇa nirūpitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:271: priyāḥ paramahaṃsānāṃ ta eva hyacyutapriyāḥ // BhP_01.04.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:275: pūjayām āsa vidhivan nāradaṃ surapūjitam // BhP_01.04.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:276: BhP_01.05.001/0 sūta uvāca atha taṃ sukham āsīna upāsīnaṃ bṛhacchravāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:277: devarṣiḥ prāha viprarṣiṃ vīṇāpāṇiḥ smayann iva // BhP_01.05.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:278: BhP_01.05.002/0 nārada uvāca pārāśarya mahābhāga bhavataḥ kaccidātmanā /
GP10bhp1-12u:279: parituṣyati śārīra ātmā mānasa eva vā // BhP_01.05.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:282: jijñāsitam adhītaṃ ca brahma yat tat sanātanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:283: tathāpi śocasyātmānam akṛtārtha iva prabho // BhP_01.05.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:284: BhP_01.05.005/0 vyāsa uvāca astyeva me sarvam idaṃ tvayoktaṃ tathāpi nātmā parituṣyate me /
GP10bhp1-12u:286: sa vai bhavān veda samastaguhyam upāsito yat puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:287: parāvareśo manasaiva viśvaṃ sṛjatyavatyatti guṇairasaṅgaḥ // BhP_01.05.006
GP10bhp1-12u:288: tvaṃ paryaṭann arka iva trilokīm antaścaro vāyurivātmasākṣī /
GP10bhp1-12u:289: parāvare brahmaṇi dharmato vrataiḥ snātasya me nyūnam alaṃ vicakṣva //
GP10bhp1-12u:290: BhP_01.05.008/0 śrīnārada uvāca bhavatānuditaprāyaṃ yaśo bhagavato 'malam /
GP10bhp1-12u:291: yenaivāsau na tuṣyeta manye taddarśanaṃ khilam // BhP_01.05.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:293: na tathā vāsudevasya mahimā hyanuvarṇitaḥ // BhP_01.05.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:294: na yadvacaścitrapadaṃ hareryaśo jagatpavitraṃ pragṛṇīta karhicit /
GP10bhp1-12u:295: tadvāyasaṃ tīrtham uśanti mānasā na yatra haṃsā niramantyuśikkṣayāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:297: nāmānyanantasya yaśo 'ṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:298: naiṣkarmyam apyacyutabhāvavarjitaṃ na śobhate jñānam alaṃ nirañjanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:299: kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvadabhadram īśvare na cārpitaṃ karma yadapyakāraṇam //
GP10bhp1-12u:300: atho mahābhāga bhavān amoghadṛk śuciśravāḥ satyarato dhṛtavrataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:303: na karhicit kvāpi ca duḥsthitā matir labheta vātāhatanaurivāspadam //
GP10bhp1-12u:305: yadvākyato dharma itītaraḥ sthito na manyate tasya nivāraṇaṃ janaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:306: vicakṣaṇo 'syārhati vedituṃ vibhor anantapārasya nivṛttitaḥ sukham /
GP10bhp1-12u:307: pravartamānasya guṇairanātmanas tato bhavān darśaya ceṣṭitaṃ vibhoḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:308: tyaktvā svadharmaṃ caraṇāmbujaṃ harer bhajann apakvo 'tha patet tato yadi
GP10bhp1-12u:309: yatra kva vābhadram abhūdamuṣya kiṃ ko vārtha āpto 'bhajatāṃ svadharmataḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:310: tasyaiva hetoḥ prayateta kovido na labhyate yadbhramatām uparyadhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:311: tal labhyate duḥkhavadanyataḥ sukhaṃ kālena sarvatra gabhīraraṃhasā //
GP10bhp1-12u:312: na vai jano jātu kathañcanāvrajen mukundasevyanyavadaṅga saṃsṛtim /
GP10bhp1-12u:313: smaran mukundāṅghryupagūhanaṃ punar vihātum icchen na rasagraho janaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:314: idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavān ivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:315: taddhi svayaṃ veda bhavāṃstathāpi te prādeśamātraṃ bhavataḥ pradarśitam //
GP10bhp1-12u:316: tvam ātmanātmānam avehyamoghadṛk parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ kalām /
GP10bhp1-12u:317: ajaṃ prajātaṃ jagataḥ śivāya tan mahānubhāvābhyudayo 'dhigaṇyatām //
GP10bhp1-12u:318: idaṃ hi puṃsastapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhidattayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:320: ahaṃ purātītabhave 'bhavaṃ mune dāsyāstu kasyāścana vedavādinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:321: nirūpito bālaka eva yogināṃ śuśrūṣaṇe prāvṛṣi nirvivikṣatām //
GP10bhp1-12u:323: cakruḥ kṛpāṃ yadyapi tulyadarśanāḥ śuśrūṣamāṇe munayo 'lpabhāṣiṇi //
GP10bhp1-12u:324: ucchiṣṭalepān anumodito dvijaiḥ sakṛt sma bhuñje tadapāstakilbiṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:325: evaṃ pravṛttasya viśuddhacetasas taddharma evātmaruciḥ prajāyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:327: tāḥ śraddhayā me 'nupadaṃ viśṛṇvataḥ priyaśravasyaṅga mamābhavadruciḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:329: yayāham etat sadasat svamāyayā paśye mayi brahmaṇi kalpitaṃ pare //
GP10bhp1-12u:330: itthaṃ śaratprāvṛṣikāvṛtū harer viśṛṇvato me 'nusavaṃ yaśo 'malam /
GP10bhp1-12u:337: māyānubhāvam avidaṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam // BhP_01.05.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:339: yadīśvare bhagavati karma brahmaṇi bhāvitam // BhP_01.05.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:340: āmayo yaśca bhūtānāṃ jāyate yena suvrata /
GP10bhp1-12u:341: tadeva hyāmayaṃ dravyaṃ na punāti cikitsitam // BhP_01.05.033 //

GP10bhp1-12u:427: mukundasevayā yadvat tathātmāddhā na śāmyati // BhP_01.06.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:428: sarvaṃ tadidam ākhyātaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayānagha /

GP10bhp1-12u:437: śamyāprāsa iti prokta ṛṣīṇāṃ satravardhanaḥ // BhP_01.07.002 //

GP10bhp1-12u:462: mātā śiśūnāṃ nidhanaṃ sutānāṃ niśamya ghoraṃ paritapyamānā /

GP10bhp1-12u:471: astraṃ brahmaśiro mene ātmatrāṇaṃ dvijātmajaḥ // BhP_01.07.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:473: ajānann api saṃhāraṃ prāṇakṛcchra upasthite // BhP_01.07.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:474: tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ tejaḥ pracaṇḍaṃ sarvato diśam /

GP10bhp1-12u:517: nirīkṣya kṛṣṇāpakṛtaṃ guroḥ sutaṃ vāmasvabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca //

GP10bhp1-12u:615: ajastvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca suradviṣām // BhP_01.08.033 //

GP10bhp1-12u:624: ke vayaṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:630: atha viśveśa viśvātman viśvamūrte svakeṣu me /
GP10bhp1-12u:631: snehapāśam imaṃ chindhi dṛḍhaṃ pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu // BhP_01.08.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:636: BhP_01.08.044/0 sūta uvāca pṛthayetthaṃ kalapadaiḥ pariṇūtākhilodayaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:639: striyaśca svapuraṃ yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ // BhP_01.08.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:644: aho me paśyatājñānaṃ hṛdi rūḍhaṃ durātmanaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:661: praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavā bhīṣmaṃ sānugāḥ saha cakriṇā // BhP_01.09.004 //

GP10bhp1-12u:683: kṛṣṇo 'strī gāṇḍivaṃ cāpaṃ suhṛt kṛṣṇastato vipat // BhP_01.09.015 //

GP10bhp1-12u:695: tatkṛtaṃ mativaiṣamyaṃ niravadyasya na kvacit // BhP_01.09.021 //

GP10bhp1-12u:1897: svalakṣaṇā prādurabhūt kilāsyataḥ sa me ṛṣīṇām ṛṣabhaḥ prasīdatām //

GP10bhp1-12u:1906: yadrūpaṃ yadadhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ prabho /

GP10bhp1-12u:1922: nānṛtaṃ tava tac cāpi yathā māṃ prabravīṣi bhoḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:2250: śreṇīnāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ ca dharmaḥ kṛcchreṣu jīvatām // BhP_02.08.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2256: iṣṭāpūrtasya kāmyānāṃ trivargasya ca yo vidhiḥ // BhP_02.08.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2257: yo vānuśāyināṃ sargaḥ pāṣaṇḍasya ca sambhavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2258: ātmano bandhamokṣau ca vyavasthānaṃ svarūpataḥ // BhP_02.08.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2260: visṛjya vā yathā māyām udāste sākṣivadvibhuḥ // BhP_02.08.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2261: sarvam etac ca bhagavan pṛcchato me 'nupūrvaśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2263: atra pramāṇaṃ hi bhavān parameṣṭhī yathātmabhūḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2264: apare cānutiṣṭhanti pūrveṣāṃ pūrvajaiḥ kṛtam // BhP_02.08.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2267: BhP_02.08.027/0 sūta uvāca sa upāmantrito rājñā kathāyām iti satpateḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2268: brahmarāto bhṛśaṃ prīto viṣṇurātena saṃsadi // BhP_02.08.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2272: ānupūrvyeṇa tat sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame // BhP_02.08.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2273: BhP_02.09.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca ātmamāyām ṛte rājan parasyānubhavātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2276: ramamāṇo guṇeṣvasyā mamāham iti manyate // BhP_02.09.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2277: yarhi vāva mahimni sve parasmin kālamāyayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2281: sa ādidevo jagatāṃ paro guruḥ svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya sisṛkṣayaikṣata /
GP10bhp1-12u:2282: tāṃ nādhyagacchaddṛśam atra sammatāṃ prapañcanirmāṇavidhiryayā bhavet //
GP10bhp1-12u:2283: sa cintayan dvyakṣaram ekadāmbhasy upāśṛṇoddvirgaditaṃ vaco vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2284: sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśaṃ niṣkiñcanānāṃ nṛpa yaddhanaṃ viduḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2286: svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya vimṛśya taddhitaṃ tapasyupādiṣṭa ivādadhe manaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2289: tasmai svalokaṃ bhagavān sabhājitaḥ sandarśayām āsa paraṃ na yatparam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2291: pravartate yatra rajastamastayoḥ sattvaṃ ca miśraṃ na ca kālavikramaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2292: na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2298: śrīryatra rūpiṇyurugāyapādayoḥ karoti mānaṃ bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2299: preṅkhaṃ śritā yā kusumākarānugair vigīyamānā priyakarma gāyatī //
GP10bhp1-12u:2300: dadarśa tatrākhilasātvatāṃ patiṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ yajñapatiṃ jagatpatim /
GP10bhp1-12u:2303: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ caturbhujaṃ pītāṃśukaṃ vakṣasi lakṣitaṃ śriyā //
GP10bhp1-12u:2305: yuktaṃ bhagaiḥ svairitaratra cādhruvaiḥ sva eva dhāman ramamāṇam īśvaram
GP10bhp1-12u:2307: nanāma pādāmbujam asya viśvasṛg yat pāramahaṃsyena pathādhigamyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:2308: taṃ prīyamāṇaṃ samupasthitaṃ kaviṃ prajāvisarge nijaśāsanārhaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2309: babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśociṣā girā priyaḥ priyaṃ prītamanāḥ kare spṛśan //
GP10bhp1-12u:2310: BhP_02.09.019/0 śrībhagavān uvāca tvayāhaṃ toṣitaḥ samyag vedagarbha sisṛkṣayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2311: ciraṃ bhṛtena tapasā dustoṣaḥ kūṭayoginām // BhP_02.09.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2312: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te vareśaṃ mābhivāñchitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2315: yadupaśrutya rahasi cakartha paramaṃ tapaḥ // BhP_02.09.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2317: tapo me hṛdayaṃ sākṣādātmāhaṃ tapaso 'nagha // BhP_02.09.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2319: bibharmi tapasā viśvaṃ vīryaṃ me duścaraṃ tapaḥ // BhP_02.09.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2320: BhP_02.09.024/0 brahmovāca bhagavan sarvabhūtānām adhyakṣo 'vasthito guhām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2323: parāvare yathā rūpejānīyāṃ te tvarūpiṇaḥ // BhP_02.09.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2325: vilumpan visṛjan gṛhṇan bibhradātmānam ātmanā // BhP_02.09.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2327: tathā tadviṣayāṃ dhehi manīṣāṃ mayi mādhava // BhP_02.09.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2330: yāvat sakhā sakhyuriveśa te kṛtaḥ prajāvisarge vibhajāmi bho janam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2331: aviklavaste parikarmaṇi sthito mā me samunnaddhamado ñja māninaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2332: BhP_02.09.030/0 śrībhagavān uvāca jñānaṃ paramaguhyaṃ me yadvijñānasamanvitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2333: sarahasyaṃ tadaṅgaṃ ca gṛhāṇa gaditaṃ mayā // BhP_02.09.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2335: tathaiva tattvavijñānam astu te madanugrahāt // BhP_02.09.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2336: aham evāsam evāgre nānyadyat sadasat param /
GP10bhp1-12u:2337: paścādahaṃ yadetac ca yo 'vaśiṣyeta so 'smyaham // BhP_02.09.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2338: ṛte 'rthaṃ yat pratīyeta na pratīyeta cātmani /
GP10bhp1-12u:2339: tadvidyādātmano māyāṃ yathābhāso yathā tamaḥ // BhP_02.09.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2341: praviṣṭānyapraviṣṭāni tathā teṣu na teṣvaham // BhP_02.09.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2343: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yat syāt sarvatra sarvadā // BhP_02.09.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2345: bhavān kalpavikalpeṣu na vimuhyati karhicit // BhP_02.09.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2346: BhP_02.09.037/0 śrīśuka uvāca sampradiśyaivam ajano janānāṃ parameṣṭhinam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2349: sarvabhūtamayo viśvaṃ sasarjedaṃ sa pūrvavat // BhP_02.09.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2351: bhadraṃ prajānām anvicchann ātiṣṭhat svārthakāmyayā // BhP_02.09.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2353: śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śīlena praśrayeṇa damena ca // BhP_02.09.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2357: devarṣiḥ paripapraccha bhavān yan mānupṛcchati // BhP_02.09.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2359: proktaṃ bhagavatā prāha prītaḥ putrāya bhūtakṛt // BhP_02.09.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2363: yathāsīt tadupākhyāste praśnān anyāṃśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // BhP_02.09.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2364: BhP_02.10.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca atra sargo visargaśca sthānaṃ poṣaṇam ūtayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2377: sa āśrayaḥ paraṃ brahma paramātmeti śabdyate // BhP_02.10.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2381: tritayaṃ tatra yo veda sa ātmā svāśrayāśrayaḥ // BhP_02.10.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2383: ātmano 'yanam anvicchann apo 'srākṣīc chuciḥ śucīḥ // BhP_02.10.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2385: tena nārāyaṇo nāma yadāpaḥ puruṣodbhavāḥ // BhP_02.10.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2386: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:2387: yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā // BhP_02.10.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2389: vīryaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ devo māyayā vyasṛjat tridhā // BhP_02.10.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2391: athaikaṃ pauruṣaṃ vīryaṃ tridhābhidyata tac chṛṇu // BhP_02.10.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2393: ojaḥ saho balaṃ jajñe tataḥ prāṇo mahān asuḥ // BhP_02.10.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2397: pipāsato jakṣataśca prāṅ mukhaṃ nirabhidyata // BhP_02.10.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2399: tato nānāraso jajñe jihvayā yo 'dhigamyate // BhP_02.10.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2401: jale caitasya suciraṃ nirodhaḥ samajāyata // BhP_02.10.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2403: tatra vāyurgandhavaho ghrāṇo nasi jighṛkṣataḥ // BhP_02.10.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2407: karṇau ca nirabhidyetāṃ diśaḥ śrotraṃ guṇagrahaḥ // BhP_02.10.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2412: tayostu balavān indra ādānam ubhayāśrayam // BhP_02.10.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2414: padbhyāṃ yajñaḥ svayaṃ havyaṃ karmabhiḥ kriyate nṛbhiḥ // BhP_02.10.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2416: upastha āsīt kāmānāṃ priyaṃ tadubhayāśrayam // BhP_02.10.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2418: tataḥ pāyustato mitra utsarga ubhayāśrayaḥ // BhP_02.10.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2424: tato manaścandra iti saṅkalpaḥ kāma eva ca // BhP_02.10.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2429: etadbhagavato rūpaṃ sthūlaṃ te vyāhṛtaṃ mayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2434: ubhe api na gṛhṇanti māyāsṛṣṭe vipaścitaḥ // BhP_02.10.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2437: prajāpatīn manūn devān ṛṣīn pitṛgaṇān pṛthak /
GP10bhp1-12u:2442: khagān mṛgān paśūn vṛkṣān girīn nṛpa sarīsṛpān // BhP_02.10.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2450: tataḥ kālāgnirudrātmā yat sṛṣṭam idam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2451: sanniyacchati tat kāle ghanānīkam ivānilaḥ // BhP_02.10.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2453: netthambhāvena hi paraṃ draṣṭum arhanti sūrayaḥ // BhP_02.10.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2456: ayaṃ tu brahmaṇaḥ kalpaḥ savikalpa udāhṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2457: vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo yatra sargāḥ prākṛtavaikṛtāḥ // BhP_02.10.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2459: yathā purastādvyākhyāsye pādmaṃ kalpam atho śṛṇu // BhP_02.10.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2460: BhP_02.10.048/0 śaunaka uvāca yadāha no bhavān sūta kṣattā bhāgavatottamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2461: cacāra tīrthāni bhuvastyaktvā bandhūn sudustyajān // BhP_02.10.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2463: yadvā sa bhagavāṃstasmai pṛṣṭastattvam uvāca ha // BhP_02.10.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2466: BhP_02.10.051/0 sūta uvāca rājñā parīkṣitā pṛṣṭo yadavocan mahāmuniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2468: BhP_03.01.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca evam etat purā pṛṣṭo maitreyo bhagavān kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:2469: kṣattrā vanaṃ praviṣṭena tyaktvā sva-gṛham ṛddhimat // BhP_03.01.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2470: yad vā ayaṃ mantra-kṛd vo bhagavān akhileśvaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2472: BhP_03.01.003/0 rājovāca kutra kṣattur bhagavatā maitreyeṇāsa saṅgamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2473: kadā vā saha-saṃvāda etad varṇaya naḥ prabho // BhP_03.01.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2476: BhP_03.01.005/0 sūta uvāca sa evam ṛṣi-varyo 'yaṃ pṛṣṭo rājñā parīkṣitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2477: praty āha taṃ subahu-vit prītātmā śrūyatām iti // BhP_03.01.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2478: BhP_03.01.006/0 śrī-śuka uvāca yadā tu rājā sva-sutān asādhūn puṣṇan na dharmeṇa vinaṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:2479: bhrātur yaviṣṭhasya sutān vibandhūn praveśya lākṣā-bhavane dadāha //
GP10bhp1-12u:2480: yadā sabhāyāṃ kuru-deva-devyāḥ keśābhimarśaṃ suta-karma garhyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2481: na vārayām āsa nṛpaḥ snuṣāyāḥ svāsrair harantyāḥ kuca-kuṅkumāni //
GP10bhp1-12u:2482: dyūte tv adharmeṇa jitasya sādhoḥ satyāvalambasya vanaṃ gatasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:2483: na yācato 'dāt samayena dāyaṃ tamo-juṣāṇo yad ajāta-śatroḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2484: yadā ca pārtha-prahitaḥ sabhāyāṃ jagad-gurur yāni jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2485: na tāni puṃsām amṛtāyanāni rājoru mene kṣata-puṇya-leśaḥ // BhP_03.01.009
GP10bhp1-12u:2486: yadopahūto bhavanaṃ praviṣṭo mantrāya pṛṣṭaḥ kila pūrvajena /
GP10bhp1-12u:2487: athāha tan mantra-dṛśāṃ varīyān yan mantriṇo vaidurikaṃ vadanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:2488: ajāta-śatroḥ pratiyaccha dāyaṃ titikṣato durviṣahaṃ tavāgaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2489: sahānujo yatra vṛkodarāhiḥ śvasan ruṣā yat tvam alaṃ bibheṣi //
GP10bhp1-12u:2490: pārthāṃs tu devo bhagavān mukundo gṛhītavān sakṣiti-deva-devaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2492: sa eṣa doṣaḥ puruṣa-dviḍ āste gṛhān praviṣṭo yam apatya-matyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2493: puṣṇāsi kṛṣṇād vimukho gata-śrīs tyajāśv aśaivaṃ kula-kauśalāya //
GP10bhp1-12u:2496: ka enam atropajuhāva jihmaṃ dāsyāḥ sutaṃ yad-balinaiva puṣṭaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2497: tasmin pratīpaḥ parakṛtya āste nirvāsyatām āśu purāc chvasānaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2498: svayaṃ dhanur dvāri nidhāya māyāṃ bhrātuḥ puro marmasu tāḍito 'pi /
GP10bhp1-12u:2499: sa ittham atyulbaṇa-karṇa-bāṇair gata-vyatho 'yād uru mānayānaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2500: sa nirgataḥ kaurava-puṇya-labdho gajāhvayāt tīrtha-padaḥ padāni /
GP10bhp1-12u:2505: alakṣitaḥ svair avadhūta-veṣo vratāni cere hari-toṣaṇāni // BhP_03.01.019
GP10bhp1-12u:2506: itthaṃ vrajan bhāratam eva varṣaṃ kālena yāvad gatavān prabhāsam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2507: tāvac chaśāsa kṣitim eka cakrāml ekātapatrām ajitena pārthaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2508: tatrātha śuśrāva suhṛd-vinaṣṭiṃ vanaṃ yathā veṇuja-vahni-saṃśrayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2509: saṃspardhayā dagdham athānuśocan sarasvatīṃ pratyag iyāya tūṣṇīm //
GP10bhp1-12u:2510: tasyāṃ tritasyośanaso manoś ca pṛthor athāgner asitasya vāyoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2511: tīrthaṃ sudāsasya gavāṃ guhasya yac chrāddhadevasya sa āsiṣeve //
GP10bhp1-12u:2512: anyāni ceha dvija-deva-devaiḥ kṛtāni nānāyatanāni viṣṇoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2514: tatas tv ativrajya surāṣṭram ṛddhaṃ sauvīra-matsyān kurujāṅgalāṃś ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:2515: kālena tāvad yamunām upetya tatroddhavaṃ bhāgavataṃ dadarśa //
GP10bhp1-12u:2516: sa vāsudevānucaraṃ praśāntaṃ bṛhaspateḥ prāk tanayaṃ pratītam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2517: āliṅgya gāḍhaṃ praṇayena bhadraṃ svānām apṛcchad bhagavat-prajānām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2518: kaccit purāṇau puruṣau svanābhya- pādmānuvṛttyeha kilāvatīrṇau /
GP10bhp1-12u:2519: āsāta urvyāḥ kuśalaṃ vidhāya kṛta-kṣaṇau kuśalaṃ śūra-gehe //
GP10bhp1-12u:2520: kaccit kurūṇāṃ paramaḥ suhṛn no bhāmaḥ sa āste sukham aṅga śauriḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2521: yo vai svas-ṇāṃ pitṛvad dadāti varān vadānyo vara-tarpaṇena //
GP10bhp1-12u:2522: kaccid varūthādhipatir yadūnāṃ pradyumna āste sukham aṅga vīraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2523: yaṃ rukmiṇī bhagavato 'bhilebhe ārādhya viprān smaram ādi-sarge //
GP10bhp1-12u:2524: kaccit sukhaṃ sātvata-vṛṣṇi-bhoja- dāśārhakāṇām adhipaḥ sa āste /
GP10bhp1-12u:2525: yam abhyaṣiñcac chata-patra-netro nṛpāsanāśāṃ parihṛtya dūrāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:2526: kaccid dhareḥ saumya sutaḥ sadṛkṣa āste 'graṇī rathināṃ sādhu sāmbaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2527: asūta yaṃ jāmbavatī vratāḍhyā devaṃ guhaṃ yo 'mbikayā dhṛto 'gre //
GP10bhp1-12u:2528: kṣemaṃ sa kaccid yuyudhāna āste yaḥ phālgunāl labdha-dhanū-rahasyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2530: kaccid budhaḥ svasty anamīva āste śvaphalka-putro bhagavat-prapannaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2532: kaccic chivaṃ devaka-bhoja-putryā viṣṇu-prajāyā iva deva-mātuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2533: yā vai sva-garbheṇa dadhāra devaṃ trayī yathā yajña-vitānam artham //
GP10bhp1-12u:2534: apisvid āste bhagavān sukhaṃ vo yaḥ sātvatāṃ kāma-dugho 'niruddhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2535: yam āmananti sma hi śabda-yoniṃ mano-mayaṃ sattva-turīya-tattvam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2536: apisvid anye ca nijātma-daivam ananya-vṛttyā samanuvratā ye /
GP10bhp1-12u:2538: api sva-dorbhyāṃ vijayācyutābhyāṃ dharmeṇa dharmaḥ paripāti setum /
GP10bhp1-12u:2540: kiṃ vā kṛtāgheṣv agham atyamarṣī bhīmo 'hivad dīrghatamaṃ vyamuñcat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2541: yasyāṅghri-pātaṃ raṇa-bhūr na sehe mārgaṃ gadāyāś carato vicitram //
GP10bhp1-12u:2543: alakṣito yac-chara-kūṭa-gūḍho māyā-kirāto giriśas tutoṣa // BhP_03.01.038
GP10bhp1-12u:2544: yamāv utasvit tanayau pṛthāyāḥ pārthair vṛtau pakṣmabhir akṣiṇīva /
GP10bhp1-12u:2545: remāta uddāya mṛdhe sva-rikthaṃ parāt suparṇāv iva vajri-vaktrāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:2546: aho pṛthāpi dhriyate 'rbhakārthe rājarṣi-varyeṇa vināpi tena /
GP10bhp1-12u:2547: yas tv eka-vīro 'dhiratho vijigye dhanur dvitīyaḥ kakubhaś catasraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2548: saumyānuśoce tam adhaḥ-patantaṃ bhrātre paretāya vidudruhe yaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2549: niryāpito yena suhṛt sva-puryā ahaṃ sva-putrān samanuvratena //
GP10bhp1-12u:2550: so 'haṃ harer martya-viḍambanena dṛśo nṛṇāṃ cālayato vidhātuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2551: nānyopalakṣyaḥ padavīṃ prasādāc carāmi paśyan gata-vismayo 'tra //
GP10bhp1-12u:2552: nūnaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ tri-madotpathānāṃ mahīṃ muhuś cālayatāṃ camūbhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2554: ajasya janmotpatha-nāśanāya karmāṇy akartur grahaṇāya puṃsām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2555: nanv anyathā ko 'rhati deha-yogaṃ paro guṇānām uta karma-tantram //
GP10bhp1-12u:2557: arthāya jātasya yaduṣv ajasya vārtāṃ sakhe kīrtaya tīrtha-kīrteḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2558: BhP_03.02.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca iti bhāgavataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā vārtāṃ priyāśrayām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2559: prativaktuṃ na cotseha autkaṇṭhyāt smāriteśvaraḥ // BhP_03.02.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2561: tan naicchad racayan yasya saparyāṃ bāla-līlayā // BhP_03.02.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2562: sa kathaṃ sevayā tasya kālena jarasaṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2563: pṛṣṭo vārtāṃ pratibrūyād bhartuḥ pādāv anusmaran // BhP_03.02.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2564: sa muhūrtam abhūt tūṣṇīṃ kṛṣṇāṅghri-sudhayā bhṛśam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2565: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena nimagnaḥ sādhu nirvṛtaḥ // BhP_03.02.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2569: vimṛjya netre viduraṃ prītyāhoddhava utsmayan // BhP_03.02.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2570: BhP_03.02.007/0 uddhava uvāca kṛṣṇa-dyumaṇi nimloce gīrṇeṣv ajagareṇa ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:2571: kiṃ nu naḥ kuśalaṃ brūyāṃ gata-śrīṣu gṛheṣv aham // BhP_03.02.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2572: durbhago bata loko 'yaṃ yadavo nitarām api /
GP10bhp1-12u:2573: ye saṃvasanto na vidur hariṃ mīnā ivoḍupam // BhP_03.02.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2575: sātvatām ṛṣabhaṃ sarve bhūtāvāsam amaṃsata // BhP_03.02.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2576: devasya māyayā spṛṣṭā ye cānyad asad-āśritāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2577: bhrāmyate dhīr na tad-vākyair ātmany uptātmano harau // BhP_03.02.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2579: ādāyāntar adhād yas tu sva-bimbaṃ loka-locanam // BhP_03.02.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2580: yan martya-līlaupayikaṃ sva-yoga- māyā-balaṃ darśayatā gṛhītam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2581: vismāpanaṃ svasya ca saubhagarddheḥ paraṃ padaṃ bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇāṅgam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2582: yad dharma-sūnor bata rājasūye nirīkṣya dṛk-svastyayanaṃ tri-lokaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2583: kārtsnyena cādyeha gataṃ vidhātur arvāk-sṛtau kauśalam ity amanyata //
GP10bhp1-12u:2585: vraja-striyo dṛgbhir anupravṛtta- dhiyo 'vatasthuḥ kila kṛtya-śeṣāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2587: parāvareśo mahad-aṃśa-yukto hy ajo 'pi jāto bhagavān yathāgniḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2588: māṃ khedayaty etad ajasya janma- viḍambanaṃ yad vasudeva-gehe /
GP10bhp1-12u:2589: vraje ca vāso 'ri-bhayād iva svayaṃ purād vyavātsīd yad-ananta-vīryaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2590: dunoti cetaḥ smarato mamaitad yad āha pādāv abhivandya pitroḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2592: ko vā amuṣyāṅghri-saroja-reṇuṃ vismartum īśīta pumān vijighran /
GP10bhp1-12u:2593: yo visphurad-bhrū-viṭapena bhūmer bhāraṃ kṛtāntena tiraścakāra //
GP10bhp1-12u:2594: dṛṣṭā bhavadbhir nanu rājasūye caidyasya kṛṣṇaṃ dviṣato 'pi siddhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2595: yāṃ yoginaḥ saṃspṛhayanti samyag yogena kas tad-virahaṃ saheta //
GP10bhp1-12u:2596: tathaiva cānye nara-loka-vīrā ya āhave kṛṣṇa-mukhāravindam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2597: netraiḥ pibanto nayanābhirāmaṃ pārthāstra-pūtaḥ padam āpur asya //
GP10bhp1-12u:2600: tat tasya kaiṅkaryam alaṃ bhṛtān no viglāpayaty aṅga yad ugrasenam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2601: tiṣṭhan niṣaṇṇaṃ parameṣṭhi-dhiṣṇye nyabodhayad deva nidhārayeti //
GP10bhp1-12u:2602: aho bakī yaṃ stana-kāla-kūṭaṃ jighāṃsayāpāyayad apy asādhvī /
GP10bhp1-12u:2603: lebhe gatiṃ dhātry-ucitāṃ tato 'nyaṃ kaṃ vā dayāluṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajema //
GP10bhp1-12u:2605: ye saṃyuge 'cakṣata tārkṣya-putram aṃse sunābhāyudham āpatantam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2607: cikīrṣur bhagavān asyāḥ śam ajenābhiyācitaḥ // BhP_03.02.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2608: tato nanda-vrajam itaḥ pitrā kaṃsād vibibhyatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2609: ekādaśa samās tatra gūḍhārciḥ sa-balo 'vasat // BhP_03.02.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2610: parīto vatsapair vatsāṃś cārayan vyaharad vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2613: rudann iva hasan mugdha- bāla-siṃhāvalokanaḥ // BhP_03.02.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2614: sa eva go-dhanaṃ lakṣmyā niketaṃ sita-go-vṛṣam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2615: cārayann anugān gopān raṇad-veṇur arīramat // BhP_03.02.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2617: līlayā vyanudat tāṃs tān bālaḥ krīḍanakān iva // BhP_03.02.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2619: utthāpyāpāyayad gāvas tat toyaṃ prakṛti-sthitam // BhP_03.02.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2621: vittasya coru-bhārasya cikīrṣan sad-vyayaṃ vibhuḥ // BhP_03.02.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2625: gāyan kala-padaṃ reme strīṇāṃ maṇḍala-maṇḍanaḥ // BhP_03.02.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2626: BhP_03.03.001/0 uddhava uvāca tataḥ sa āgatya puraṃ sva-pitroś cikīrṣayā śaṃ baladeva-saṃyutaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:2627: nipātya tuṅgād ripu-yūtha-nāthaṃ hataṃ vyakarṣad vyasum ojasorvyām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2629: tasmai prādād varaṃ putraṃ mṛtaṃ pañca-janodarāt // BhP_03.03.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2630: samāhutā bhīṣmaka-kanyayā ye śriyaḥ savarṇena bubhūṣayaiṣām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2631: gāndharva-vṛttyā miṣatāṃ sva-bhāgaṃ jahre padaṃ mūrdhni dadhat suparṇaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2635: priyaṃ prabhur grāmya iva priyāyā vidhitsur ārcchad dyutaruṃ yad-arthe /
GP10bhp1-12u:2636: vajry ādravat taṃ sa-gaṇo ruṣāndhaḥ krīḍā-mṛgo nūnam ayaṃ vadhūnām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2637: sutaṃ mṛdhe khaṃ vapuṣā grasantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sunābhonmathitaṃ dharitryā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2638: āmantritas tat-tanayāya śeṣaṃ dattvā tad-antaḥ-puram āviveśa //
GP10bhp1-12u:2639: tatrāhṛtās tā nara-deva-kanyāḥ kujena dṛṣṭvā harim ārta-bandhum /
GP10bhp1-12u:2642: sa-vidhaṃ jagṛhe pāṇīn anurūpaḥ sva-māyayā // BhP_03.03.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2644: ekaikasyāṃ daśa daśa prakṛter vibubhūṣayā // BhP_03.03.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2646: ajīghanat svayaṃ divyaṃ sva-puṃsāṃ teja ādiśat // BhP_03.03.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2647: śambaraṃ dvividaṃ bāṇaṃ muraṃ balvalam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:2648: anyāṃś ca dantavakrādīn avadhīt kāṃś ca ghātayat // BhP_03.03.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2649: atha te bhrātṛ-putrāṇāṃ pakṣayoḥ patitān nṛpān /
GP10bhp1-12u:2650: cacāla bhūḥ kurukṣetraṃ yeṣām āpatatāṃ balaiḥ // BhP_03.03.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2652: suyodhanaṃ sānucaraṃ śayānaṃ bhagnorum ūrvyāṃ na nananda paśyan //
GP10bhp1-12u:2654: aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇiko mad-aṃśair āste balaṃ durviṣahaṃ yadūnām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2656: naiṣāṃ vadhopāya iyān ato 'nyo mayy udyate 'ntardadhate svayaṃ sma //
GP10bhp1-12u:2657: evaṃ sañcintya bhagavān sva-rājye sthāpya dharmajam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2658: nandayām āsa suhṛdaḥ sādhūnāṃ vartma darśayan // BhP_03.03.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2660: sa vai drauṇy-astra-sampluṣṭaḥ punar bhagavatā dhṛtaḥ // BhP_03.03.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2662: so 'pi kṣmām anujai rakṣan reme kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ // BhP_03.03.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2664: kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ // BhP_03.03.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2667: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva ramayan sutarāṃ yadūn /
GP10bhp1-12u:2672: ko viśrambheta yogena yogeśvaram anuvrataḥ // BhP_03.03.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2676: yayuḥ prabhāsaṃ saṃhṛṣṭā rathair deva-vimohitāḥ // BhP_03.03.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2677: tatra snātvā pit-n devān ṛṣīṃś caiva tad-ambhasā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2678: tarpayitvātha viprebhyo gāvo bahu-guṇā daduḥ // BhP_03.03.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2680: yānaṃ rathān ibhān kanyā dharāṃ vṛtti-karīm api // BhP_03.03.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2682: go-viprārthāsavaḥ śūrāḥ praṇemur bhuvi mūrdhabhiḥ // BhP_03.03.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2683: BhP_03.04.001/0 uddhava uvāca atha te tad-anujñātā bhuktvā pītvā ca vāruṇīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:2684: tayā vibhraṃśita-jñānā duruktair marma paspṛśuḥ // BhP_03.04.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2686: nimlocati ravāv āsīd veṇūnām iva mardanam // BhP_03.04.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2687: bhagavān svātma-māyāyā gatiṃ tām avalokya saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2690: badarīṃ tvaṃ prayāhīti sva-kulaṃ sañjihīrṣuṇā // BhP_03.04.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2693: adrākṣam ekam āsīnaṃ vicinvan dayitaṃ patim /
GP10bhp1-12u:2696: dorbhiś caturbhir viditaṃ pīta-kauśāmbareṇa ca // BhP_03.04.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2700: lokān anucaran siddha āsasāda yadṛcchayā // BhP_03.04.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2702: āśṛṇvato mām anurāga-hāsa- samīkṣayā viśramayann uvāca // BhP_03.04.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2703: BhP_03.04.011/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca vedāham antar manasīpsitaṃ te dadāmi yat tad duravāpam anyaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2704: satre purā viśva-sṛjāṃ vasūnāṃ mat-siddhi-kāmena vaso tvayeṣṭaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2705: sa eṣa sādho caramo bhavānām āsāditas te mad-anugraho yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2706: yan māṃ nṛlokān raha utsṛjantaṃ diṣṭyā dadṛśvān viśadānuvṛttyā //
GP10bhp1-12u:2707: purā mayā proktam ajāya nābhye padme niṣaṇṇāya mamādi-sarge /
GP10bhp1-12u:2708: jñānaṃ paraṃ man-mahimāvabhāsaṃ yat sūrayo bhāgavataṃ vadanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:2710: snehottha-romā skhalitākṣaras taṃ muñcañ chucaḥ prāñjalir ābabhāṣe //
GP10bhp1-12u:2711: ko nv īśa te pāda-saroja-bhājāṃ sudurlabho 'rtheṣu caturṣv apīha /
GP10bhp1-12u:2713: karmāṇy anīhasya bhavo 'bhavasya te durgāśrayo 'thāri-bhayāt palāyanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2714: kālātmano yat pramadā-yutāśramaḥ svātman-rateḥ khidyati dhīr vidām iha //
GP10bhp1-12u:2715: mantreṣu māṃ vā upahūya yat tvam akuṇṭhitākhaṇḍa-sadātma-bodhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2716: pṛccheḥ prabho mugdha ivāpramattas tan no mano mohayatīva deva //
GP10bhp1-12u:2717: jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ provāca kasmai bhagavān samagram /
GP10bhp1-12u:2718: api kṣamaṃ no grahaṇāya bhartar vadāñjasā yad vṛjinaṃ tarema //
GP10bhp1-12u:2719: ity āvedita-hārdāya mahyaṃ sa bhagavān paraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2722: praṇamya pādau parivṛtya devam ihāgato 'haṃ virahāturātmā // BhP_03.04.020
GP10bhp1-12u:2725: yatra nārāyaṇo devo naraś ca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2726: mṛdu tīvraṃ tapo dīrghaṃ tepāte loka-bhāvanau // BhP_03.04.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2727: BhP_03.04.023/0 śrī-śuka uvāca ity uddhavād upākarṇya suhṛdāṃ duḥsahaṃ vadham /
GP10bhp1-12u:2728: jñānenāśamayat kṣattā śokam utpatitaṃ budhaḥ // BhP_03.04.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2731: BhP_03.04.025/0 vidura uvāca jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ yad āha yogeśvara īśvaras te /
GP10bhp1-12u:2732: vaktuṃ bhavān no 'rhati yad dhi viṣṇor bhṛtyāḥ sva-bhṛtyārtha-kṛtaś
GP10bhp1-12u:2734: BhP_03.04.026/0 uddhava uvāca nanu te tattva-saṃrādhya ṛṣiḥ kauṣāravo 'ntike /
GP10bhp1-12u:2736: BhP_03.04.027/0 śrī-śuka uvāca iti saha vidureṇa viśva-mūrter guṇa-kathayā sudhayā plāvitorutāpaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:2737: kṣaṇam iva puline yamasvasus tāṃ samuṣita aupagavir niśāṃ tato 'gāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:2738: BhP_03.04.028/0 rājovāca nidhanam upagateṣu vṛṣṇi-bhojeṣv adhiratha-yūthapa-yūthapeṣu mukhyaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:2739: sa tu katham avaśiṣṭa uddhavo yad dharir api tatyaja ākṛtiṃ tryadhīśaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2742: saṃhṛtya sva-kulaṃ sphītaṃ tyakṣyan deham acintayat // BhP_03.04.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2743: asmāl lokād uparate mayi jñānaṃ mad-āśrayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2744: arhaty uddhava evāddhā sampraty ātmavatāṃ varaḥ // BhP_03.04.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2745: noddhavo 'ṇv api man-nyūno yad guṇair nārditaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2746: ato mad-vayunaṃ lokaṃ grāhayann iha tiṣṭhatu // BhP_03.04.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2748: badaryāśramam āsādya harim īje samādhinā // BhP_03.04.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2754: dhyāyan gate bhāgavate ruroda prema-vihvalaḥ // BhP_03.04.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2756: prāpadyata svaḥ-saritaṃ yatra mitrā-suto muniḥ // BhP_03.04.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2757: BhP_03.05.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca dvāri dyu-nadyā ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇāṃ maitreyam āsīnam agādha-bodham
GP10bhp1-12u:2759: BhP_03.05.002/0 vidura uvāca sukhāya karmāṇi karoti loko na taiḥ sukhaṃ vānyad-upāramaṃ vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2760: vindeta bhūyas tata eva duḥkhaṃ yad atra yuktaṃ bhagavān vaden naḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2761: janasya kṛṣṇād vimukhasya daivād adharma-śīlasya suduḥkhitasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:2762: anugrahāyeha caranti nūnaṃ bhūtāni bhavyāni janārdanasya // BhP_03.05.003
GP10bhp1-12u:2763: tat sādhu-varyādiśa vartma śaṃ naḥ saṃrādhito bhagavān yena puṃsām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2764: hṛdi sthito yacchati bhakti-pūte jñānaṃ sa-tattvādhigamaṃ purāṇam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2765: karoti karmāṇi kṛtāvatāro yāny ātma-tantro bhagavāṃs tryadhīśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2766: yathā sasarjāgra idaṃ nirīhaḥ saṃsthāpya vṛttiṃ jagato vidhatte //
GP10bhp1-12u:2767: yathā punaḥ sve kha idaṃ niveśya śete guhāyāṃ sa nivṛtta-vṛttiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2768: yogeśvarādhīśvara eka etad anupraviṣṭo bahudhā yathāsīt // BhP_03.05.006
GP10bhp1-12u:2769: krīḍan vidhatte dvija-go-surāṇāṃ kṣemāya karmāṇy avatāra-bhedaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2770: mano na tṛpyaty api śṛṇvatāṃ naḥ suśloka-mauleś caritāmṛtāni //
GP10bhp1-12u:2771: yais tattva-bhedair adhiloka-nātho lokān alokān saha lokapālān /
GP10bhp1-12u:2772: acīkḷpad yatra hi sarva-sattva- nikāya-bhedo 'dhikṛtaḥ pratītaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2773: yena prajānām uta ātma-karma- rūpābhidhānāṃ ca bhidāṃ vyadhatta /
GP10bhp1-12u:2774: nārāyaṇo viśvasṛg ātma-yonir etac ca no varṇaya vipra-varya //
GP10bhp1-12u:2775: parāvareṣāṃ bhagavan vratāni śrutāni me vyāsa-mukhād abhīkṣṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2777: kas tṛpnuyāt tīrtha-pado 'bhidhānāt satreṣu vaḥ sūribhir īḍyamānāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:2778: yaḥ karṇa-nāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhava-pradāṃ geha-ratiṃ chinatti //
GP10bhp1-12u:2779: munir vivakṣur bhagavad-guṇānāṃ sakhāpi te bhāratam āha kṛṣṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2780: yasmin nṛṇāṃ grāmya-sukhānuvādair matir gṛhītā nu hareḥ kathāyām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2781: sā śraddadhānasya vivardhamānā viraktim anyatra karoti puṃsaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2783: tāñ chocya-śocyān avido 'nuśoce hareḥ kathāyāṃ vimukhān aghena /
GP10bhp1-12u:2784: kṣiṇoti devo 'nimiṣas tu yeṣām āyur vṛthā-vāda-gati-smṛtīnām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2785: tad asya kauṣārava śarma-dātur hareḥ kathām eva kathāsu sāram /
GP10bhp1-12u:2786: uddhṛtya puṣpebhya ivārta-bandho śivāya naḥ kīrtaya tīrtha-kīrteḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2788: cakāra karmāṇy atipūruṣāṇi yānīśvaraḥ kīrtaya tāni mahyam // BhP_03.05.016
GP10bhp1-12u:2789: BhP_03.05.017/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sa evaṃ bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā kauṣāravo muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2790: puṃsāṃ niḥśreyasārthena tam āha bahu-mānayan // BhP_03.05.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2791: BhP_03.05.018/0 maitreya uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho lokān sādhv anugṛhṇatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2794: gṛhīto 'nanya-bhāvena yat tvayā harir īśvaraḥ // BhP_03.05.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2796: bhrātuḥ kṣetre bhujiṣyāyāṃ jātaḥ satyavatī-sutāt // BhP_03.05.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2797: bhavān bhagavato nityaṃ sammataḥ sānugasya ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:2798: yasya jñānopadeśāya mādiśad bhagavān vrajan // BhP_03.05.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2801: bhagavān eka āsedam agra ātmātmanāṃ vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2803: sa vā eṣa tadā draṣṭā nāpaśyad dṛśyam ekarāṭ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2805: sā vā etasya saṃdraṣṭuḥ śaktiḥ sad-asad-ātmikā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2806: māyā nāma mahā-bhāga yayedaṃ nirmame vibhuḥ // BhP_03.05.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2812: ātmānaṃ vyakarod ātmā viśvasyāsya sisṛkṣayā // BhP_03.05.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2815: vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tridhā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2817: vaikārikāś ca ye devā arthābhivyañjanaṃ yataḥ // BhP_03.05.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2819: tāmaso bhūta-sūkṣmādir yataḥ khaṃ liṅgam ātmanaḥ // BhP_03.05.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2823: sasarja rūpa-tanmātraṃ jyotir lokasya locanam // BhP_03.05.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2829: teṣāṃ parānusaṃsargād yathā saṅkhyaṃ guṇān viduḥ // BhP_03.05.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2831: nānātvāt sva-kriyānīśāḥ procuḥ prāñjalayo vibhum // BhP_03.05.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2832: BhP_03.05.038/0 devā ūcuḥ namāma te deva padāravindaṃ prapanna-tāpopaśamātapatram /
GP10bhp1-12u:2834: dhātar yad asmin bhava īśa jīvās tāpa-trayeṇābhihatā na śarma /
GP10bhp1-12u:2835: ātman labhante bhagavaṃs tavāṅghri- cchāyāṃ sa-vidyām ata āśrayema //
GP10bhp1-12u:2836: mārganti yat te mukha-padma-nīḍaiś chandaḥ-suparṇair ṛṣayo vivikte /
GP10bhp1-12u:2838: yac chraddhayā śrutavatyā ca bhaktyā sammṛjyamāne hṛdaye 'vadhāya /
GP10bhp1-12u:2839: jñānena vairāgya-balena dhīrā vrajema tat te 'ṅghri-saroja-pīṭham //
GP10bhp1-12u:2841: vrajema sarve śaraṇaṃ yad īśa smṛtaṃ prayacchaty abhayaṃ sva-puṃsām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2842: yat sānubandhe 'sati deha-gehe mamāham ity ūḍha-durāgrahāṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2843: puṃsāṃ sudūraṃ vasato 'pi puryāṃ bhajema tat te bhagavan padābjam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2844: tān vai hy asad-vṛttibhir akṣibhir ye parāhṛtāntar-manasaḥ pareśa /
GP10bhp1-12u:2845: atho na paśyanty urugāya nūnaṃ ye te padanyāsa-vilāsa-lakṣyāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2846: pānena te deva kathā-sudhāyāḥ pravṛddha-bhaktyā viśadāśayā ye /
GP10bhp1-12u:2848: tathāpare cātma-samādhi-yoga- balena jitvā prakṛtiṃ baliṣṭhām /
GP10bhp1-12u:2849: tvām eva dhīrāḥ puruṣaṃ viśanti teṣāṃ śramaḥ syān na tu sevayā te //
GP10bhp1-12u:2850: tat te vayaṃ loka-sisṛkṣayādya tvayānusṛṣṭās tribhir ātmabhiḥ sma /
GP10bhp1-12u:2851: sarve viyuktāḥ sva-vihāra-tantraṃ na śaknumas tat pratihartave te //
GP10bhp1-12u:2852: yāvad baliṃ te 'ja harāma kāle yathā vayaṃ cānnam adāma yatra /
GP10bhp1-12u:2853: yathobhayeṣāṃ ta ime hi lokā baliṃ haranto 'nnam adanty anūhāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2854: tvaṃ naḥ surāṇām asi sānvayānāṃ kūṭa-stha ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2855: tvaṃ deva śaktyāṃ guṇa-karma-yonau retas tv ajāyāṃ kavim ādadhe 'jaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:2856: tato vayaṃ mat-pramukhā yad-arthe babhūvimātman karavāma kiṃ te /
GP10bhp1-12u:2857: tvaṃ naḥ sva-cakṣuḥ paridehi śaktyā deva kriyārthe yad-anugrahāṇām //
GP10bhp1-12u:2858: BhP_03.06.001/0 ṛṣir uvāca iti tāsāṃ sva-śaktīnāṃ satīnām asametya saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2861: trayoviṃśati tattvānāṃ gaṇaṃ yugapad āviśat // BhP_03.06.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2863: bhinnaṃ saṃyojayām āsa suptaṃ karma prabodhayan // BhP_03.06.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2867: cukṣobhānyonyam āsādya yasmin lokāś carācarāḥ // BhP_03.06.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2874: sādhyātmaḥ sādhidaivaś ca sādhibhūta iti tridhā /
GP10bhp1-12u:2875: virāṭ prāṇo daśa-vidha ekadhā hṛdayena ca // BhP_03.06.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2877: virājam atapat svena tejasaiṣāṃ vivṛttaye // BhP_03.06.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2879: nirabhidyanta devānāṃ tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu // BhP_03.06.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2881: vācā svāṃśena vaktavyaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate // BhP_03.06.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2883: jihvayāṃśena ca rasaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate // BhP_03.06.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2884: nirbhinne aśvinau nāse viṣṇor āviśatāṃ padam /
GP10bhp1-12u:2885: ghrāṇenāṃśena gandhasya pratipattir yato bhavet // BhP_03.06.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2887: cakṣuṣāṃśena rūpāṇāṃ pratipattir yato bhavet // BhP_03.06.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2890: karṇāv asya vinirbhinnau dhiṣṇyaṃ svaṃ viviśur diśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2891: śrotreṇāṃśena śabdasya siddhiṃ yena prapadyate // BhP_03.06.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2892: tvacam asya vinirbhinnāṃ viviśur dhiṣṇyam oṣadhīḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2893: aṃśena romabhiḥ kaṇḍūṃ yair asau pratipadyate // BhP_03.06.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2894: meḍhraṃ tasya vinirbhinnaṃ sva-dhiṣṇyaṃ ka upāviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2896: gudaṃ puṃso vinirbhinnaṃ mitro lokeśa āviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2898: hastāv asya vinirbhinnāv indraḥ svar-patir āviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2899: vārtayāṃśena puruṣo yayā vṛttiṃ prapadyate // BhP_03.06.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2900: pādāv asya vinirbhinnau lokeśo viṣṇur āviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2901: gatyā svāṃśena puruṣo yayā prāpyaṃ prapadyate // BhP_03.06.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2902: buddhiṃ cāsya vinirbhinnāṃ vāg-īśo dhiṣṇyam āviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2903: bodhenāṃśena boddhavyam pratipattir yato bhavet // BhP_03.06.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2904: hṛdayaṃ cāsya nirbhinnaṃ candramā dhiṣṇyam āviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2908: sattvaṃ cāsya vinirbhinnaṃ mahān dhiṣṇyam upāviśat /
GP10bhp1-12u:2910: śīrṣṇo 'sya dyaur dharā padbhyāṃ khaṃ nābher udapadyata /
GP10bhp1-12u:2911: guṇānāṃ vṛttayo yeṣu pratīyante surādayaḥ // BhP_03.06.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2913: dharāṃ rajaḥ-svabhāvena paṇayo ye ca tān anu // BhP_03.06.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2915: ubhayor antaraṃ vyoma ye rudra-pārṣadāṃ gaṇāḥ // BhP_03.06.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2917: yas tūnmukhatvād varṇānāṃ mukhyo 'bhūd brāhmaṇo guruḥ // BhP_03.06.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2919: yo jātas trāyate varṇān pauruṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-kṣatāt // BhP_03.06.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2921: vaiśyas tad-udbhavo vārtāṃ nṛṇāṃ yaḥ samavartayat // BhP_03.06.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2923: tasyāṃ jātaḥ purā śūdro yad-vṛttyā tuṣyate hariḥ // BhP_03.06.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2924: ete varṇāḥ sva-dharmeṇa yajanti sva-guruṃ harim /
GP10bhp1-12u:2929: kīrtiṃ hareḥ svāṃ sat-kartuṃ giram anyābhidhāsatīm // BhP_03.06.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2930: ekānta-lābhaṃ vacaso nu puṃsāṃ suśloka-mauler guṇa-vādam āhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2931: śruteś ca vidvadbhir upākṛtāyāṃ kathā-sudhāyām upasamprayogam //
GP10bhp1-12u:2934: ato bhagavato māyā māyinām api mohinī /
GP10bhp1-12u:2935: yat svayaṃ cātma-vartmātmā na veda kim utāpare // BhP_03.06.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2936: yato 'prāpya nyavartanta vācaś ca manasā saha /
GP10bhp1-12u:2937: ahaṃ cānya ime devās tasmai bhagavate namaḥ // BhP_03.06.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2938: BhP_03.07.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ maitreyaṃ dvaipāyana-suto budhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2939: prīṇayann iva bhāratyā viduraḥ pratyabhāṣata // BhP_03.07.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2940: BhP_03.07.002/0 vidura uvāca brahman kathaṃ bhagavataś cin-mātrasyāvikāriṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2941: līlayā cāpi yujyeran nirguṇasya guṇāḥ kriyāḥ // BhP_03.07.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2943: svatas-tṛptasya ca kathaṃ nivṛttasya sadānyataḥ // BhP_03.07.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2945: tayā saṃsthāpayaty etad bhūyaḥ pratyapidhāsyati // BhP_03.07.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2949: amuṣya durbhagatvaṃ vā kleśo vā karmabhiḥ kutaḥ // BhP_03.07.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2951: tan naḥ parāṇuda vibho kaśmalaṃ mānasaṃ mahat // BhP_03.07.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2952: BhP_03.07.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sa itthaṃ coditaḥ kṣattrā tattva-jijñāsunā muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2953: pratyāha bhagavac-cittaḥ smayann iva gata-smayaḥ // BhP_03.07.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2954: BhP_03.07.009/0 maitreya uvāca seyaṃ bhagavato māyā yan nayena virudhyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:2955: īśvarasya vimuktasya kārpaṇyam uta bandhanam // BhP_03.07.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2958: yathā jale candramasaḥ kampādis tat-kṛto guṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2959: dṛśyate 'sann api draṣṭur ātmano 'nātmano guṇaḥ // BhP_03.07.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2963: vilīyante tadā kleśāḥ saṃsuptasyeva kṛtsnaśaḥ // BhP_03.07.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2965: kiṃ vā punas tac-caraṇāravinda- parāga-sevā-ratir ātma-labdhā //
GP10bhp1-12u:2966: BhP_03.07.015/0 vidura uvāca sañchinnaḥ saṃśayo mahyaṃ tava sūktāsinā vibho /
GP10bhp1-12u:2967: ubhayatrāpi bhagavan mano me sampradhāvati // BhP_03.07.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2968: sādhv etad vyāhṛtaṃ vidvan nātma-māyāyanaṃ hareḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2969: ābhāty apārthaṃ nirmūlaṃ viśva-mūlaṃ na yad bahiḥ // BhP_03.07.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2970: yaś ca mūḍhatamo loke yaś ca buddheḥ paraṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2971: tāv ubhau sukham edhete kliśyaty antarito janaḥ // BhP_03.07.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2973: tāṃ cāpi yuṣmac-caraṇa- sevayāhaṃ parāṇude // BhP_03.07.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2975: rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ // BhP_03.07.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2979: tebhyo virājam uddhṛtya tam anu prāviśad vibhuḥ // BhP_03.07.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2981: yatra viśva ime lokāḥ sa-vikāśaṃ ta āsate // BhP_03.07.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2983: tvayerito yato varṇās tad-vibhūtīr vadasva naḥ // BhP_03.07.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2984: yatra putraiś ca pautraiś ca naptṛbhiḥ saha gotrajaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:2985: prajā vicitrākṛtaya āsan yābhir idaṃ tatam // BhP_03.07.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2986: prajāpatīnāṃ sa patiś cakḷpe kān prajāpatīn /
GP10bhp1-12u:2987: sargāṃś caivānusargāṃś ca manūn manvantarādhipān // BhP_03.07.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2988: eteṣām api vedāṃś ca vaṃśānucaritāni ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:2989: upary adhaś ca ye lokā bhūmer mitrātmajāsate // BhP_03.07.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2990: teṣāṃ saṃsthāṃ pramāṇaṃ ca bhūr-lokasya ca varṇaya /
GP10bhp1-12u:2996: ṛṣīṇāṃ janma-karmāṇi vedasya ca vikarṣaṇam // BhP_03.07.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:2997: yajñasya ca vitānāni yogasya ca pathaḥ prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:2998: naiṣkarmyasya ca sāṅkhyasya tantraṃ vā bhagavat-smṛtam // BhP_03.07.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3000: jīvasya gatayo yāś ca yāvatīr guṇa-karmajāḥ // BhP_03.07.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3002: vārtāyā daṇḍa-nīteś ca śrutasya ca vidhiṃ pṛthak // BhP_03.07.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3003: śrāddhasya ca vidhiṃ brahman pit-ṇāṃ sargam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:3005: dānasya tapaso vāpi yac ceṣṭā-pūrtayoḥ phalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:3006: pravāsa-sthasya yo dharmo yaś ca puṃsa utāpadi // BhP_03.07.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3007: yena vā bhagavāṃs tuṣyed dharma-yonir janārdanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3008: samprasīdati vā yeṣām etad ākhyāhi me 'nagha // BhP_03.07.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3010: anāpṛṣṭam api brūyur guravo dīna-vatsalāḥ // BhP_03.07.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3012: tatremaṃ ka upāsīran ka u svid anuśerate // BhP_03.07.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3013: puruṣasya ca saṃsthānaṃ svarūpaṃ vā parasya ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:3014: jñānaṃ ca naigamaṃ yat tad guru-śiṣya-prayojanam // BhP_03.07.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3016: svato jñānaṃ kutaḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktir vairāgyam eva vā // BhP_03.07.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3017: etān me pṛcchataḥ praśnān hareḥ karma-vivitsayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:3018: brūhi me 'jñasya mitratvād ajayā naṣṭa-cakṣuṣaḥ // BhP_03.07.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3019: sarve vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapo dānāni cānagha /
GP10bhp1-12u:3020: jīvābhaya-pradānasya na kurvīran kalām api // BhP_03.07.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3021: BhP_03.07.042/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sa ittham āpṛṣṭa-purāṇa-kalpaḥ kuru-pradhānena muni-pradhānaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:3022: pravṛddha-harṣo bhagavat-kathāyāṃ sañcoditas taṃ prahasann ivāha //
GP10bhp1-12u:3023: BhP_03.08.001/0 maitreya uvāca sat-sevanīyo bata pūru-vaṃśo yal loka-pālo bhagavat-pradhānaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:3025: so 'haṃ nṛṇāṃ kṣulla-sukhāya duḥkhaṃ mahad gatānāṃ viramāya tasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:3026: pravartaye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yad āha sākṣād bhagavān ṛṣibhyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:3027: āsīnam urvyāṃ bhagavantam ādyaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ devam akuṇṭha-sattvam /
GP10bhp1-12u:3028: vivitsavas tattvam ataḥ parasya kumāra-mukhyā munayo 'nvapṛcchan //
GP10bhp1-12u:3029: svam eva dhiṣṇyaṃ bahu mānayantaṃ yad vāsudevābhidham āmananti /
GP10bhp1-12u:3032: padmaṃ yad arcanty ahi-rāja-kanyāḥ sa-prema nānā-balibhir varārthāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:3033: muhur gṛṇanto vacasānurāga- skhalat-padenāsya kṛtāni taj-jñāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3036: sanat-kumārāya sa cāha pṛṣṭaḥ sāṅkhyāyanāyāṅga dhṛta-vratāya //
GP10bhp1-12u:3039: provāca mahyaṃ sa dayālur ukto muniḥ pulastyena purāṇam ādyam /

GP10bhp1-12u:3300: tam evāhur yugaṃ taj-jñā yatra dharmo vidhīyate // BhP_03.11.020 //

GP10bhp1-12u:3313: manv-ādibhir idaṃ viśvam avaty udita-pauruṣaḥ // BhP_03.11.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3316: tam evānv api dhīyante lokā bhūr-ādayas trayaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3328: pūrvasyādau parārdhasya brāhmo nāma mahān abhūt /

GP10bhp1-12u:3330: tasyaiva cānte kalpo 'bhūd yaṃ pādmam abhicakṣate /

GP10bhp1-12u:3332: ayaṃ tu kathitaḥ kalpo dvitīyasyāpi bhārata /

GP10bhp1-12u:3337: naiveśituṃ prabhur bhūmna īśvaro dhāma-māninām // BhP_03.11.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3341: lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ // BhP_03.11.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3343: viṣṇor dhāma paraṃ sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ // BhP_03.11.041 //

GP10bhp1-12u:3345: mahimā veda-garbho 'tha yathāsrākṣīn nibodha me // BhP_03.12.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3347: mahāmohaṃ ca mohaṃ ca tamaś cājñāna-vṛttayaḥ // BhP_03.12.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3348: dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nātmānaṃ bahv amanyata /

GP10bhp1-12u:3352: tān babhāṣe svabhūḥ putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3358: sa vai ruroda devānāṃ pūrvajo bhagavān bhavaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3360: iti tasya vacaḥ pādmo bhagavān paripālayan /
GP10bhp1-12u:3361: abhyadhād bhadrayā vācā mā rodīs tat karomi te // BhP_03.12.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3362: yad arodīḥ sura-śreṣṭha sodvega iva bālakaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3363: tatas tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudra iti prajāḥ // BhP_03.12.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3364: hṛd indriyāṇy asur vyoma vāyur agnir jalaṃ mahī /

GP10bhp1-12u:3366: manyur manur mahinaso mahāñ chiva ṛtadhvajaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3368: dhīr dhṛti-rasalomā ca niyut sarpir ilāmbikā /
GP10bhp1-12u:3369: irāvatī svadhā dīkṣā rudrāṇyo rudra te striyaḥ // BhP_03.12.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3371: ebhiḥ sṛja prajā bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ // BhP_03.12.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3377: mayā saha dahantībhir diśaś cakṣurbhir ulbaṇaiḥ // BhP_03.12.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3379: tapasaiva yathā pūrvaṃ sraṣṭā viśvam idaṃ bhavān // BhP_03.12.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3382: BhP_03.12.020/0 maitreya uvāca evam ātmabhuvādiṣṭaḥ parikramya girāṃ patim /
GP10bhp1-12u:3383: bāḍham ity amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam // BhP_03.12.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3387: bhṛgur vasiṣṭho dakṣaś ca daśamas tatra nāradaḥ // BhP_03.12.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3389: prāṇād vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjāto bhṛgus tvaci karāt kratuḥ // BhP_03.12.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3390: pulaho nābhito jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayor ṛṣiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3392: dharmaḥ stanād dakṣiṇato yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:3393: adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasmān mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ // BhP_03.12.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3394: hṛdi kāmo bhruvaḥ krodho lobhaś cādhara-dacchadāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:3395: āsyād vāk sindhavo meḍhrān nirṛtiḥ pāyor aghāśrayaḥ // BhP_03.12.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3396: chāyāyāḥ kardamo jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3398: vācaṃ duhitaraṃ tanvīṃ svayambhūr haratīṃ manaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3400: tam adharme kṛta-matiṃ vilokya pitaraṃ sutāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3402: naitat pūrvaiḥ kṛtaṃ tvad ye na kariṣyanti cāpare /

GP10bhp1-12u:3404: tejīyasām api hy etan na suślokyaṃ jagad-guro /
GP10bhp1-12u:3405: yad-vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate // BhP_03.12.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3406: tasmai namo bhagavate ya idaṃ svena rociṣā /

GP10bhp1-12u:3408: sa itthaṃ gṛṇataḥ putrān puro dṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn /

GP10bhp1-12u:3411: kadācid dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭur vedā āsaṃś catur-mukhāt /

GP10bhp1-12u:3415: BhP_03.12.036/0 vidura uvāca sa vai viśva-sṛjām īśo vedādīn mukhato 'sṛjat /
GP10bhp1-12u:3416: yad yad yenāsṛjad devas tan me brūhi tapo-dhana // BhP_03.12.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3417: BhP_03.12.037/0 maitreya uvāca ṛg-yajuḥ-sāmātharvākhyān vedān pūrvādibhir mukhaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3418: śāstram ijyāṃ stuti-stomaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vyadhāt kramāt // BhP_03.12.037 //

GP10bhp1-12u:3427: sāvitraṃ prājāpatyaṃ ca brāhmaṃ cātha bṛhat tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:3428: vārtā sañcaya-śālīna- śiloñcha iti vai gṛhe // BhP_03.12.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3430: nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvaṃ bahvodo haṃsa-niṣkriyau // BhP_03.12.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3431: ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍa-nītis tathaiva ca /

GP10bhp1-12u:3447: kasya rūpam abhūd dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate /
GP10bhp1-12u:3449: yas tu tatra pumān so 'bhūn manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ svarāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3454: ākūtir devahūtiś ca prasūtir iti sattama // BhP_03.12.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3455: ākūtiṃ rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām /

GP10bhp1-12u:3457: BhP_03.13.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca niśamya vācaṃ vadato muneḥ puṇyatamāṃ nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:3459: BhP_03.13.002/0 vidura uvāca sa vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāṭ priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3460: pratilabhya priyāṃ patnīṃ kiṃ cakāra tato mune // BhP_03.13.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3462: brūhi me śraddadhānāya viṣvaksenāśrayo hy asau // BhP_03.13.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3463: śrutasya puṃsāṃ sucira-śramasya nanv añjasā sūribhir īḍito 'rthaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:3467: BhP_03.13.006/0 maitreya uvāca yadā sva-bhāryayā sārdhaṃ jātaḥ svāyambhuvo manuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3468: prāñjaliḥ praṇataś cedaṃ veda-garbham abhāṣata // BhP_03.13.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3469: tvam ekaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ janma-kṛd vṛttidaḥ pitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:3470: tathāpi naḥ prajānāṃ te śuśrūṣā kena vā bhavet // BhP_03.13.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3471: tad vidhehi namas tubhyaṃ karmasv īḍyātma-śaktiṣu /
GP10bhp1-12u:3472: yat kṛtveha yaśo viṣvag amutra ca bhaved gatiḥ // BhP_03.13.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3473: BhP_03.13.009/0 brahmovāca prītas tubhyam ahaṃ tāta svasti stād vāṃ kṣitīśvara /
GP10bhp1-12u:3474: yan nirvyalīkena hṛdā śādhi mety ātmanārpitam // BhP_03.13.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3475: etāvaty ātmajair vīra kāryā hy apacitir gurau /
GP10bhp1-12u:3477: sa tvam asyām apatyāni sadṛśāny ātmano guṇaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3478: utpādya śāsa dharmeṇa gāṃ yajñaiḥ puruṣaṃ yaja // BhP_03.13.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3479: paraṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ syāt prajā-rakṣayā nṛpa /

GP10bhp1-12u:3482: teṣāṃ śramo hy apārthāya yad ātmā nādṛtaḥ svayam // BhP_03.13.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3483: BhP_03.13.014/0 manur uvāca ādeśe 'haṃ bhagavato varteyāmīva-sūdana /
GP10bhp1-12u:3484: sthānaṃ tv ihānujānīhi prajānāṃ mama ca prabho // BhP_03.13.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3485: yad okaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ mahī magnā mahāmbhasi /

GP10bhp1-12u:3487: BhP_03.13.016/0 maitreya uvāca parameṣṭhī tv apāṃ madhye tathā sannām avekṣya gām /
GP10bhp1-12u:3488: katham enāṃ samunneṣya iti dadhyau dhiyā ciram // BhP_03.13.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3489: sṛjato me kṣitir vārbhiḥ plāvyamānā rasāṃ gatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:3491: yasyāhaṃ hṛdayād āsaṃ sa īśo vidadhātu me // BhP_03.13.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3495: gaja-mātraḥ pravavṛdhe tad adbhutam abhūn mahat // BhP_03.13.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3497: dṛṣṭvā tat saukaraṃ rūpaṃ tarkayām āsa citradhā // BhP_03.13.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3498: kim etat sūkara-vyājaṃ sattvaṃ divyam avasthitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:3499: aho batāścaryam idaṃ nāsāyā me viniḥsṛtam // BhP_03.13.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3501: api svid bhagavān eṣa yajño me khedayan manaḥ // BhP_03.13.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:3502: iti mīmāṃsatas tasya brahmaṇaḥ saha sūnubhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3504: brahmāṇaṃ harṣayām āsa haris tāṃś ca dvijottamān /
GP10bhp1-12u:3506: niśamya te ghargharitaṃ sva-kheda- kṣayiṣṇu māyāmaya-sūkarasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:3507: janas-tapaḥ-satya-nivāsinas te tribhiḥ pavitrair munayo 'gṛṇan sma //
GP10bhp1-12u:3509: vinadya bhūyo vibudhodayāya gajendra-līlo jalam āviveśa // BhP_03.13.026
GP10bhp1-12u:3510: utkṣipta-vālaḥ kha-caraḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṭā vidhunvan khara-romaśa-tvak /
GP10bhp1-12u:3511: khurāhatābhraḥ sita-daṃṣṭra īkṣā- jyotir babhāse bhagavān mahīdhraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:3512: ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīṃ vijighran kroḍāpadeśaḥ svayam adhvarāṅgaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3513: karāla-daṃṣṭro 'py akarāla-dṛgbhyām udvīkṣya viprān gṛṇato 'viśat kam //
GP10bhp1-12u:3515: utsṛṣṭa-dīrghormi-bhujair ivārtaś cukrośa yajñeśvara pāhi meti //
GP10bhp1-12u:3516: khuraiḥ kṣuraprair darayaṃs tad āpa utpāra-pāraṃ tri-parū rasāyām /
GP10bhp1-12u:3517: dadarśa gāṃ tatra suṣupsur agre yāṃ jīva-dhānīṃ svayam abhyadhatta //
GP10bhp1-12u:3518: pātāla-mūleśvara-bhoga-saṃhatau vinyasya pādau pṛthivīṃ ca bibhrataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3519: yasyopamāno na babhūva so 'cyuto mamāstu māṅgalya-vivṛddhaye hariḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:3520: sva-daṃṣṭrayoddhṛtya mahīṃ nimagnāṃ sa utthitaḥ saṃruruce rasāyāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3522: jaghāna rundhānam asahya-vikramaṃ sa līlayebhaṃ mṛgarāḍ ivāmbhasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:3526: BhP_03.13.035/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ jitaṃ jitaṃ te 'jita yajña-bhāvana trayīṃ tanuṃ svāṃ paridhunvate namaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:3527: yad-roma-garteṣu nililyur addhayas tasmai namaḥ kāraṇa-sūkarāya te //
GP10bhp1-12u:3528: rūpaṃ tavaitan nanu duṣkṛtātmanāṃ durdarśanaṃ deva yad adhvarātmakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:3529: chandāṃsi yasya tvaci barhi-romasv ājyaṃ dṛśi tv aṅghriṣu cātur-hotram //

GP10bhp1-12u:4529: imā duhitaraḥ satyas tava vatsa sumadhyamāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4530: sargam etaṃ prabhāvaiḥ svair bṛṃhayiṣyanty anekadhā // BhP_03.24.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4532: ātmajāḥ paridehy adya vistṛṇīhi yaśo bhuvi // BhP_03.24.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4534: bhūtānāṃ śevadhiṃ dehaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ kapilaṃ mune // BhP_03.24.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4537: eṣa mānavi te garbhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ kaiṭabhārdanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4540: loke kapila ity ākhyāṃ gantā te kīrti-vardhanaḥ // BhP_03.24.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4541: BhP_03.24.020/0 maitreya uvāca tāv āśvāsya jagat-sraṣṭā kumāraiḥ saha-nāradaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4542: haṃso haṃsena yānena tri-dhāma-paramaṃ yayau // BhP_03.24.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4543: gate śata-dhṛtau kṣattaḥ kardamas tena coditaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4544: yathoditaṃ sva-duhit-ḥ prādād viśva-sṛjāṃ tataḥ // BhP_03.24.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4547: pulahāya gatiṃ yuktāṃ kratave ca kriyāṃ satīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:4548: khyātiṃ ca bhṛgave 'yacchad vasiṣṭhāyāpy arundhatīm // BhP_03.24.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4551: tatas ta ṛṣayaḥ kṣattaḥ kṛta-dārā nimantrya tam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4552: prātiṣṭhan nandim āpannāḥ svaṃ svam āśrama-maṇḍalam // BhP_03.24.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4556: kālena bhūyasā nūnaṃ prasīdantīha devatāḥ // BhP_03.24.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4558: draṣṭuṃ yatante yatayaḥ śūnyāgāreṣu yat-padam // BhP_03.24.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4559: sa eva bhagavān adya helanaṃ na gaṇayya naḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4560: gṛheṣu jāto grāmyāṇāṃ yaḥ svānāṃ pakṣa-poṣaṇaḥ // BhP_03.24.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4561: svīyaṃ vākyam ṛtaṃ kartum avatīrṇo 'si me gṛhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:4562: cikīrṣur bhagavān jñānaṃ bhaktānāṃ māna-vardhanaḥ // BhP_03.24.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4563: tāny eva te 'bhirūpāṇi rūpāṇi bhagavaṃs tava /
GP10bhp1-12u:4564: yāni yāni ca rocante sva-janānām arūpiṇaḥ // BhP_03.24.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4567: paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntaṃ kālaṃ kaviṃ tri-vṛtaṃ loka-pālam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4569: a smābhipṛcche 'dya patiṃ prajānāṃ tvayāvatīrṇarṇa utāpta-kāmaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4570: parivrajat-padavīm āsthito 'haṃ cariṣye tvāṃ hṛdi yuñjan viśokaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:4571: BhP_03.24.035/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayā proktaṃ hi lokasya pramāṇaṃ satya-laukike /
GP10bhp1-12u:4572: athājani mayā tubhyaṃ yad avocam ṛtaṃ mune // BhP_03.24.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4573: etan me janma loke 'smin mumukṣūṇāṃ durāśayāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:4576: taṃ pravartayituṃ deham imaṃ viddhi mayā bhṛtam // BhP_03.24.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4578: jitvā sudurjayaṃ mṛtyum amṛtatvāya māṃ bhaja // BhP_03.24.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4580: ātmany evātmanā vīkṣya viśoko 'bhayam ṛcchasi // BhP_03.24.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4582: vitariṣye yayā cāsau bhayaṃ cātitariṣyati // BhP_03.24.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4583: BhP_03.24.041/0 maitreya uvāca evaṃ samuditas tena kapilena prajāpatiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4584: dakṣiṇī-kṛtya taṃ prīto vanam eva jagāma ha // BhP_03.24.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4585: vrataṃ sa āsthito maunam ātmaika-śaraṇo muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4586: niḥsaṅgo vyacarat kṣoṇīm anagnir aniketanaḥ // BhP_03.24.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4587: mano brahmaṇi yuñjāno yat tat sad-asataḥ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:4589: nirahaṅkṛtir nirmamaś ca nirdvandvaḥ sama-dṛk sva-dṛk /
GP10bhp1-12u:4594: apaśyat sarva-bhūtāni bhagavaty api cātmani // BhP_03.24.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4597: BhP_03.25.001/0 śaunaka uvāca kapilas tattva-saṅkhyātā bhagavān ātma-māyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4598: jātaḥ svayam ajaḥ sākṣād ātma-prajñaptaye nṛṇām // BhP_03.25.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4599: na hy asya varṣmaṇaḥ puṃsāṃ varimṇaḥ sarva-yoginām /
GP10bhp1-12u:4600: viśrutau śruta-devasya bhūri tṛpyanti me 'savaḥ // BhP_03.25.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4602: tāni me śraddadhānasya kīrtanyāny anukīrtaya // BhP_03.25.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4603: BhP_03.25.004/0 sūta uvāca dvaipāyana-sakhas tv evaṃ maitreyo bhagavāṃs tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4604: prāhedaṃ viduraṃ prīta ānvīkṣikyāṃ pracoditaḥ // BhP_03.25.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4605: BhP_03.25.005/0 maitreya uvāca pitari prasthite 'raṇyaṃ mātuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4606: tasmin bindusare 'vātsīd bhagavān kapilaḥ kila // BhP_03.25.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4608: sva-sutaṃ devahūty āha dhātuḥ saṃsmaratī vacaḥ // BhP_03.25.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4609: BhP_03.25.007/0 devahūtir uvāca nirviṇṇā nitarāṃ bhūmann asad-indriya-tarṣaṇāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:4610: yena sambhāvyamānena prapannāndhaṃ tamaḥ prabho // BhP_03.25.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4612: sac-cakṣur janmanām ante labdhaṃ me tvad-anugrahāt // BhP_03.25.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4613: ya ādyo bhagavān puṃsām īśvaro vai bhavān kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:4614: lokasya tamasāndhasya cakṣuḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ // BhP_03.25.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4615: atha me deva sammoham apākraṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:4616: yo 'vagraho 'haṃ mametīty etasmin yojitas tvayā // BhP_03.25.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4617: taṃ tvā gatāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ sva-bhṛtya-saṃsāra-taroḥ kuṭhāram /
GP10bhp1-12u:4618: jijñāsayāhaṃ prakṛteḥ pūruṣasya namāmi sad-dharma-vidāṃ variṣṭham //
GP10bhp1-12u:4619: BhP_03.25.012/0 maitreya uvāca iti sva-mātur niravadyam īpsitaṃ niśamya puṃsām apavarga-vardhanam
GP10bhp1-12u:4621: BhP_03.25.013/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yoga ādhyātmikaḥ puṃsāṃ mato niḥśreyasāya me /
GP10bhp1-12u:4622: atyantoparatir yatra duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca // BhP_03.25.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4623: tam imaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yam avocaṃ purānaghe /
GP10bhp1-12u:4625: cetaḥ khalv asya bandhāya muktaye cātmano matam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4626: guṇeṣu saktaṃ bandhāya rataṃ vā puṃsi muktaye // BhP_03.25.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4628: vītaṃ yadā manaḥ śuddham aduḥkham asukhaṃ samam // BhP_03.25.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4629: tadā puruṣa ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ prakṛteḥ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:4632: paripaśyaty udāsīnaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca hataujasam // BhP_03.25.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4634: sadṛśo 'sti śivaḥ panthā yogināṃ brahma-siddhaye // BhP_03.25.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4635: prasaṅgam ajaraṃ pāśam ātmanaḥ kavayo viduḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4636: sa eva sādhuṣu kṛto mokṣa-dvāram apāvṛtam // BhP_03.25.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4639: mayy ananyena bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām /
GP10bhp1-12u:4641: mad-āśrayāḥ kathā mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:4642: tapanti vividhās tāpā naitān mad-gata-cetasaḥ // BhP_03.25.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4644: saṅgas teṣv atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga-doṣa-harā hi te // BhP_03.25.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4645: satāṃ prasaṅgān mama vīrya-saṃvido bhavanti hṛt-karṇa-rasāyanāḥ kathāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4646: taj-joṣaṇād āśv apavarga-vartmani śraddhā ratir bhaktir anukramiṣyati //
GP10bhp1-12u:4647: bhaktyā pumān jāta-virāga aindriyād dṛṣṭa-śrutān mad-racanānucintayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4648: cittasya yatto grahaṇe yoga-yukto yatiṣyate ṛjubhir yoga-mārgaiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:4650: yogena mayy arpitayā ca bhaktyā māṃ pratyag-ātmānam ihāvarundhe //
GP10bhp1-12u:4651: BhP_03.25.028/0 devahūtir uvāca kācit tvayy ucitā bhaktiḥ kīdṛśī mama gocarā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4652: yayā padaṃ te nirvāṇam añjasānvāśnavā aham // BhP_03.25.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4654: kīdṛśaḥ kati cāṅgāni yatas tattvāvabodhanam // BhP_03.25.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4655: tad etan me vijānīhi yathāhaṃ manda-dhīr hare /
GP10bhp1-12u:4656: sukhaṃ buddhyeya durbodhaṃ yoṣā bhavad-anugrahāt // BhP_03.25.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4657: BhP_03.25.031/0 maitreya uvāca viditvārthaṃ kapilo mātur itthaṃ jāta-sneho yatra tanvābhijātaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:4658: tattvāmnāyaṃ yat pravadanti sāṅkhyaṃ provāca vai bhakti-vitāna-yogam //
GP10bhp1-12u:4659: BhP_03.25.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca devānāṃ guṇa-liṅgānām ānuśravika-karmaṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:4660: sattva evaika-manaso vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā // BhP_03.25.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4662: jarayaty āśu yā kośaṃ nigīrṇam analo yathā // BhP_03.25.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4663: naikātmatāṃ me spṛhayanti kecin mat-pāda-sevābhiratā mad-īhāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4664: ye 'nyonyato bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi //
GP10bhp1-12u:4665: paśyanti te me rucirāṇy amba santaḥ prasanna-vaktrāruṇa-locanāni /
GP10bhp1-12u:4666: rūpāṇi divyāni vara-pradāni sākaṃ vācaṃ spṛhaṇīyāṃ vadanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:4668: hṛtātmano hṛta-prāṇāṃś ca bhaktir anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte //
GP10bhp1-12u:4669: atho vibhūtiṃ mama māyāvinas tām aiśvaryam aṣṭāṅgam anupravṛttam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4670: śriyaṃ bhāgavatīṃ vāspṛhayanti bhadrāṃ parasya me te 'śnuvate tu loke //
GP10bhp1-12u:4671: na karhicin mat-parāḥ śānta-rūpe naṅkṣyanti no me 'nimiṣo leḍhi hetiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4672: yeṣām ahaṃ priya ātmā sutaś ca sakhā guruḥ suhṛdo daivam iṣṭam //
GP10bhp1-12u:4674: ātmānam anu ye ceha ye rāyaḥ paśavo gṛhāḥ // BhP_03.25.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4675: visṛjya sarvān anyāṃś ca mām evaṃ viśvato-mukham /
GP10bhp1-12u:4676: bhajanty ananyayā bhaktyā tān mṛtyor atipāraye // BhP_03.25.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4678: ātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ nivartate // BhP_03.25.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4679: mad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati mad-bhayāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:4680: varṣatīndro dahaty agnir mṛtyuś carati mad-bhayāt // BhP_03.25.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4682: kṣemāya pāda-mūlaṃ me praviśanty akuto-bhayam // BhP_03.25.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4684: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena mano mayy arpitaṃ sthiram // BhP_03.25.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4685: BhP_03.26.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca atha te sampravakṣyāmi tattvānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak /
GP10bhp1-12u:4686: yad viditvā vimucyeta puruṣaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ // BhP_03.26.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4688: yad āhur varṇaye tat te hṛdaya-granthi-bhedanam // BhP_03.26.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4689: anādir ātmā puruṣo nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4690: pratyag-dhāmā svayaṃ-jyotir viśvaṃ yena samanvitam // BhP_03.26.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4691: sa eṣa prakṛtiṃ sūkṣmāṃ daivīṃ guṇamayīṃ vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4693: guṇair vicitrāḥ sṛjatīṃ sa-rūpāḥ prakṛtiṃ prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4694: vilokya mumuhe sadyaḥ sa iha jñāna-gūhayā // BhP_03.26.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4696: karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu guṇair ātmani manyate // BhP_03.26.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4697: tad asya saṃsṛtir bandhaḥ pāra-tantryaṃ ca tat-kṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4698: bhavaty akartur īśasya sākṣiṇo nirvṛtātmanaḥ // BhP_03.26.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4700: bhoktṛtve sukha-duḥkhānāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // BhP_03.26.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4701: BhP_03.26.009/0 devahūtir uvāca prakṛteḥ puruṣasyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣottama /
GP10bhp1-12u:4702: brūhi kāraṇayor asya sad-asac ca yad-ātmakam // BhP_03.26.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4703: BhP_03.26.010/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yat tat tri-guṇam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ sad-asad-ātmakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4704: pradhānaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhur aviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavat // BhP_03.26.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4705: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir brahma caturbhir daśabhis tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4706: etac catur-viṃśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ prādhānikaṃ viduḥ // BhP_03.26.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4707: mahā-bhūtāni pañcaiva bhūr āpo 'gnir marun nabhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4708: tan-mātrāṇi ca tāvanti gandhādīni matāni me // BhP_03.26.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4709: indriyāṇi daśa śrotraṃ tvag dṛg rasana-nāsikāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4710: vāk karau caraṇau meḍhraṃ pāyur daśama ucyate // BhP_03.26.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4711: mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cittam ity antar-ātmakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4712: caturdhā lakṣyate bhedo vṛttyā lakṣaṇa-rūpayā // BhP_03.26.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4713: etāvān eva saṅkhyāto brahmaṇaḥ sa-guṇasya ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:4714: sanniveśo mayā prokto yaḥ kālaḥ pañca-viṃśakaḥ // BhP_03.26.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4715: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4718: ceṣṭā yataḥ sa bhagavān kāla ity upalakṣitaḥ // BhP_03.26.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4720: samanvety eṣa sattvānāṃ bhagavān ātma-māyayā // BhP_03.26.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4721: daivāt kṣubhita-dharmiṇyāṃ svasyāṃ yonau paraḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:4722: ādhatta vīryaṃ sāsūta mahat-tattvaṃ hiraṇmayam // BhP_03.26.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4725: yat tat sattva-guṇaṃ svacchaṃ śāntaṃ bhagavataḥ padam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4726: yad āhur vāsudevākhyaṃ cittaṃ tan mahad-ātmakam // BhP_03.26.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4728: vṛttibhir lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yathāpāṃ prakṛtiḥ parā // BhP_03.26.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4731: vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś ca yato bhavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4732: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām api // BhP_03.26.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4735: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca kāryatvaṃ ceti lakṣaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4736: śānta-ghora-vimūḍhatvam iti vā syād ahaṅkṛteḥ // BhP_03.26.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4739: yad vidur hy aniruddhākhyaṃ hṛṣīkāṇām adhīśvaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:4741: taijasāt tu vikurvāṇād buddhi-tattvam abhūt sati /
GP10bhp1-12u:4743: saṃśayo 'tha viparyāso niścayaḥ smṛtir eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:4744: svāpa ity ucyate buddher lakṣaṇaṃ vṛttitaḥ pṛthak // BhP_03.26.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4746: prāṇasya hi kriyā-śaktir buddher vijñāna-śaktitā // BhP_03.26.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4748: śabda-mātram abhūt tasmān nabhaḥ śrotraṃ tu śabdagam // BhP_03.26.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4749: arthāśrayatvaṃ śabdasya draṣṭur liṅgatvam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:4750: tan-mātratvaṃ ca nabhaso lakṣaṇaṃ kavayo viduḥ // BhP_03.26.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4751: bhūtānāṃ chidra-dātṛtvaṃ bahir antaram eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:4754: sparśo 'bhavat tato vāyus tvak sparśasya ca saṅgrahaḥ // BhP_03.26.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4755: mṛdutvaṃ kaṭhinatvaṃ ca śaityam uṣṇatvam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:4756: etat sparśasya sparśatvaṃ tan-mātratvaṃ nabhasvataḥ // BhP_03.26.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4759: vāyoś ca sparśa-tanmātrād rūpaṃ daiveritād abhūt /
GP10bhp1-12u:4760: samutthitaṃ tatas tejaś cakṣū rūpopalambhanam // BhP_03.26.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4762: tejastvaṃ tejasaḥ sādhvi rūpa-mātrasya vṛttayaḥ // BhP_03.26.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4764: tejaso vṛttayas tv etāḥ śoṣaṇaṃ kṣut tṛḍ eva ca // BhP_03.26.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4766: rasa-mātram abhūt tasmād ambho jihvā rasa-grahaḥ // BhP_03.26.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4767: kaṣāyo madhuras tiktaḥ kaṭv amla iti naikadhā /
GP10bhp1-12u:4768: bhautikānāṃ vikāreṇa rasa eko vibhidyate // BhP_03.26.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4770: tāpāpanodo bhūyastvam ambhaso vṛttayas tv imāḥ // BhP_03.26.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4772: gandha-mātram abhūt tasmāt pṛthvī ghrāṇas tu gandhagaḥ // BhP_03.26.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4778: vāyor guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tat sparśanaṃ viduḥ // BhP_03.26.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4781: bhūmer guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya sa ghrāṇa ucyate // BhP_03.26.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4782: parasya dṛśyate dharmo hy aparasmin samanvayāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:4783: ato viśeṣo bhāvānāṃ bhūmāv evopalakṣyate // BhP_03.26.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4784: etāny asaṃhatya yadā mahad-ādīni sapta vai /
GP10bhp1-12u:4787: utthitaṃ puruṣo yasmād udatiṣṭhad asau virāṭ // BhP_03.26.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4790: yatra loka-vitāno 'yaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato hareḥ // BhP_03.26.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4792: tam āviśya mahā-devo bahudhā nirbibheda kham // BhP_03.26.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4794: vāṇyā vahnir atho nāse prāṇoto ghrāṇa etayoḥ // BhP_03.26.054 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4795: ghrāṇād vāyur abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣur etayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4796: tasmāt sūryo nyabhidyetāṃ karṇau śrotraṃ tato diśaḥ // BhP_03.26.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4798: tata oṣadhayaś cāsan śiśnaṃ nirbibhide tataḥ // BhP_03.26.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4799: retas tasmād āpa āsan nirabhidyata vai gudam /
GP10bhp1-12u:4800: gudād apāno 'pānāc ca mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ // BhP_03.26.057 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4801: hastau ca nirabhidyetāṃ balaṃ tābhyāṃ tataḥ svarāṭ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4802: pādau ca nirabhidyetāṃ gatis tābhyāṃ tato hariḥ // BhP_03.26.058 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4804: nadyas tataḥ samabhavann udaraṃ nirabhidyata // BhP_03.26.059 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4805: kṣut-pipāse tataḥ syātāṃ samudras tv etayor abhūt /

GP10bhp1-12u:4807: manasaś candramā jāto buddhir buddher girāṃ patiḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4810: punar āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayituṃ kramāt // BhP_03.26.062 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4811: vahnir vācā mukhaṃ bheje nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4814: śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ // BhP_03.26.064 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4815: tvacaṃ romabhir oṣadhyo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4817: gudaṃ mṛtyur apānena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /
GP10bhp1-12u:4818: hastāv indro balenaiva nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ // BhP_03.26.066 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4819: viṣṇur gatyaiva caraṇau nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4821: kṣut-tṛḍbhyām udaraṃ sindhur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4823: buddhyā brahmāpi hṛdayaṃ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ /

GP10bhp1-12u:4825: cittena hṛdayaṃ caityaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ prāviśad yadā /

GP10bhp1-12u:4828: prabhavanti vinā yena notthāpayitum ojasā // BhP_03.26.071 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4830: bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicyātmani cintayet // BhP_03.26.072 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4834: sa eṣa yarhi prakṛter guṇeṣv abhiviṣajjate /

GP10bhp1-12u:4847: vivikta-śaraṇaḥ śānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān // BhP_03.27.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4849: jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca // BhP_03.27.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4853: sato bandhum asac-cakṣuḥ sarvānusyūtam advayam // BhP_03.27.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:4855: svābhāsena tathā sūryo jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ // BhP_03.27.012 //

GP10bhp1-12u:4880: neśvarasyāśubhaṃ dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca // BhP_03.27.024 //

GP10bhp1-12u:4893: BhP_03.28.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yogasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye sabījasya nṛpātmaje /

GP10bhp1-12u:4908: tasmin svasti samāsīna ṛju-kāyaḥ samabhyaset // BhP_03.28.008 //

GP10bhp1-12u:4999: yathā sāṅkhyeṣu kathitaṃ yan-mūlaṃ tat pracakṣate /
GP10bhp1-12u:5000: bhakti-yogasya me mārgaṃ brūhi vistaraśaḥ prabho // BhP_03.29.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5001: virāgo yena puruṣo bhagavan sarvato bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:5002: ācakṣva jīva-lokasya vividhā mama saṃsṛtīḥ // BhP_03.29.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5004: svarūpaṃ bata kurvanti yad-dhetoḥ kuśalaṃ janāḥ // BhP_03.29.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5005: lokasya mithyābhimater acakṣuṣaś ciraṃ prasuptasya tamasy anāśraye /
GP10bhp1-12u:5006: śrāntasya karmasv anuviddhayā dhiyā tvam āvirāsīḥ kila yoga-bhāskaraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5007: BhP_03.29.006/0 maitreya uvāca iti mātur vacaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ pratinandya mahā-muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5008: ābabhāṣe kuru-śreṣṭha prītas tāṃ karuṇārditaḥ // BhP_03.29.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5012: abhisandhāya yo hiṃsāṃ dambhaṃ mātsaryam eva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5013: saṃrambhī bhinna-dṛg bhāvaṃ mayi kuryāt sa tāmasaḥ // BhP_03.29.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5014: viṣayān abhisandhāya yaśa aiśvaryam eva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5015: arcādāv arcayed yo māṃ pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa rājasaḥ // BhP_03.29.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5017: yajed yaṣṭavyam iti vā pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ // BhP_03.29.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5021: ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame // BhP_03.29.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5023: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // BhP_03.29.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5031: maitryā caivātma-tulyeṣu yamena niyamena ca // BhP_03.29.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5036: yathā vāta-ratho ghrāṇam āvṛṅkte gandha āśayāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:5037: evaṃ yoga-rataṃ ceta ātmānam avikāri yat // BhP_03.29.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5039: tam avajñāya māṃ martyaḥ kurute 'rcā-viḍambanam // BhP_03.29.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5040: yo māṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu santam ātmānam īśvaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:5041: hitvārcāṃ bhajate mauḍhyād bhasmany eva juhoti saḥ // BhP_03.29.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5043: bhūteṣu baddha-vairasya na manaḥ śāntim ṛcchati // BhP_03.29.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5046: arcādāv arcayet tāvad īśvaraṃ māṃ sva-karma-kṛt /
GP10bhp1-12u:5047: yāvan na veda sva-hṛdi sarva-bhūteṣv avasthitam // BhP_03.29.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5048: ātmanaś ca parasyāpi yaḥ karoty antarodaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:5049: tasya bhinna-dṛśo mṛtyur vidadhe bhayam ulbaṇam // BhP_03.29.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5052: jīvāḥ śreṣṭhā hy ajīvānāṃ tataḥ prāṇa-bhṛtaḥ śubhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:5053: tataḥ sa-cittāḥ pravarās tataś cendriya-vṛttayaḥ // BhP_03.29.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5055: tebhyo gandha-vidaḥ śreṣṭhās tataḥ śabda-vido varāḥ // BhP_03.29.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5057: teṣāṃ bahu-padāḥ śreṣṭhāś catuṣ-pādas tato dvi-pāt // BhP_03.29.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5058: tato varṇāś ca catvāras teṣāṃ brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5059: brāhmaṇeṣv api veda-jño hy artha-jño 'bhyadhikas tataḥ // BhP_03.29.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5061: mukta-saṅgas tato bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ // BhP_03.29.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5064: na paśyāmi paraṃ bhūtam akartuḥ sama-darśanāt // BhP_03.29.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5066: īśvaro jīva-kalayā praviṣṭo bhagavān iti // BhP_03.29.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5067: bhakti-yogaś ca yogaś ca mayā mānavy udīritaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5068: yayor ekatareṇaiva puruṣaḥ puruṣaṃ vrajet // BhP_03.29.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5070: paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ daivaṃ karma-viceṣṭitam // BhP_03.29.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5072: bhūtānāṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ yato bhinna-dṛśāṃ bhayam // BhP_03.29.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5073: yo 'ntaḥ praviśya bhūtāni bhūtair atty akhilāśrayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5074: sa viṣṇv-ākhyo 'dhiyajño 'sau kālaḥ kalayatāṃ prabhuḥ // BhP_03.29.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5075: na cāsya kaścid dayito na dveṣyo na ca bāndhavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5076: āviśaty apramatto 'sau pramattaṃ janam anta-kṛt // BhP_03.29.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5077: yad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati yad-bhayāt /
