GP10bhp1-12u:5660: kathaṃ sutāyāḥ pitṛ-geha-kautukaṃ niśamya dehaḥ sura-varya neṅgate /
GP10bhp1-12u:5661: anāhutā apy abhiyanti sauhṛdaṃ bhartur guror deha-kṛtaś ca ketanam //
GP10bhp1-12u:5662: tan me prasīdedam amartya vāñchitaṃ kartuṃ bhavān kāruṇiko batārhati /
GP10bhp1-12u:5664: BhP_04.03.015/0 ṛṣir uvāca evaṃ giritraḥ priyayābhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛt-priyaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:5665: saṃsmārito marma-bhidaḥ kuvāg-iṣūn yān āha ko viśva-sṛjāṃ samakṣataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5666: BhP_04.03.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca tvayoditaṃ śobhanam eva śobhane anāhutā apy abhiyanti bandhuṣu
GP10bhp1-12u:5669: smṛtau hatāyāṃ bhṛta-māna-durdṛśaḥ stabdhā na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām
GP10bhp1-12u:5672: tathāribhir na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete 'rditāṅgo hṛdayena dūyatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5673: svānāṃ yathā vakra-dhiyāṃ duruktibhir divā-niśaṃ tapyati marma-tāḍitaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5674: vyaktaṃ tvam utkṛṣṭa-gateḥ prajāpateḥ priyātmajānām asi subhru me matā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5675: tathāpi mānaṃ na pituḥ prapatsyase mad-āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5677: akalpa eṣām adhiroḍhum añjasā paraṃ padaṃ dveṣṭi yathāsurā harim //
GP10bhp1-12u:5679: prājñaiḥ parasmai puruṣāya cetasā guhā-śayāyaiva na deha-mānine //
GP10bhp1-12u:5680: sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ vasudeva-śabditaṃ yad īyate tatra pumān apāvṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5681: sattve ca tasmin bhagavān vāsudevo hy adhokṣajo me namasā vidhīyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:5682: tat te nirīkṣyo na pitāpi deha-kṛd dakṣo mama dviṭ tad-anuvratāś ca ye /
GP10bhp1-12u:5683: yo viśvasṛg-yajña-gataṃ varoru mām anāgasaṃ durvacasākarot tiraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5684: yadi vrajiṣyasy atihāya mad-vaco bhadraṃ bhavatyā na tato bhaviṣyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:5685: sambhāvitasya sva-janāt parābhavo yadā sa sadyo maraṇāya kalpate //
GP10bhp1-12u:5686: BhP_04.04.001/0 maitreya uvāca etāvad uktvā virarāma śaṅkaraḥ patny-aṅga-nāśaṃ hy ubhayatra cintayan /
GP10bhp1-12u:5687: suhṛd-didṛkṣuḥ pariśaṅkitā bhavān niṣkrāmatī nirviśatī dvidhāsa sā //
GP10bhp1-12u:5689: bhavaṃ bhavāny apratipūruṣaṃ ruṣā pradhakṣyatīvaikṣata jāta-vepathuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5690: tato viniḥśvasya satī vihāya taṃ śokena roṣeṇa ca dūyatā hṛdā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5691: pitror agāt straiṇa-vimūḍha-dhīr gṛhān premṇātmano yo 'rdham adāt satāṃ priyaḥ // BhP_04.04.003
GP10bhp1-12u:5692: tām anvagacchan druta-vikramāṃ satīm ekāṃ tri-netrānucarāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5695: gītāyanair dundubhi-śaṅkha-veṇubhir vṛṣendram āropya viṭaṅkitā yayuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5698: tām āgatāṃ tatra na kaścanādriyad vimānitāṃ yajña-kṛto bhayāj janaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5699: ṛte svasṝr vai jananīṃ ca sādarāḥ premāśru-kaṇṭhyaḥ pariṣasvajur mudā //
GP10bhp1-12u:5700: saudarya-sampraśna-samartha-vārtayā mātrā ca mātṛ-ṣvasṛbhiś ca sādaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:5701: dattāṃ saparyāṃ varam āsanaṃ ca sā nādatta pitrāpratinanditā satī //
GP10bhp1-12u:5702: arudra-bhāgaṃ tam avekṣya cādhvaraṃ pitrā ca deve kṛta-helanaṃ vibhau /
GP10bhp1-12u:5703: anādṛtā yajña-sadasy adhīśvarī cukopa lokān iva dhakṣyatī ruṣā //
GP10bhp1-12u:5705: sva-tejasā bhūta-gaṇān samutthitān nigṛhya devī jagato 'bhiśṛṇvataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5706: BhP_04.04.011/0 devy uvāca na yasya loke 'sty atiśāyanaḥ priyas tathāpriyo deha-bhṛtāṃ priyātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5707: tasmin samastātmani mukta-vairake ṛte bhavantaṃ katamaḥ pratīpayet //
GP10bhp1-12u:5708: doṣān pareṣāṃ hi guṇeṣu sādhavo gṛhṇanti kecin na bhavādṛśo dvija /
GP10bhp1-12u:5709: guṇāṃś ca phalgūn bahulī-kariṣṇavo mahattamās teṣv avidad bhavān agham //
GP10bhp1-12u:5710: nāścaryam etad yad asatsu sarvadā mahad-vinindā kuṇapātma-vādiṣu /
GP10bhp1-12u:5711: serṣyaṃ mahāpūruṣa-pāda-pāṃsubhir nirasta-tejaḥsu tad eva śobhanam //
GP10bhp1-12u:5712: yad dvy-akṣaraṃ nāma gireritaṃ nṛṇāṃ sakṛt prasaṅgād agham āśu hanti tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:5713: pavitra-kīrtiṃ tam alaṅghya-śāsanaṃ bhavān aho dveṣṭi śivaṃ śivetaraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5715: lokasya yad varṣati cāśiṣo 'rthinas tasmai bhavān druhyati viśva-bandhave
GP10bhp1-12u:5716: kiṃ vā śivākhyam aśivaṃ na vidus tvad anye brahmādayas tam avakīrya jaṭāḥ śmaśāne /
GP10bhp1-12u:5717: tan-mālya-bhasma-nṛkapāly avasat piśācair ye mūrdhabhir dadhati tac-caraṇāvasṛṣṭam // BhP_04.04.016
GP10bhp1-12u:5718: karṇau pidhāya nirayād yad akalpa īśe dharmāvitary asṛṇibhir nṛbhir asyamāne /
GP10bhp1-12u:5719: chindyāt prasahya ruśatīm asatīṃ prabhuś cej jihvām asūn api tato visṛjet sa dharmaḥ // BhP_04.04.017
GP10bhp1-12u:5720: atas tavotpannam idaṃ kalevaraṃ na dhārayiṣye śiti-kaṇṭha-garhiṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5721: jagdhasya mohād dhi viśuddhim andhaso jugupsitasyoddharaṇaṃ pracakṣate //
GP10bhp1-12u:5722: na veda-vādān anuvartate matiḥ sva eva loke ramato mahā-muneḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5723: yathā gatir deva-manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sva eva dharme na paraṃ kṣipet sthitaḥ // BhP_04.04.019
GP10bhp1-12u:5724: karma pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttam apy ṛtaṃ vede vivicyobhaya-liṅgam āśritam /
GP10bhp1-12u:5725: virodhi tad yaugapadaika-kartari dvayaṃ tathā brahmaṇi karma narcchati //
GP10bhp1-12u:5726: mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitar asmad-āsthitā yā yajña-śālāsu na dhūma-vartmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5728: naitena dehena hare kṛtāgaso dehodbhavenālam alaṃ kujanmanā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5729: vrīḍā mamābhūt kujana-prasaṅgatas taj janma dhig yo mahatām avadya-kṛt //
GP10bhp1-12u:5730: gotraṃ tvadīyaṃ bhagavān vṛṣadhvajo dākṣāyaṇīty āha yadā sudurmanāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5731: vyapeta-narma-smitam āśu tadāhaṃ vyutsrakṣya etat kuṇapaṃ tvad-aṅgajam //
GP10bhp1-12u:5732: BhP_04.04.024/0 maitreya uvāca ity adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru-han kṣitāv udīcīṃ niṣasāda śānta-vāk /
GP10bhp1-12u:5733: spṛṣṭvā jalaṃ pīta-dukūla-saṃvṛtā nimīlya dṛg yoga-pathaṃ samāviśat //
GP10bhp1-12u:5734: kṛtvā samānāv anilau jitāsanā sodānam utthāpya ca nābhi-cakrataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5735: śanair hṛdi sthāpya dhiyorasi sthitaṃ kaṇṭhād bhruvor madhyam aninditānayat // BhP_04.04.025
GP10bhp1-12u:5736: evaṃ sva-dehaṃ mahatāṃ mahīyasā muhuḥ samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:5737: jihāsatī dakṣa-ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣv anilāgni-dhāraṇām //
GP10bhp1-12u:5738: tataḥ sva-bhartuś caraṇāmbujāsavaṃ jagad-guroś cintayatī na cāparam /
GP10bhp1-12u:5739: dadarśa deho hata-kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyaḥ prajajvāla samādhijāgninā //
GP10bhp1-12u:5740: tat paśyatāṃ khe bhuvi cādbhutaṃ mahad hā heti vādaḥ sumahān ajāyata /
GP10bhp1-12u:5741: hanta priyā daivatamasya devī jahāv asūn kena satī prakopitā //
GP10bhp1-12u:5742: aho anātmyaṃ mahad asya paśyata prajāpater yasya carācaraṃ prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5743: jahāv asūn yad-vimatātmajā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati //
GP10bhp1-12u:5744: so 'yaṃ durmarṣa-hṛdayo brahma-dhruk ca loke 'pakīrtiṃ mahatīm avāpsyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:5745: yad-aṅgajāṃ svāṃ puruṣa-dviḍ udyatāṃ na pratyaṣedhan mṛtaye 'parādhataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5746: vadaty evaṃ jane satyā dṛṣṭvāsu-tyāgam adbhutam /
GP10bhp1-12u:5747: dakṣaṃ tat-pārṣadā hantum udatiṣṭhann udāyudhāḥ // BhP_04.04.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5748: teṣām āpatatāṃ vegaṃ niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5749: yajña-ghna-ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇāgnau juhāva ha // BhP_04.04.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5751: ṛbhavo nāma tapasā somaṃ prāptāḥ sahasraśaḥ // BhP_04.04.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5753: hanyamānā diśo bhejur uśadbhir brahma-tejasā // BhP_04.04.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5754: BhP_04.05.001/0 maitreya uvāca bhavo bhavānyā nidhanaṃ prajāpater asat-kṛtāyā avagamya nāradāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:5755: sva-pārṣada-sainyaṃ ca tad-adhvararbhubhir vidrāvitaṃ krodham apāram
GP10bhp1-12u:5759: utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasotthito hasan gambhīra-nādo visasarja tāṃ bhuvi //
GP10bhp1-12u:5760: tato 'tikāyas tanuvā spṛśan divaṃ sahasra-bāhur ghana-ruk tri-sūrya-dṛk /
GP10bhp1-12u:5762: taṃ kiṃ karomīti gṛṇantam āha baddhāñjaliṃ bhagavān bhūta-nāthaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5763: dakṣaṃ sa-yajñaṃ jahi mad-bhaṭānāṃ tvam agraṇī rudra bhaṭāṃśako me //
GP10bhp1-12u:5764: ājñapta evaṃ kupitena manyunā sa deva-devaṃ paricakrame vibhum /
GP10bhp1-12u:5765: mene-tadātmānam asaṅga-raṃhasā mahīyasāṃ tāta sahaḥ sahiṣṇum //
GP10bhp1-12u:5766: anvīyamānaḥ sa tu rudra-pārṣadair bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir vyanadat subhairavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:5768: athartvijo yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhy udīcyāṃ prasamīkṣya reṇum /
GP10bhp1-12u:5769: tamaḥ kim etat kuta etad rajo 'bhūd iti dvijā dvija-patnyaś ca dadhyuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5770: vātā na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna-barhir jīvati hogra-daṇḍaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5771: gāvo na kālyanta idaṃ kuto rajo loko 'dhunā kiṃ pralayāya kalpate //
GP10bhp1-12u:5772: prasūti-miśrāḥ striya udvigna-cittā ūcur vipāko vṛjinasyaiva tasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:5773: yat paśyantīnāṃ duhitṝṇāṃ prajeśaḥ sutāṃ satīm avadadhyāv anāgām //
GP10bhp1-12u:5776: amarṣayitvā tam asahya-tejasaṃ manyu-plutaṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ bhru-kuṭyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:5777: karāla-daṃṣṭrābhir udasta-bhāgaṇaṃ syāt svasti kiṃ kopayato vidhātuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5778: bahv evam udvigna-dṛśocyamāne janena dakṣasya muhur mahātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5779: utpetur utpātatamāḥ sahasraśo bhayāvahā divi bhūmau ca paryak //
GP10bhp1-12u:5780: tāvat sa rudrānucarair mahā-makho nānāyudhair vāmanakair udāyudhaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5783: sada āgnīdhra-śālāṃ ca tad-vihāraṃ mahānasam // BhP_04.05.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5785: kuṇḍeṣv amūtrayan kecid bibhidur vedi-mekhalāḥ // BhP_04.05.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5786: abādhanta munīn anye eke patnīr atarjayan /
GP10bhp1-12u:5787: apare jagṛhur devān pratyāsannān palāyitān // BhP_04.05.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5789: caṇḍeśaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ devaṃ bhagaṃ nandīśvaro 'grahīt // BhP_04.05.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5791: tair ardyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ grāvabhir naikadhādravan // BhP_04.05.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5793: bhṛgor luluñce sadasi yo 'hasac chmaśru darśayan // BhP_04.05.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5794: bhagasya netre bhagavān pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi /
GP10bhp1-12u:5795: ujjahāra sada-stho 'kṣṇā yaḥ śapantam asūsucat // BhP_04.05.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5796: pūṣṇo hy apātayad dantān kāliṅgasya yathā balaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5797: śapyamāne garimaṇi yo 'hasad darśayan dataḥ // BhP_04.05.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5799: chindann api tad uddhartuṃ nāśaknot tryambakas tadā // BhP_04.05.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5801: vismayaṃ param āpanno dadhyau paśupatiś ciram // BhP_04.05.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5802: dṛṣṭvā saṃjñapanaṃ yogaṃ paśūnāṃ sa patir makhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:5803: yajamāna-paśoḥ kasya kāyāt tenāharac chiraḥ // BhP_04.05.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5804: sādhu-vādas tadā teṣāṃ karma tat tasya paśyatām /
GP10bhp1-12u:5808: BhP_04.06.001/0 maitreya uvāca atha deva-gaṇāḥ sarve rudrānīkaiḥ parājitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5813: nārāyaṇaś ca viśvātmā na kasyādhvaram īyatuḥ // BhP_04.06.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5814: tad ākarṇya vibhuḥ prāha tejīyasi kṛtāgasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:5815: kṣemāya tatra sā bhūyān na prāyeṇa bubhūṣatām // BhP_04.06.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5816: athāpi yūyaṃ kṛta-kilbiṣā bhavaṃ ye barhiṣo bhāga-bhājaṃ parāduḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5818: āśāsānā jīvitam adhvarasya lokaḥ sa-pālaḥ kupite na yasmin /
GP10bhp1-12u:5819: tam āśu devaṃ priyayā vihīnaṃ kṣamāpayadhvaṃ hṛdi viddhaṃ duruktaiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5820: nāhaṃ na yajño na ca yūyam anye ye deha-bhājo munayaś ca tattvam /
GP10bhp1-12u:5821: viduḥ pramāṇaṃ bala-vīryayor vā yasyātma-tantrasya ka upāyaṃ vidhitset //
GP10bhp1-12u:5822: sa ittham ādiśya surān ajas tu taiḥ samanvitaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sa-prajeśaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5823: yayau sva-dhiṣṇyān nilayaṃ pura-dviṣaḥ kailāsam adri-pravaraṃ priyaṃ prabhoḥ // BhP_04.06.008
GP10bhp1-12u:5825: juṣṭaṃ kinnara-gandharvair apsarobhir vṛtaṃ sadā // BhP_04.06.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5831: plāvitai rakta-kaṇṭhānāṃ kūjitaiś ca patattriṇām // BhP_04.06.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5833: vrajantam iva mātaṅgair gṛṇantam iva nirjharaiḥ // BhP_04.06.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5839: kubjakair mallikābhiś ca mādhavībhiś ca maṇḍitam // BhP_04.06.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5841: bhūrjair oṣadhibhiḥ pūgai rājapūgaiś ca jambubhiḥ // BhP_04.06.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5843: druma-jātibhir anyaiś ca rājitaṃ veṇu-kīcakaiḥ // BhP_04.06.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5847: gavayaiḥ śarabhair vyāghrai rurubhir mahiṣādibhiḥ // BhP_04.06.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5851: vilokya bhūteśa-giriṃ vibudhā vismayaṃ yayuḥ // BhP_04.06.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5852: dadṛśus tatra te ramyām alakāṃ nāma vai purīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:5853: vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ cāpi yatra tan-nāma paṅkajam // BhP_04.06.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5854: nandā cālakanandā ca saritau bāhyataḥ puraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:5857: krīḍanti puṃsaḥ siñcantyo vigāhya rati-karśitāḥ // BhP_04.06.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5859: vitṛṣo 'pi pibanty ambhaḥ pāyayanto gajā gajīḥ // BhP_04.06.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5861: juṣṭāṃ puṇyajana-strībhir yathā khaṃ sataḍid-ghanam // BhP_04.06.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5862: hitvā yakṣeśvara-purīṃ vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ ca tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:5867: adhi puṇyajana-strīṇāṃ muhur unmathayan manaḥ // BhP_04.06.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5869: prāptaṃ kimpuruṣair dṛṣṭvā ta ārād dadṛśur vaṭam // BhP_04.06.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5873: dadṛśuḥ śivam āsīnaṃ tyaktāmarṣam ivāntakam // BhP_04.06.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5875: upāsyamānaṃ sakhyā ca bhartrā guhyaka-rakṣasām // BhP_04.06.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5879: aṅgena sandhyābhra-rucā candra-lekhāṃ ca bibhratam // BhP_04.06.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5881: nāradāya pravocantaṃ pṛcchate śṛṇvatāṃ satām // BhP_04.06.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:5882: kṛtvorau dakṣiṇe savyaṃ pāda-padmaṃ ca jānuni /
GP10bhp1-12u:5884: taṃ brahma-nirvāṇa-samādhim āśritaṃ vyupāśritaṃ giriśaṃ yoga-kakṣām /
GP10bhp1-12u:5885: sa-loka-pālā munayo manūnām ādyaṃ manuṃ prāñjalayaḥ praṇemuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:5887: utthāya cakre śirasābhivandanam arhattamaḥ kasya yathaiva viṣṇuḥ //

GP10bhp1-12u:6631: pradoṣo niśitho vyuṣṭa iti doṣā-sutās trayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6632: vyuṣṭaḥ sutaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ sarvatejasam ādadhe // BhP_04.13.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6633: sa cakṣuḥ sutam ākūtyāṃ patnyāṃ manum avāpa ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:6634: manor asūta mahiṣī virajān naḍvalā sutān // BhP_04.13.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6635: puruṃ kutsaṃ tritaṃ dyumnaṃ satyavantam ṛtaṃ vratam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6636: agniṣṭomam atīrātraṃ pradyumnaṃ śibim ulmukam // BhP_04.13.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6638: aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ khyātiṃ kratum aṅgirasaṃ gayam // BhP_04.13.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6639: sunīthāṅgasya yā patnī suṣuve venam ulbaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6640: yad-dauḥśīlyāt sa rājarṣir nirviṇṇo niragāt purāt // BhP_04.13.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6641: yam aṅga śepuḥ kupitā vāg-vajrā munayaḥ kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:6642: gatāsos tasya bhūyas te mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ karam // BhP_04.13.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6643: arājake tadā loke dasyubhiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6644: jāto nārāyaṇāṃśena pṛthur ādyaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ // BhP_04.13.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6645: BhP_04.13.021/0 vidura uvāca tasya śīla-nidheḥ sādhor brahmaṇyasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6646: rājñaḥ katham abhūd duṣṭā prajā yad vimanā yayau // BhP_04.13.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6647: kiṃ vāṃho vena uddiśya brahma-daṇḍam ayūyujan /
GP10bhp1-12u:6650: yad asau loka-pālānāṃ bibharty ojaḥ sva-tejasā // BhP_04.13.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6653: BhP_04.13.025/0 maitreya uvāca aṅgo 'śvamedhaṃ rājarṣir ājahāra mahā-kratum /
GP10bhp1-12u:6654: nājagmur devatās tasminn āhūtā brahma-vādibhiḥ // BhP_04.13.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6655: tam ūcur vismitās tatra yajamānam athartvijaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6656: havīṃṣi hūyamānāni na te gṛhṇanti devatāḥ // BhP_04.13.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6659: na vidāmeha devānāṃ helanaṃ vayam aṇv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:6660: yan na gṛhṇanti bhāgān svān ye devāḥ karma-sākṣiṇaḥ // BhP_04.13.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6661: BhP_04.13.029/0 maitreya uvāca aṅgo dvija-vacaḥ śrutvā yajamānaḥ sudurmanāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6662: tat praṣṭuṃ vyasṛjad vācaṃ sadasyāṃs tad-anujñayā // BhP_04.13.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6663: nāgacchanty āhutā devā na gṛhṇanti grahān iha /
GP10bhp1-12u:6664: sadasas-patayo brūta kim avadyaṃ mayā kṛtam // BhP_04.13.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6666: nara-deveha bhavato nāghaṃ tāvan manāk sthitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6667: asty ekaṃ prāktanam aghaṃ yad ihedṛk tvam aprajaḥ // BhP_04.13.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6668: tathā sādhaya bhadraṃ te ātmānaṃ suprajaṃ nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:6669: iṣṭas te putra-kāmasya putraṃ dāsyati yajña-bhuk // BhP_04.13.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6671: yad yajña-puruṣaḥ sākṣād apatyāya harir vṛtaḥ // BhP_04.13.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6672: tāṃs tān kāmān harir dadyād yān yān kāmayate janaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6673: ārādhito yathaivaiṣa tathā puṃsāṃ phalodayaḥ // BhP_04.13.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6674: iti vyavasitā viprās tasya rājñaḥ prajātaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:6677: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa siddham ādāya pāyasam // BhP_04.13.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6679: avaghrāya mudā yuktaḥ prādāt patnyā udāra-dhīḥ // BhP_04.13.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6680: sā tat puṃ-savanaṃ rājñī prāśya vai patyur ādadhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:6681: garbhaṃ kāla upāvṛtte kumāraṃ suṣuve 'prajā // BhP_04.13.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6682: sa bāla eva puruṣo mātāmaham anuvrataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6685: hanty asādhur mṛgān dīnān veno 'sāv ity arauj janaḥ // BhP_04.13.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6688: taṃ vicakṣya khalaṃ putraṃ śāsanair vividhair nṛpaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6689: yadā na śāsituṃ kalpo bhṛśam āsīt sudurmanāḥ // BhP_04.13.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6691: kad-apatya-bhṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ ye na vindanti durbharam // BhP_04.13.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6692: yataḥ pāpīyasī kīrtir adharmaś ca mahān nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:6693: yato virodhaḥ sarveṣāṃ yata ādhir anantakaḥ // BhP_04.13.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6694: kas taṃ prajāpadeśaṃ vai moha-bandhanam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6695: paṇḍito bahu manyeta yad-arthāḥ kleśadā gṛhāḥ // BhP_04.13.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6696: kad-apatyaṃ varaṃ manye sad-apatyāc chucāṃ padāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:6697: nirvidyeta gṛhān martyo yat-kleśa-nivahā gṛhāḥ // BhP_04.13.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6698: evaṃ sa nirviṇṇa-manā nṛpo gṛhān niśītha utthāya mahodayodayāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:6699: alabdha-nidro 'nupalakṣito nṛbhir hitvā gato vena-suvaṃ prasuptām //
GP10bhp1-12u:6700: vijñāya nirvidya gataṃ patiṃ prajāḥ purohitāmātya-suhṛd-gaṇādayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6701: vicikyur urvyām atiśoka-kātarā yathā nigūḍhaṃ puruṣaṃ kuyoginaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6702: alakṣayantaḥ padavīṃ prajāpater hatodyamāḥ pratyupasṛtya te purīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:6703: ṛṣīn sametān abhivandya sāśravo nyavedayan paurava bhartṛ-viplavam //
GP10bhp1-12u:6704: BhP_04.14.001/0 maitreya uvāca bhṛgv-ādayas te munayo lokānāṃ kṣema-darśinaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6705: goptary asati vai nṝṇāṃ paśyantaḥ paśu-sāmyatām // BhP_04.14.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6707: prakṛty-asammataṃ venam abhyaṣiñcan patiṃ bhuvaḥ // BhP_04.14.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6709: nililyur dasyavaḥ sadyaḥ sarpa-trastā ivākhavaḥ // BhP_04.14.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6711: avamene mahā-bhāgān stabdhaḥ sambhāvitaḥ svataḥ // BhP_04.14.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6712: evaṃ madāndha utsikto niraṅkuśa iva dvipaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6713: paryaṭan ratham āsthāya kampayann iva rodasī // BhP_04.14.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6714: na yaṣṭavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hotavyaṃ dvijāḥ kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:6715: iti nyavārayad dharmaṃ bherī-ghoṣeṇa sarvaśaḥ // BhP_04.14.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6717: vimṛśya loka-vyasanaṃ kṛpayocuḥ sma satriṇaḥ // BhP_04.14.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6718: aho ubhayataḥ prāptaṃ lokasya vyasanaṃ mahat /
GP10bhp1-12u:6719: dāruṇy ubhayato dīpte iva taskara-pālayoḥ // BhP_04.14.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6721: tato 'py āsīd bhayaṃ tv adya kathaṃ syāt svasti dehinām // BhP_04.14.009
GP10bhp1-12u:6724: nirūpitaḥ prajā-pālaḥ sa jighāṃsati vai prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6725: tathāpi sāntvayemāmuṃ nāsmāṃs tat-pātakaṃ spṛśet // BhP_04.14.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6727: sāntvito yadi no vācaṃ na grahīṣyaty adharma-kṛt // BhP_04.14.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6730: upavrajyābruvan venaṃ sāntvayitvā ca sāmabhiḥ // BhP_04.14.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6731: BhP_04.14.014/0 munaya ūcuḥ nṛpa-varya nibodhaitad yat te vijñāpayāma bhoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6734: lokān viśokān vitaraty athānantyam asaṅginām // BhP_04.14.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6735: sa te mā vinaśed vīra prajānāṃ kṣema-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6736: yasmin vinaṣṭe nṛpatir aiśvaryād avarohati // BhP_04.14.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6738: rakṣan yathā baliṃ gṛhṇann iha pretya ca modate // BhP_04.14.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6739: yasya rāṣṭre pure caiva bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6740: ijyate svena dharmeṇa janair varṇāśramānvitaiḥ // BhP_04.14.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6744: lokāḥ sapālā hy etasmai haranti balim ādṛtāḥ // BhP_04.14.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6746: yajñair vicitrair yajato bhavāya te rājan sva-deśān anuroddhum arhasi //
GP10bhp1-12u:6747: yajñena yuṣmad-viṣaye dvijātibhir vitāyamānena surāḥ kalā hareḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6748: sviṣṭāḥ sutuṣṭāḥ pradiśanti vāñchitaṃ tad-dhelanaṃ nārhasi vīra ceṣṭitum
GP10bhp1-12u:6749: BhP_04.14.023/0 vena uvāca bāliśā bata yūyaṃ vā adharme dharma-māninaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6750: ye vṛttidaṃ patiṃ hitvā jāraṃ patim upāsate // BhP_04.14.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6752: nānuvindanti te bhadram iha loke paratra ca // BhP_04.14.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6753: ko yajña-puruṣo nāma yatra vo bhaktir īdṛśī /
GP10bhp1-12u:6755: viṣṇur viriñco giriśa indro vāyur yamo raviḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6756: parjanyo dhanadaḥ somaḥ kṣitir agnir apāmpatiḥ // BhP_04.14.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6757: ete cānye ca vibudhāḥ prabhavo vara-śāpayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6758: dehe bhavanti nṛpateḥ sarva-devamayo nṛpaḥ // BhP_04.14.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6759: tasmān māṃ karmabhir viprā yajadhvaṃ gata-matsarāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6760: baliṃ ca mahyaṃ harata matto 'nyaḥ ko 'gra-bhuk pumān // BhP_04.14.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6761: BhP_04.14.029/0 maitreya uvāca itthaṃ viparyaya-matiḥ pāpīyān utpathaṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6762: anunīyamānas tad-yācñāṃ na cakre bhraṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ // BhP_04.14.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6764: bhagnāyāṃ bhavya-yācñāyāṃ tasmai vidura cukrudhuḥ // BhP_04.14.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6766: jīvan jagad asāv āśu kurute bhasmasād dhruvam // BhP_04.14.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6769: ko vainaṃ paricakṣīta venam ekam ṛte 'śubham /
GP10bhp1-12u:6772: nijaghnur huṅkṛtair venaṃ hatam acyuta-nindayā // BhP_04.14.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6774: sunīthā pālayām āsa vidyā-yogena śocatī // BhP_04.14.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6776: hutvāgnīn sat-kathāś cakrur upaviṣṭāḥ sarit-taṭe // BhP_04.14.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6778: apy abhadram anāthāyā dasyubhyo na bhaved bhuvaḥ // BhP_04.14.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6780: pāṃsuḥ samutthito bhūriś corāṇām abhilumpatām // BhP_04.14.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6781: tad upadravam ājñāya lokasya vasu lumpatām /
GP10bhp1-12u:6782: bhartary uparate tasminn anyonyaṃ ca jighāṃsatām // BhP_04.14.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6784: lokān nāvārayañ chaktā api tad-doṣa-darśinaḥ // BhP_04.14.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6786: sravate brahma tasyāpi bhinna-bhāṇḍāt payo yathā // BhP_04.14.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6787: nāṅgasya vaṃśo rājarṣer eṣa saṃsthātum arhati /
GP10bhp1-12u:6788: amogha-vīryā hi nṛpā vaṃśe 'smin keśavāśrayāḥ // BhP_04.14.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6790: mamanthur ūruṃ tarasā tatrāsīd bāhuko naraḥ // BhP_04.14.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6793: taṃ tu te 'vanataṃ dīnaṃ kiṃ karomīti vādinam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6794: niṣīdety abruvaṃs tāta sa niṣādas tato 'bhavat // BhP_04.14.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6797: BhP_04.15.001/0 maitreya uvāca atha tasya punar viprair aputrasya mahīpateḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6799: tad dṛṣṭvā mithunaṃ jātam ṛṣayo brahma-vādinaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6801: BhP_04.15.003/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ eṣa viṣṇor bhagavataḥ kalā bhuvana-pālinī /
GP10bhp1-12u:6802: iyaṃ ca lakṣmyāḥ sambhūtiḥ puruṣasyānapāyinī // BhP_04.15.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6803: ayaṃ tu prathamo rājñāṃ pumān prathayitā yaśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6804: pṛthur nāma mahārājo bhaviṣyati pṛthu-śravāḥ // BhP_04.15.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6806: arcir nāma varārohā pṛthum evāvarundhatī // BhP_04.15.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6808: iyaṃ ca tat-parā hi śrīr anujajñe 'napāyinī // BhP_04.15.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6809: BhP_04.15.007/0 maitreya uvāca praśaṃsanti sma taṃ viprā gandharva-pravarā jaguḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6810: mumucuḥ sumano-dhārāḥ siddhā nṛtyanti svaḥ-striyaḥ // BhP_04.15.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6812: tatra sarva upājagmur devarṣi-pitṝṇāṃ gaṇāḥ // BhP_04.15.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6814: vainyasya dakṣiṇe haste dṛṣṭvā cihnaṃ gadābhṛtaḥ // BhP_04.15.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6815: pādayor aravindaṃ ca taṃ vai mene hareḥ kalām /
GP10bhp1-12u:6816: yasyāpratihataṃ cakram aṃśaḥ sa parameṣṭhinaḥ // BhP_04.15.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6818: ābhiṣecanikāny asmai ājahruḥ sarvato janāḥ // BhP_04.15.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6819: sarit-samudrā girayo nāgā gāvaḥ khagā mṛgāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6820: dyauḥ kṣitiḥ sarva-bhūtāni samājahrur upāyanam // BhP_04.15.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6823: tasmai jahāra dhanado haimaṃ vīra varāsanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6825: vāyuś ca vāla-vyajane dharmaḥ kīrtimayīṃ srajam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6826: indraḥ kirīṭam utkṛṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ saṃyamanaṃ yamaḥ // BhP_04.15.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6827: brahmā brahmamayaṃ varma bhāratī hāram uttamam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6828: hariḥ sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ tat-patny avyāhatāṃ śriyam // BhP_04.15.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6830: somo 'mṛtamayān aśvāṃs tvaṣṭā rūpāśrayaṃ ratham // BhP_04.15.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6831: agnir āja-gavaṃ cāpaṃ sūryo raśmimayān iṣūn /
GP10bhp1-12u:6832: bhūḥ pāduke yogamayyau dyauḥ puṣpāvalim anvaham // BhP_04.15.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6833: nāṭyaṃ sugītaṃ vāditram antardhānaṃ ca khecarāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6834: ṛṣayaś cāśiṣaḥ satyāḥ samudraḥ śaṅkham ātmajam // BhP_04.15.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6836: sūto 'tha māgadho vandī taṃ stotum upatasthire // BhP_04.15.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6837: stāvakāṃs tān abhipretya pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:6838: megha-nirhrādayā vācā prahasann idam abravīt // BhP_04.15.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6839: BhP_04.15.022/0 pṛthur uvāca bhoḥ sūta he māgadha saumya vandin loke 'dhunāspaṣṭa-guṇasya me syāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:6840: kim āśrayo me stava eṣa yojyatāṃ mā mayy abhūvan vitathā giro vaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6841: tasmāt parokṣe 'smad-upaśrutāny alaṃ kariṣyatha stotram apīcya-vācaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6842: saty uttamaśloka-guṇānuvāde jugupsitaṃ na stavayanti sabhyāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6843: mahad-guṇān ātmani kartum īśaḥ kaḥ stāvakaiḥ stāvayate 'sato 'pi /
GP10bhp1-12u:6844: te 'syābhaviṣyann iti vipralabdho janāvahāsaṃ kumatir na veda //
GP10bhp1-12u:6845: prabhavo hy ātmanaḥ stotraṃjugupsanty api viśrutāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6846: hrīmantaḥ paramodārāḥ pauruṣaṃ vā vigarhitam // BhP_04.15.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6847: vayaṃ tv aviditā loke sūtādyāpi varīmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6848: karmabhiḥ katham ātmānaṃ gāpayiṣyāma bālavat // BhP_04.15.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6849: BhP_04.16.001/0 maitreya uvāca iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ gāyakā muni-coditāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6851: nālaṃ vayaṃ te mahimānuvarṇane yo deva-varyo 'vatatāra māyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:6852: venāṅga-jātasya ca pauruṣāṇi te vācas-patīnām api babhramur dhiyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6853: athāpy udāra-śravasaḥ pṛthor hareḥ kalāvatārasya kathāmṛtādṛtāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6854: yathopadeśaṃ munibhiḥ pracoditāḥ ślāghyāni karmāṇi vayaṃ vitanmahi //
GP10bhp1-12u:6856: goptā ca dharma-setūnāṃ śāstā tat-paripanthinām // BhP_04.16.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6857: eṣa vai loka-pālānāṃ bibharty ekas tanau tanūḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6858: kāle kāle yathā-bhāgaṃ lokayor ubhayor hitam // BhP_04.16.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6859: vasu kāla upādatte kāle cāyaṃ vimuñcati /
GP10bhp1-12u:6860: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu pratapan sūryavad vibhuḥ // BhP_04.16.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6861: titikṣaty akramaṃ vainya upary ākramatām api /
GP10bhp1-12u:6862: bhūtānāṃ karuṇaḥ śaśvad ārtānāṃ kṣiti-vṛttimān // BhP_04.16.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6864: kṛcchra-prāṇāḥ prajā hy eṣa rakṣiṣyaty añjasendravat // BhP_04.16.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6871: antar bahiś ca bhūtānāṃ paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6872: udāsīna ivādhyakṣo vāyur ātmeva dehinām // BhP_04.16.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6873: nādaṇḍyaṃ daṇḍayaty eṣa sutam ātma-dviṣām api /
GP10bhp1-12u:6874: daṇḍayaty ātmajam api daṇḍyaṃ dharma-pathe sthitaḥ // BhP_04.16.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6876: vartate bhagavān arko yāvat tapati go-gaṇaiḥ // BhP_04.16.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6878: athāmum āhū rājānaṃ mano-rañjanakaiḥ prajāḥ // BhP_04.16.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6882: prajāsu pitṛvat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaro brahma-vādinām // BhP_04.16.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6885: ayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ kūṭa-stha ātmā kalayāvatīrṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6886: yasminn avidyā-racitaṃ nirarthakaṃ paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam //
GP10bhp1-12u:6887: ayaṃ bhuvo maṇḍalam odayādrer goptaika-vīro naradeva-nāthaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6888: āsthāya jaitraṃ ratham ātta-cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇato yathārkaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6889: asmai nṛ-pālāḥ kila tatra tatra baliṃ hariṣyanti saloka-pālāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6890: maṃsyanta eṣāṃ striya ādi-rājaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ tad-yaśa uddharantyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6891: ayaṃ mahīṃ gāṃ duduhe 'dhirājaḥ prajāpatir vṛtti-karaḥ prajānām /
GP10bhp1-12u:6892: yo līlayādrīn sva-śarāsa-koṭyā bhindan samāṃ gām akarod yathendraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6893: visphūrjayann āja-gavaṃ dhanuḥ svayaṃ yadācarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau /
GP10bhp1-12u:6894: tadā nililyur diśi diśy asanto lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6895: eṣo 'śvamedhāñ śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra /
GP10bhp1-12u:6896: ahārṣīd yasya hayaṃ purandaraḥ śata-kratuś carame vartamāne //
GP10bhp1-12u:6897: eṣa sva-sadmopavane sametya sanat-kumāraṃ bhagavantam ekam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6898: ārādhya bhaktyālabhatāmalaṃ taj jñānaṃ yato brahma paraṃ vidanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:6899: tatra tatra giras tās tā iti viśruta-vikramaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6900: śroṣyaty ātmāśritā gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ // BhP_04.16.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6902: surāsurendrair upagīyamāna- mahānubhāvo bhavitā patir bhuvaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6903: BhP_04.17.001/0 maitreya uvāca evaṃ sa bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpito guṇa-karmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6904: chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjyābhinandya ca // BhP_04.17.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6906: paurān jāna-padān śreṇīḥ prakṛtīḥ samapūjayat // BhP_04.17.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6907: BhP_04.17.003/0 vidura uvāca kasmād dadhāra go-rūpaṃ dharitrī bahu-rūpiṇī /
GP10bhp1-12u:6908: yāṃ dudoha pṛthus tatra ko vatso dohanaṃ ca kim // BhP_04.17.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6909: prakṛtyā viṣamā devī kṛtā tena samā katham /
GP10bhp1-12u:6910: tasya medhyaṃ hayaṃ devaḥ kasya hetor apāharat // BhP_04.17.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6912: labdhvā jñānaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ rājarṣiḥ kāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ // BhP_04.17.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6913: yac cānyad api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6916: vaktum arhasi yo 'duhyad vainya-rūpeṇa gām imām // BhP_04.17.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6917: BhP_04.17.008/0 sūta uvāca codito vidureṇaivaṃ vāsudeva-kathāṃ prati /
GP10bhp1-12u:6918: praśasya taṃ prīta-manā maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata // BhP_04.17.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6919: BhP_04.17.009/0 maitreya uvāca yadābhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur aṅga viprair āmantrito janatāyāś ca pālaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6920: prajā niranne kṣiti-pṛṣṭha etya kṣut-kṣāma-dehāḥ patim abhyavocan //
GP10bhp1-12u:6921: vayaṃ rājañ jāṭhareṇābhitaptā yathāgninā koṭara-sthena vṛkṣāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6922: tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ yaḥ sādhito vṛtti-karaḥ patir naḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6923: tan no bhavān īhatu rātave 'nnaṃ kṣudhārditānāṃ naradeva-deva /
GP10bhp1-12u:6924: yāvan na naṅkṣyāmaha ujjhitorjā vārtā-patis tvaṃ kila loka-pālaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6925: BhP_04.17.012/0 maitreya uvāca pṛthuḥ prajānāṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya paridevitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6926: dīrghaṃ dadhyau kuruśreṣṭha nimittaṃ so 'nvapadyata // BhP_04.17.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6928: sandadhe viśikhaṃ bhūmeḥ kruddhas tripura-hā yathā // BhP_04.17.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6930: gauḥ saty apādravad bhītā mṛgīva mṛgayu-drutā // BhP_04.17.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6932: śaraṃ dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate // BhP_04.17.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6933: sā diśo vidiśo devī rodasī cāntaraṃ tayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6935: loke nāvindata trāṇaṃ vainyān mṛtyor iva prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6936: trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā // BhP_04.17.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6938: trāhi mām api bhūtānāṃ pālane 'vasthito bhavān // BhP_04.17.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6939: sa tvaṃ jighāṃsase kasmād dīnām akṛta-kilbiṣām /
GP10bhp1-12u:6940: ahaniṣyat kathaṃ yoṣāṃ dharma-jña iti yo mataḥ // BhP_04.17.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6941: praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛtāgaḥsv api jantavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6942: kim uta tvad-vidhā rājan karuṇā dīna-vatsalāḥ // BhP_04.17.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6943: māṃ vipāṭyājarāṃ nāvaṃ yatra viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6944: ātmānaṃ ca prajāś cemāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi // BhP_04.17.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6945: BhP_04.17.022/0 pṛthur uvāca vasudhe tvāṃ vadhiṣyāmi mac-chāsana-parāṅ-mukhīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:6946: bhāgaṃ barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca no vasu // BhP_04.17.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6947: yavasaṃ jagdhy anudinaṃ naiva dogdhy audhasaṃ payaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6948: tasyām evaṃ hi duṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍo nātra na śasyate // BhP_04.17.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6949: tvaṃ khalv oṣadhi-bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā /
GP10bhp1-12u:6950: na muñcasy ātma-ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda-dhīḥ // BhP_04.17.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6952: śamayiṣyāmi mad-bāṇair bhinnāyās tava medasā // BhP_04.17.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6955: tvāṃ stabdhāṃ durmadāṃ nītvā māyā-gāṃ tilaśaḥ śaraiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6957: evaṃ manyumayīṃ mūrtiṃ kṛtāntam iva bibhratam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6958: praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta-vepathuḥ // BhP_04.17.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6959: BhP_04.17.029/0 dharovāca namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta-nānā-tanave guṇātmane /
GP10bhp1-12u:6961: yenāham ātmāyatanaṃ vinirmitā dhātrā yato 'yaṃ guṇa-sarga-saṅgrahaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6962: sa eva māṃ hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāḍ upasthito 'nyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kam āśraye //
GP10bhp1-12u:6963: ya etad ādāv asṛjac carācaraṃ sva-māyayātmāśrayayāvitarkyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:6964: tayaiva so 'yaṃ kila goptum udyataḥ kathaṃ nu māṃ dharma-paro jighāṃsati
GP10bhp1-12u:6965: nūnaṃ bateśasya samīhitaṃ janais tan-māyayā durjayayākṛtātmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6966: na lakṣyate yas tv akarod akārayad yo 'neka ekaḥ parataś ca īśvaraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6968: tasmai samunnaddha-niruddha-śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase //
GP10bhp1-12u:6969: sa vai bhavān ātma-vinirmitaṃ jagad bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇātmakaṃ vibho /
GP10bhp1-12u:6970: saṃsthāpayiṣyann aja māṃ rasātalād abhyujjahārāmbhasa ādi-sūkaraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6971: apām upasthe mayi nāvy avasthitāḥ prajā bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:6972: sa vīra-mūrtiḥ samabhūd dharā-dharo yo māṃ payasy ugra-śaro jighāṃsasi //
GP10bhp1-12u:6973: nūnaṃ janair īhitam īśvarāṇām asmad-vidhais tad-guṇa-sarga-māyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:6974: na jñāyate mohita-citta-vartmabhis tebhyo namo vīra-yaśas-karebhyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:6975: BhP_04.18.001/0 maitreya uvāca itthaṃ pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphuritādharam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6976: punar āhāvanir bhītā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā // BhP_04.18.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6977: sanniyacchābhibho manyuṃ nibodha śrāvitaṃ ca me /
GP10bhp1-12u:6978: sarvataḥ sāram ādatte yathā madhu-karo budhaḥ // BhP_04.18.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6980: dṛṣṭā yogāḥ prayuktāś ca puṃsāṃ śreyaḥ-prasiddhaye // BhP_04.18.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6981: tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyag upāyān pūrva-darśitān /
GP10bhp1-12u:6983: tān anādṛtya yo 'vidvān arthān ārabhate svayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:6984: tasya vyabhicaranty arthā ārabdhāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // BhP_04.18.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6985: purā sṛṣṭā hy oṣadhayo brahmaṇā yā viśāmpate /
GP10bhp1-12u:6986: bhujyamānā mayā dṛṣṭā asadbhir adhṛta-vrataiḥ // BhP_04.18.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6989: nūnaṃ tā vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇā mayi kālena bhūyasā /
GP10bhp1-12u:6990: tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati // BhP_04.18.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6991: vatsaṃ kalpaya me vīra yenāhaṃ vatsalā tava /
GP10bhp1-12u:6992: dhokṣye kṣīramayān kāmān anurūpaṃ ca dohanam // BhP_04.18.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6994: annam īpsitam ūrjasvad bhagavān vāñchate yadi // BhP_04.18.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6995: samāṃ ca kuru māṃ rājan deva-vṛṣṭaṃ yathā payaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6996: apartāv api bhadraṃ te upāvarteta me vibho // BhP_04.18.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6997: iti priyaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhuva ādāya bhūpatiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:6998: vatsaṃ kṛtvā manuṃ pāṇāv aduhat sakalauṣadhīḥ // BhP_04.18.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:6999: tathāpare ca sarvatra sāram ādadate budhāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7000: tato 'nye ca yathā-kāmaṃ duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām // BhP_04.18.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7001: ṛṣayo duduhur devīm indriyeṣv atha sattama /
GP10bhp1-12u:7002: vatsaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ kṛtvā payaś chandomayaṃ śuci // BhP_04.18.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7003: kṛtvā vatsaṃ sura-gaṇā indraṃ somam adūduhan /
GP10bhp1-12u:7004: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa vīryam ojo balaṃ payaḥ // BhP_04.18.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7008: vatsaṃ viśvāvasuṃ kṛtvā gāndharvaṃ madhu saubhagam // BhP_04.18.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7012: siddhiṃ nabhasi vidyāṃ ca ye ca vidyādharādayaḥ // BhP_04.18.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7014: mayaṃ prakalpya vatsaṃ te duduhur dhāraṇāmayīm // BhP_04.18.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7017: tathāhayo dandaśūkāḥ sarpā nāgāś ca takṣakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7018: vidhāya vatsaṃ duduhur bila-pātre viṣaṃ payaḥ // BhP_04.18.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7019: paśavo yavasaṃ kṣīraṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā ca go-vṛṣam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7020: araṇya-pātre cādhukṣan mṛgendreṇa ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ // BhP_04.18.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7021: kravyādāḥ prāṇinaḥ kravyaṃ duduhuḥ sve kalevare /
GP10bhp1-12u:7022: suparṇa-vatsā vihagāś caraṃ cācaram eva ca // BhP_04.18.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7025: sarve sva-mukhya-vatsena sve sve pātre pṛthak payaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7027: evaṃ pṛthv-ādayaḥ pṛthvīm annādāḥ svannam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7032: bhū-maṇḍalam idaṃ vainyaḥ prāyaś cakre samaṃ vibhuḥ // BhP_04.18.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7033: athāsmin bhagavān vainyaḥ prajānāṃ vṛttidaḥ pitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7034: nivāsān kalpayāṃ cakre tatra tatra yathārhataḥ // BhP_04.18.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7035: grāmān puraḥ pattanāni durgāṇi vividhāni ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:7036: ghoṣān vrajān sa-śibirān ākarān kheṭa-kharvaṭān // BhP_04.18.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7038: yathā-sukhaṃ vasanti sma tatra tatrākutobhayāḥ // BhP_04.18.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7039: BhP_04.19.001/0 maitreya uvāca athādīkṣata rājā tu hayamedha-śatena saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7040: brahmāvarte manoḥ kṣetre yatra prācī sarasvatī // BhP_04.19.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7042: śata-kratur na mamṛṣe pṛthor yajña-mahotsavam // BhP_04.19.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7043: yatra yajña-patiḥ sākṣād bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7050: tam anvīyur bhāgavatā ye ca tat-sevanotsukāḥ // BhP_04.19.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7052: dogdhi smābhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata // BhP_04.19.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7056: upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ // BhP_04.19.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7058: asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat // BhP_04.19.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7060: vainye yajña-paśuṃ spardhann apovāha tirohitaḥ // BhP_04.19.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7061: tam atrir bhagavān aikṣat tvaramāṇaṃ vihāyasā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7062: āmuktam iva pākhaṇḍaṃ yo 'dharme dharma-vibhramaḥ // BhP_04.19.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7064: anvadhāvata saṅkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // BhP_04.19.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7065: taṃ tādṛśākṛtiṃ vīkṣya mene dharmaṃ śarīriṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7066: jaṭilaṃ bhasmanācchannaṃ tasmai bāṇaṃ na muñcati // BhP_04.19.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7067: vadhān nivṛttaṃ taṃ bhūyo hantave 'trir acodayat /
GP10bhp1-12u:7068: jahi yajña-hanaṃ tāta mahendraṃ vibudhādhamam // BhP_04.19.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7070: anvadravad abhikruddho rāvaṇaṃ gṛdhra-rāḍ iva // BhP_04.19.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7071: so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasmā antarhitaḥ svarāṭ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7072: vīraḥ sva-paśum ādāya pitur yajñam upeyivān // BhP_04.19.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7073: tat tasya cādbhutaṃ karma vicakṣya paramarṣayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7074: nāmadheyaṃ dadus tasmai vijitāśva iti prabho // BhP_04.19.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7075: upasṛjya tamas tīvraṃ jahārāśvaṃ punar hariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7079: atriṇā coditas tasmai sandadhe viśikhaṃ ruṣā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7080: so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasthāv antarhitaḥ svarāṭ // BhP_04.19.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7082: tad avadyaṃ hare rūpaṃ jagṛhur jñāna-durbalāḥ // BhP_04.19.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7084: tāni pāpasya khaṇḍāni liṅgaṃ khaṇḍam ihocyate // BhP_04.19.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7088: prāyeṇa sajjate bhrāntyā peśaleṣu ca vāgmiṣu // BhP_04.19.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7091: tam ṛtvijaḥ śakra-vadhābhisandhitaṃ vicakṣya duṣprekṣyam asahya-raṃhasam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7092: nivārayām āsur aho mahā-mate na yujyate 'trānya-vadhaḥ pracoditāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:7093: vayaṃ marutvantam ihārtha-nāśanaṃ hvayāmahe tvac-chravasā hata-tviṣam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7094: ayātayāmopahavair anantaraṃ prasahya rājan juhavāma te 'hitam //
GP10bhp1-12u:7097: na vadhyo bhavatām indro yad yajño bhagavat-tanuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7098: yaṃ jighāṃsatha yajñena yasyeṣṭās tanavaḥ surāḥ // BhP_04.19.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7099: tad idaṃ paśyata mahad- dharma-vyatikaraṃ dvijāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:7642: yad-bheda-buddhiḥ sad ivātma-duḥsthayā tvam ātma-tantraṃ bhagavan pratīmahi // BhP_04.24.061
GP10bhp1-12u:7643: kriyā-kalāpair idam eva yoginaḥ śraddhānvitāḥ sādhu yajanti siddhaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:7644: bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇopalakṣitaṃ vede ca tantre ca ta eva kovidāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:7645: tvam eka ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ supta-śaktis tayā rajaḥ-sattva-tamo vibhidyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:7646: mahān ahaṃ khaṃ marud agni-vār-dharāḥ surarṣayo bhūta-gaṇā idaṃ yataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:7647: sṛṣṭaṃ sva-śaktyedam anupraviṣṭaś catur-vidhaṃ puram ātmāṃśakena /
GP10bhp1-12u:7648: atho vidus taṃ puruṣaṃ santam antar bhuṅkte hṛṣīkair madhu sāra-ghaṃ yaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:7649: sa eṣa lokān aticaṇḍa-vego vikarṣasi tvaṃ khalu kāla-yānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7650: bhūtāni bhūtair anumeya-tattvo ghanāvalīr vāyur ivāviṣahyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:7651: pramattam uccair iti kṛtya-cintayā pravṛddha-lobhaṃ viṣayeṣu lālasam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7652: tvam apramattaḥ sahasābhipadyase kṣul-lelihāno 'hir ivākhum antakaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:7653: kas tvat-padābjaṃ vijahāti paṇḍito yas te 'vamāna-vyayamāna-ketanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7654: viśaṅkayāsmad-gurur arcati sma yad vinopapattiṃ manavaś caturdaśa //
GP10bhp1-12u:7655: atha tvam asi no brahman paramātman vipaścitām /
GP10bhp1-12u:7657: idaṃ japata bhadraṃ vo viśuddhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7660: pūjayadhvaṃ gṛṇantaś ca dhyāyantaś cāsakṛd dharim // BhP_04.24.070 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7665: te vayaṃ noditāḥ sarve prajā-sarge prajeśvarāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7666: anena dhvasta-tamasaḥ sisṛkṣmo vividhāḥ prajāḥ // BhP_04.24.073 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7667: athedaṃ nityadā yukto japann avahitaḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:7669: śreyasām iha sarveṣāṃ jñānaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:7670: sukhaṃ tarati duṣpāraṃ jñāna-naur vyasanārṇavam // BhP_04.24.075 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7671: ya imaṃ śraddhayā yukto mad-gītaṃ bhagavat-stavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7672: adhīyāno durārādhyaṃ harim ārādhayaty asau // BhP_04.24.076 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7673: vindate puruṣo 'muṣmād yad yad icchaty asatvaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:7675: idaṃ yaḥ kalya utthāya prāñjaliḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7676: śṛṇuyāc chrāvayen martyo mucyate karma-bandhanaiḥ // BhP_04.24.078 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7677: gītaṃ mayedaṃ naradeva-nandanāḥ parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ stavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7678: japanta ekāgra-dhiyas tapo mahat caradhvam ante tata āpsyathepsitam //
GP10bhp1-12u:7679: BhP_04.25.001/0 maitreya uvāca iti sandiśya bhagavān bārhiṣadair abhipūjitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7682: japantas te tapas tepur varṣāṇām ayutaṃ jale // BhP_04.25.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7685: śreyas tvaṃ katamad rājan karmaṇātmana īhase /
GP10bhp1-12u:7686: duḥkha-hāniḥ sukhāvāptiḥ śreyas tan neha ceṣyate // BhP_04.25.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7687: BhP_04.25.005/0 rājovāca na jānāmi mahā-bhāga paraṃ karmāpaviddha-dhīḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7688: brūhi me vimalaṃ jñānaṃ yena mucyeya karmabhiḥ // BhP_04.25.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7690: na paraṃ vindate mūḍho bhrāmyan saṃsāra-vartmasu // BhP_04.25.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7691: BhP_04.25.007/0 nārada uvāca bho bhoḥ prajāpate rājan paśūn paśya tvayādhvare /
GP10bhp1-12u:7693: ete tvāṃ sampratīkṣante smaranto vaiśasaṃ tava /
GP10bhp1-12u:7696: purañjanasya caritaṃ nibodha gadato mama // BhP_04.25.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7697: āsīt purañjano nāma rājā rājan bṛhac-chravāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7700: nānurūpaṃ yadāvindad abhūt sa vimanā iva // BhP_04.25.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7701: na sādhu mene tāḥ sarvā bhūtale yāvatīḥ puraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7703: sa ekadā himavato dakṣiṇeṣv atha sānuṣu /
GP10bhp1-12u:7704: dadarśa navabhir dvārbhiḥ puraṃ lakṣita-lakṣaṇām // BhP_04.25.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7706: svarṇa-raupyāyasaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ saṅkulāṃ sarvato gṛhaiḥ // BhP_04.25.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7708: kḷpta-harmya-sthalīṃ dīptāṃ śriyā bhogavatīm iva // BhP_04.25.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7716: āhūtaṃ manyate pāntho yatra kokila-kūjitaiḥ // BhP_04.25.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7724: padbhyāṃ kvaṇadbhyāṃ calantīṃ nūpurair devatām iva // BhP_04.25.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7729: kā tvaṃ kañja-palāśākṣi kasyāsīha kutaḥ sati /
GP10bhp1-12u:7730: imām upa purīṃ bhīru kiṃ cikīrṣasi śaṃsa me // BhP_04.25.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7731: ka ete 'nupathā ye ta ekādaśa mahā-bhaṭāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7732: etā vā lalanāḥ subhru ko 'yaṃ te 'hiḥ puraḥ-saraḥ // BhP_04.25.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7733: tvaṃ hrīr bhavāny asy atha vāg ramā patiṃ vicinvatī kiṃ munivad raho vane
GP10bhp1-12u:7735: nāsāṃ varorv anyatamā bhuvi-spṛk purīm imāṃ vīra-vareṇa sākam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7736: arhasy alaṅkartum adabhra-karmaṇā lokaṃ paraṃ śrīr iva yajña-puṃsā //
GP10bhp1-12u:7740: unnīya me darśaya valgu-vācakaṃ yad vrīḍayā nābhimukhaṃ śuci-smite //
GP10bhp1-12u:7741: BhP_04.25.032/0 nārada uvāca itthaṃ purañjanaṃ nārī yācamānam adhīravat /
GP10bhp1-12u:7742: abhyanandata taṃ vīraṃ hasantī vīra mohitā // BhP_04.25.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7743: na vidāma vayaṃ samyak kartāraṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GP10bhp1-12u:7744: ātmanaś ca parasyāpi gotraṃ nāma ca yat-kṛtam // BhP_04.25.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7745: ihādya santam ātmānaṃ vidāma na tataḥ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:7746: yeneyaṃ nirmitā vīra purī śaraṇam ātmanaḥ // BhP_04.25.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7747: ete sakhāyaḥ sakhyo me narā nāryaś ca mānada /
GP10bhp1-12u:7748: suptāyāṃ mayi jāgarti nāgo 'yaṃ pālayan purīm // BhP_04.25.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7749: diṣṭyāgato 'si bhadraṃ te grāmyān kāmān abhīpsase /
GP10bhp1-12u:7750: udvahiṣyāmi tāṃs te 'haṃ sva-bandhubhir arindama // BhP_04.25.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7751: imāṃ tvam adhitiṣṭhasva purīṃ nava-mukhīṃ vibho /
GP10bhp1-12u:7752: mayopanītān gṛhṇānaḥ kāma-bhogān śataṃ samāḥ // BhP_04.25.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7753: kaṃ nu tvad-anyaṃ ramaye hy arati-jñam akovidam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7755: dharmo hy atrārtha-kāmau ca prajānando 'mṛtaṃ yaśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7756: lokā viśokā virajā yān na kevalino viduḥ // BhP_04.25.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7758: kṣemyaṃ vadanti śaraṇaṃ bhave 'smin yad gṛhāśramaḥ // BhP_04.25.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7759: kā nāma vīra vikhyātaṃ vadānyaṃ priya-darśanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7760: na vṛṇīta priyaṃ prāptaṃ mādṛśī tvādṛśaṃ patim // BhP_04.25.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7761: kasyā manas te bhuvi bhogi-bhogayoḥ striyā na sajjed bhujayor mahā-bhuja /
GP10bhp1-12u:7762: yo 'nātha-vargādhim alaṃ ghṛṇoddhata- smitāvalokena caraty apohitum //
GP10bhp1-12u:7763: BhP_04.25.043/0 nārada uvāca iti tau dam-patī tatra samudya samayaṃ mithaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7764: tāṃ praviśya purīṃ rājan mumudāte śataṃ samāḥ // BhP_04.25.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7765: upagīyamāno lalitaṃ tatra tatra ca gāyakaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7766: krīḍan parivṛtaḥ strībhir hradinīm āviśac chucau // BhP_04.25.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7767: saptopari kṛtā dvāraḥ puras tasyās tu dve adhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7769: pañca dvāras tu paurastyā dakṣiṇaikā tathottarā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7770: paścime dve amūṣāṃ te nāmāni nṛpa varṇaye // BhP_04.25.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7771: khadyotāvirmukhī ca prāg dvārāv ekatra nirmite /
GP10bhp1-12u:7772: vibhrājitaṃ janapadaṃ yāti tābhyāṃ dyumat-sakhaḥ // BhP_04.25.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7773: nalinī nālinī ca prāg dvārāv ekatra nirmite /
GP10bhp1-12u:7774: avadhūta-sakhas tābhyāṃ viṣayaṃ yāti saurabham // BhP_04.25.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7777: pitṛhūr nṛpa puryā dvār dakṣiṇena purañjanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7779: devahūr nāma puryā dvā uttareṇa purañjanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7781: āsurī nāma paścād dvās tayā yāti purañjanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7782: grāmakaṃ nāma viṣayaṃ durmadena samanvitaḥ // BhP_04.25.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7783: nirṛtir nāma paścād dvās tayā yāti purañjanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7784: vaiśasaṃ nāma viṣayaṃ lubdhakena samanvitaḥ // BhP_04.25.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7786: akṣaṇvatām adhipatis tābhyāṃ yāti karoti ca // BhP_04.25.054 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7788: mohaṃ prasādaṃ harṣaṃ vā yāti jāyātmajodbhavam // BhP_04.25.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7790: mahiṣī yad yad īheta tat tad evānvavartata // BhP_04.25.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7792: aśnantyāṃ kvacid aśnāti jakṣatyāṃ saha jakṣiti // BhP_04.25.057 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7793: kvacid gāyati gāyantyāṃ rudatyāṃ rudati kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:7794: kvacid dhasantyāṃ hasati jalpantyām anu jalpati // BhP_04.25.058 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7795: kvacid dhāvati dhāvantyāṃ tiṣṭhantyām anu tiṣṭhati /
GP10bhp1-12u:7796: anu śete śayānāyām anvāste kvacid āsatīm // BhP_04.25.059 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7797: kvacic chṛṇoti śṛṇvantyāṃ paśyantyām anu paśyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:7798: kvacij jighrati jighrantyāṃ spṛśantyāṃ spṛśati kvacit // BhP_04.25.060 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7799: kvacic ca śocatīṃ jāyām anu śocati dīnavat /
GP10bhp1-12u:7800: anu hṛṣyati hṛṣyantyāṃ muditām anu modate // BhP_04.25.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7802: necchann anukaroty ajñaḥ klaibyāt krīḍā-mṛgo yathā // BhP_04.25.062 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7803: BhP_04.26.001/0 nārada uvāca sa ekadā maheṣvāso rathaṃ pañcāśvam āśu-gam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7804: dvīṣaṃ dvi-cakram ekākṣaṃ tri-veṇuṃ pañca-bandhuram // BhP_04.26.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7812: nyahanan niśitair bāṇair vaneṣu vana-gocarān // BhP_04.26.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7813: tīrtheṣu pratidṛṣṭeṣu rājā medhyān paśūn vane /
GP10bhp1-12u:7814: yāvad-artham alaṃ lubdho hanyād iti niyamyate // BhP_04.26.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7815: ya evaṃ karma niyataṃ vidvān kurvīta mānavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7816: karmaṇā tena rājendra jñānena na sa lipyate // BhP_04.26.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7822: medhyān anyāṃś ca vividhān vinighnan śramam adhyagāt // BhP_04.26.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7828: na vyacaṣṭa varārohāṃ gṛhiṇīṃ gṛha-medhinīm // BhP_04.26.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7830: api vaḥ kuśalaṃ rāmāḥ seśvarīṇāṃ yathā purā // BhP_04.26.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7832: yadi na syād gṛhe mātā patnī vā pati-devatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7833: vyaṅge ratha iva prājñaḥ ko nāmāsīta dīnavat // BhP_04.26.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7834: kva vartate sā lalanā majjantaṃ vyasanārṇave /
GP10bhp1-12u:7835: yā mām uddharate prajñāṃ dīpayantī pade pade // BhP_04.26.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7836: BhP_04.26.017/0 rāmā ūcuḥ nara-nātha na jānīmas tvat-priyā yad vyavasyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:7837: bhūtale niravastāre śayānāṃ paśya śatru-han // BhP_04.26.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7838: BhP_04.26.018/0 nārada uvāca purañjanaḥ sva-mahiṣīṃ nirīkṣyāvadhutāṃ bhuvi /
GP10bhp1-12u:7841: preyasyāḥ sneha-saṃrambha- liṅgam ātmani nābhyagāt // BhP_04.26.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7844: BhP_04.26.021/0 purañjana uvāca nūnaṃ tv akṛta-puṇyās te bhṛtyā yeṣv īśvarāḥ śubhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:7845: kṛtāgaḥsv ātmasāt kṛtvā śikṣā-daṇḍaṃ na yuñjate // BhP_04.26.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7847: bālo na veda tat tanvi bandhu-kṛtyam amarṣaṇaḥ // BhP_04.26.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7848: sā tvaṃ mukhaṃ sudati subhrv anurāga-bhāra-
GP10bhp1-12u:7850: nīlālakālibhir upaskṛtam unnasaṃ naḥ svānāṃ pradarśaya manasvini
GP10bhp1-12u:7852: tasmin dadhe damam ahaṃ tava vīra-patni yo 'nyatra bhūsura-kulāt
GP10bhp1-12u:7854: paśye na vīta-bhayam unmuditaṃ tri-lokyām anyatra vai mura-ripor itaratra dāsāt // BhP_04.26.024
GP10bhp1-12u:7855: vaktraṃ na te vitilakaṃ malinaṃ viharṣaṃ saṃrambha-bhīmam avimṛṣṭam
GP10bhp1-12u:7857: paśye stanāv api śucopahatau sujātau bimbādharaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:7859: tan me prasīda suhṛdaḥ kṛta-kilbiṣasya svairaṃ gatasya mṛgayāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:7861: kā devaraṃ vaśa-gataṃ kusumāstra-vega- visrasta-pauṃsnam uśatī na bhajeta
GP10bhp1-12u:7863: BhP_04.27.001/0 nārada uvāca itthaṃ purañjanaṃ sadhryag vaśamānīya vibhramaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7864: purañjanī mahārāja reme ramayatī patim // BhP_04.27.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7865: sa rājā mahiṣīṃ rājan susnātāṃ rucirānanām /
GP10bhp1-12u:7868: na kāla-raṃho bubudhe duratyayaṃ divā niśeti pramadā-parigrahaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:7870: tām eva vīro manute paraṃ yatas tamo-'bhibhūto na nijaṃ paraṃ ca yat //
GP10bhp1-12u:7872: kṣaṇārdham iva rājendra vyatikrāntaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ // BhP_04.27.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7874: śatāny ekādaśa virāḍ āyuṣo 'rdham athātyagāt // BhP_04.27.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7878: dāraiḥ saṃyojayām āsa duhitṝḥ sadṛśair varaiḥ // BhP_04.27.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7879: putrāṇāṃ cābhavan putrā ekaikasya śataṃ śatam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7880: yair vai paurañjano vaṃśaḥ pañcāleṣu samedhitaḥ // BhP_04.27.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7883: īje ca kratubhir ghorair dīkṣitaḥ paśu-mārakaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7884: devān pitṝn bhūta-patīn nānā-kāmo yathā bhavān // BhP_04.27.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7886: āsasāda sa vai kālo yo 'priyaḥ priya-yoṣitām // BhP_04.27.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7889: gandharvyas tādṛśīr asya maithunyaś ca sitāsitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7892: hartum ārebhire tatra pratyaṣedhat prajāgaraḥ // BhP_04.27.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7893: sa saptabhiḥ śatair eko viṃśatyā ca śataṃ samāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7897: sa eva puryāṃ madhu-bhuk pañcāleṣu sva-pārṣadaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7898: upanītaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇan strī-jito nāvidad bhayam // BhP_04.27.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7899: kālasya duhitā kācit tri-lokīṃ varam icchatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:7900: paryaṭantī na barhiṣman pratyanandata kaścana // BhP_04.27.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7902: yā tuṣṭā rājarṣaye tu vṛtādāt pūrave varam // BhP_04.27.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7903: kadācid aṭamānā sā brahma-lokān mahīṃ gatam /
GP10bhp1-12u:7904: vavre bṛhad-vrataṃ māṃ tu jānatī kāma-mohitā // BhP_04.27.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7905: mayi saṃrabhya vipula- madāc chāpaṃ suduḥsaham /
GP10bhp1-12u:7906: sthātum arhasi naikatra mad-yācñā-vimukho mune // BhP_04.27.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7908: mayopadiṣṭam āsādya vavre nāmnā bhayaṃ patim // BhP_04.27.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7909: ṛṣabhaṃ yavanānāṃ tvāṃ vṛṇe vīrepsitaṃ patim /
GP10bhp1-12u:7910: saṅkalpas tvayi bhūtānāṃ kṛtaḥ kila na riṣyati // BhP_04.27.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7912: yal loka-śāstropanataṃ na rāti na tad icchati // BhP_04.27.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7913: atho bhajasva māṃ bhadra bhajantīṃ me dayāṃ kuru /
GP10bhp1-12u:7914: etāvān pauruṣo dharmo yad ārtān anukampate // BhP_04.27.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7916: cikīrṣur deva-guhyaṃ sa sasmitaṃ tām abhāṣata // BhP_04.27.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7918: nābhinandati loko 'yaṃ tvām abhadrām asammatām // BhP_04.27.028 //

GP10bhp1-12u:7958: vartiṣyate kathaṃ tv eṣā bālakān anuśocatī // BhP_04.28.018 //

GP10bhp1-12u:7974: kuṭhāraiś cicchiduḥ kruddhāḥ smaranto 'mīvam asya tat // BhP_04.28.026 //

GP10bhp1-12u:7981: tasyāṃ sa janayāṃ cakra ātmajām asitekṣaṇām /

GP10bhp1-12u:7984: bhokṣyate yad-vaṃśa-dharair mahī manvantaraṃ param // BhP_04.28.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7986: yasyāṃ dṛḍhacyuto jāta idhmavāhātmajo muniḥ // BhP_04.28.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7988: ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sa jagāma kulācalam // BhP_04.28.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7989: hitvā gṛhān sutān bhogān vaidarbhī madirekṣaṇā /
GP10bhp1-12u:7994: vartamānaḥ śanair gātra- karśanaṃ tapa āsthitaḥ // BhP_04.28.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7996: sukha-duḥkhe iti dvandvāny ajayat sama-darśanaḥ // BhP_04.28.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:7997: tapasā vidyayā pakva- kaṣāyo niyamair yamaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:7999: āste sthāṇur ivaikatra divyaṃ varṣa-śataṃ sthiraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8000: vāsudeve bhagavati nānyad vedodvahan ratim // BhP_04.28.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8002: vidvān svapna ivāmarśa- sākṣiṇaṃ virarāma ha // BhP_04.28.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8005: pare brahmaṇi cātmānaṃ paraṃ brahma tathātmani /
GP10bhp1-12u:8006: vīkṣamāṇo vihāyekṣām asmād upararāma ha // BhP_04.28.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8008: premṇā paryacarad dhitvā bhogān sā pati-devatā // BhP_04.28.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8010: babhāv upa patiṃ śāntā śikhā śāntam ivānalam // BhP_04.28.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8014: āsīt saṃvigna-hṛdayā yūtha-bhraṣṭā mṛgī yathā // BhP_04.28.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8016: stanāv āsicya vipine susvaraṃ praruroda sā // BhP_04.28.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8018: dasyubhyaḥ kṣatra-bandhubhyo bibhyatīṃ pātum arhasi // BhP_04.28.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8020: patitā pādayor bhartū rudaty aśrūṇy avartayat // BhP_04.28.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8021: citiṃ dārumayīṃ citvā tasyāṃ patyuḥ kalevaram /

GP10bhp1-12u:8023: tatra pūrvataraḥ kaścit sakhā brāhmaṇa ātmavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:8024: sāntvayan valgunā sāmnā tām āha rudatīṃ prabho // BhP_04.28.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8025: BhP_04.28.052/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca kā tvaṃ kasyāsi ko vāyaṃ śayāno yasya śocasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:8026: jānāsi kiṃ sakhāyaṃ māṃ yenāgre vicacartha ha // BhP_04.28.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8028: hitvā māṃ padam anvicchan bhauma-bhoga-rato gataḥ // BhP_04.28.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8029: haṃsāv ahaṃ ca tvaṃ cārya sakhāyau mānasāyanau /
GP10bhp1-12u:8031: sa tvaṃ vihāya māṃ bandho gato grāmya-matir mahīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:8032: vicaran padam adrākṣīḥ kayācin nirmitaṃ striyā // BhP_04.28.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8035: pañcendriyārthā ārāmā dvāraḥ prāṇā nava prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:8038: śakty-adhīśaḥ pumāṃs tv atra praviṣṭo nāvabudhyate // BhP_04.28.058 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8040: tat-saṅgād īdṛśīṃ prāpto daśāṃ pāpīyasīṃ prabho // BhP_04.28.059 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8041: na tvaṃ vidarbha-duhitā nāyaṃ vīraḥ suhṛt tava /

GP10bhp1-12u:8043: māyā hy eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yat pumāṃsaṃ striyaṃ satīm /

GP10bhp1-12u:8045: ahaṃ bhavān na cānyas tvaṃ tvam evāhaṃ vicakṣva bhoḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8049: evaṃ sa mānaso haṃso haṃsena pratibodhitaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8052: yat parokṣa-priyo devo bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ // BhP_04.28.065 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8055: BhP_04.29.002/0 nārada uvāca puruṣaṃ purañjanaṃ vidyād yad vyanakty ātmanaḥ puram /
GP10bhp1-12u:8058: yan na vijñāyate pumbhir nāmabhir vā kriyā-guṇaiḥ // BhP_04.29.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8059: yadā jighṛkṣan puruṣaḥ kārtsnyena prakṛter guṇān /

GP10bhp1-12u:8061: buddhiṃ tu pramadāṃ vidyān mamāham iti yat-kṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:8062: yām adhiṣṭhāya dehe 'smin pumān bhuṅkte 'kṣabhir guṇān // BhP_04.29.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8063: sakhāya indriya-gaṇā jñānaṃ karma ca yat-kṛtam /

GP10bhp1-12u:8066: pañcālāḥ pañca viṣayā yan-madhye nava-khaṃ puram // BhP_04.29.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8067: akṣiṇī nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ śiśna-gudāv iti /

GP10bhp1-12u:8069: akṣiṇī nāsike āsyam iti pañca puraḥ kṛtāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8071: paścime ity adho dvārau gudaṃ śiśnam ihocyate /

GP10bhp1-12u:8074: nalinī nālinī nāse gandhaḥ saurabha ucyate /

GP10bhp1-12u:8077: pitṛhūr dakṣiṇaḥ karṇa uttaro devahūḥ smṛtaḥ // BhP_04.29.012 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8116: upary adho vā madhye vā yāti diṣṭaṃ priyāpriyam // BhP_04.29.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8118: jīvasya na vyavacchedaḥ syāc cet tat-tat-pratikriyā // BhP_04.29.032 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8122: dvayaṃ hy avidyopasṛtaṃ svapne svapna ivānagha // BhP_04.29.034 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8137: na karoti harer nūnaṃ kathāmṛta-nidhau ratim // BhP_04.29.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8141: bhṛgur vasiṣṭha ity ete mad-antā brahma-vādinaḥ // BhP_04.29.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8143: paśyanto 'pi na paśyanti paśyantaṃ parameśvaram // BhP_04.29.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8145: mantra-liṅgair vyavacchinnaṃ bhajanto na viduḥ param // BhP_04.29.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8147: asti prajñā samāyattā ko viśeṣas tadā nṛṇām // BhP_04.29.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8149: ātma-sṛtyā vihāyedaṃ jīvātmā sa viśiṣyate // BhP_04.29.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8151: sa jahāti matiṃ loke vede ca pariniṣṭhitām // BhP_04.29.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8153: mārtha-dṛṣṭiṃ kṛthāḥ śrotra- sparśiṣv aspṛṣṭa-vastuṣu // BhP_04.29.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8154: svaṃ lokaṃ na vidus te vai yatra devo janārdanaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8157: stabdho bṛhad-vadhān mānī karma nāvaiṣi yat param /

GP10bhp1-12u:8159: harir deha-bhṛtām ātmā svayaṃ prakṛtir īśvaraḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8161: sa vai priyatamaś cātmā yato na bhayam aṇv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:8162: iti veda sa vai vidvān yo vidvān sa gurur hariḥ // BhP_04.29.051 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8164: atra me vadato guhyaṃ niśāmaya suniścitam // BhP_04.29.052 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8167: agre vṛkān asu-tṛpo 'vigaṇayya yāntaṃ % pṛṣṭhe mṛgaṃ mṛgaya
GP10bhp1-12u:8173: atipralobhita-karṇam agre vṛka-yūthavad ātmana āyur harato 'ho-rātrān tān
GP10bhp1-12u:8174: kāla-lava-viśeṣān avigaṇayya gṛheṣu viharantaṃ pṛṣṭhata eva parokṣam
GP10bhp1-12u:8175: anupravṛtto lubdhakaḥ kṛtānto 'ntaḥ śareṇa yam iha parāvidhyati tam imam
GP10bhp1-12u:8176: ātmānam aho rājan bhinna-hṛdayaṃ draṣṭum arhasīti // BhP_04.29.054 //_*

GP10bhp1-12u:8180: BhP_04.29.056/0 rājovāca śrutam anvīkṣitaṃ brahman bhagavān yad abhāṣata /
GP10bhp1-12u:8181: naitaj jānanty upādhyāyāḥ kiṃ na brūyur vidur yadi // BhP_04.29.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8182: saṃśayo 'tra tu me vipra sañchinnas tat-kṛto mahān /
GP10bhp1-12u:8183: ṛṣayo 'pi hi muhyanti yatra nendriya-vṛttayaḥ // BhP_04.29.057 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8184: karmāṇy ārabhate yena pumān iha vihāya tam /

GP10bhp1-12u:8186: iti veda-vidāṃ vādaḥ śrūyate tatra tatra ha /

GP10bhp1-12u:8188: BhP_04.29.060/0 nārada uvāca yenaivārabhate karma tenaivāmutra tat pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:8189: bhuṅkte hy avyavadhānena liṅgena manasā svayam // BhP_04.29.060 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8190: śayānam imam utsṛjya śvasantaṃ puruṣo yathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:8191: karmātmany āhitaṃ bhuṅkte tādṛśenetareṇa vā // BhP_04.29.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8192: mamaite manasā yad yad asāv aham iti bruvan /

GP10bhp1-12u:8195: evaṃ prāg-dehajaṃ karma lakṣyate citta-vṛttibhiḥ // BhP_04.29.063 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8199: śraddhatsvānanubhūto 'rtho na manaḥ spraṣṭum arhati // BhP_04.29.065 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8201: bhaviṣyataś ca bhadraṃ te tathaiva na bhaviṣyataḥ // BhP_04.29.066 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8202: adṛṣṭam aśrutaṃ cātra kvacin manasi dṛśyate /

GP10bhp1-12u:8209: yāvad buddhi-mano-'kṣārtha- guṇa-vyūho hy anādimān // BhP_04.29.070 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8220: bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe dayā jīveṣv akuṇṭha-jñānam ātmani /

GP10bhp1-12u:8224: adṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭavan naṅkṣed bhūtaṃ svapnavad anyathā /

GP10bhp1-12u:8226: yāvad anyaṃ na vindeta vyavadhānena karmaṇām /

GP10bhp1-12u:8229: sati karmaṇy avidyāyāṃ bandhaḥ karmaṇy anātmanaḥ // BhP_04.29.078 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8230: atas tad apavādārthaṃ bhaja sarvātmanā harim /

GP10bhp1-12u:8235: ādiśya putrān agamat tapase kapilāśramam // BhP_04.29.081 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8239: yaḥ śrāvayed yaḥ śṛṇuyāt sa liṅgena vimucyate // BhP_04.29.083 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8246: BhP_04.30.001/0 vidura uvāca ye tvayābhihitā brahman sutāḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8247: te rudra-gītena hariṃ siddhim āpuḥ pratoṣya kām // BhP_04.30.001 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8253: teṣām āvirabhūt kṛcchraṃ śāntena śamayan rucā // BhP_04.30.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8255: pīta-vāsā maṇi-grīvaḥ kurvan vitimirā diśaḥ // BhP_04.30.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8261: barhiṣmataḥ puruṣa āha sutān prapannān % parjanya-nāda-rutayā
GP10bhp1-12u:8263: BhP_04.30.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca varaṃ vṛṇīdhvaṃ bhadraṃ vo yūyaṃ me nṛpa-nandanāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8266: tasya bhrātṛṣv ātma-sāmyaṃ tathā bhūteṣu sauhṛdam // BhP_04.30.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8267: ye tu māṃ rudra-gītena sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8268: stuvanty ahaṃ kāma-varān dāsye prajñāṃ ca śobhanām // BhP_04.30.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8269: yad yūyaṃ pitur ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudānvitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8270: atho va uśatī kīrtir lokān anu bhaviṣyati // BhP_04.30.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8272: ya etām ātma-vīryeṇa tri-lokīṃ pūrayiṣyati // BhP_04.30.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8274: tāṃ cāpaviddhāṃ jagṛhur bhūruhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ // BhP_04.30.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8276: deśinīṃ rodamānāyā nidadhe sa dayānvitaḥ // BhP_04.30.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8278: tatra kanyāṃ varārohāṃ tām udvahata mā ciram // BhP_04.30.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:8282: bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyāṃś cānugrahān mama // BhP_04.30.017 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8286: mad-vārtā-yāta-yāmānāṃ na bandhāya gṛhā matāḥ // BhP_04.30.019 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8291: BhP_04.30.022/0 pracetasa ūcuḥ namo namaḥ kleśa-vināśanāya nirūpitodāra-guṇāhvayāya /
GP10bhp1-12u:8293: śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva-niṣṭhayā manasy apārthaṃ vilasad-dvayāya /

GP10bhp1-12u:8302: āviṣkṛtaṃ naḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kim anyad anukampitam // BhP_04.30.027 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8307: asāv eva varo 'smākam īpsito jagataḥ pate /

GP10bhp1-12u:8309: varaṃ vṛṇīmahe 'thāpi nātha tvat parataḥ parāt /

GP10bhp1-12u:8312: tvad-aṅghri-mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kiṃ kiṃ vṛṇīmahi // BhP_04.30.032 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8317: yatreḍyante kathā mṛṣṭās tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamo yataḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:8322: bhītasya kiṃ na roceta tāvakānāṃ samāgamaḥ // BhP_04.30.037 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8328: sarvaṃ tad etat puruṣasya bhūmno vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya // BhP_04.30.040

GP10bhp1-12u:8336: vīkṣyākupyan drumaiś channāṃ gāṃ gāṃ roddhum ivocchritaiḥ // BhP_04.30.044

GP10bhp1-12u:8360: tava caṅkramaṇaṃ brahmann abhayāya yathā raveḥ // BhP_04.31.005 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8411: svānāṃ didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnāṃ nirvṛtāśayaḥ // BhP_04.31.030 //

GP10bhp1-12u:8424: svāṃ śivatamāṃ padavīṃ na prāyeṇa hinvanti // BhP_05.01.005 //_*

GP10bhp1-12u:8430: apratyāmnātavyaṃ tad-adhikaraṇa ātmano 'nyasmād asato 'pi parābhavam anvīkṣamāṇaḥ // BhP_05.01.006

GP10bhp1-12u:8816: nūnaṃ hy āryāḥ sādhava upaśama-śīlāḥ kṛpaṇa-suhṛda evaṃ-vidhārthe svārthān api gurutarān upekṣante iti kṛtānuṣaṅga āsana-śayanāṭana-snānāśanādiṣu saha mṛga-jahunā
GP10bhp1-12u:8819: bhayam āśaṃsamāno yadā saha hariṇa-kuṇakena vanaṃ samāviśati //
GP10bhp1-12u:8820: pathiṣu ca mugdha-bhāvena tatra tatra viṣakta-mati-praṇaya-bhara-hṛdayaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8821: kārpaṇyāt skandhenodvahati evam utsaṅga urasi cādhāyopalālayan mudaṃ paramām avāpa // BhP_05.08.013
GP10bhp1-12u:8822: kriyāyāṃ nirvartyamānāyām antarāle 'py utthāyotthāya yadainam abhicakṣīta
GP10bhp1-12u:8823: tarhi vāva sa varṣa-patiḥ prakṛti-sthena manasā tasmā āśiṣa āśāste svasti stād vatsa te sarvata iti // BhP_05.08.014 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8824: anyadā bhṛśam udvigna-manā naṣṭa-draviṇa iva kṛpaṇaḥ sakaruṇam ati-tarṣeṇa
GP10bhp1-12u:8825: hariṇa-kuṇaka-viraha-vihvala-hṛdaya-santāpas tam evānuśocan kila kaśmalaṃ mahad abhirambhita iti hovāca // BhP_05.08.015 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8826: api bata sa vai kṛpaṇa eṇa-bālako mṛta-hariṇī-suto 'ho mamānāryasya
GP10bhp1-12u:8827: śaṭha-kirāta-mater akṛta-sukṛtasya kṛta-visrambha ātma-pratyayena tad avigaṇayan sujana ivāgamiṣyati api kṣemeṇāsminn āśramopavane śaṣpāṇi carantaṃ deva-guptaṃ drakṣyāmi //
GP10bhp1-12u:8828: api ca na vṛkaḥ sālā-vṛko 'nyatamo vā naika-cara eka-caro vā bhakṣayati //
GP10bhp1-12u:8829: nimlocati ha bhagavān sakala-jagat-kṣemodayas trayy-ātmādyāpi mama na mṛga-vadhū-nyāsa āgacchati // BhP_05.08.019 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8830: api svid akṛta-sukṛtam āgatya māṃ sukhayiṣyati hariṇa-rāja-kumāro
GP10bhp1-12u:8834: āsādita-haviṣi barhiṣi dūṣite mayopālabdho bhīta-bhītaḥ sapady
GP10bhp1-12u:8836: kiṃ vā are ācaritaṃ tapas tapasvinyānayā yad iyam avaniḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8838: draviṇa-vidhurāturasya kṛpaṇasya mama draviṇa-padavīṃ sūcayanty ātmānaṃ ca
GP10bhp1-12u:8839: sarvataḥ kṛta-kautukaṃ dvijānāṃ svargāpavarga-kāmānāṃ deva-yajanaṃ karoti
GP10bhp1-12u:8840: api svid asau bhagavān uḍu-patir enaṃ mṛga-pati-bhayān mṛta-mātaraṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:8848: yogārambhaṇato vibhraṃśitaḥ sa yoga-tāpaso bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇāc ca katham itarathā jāty-antara eṇa-kuṇaka āsaṅgaḥ sākṣān niḥśreyasa-pratipakṣatayā prāk-parityakta-dustyaja-hṛdayābhijātasya
GP10bhp1-12u:8850: mṛgārbhaka-poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanānuṣaṅgeṇāvigaṇayata ātmānam ahir ivākhu-bilaṃ duratikramaḥ kālaḥ karāla-rabhasa āpadyata // BhP_05.08.026
GP10bhp1-12u:8851: tadānīm api pārśva-vartinam ātmajam ivānuśocantam abhivīkṣamāṇo mṛga
GP10bhp1-12u:8852: evābhiniveśita-manā visṛjya lokam imaṃ saha mṛgeṇa kalevaraṃ mṛtam anu na
GP10bhp1-12u:8856: aho kaṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭo 'ham ātmavatām anupathād yad-vimukta-samasta-saṅgasya
GP10bhp1-12u:8857: vivikta-puṇyāraṇya-śaraṇasyātmavata ātmani sarveṣām ātmanāṃ bhagavati vāsudeve tad-anuśravaṇa-manana-saṅkīrtanārādhanānusmaraṇābhiyogenāśūnya-sakala-yāmena
GP10bhp1-12u:8858: kālena samāveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ kārtsnyena manas tat tu punar mamābudhasyārān
GP10bhp1-12u:8860: ity evaṃ nigūḍha-nirvedo visṛjya mṛgīṃ mātaraṃ punar bhagavat-kṣetram
GP10bhp1-12u:8861: upaśama-śīla-muni-gaṇa-dayitaṃ śālagrāmaṃ pulastya-pulahāśramaṃ kālañjarāt pratyājagāma // tasminn api kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaḥ saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvigna ātma-sahacaraḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8862: śuṣka-parṇa-tṛṇa-vīrudhā vartamāno mṛgatva-nimittāvasānam eva gaṇayan mṛga-śarīraṃ tīrthodaka-klinnam ut-sasarja // BhP_05.08.031 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8863: BhP_05.09.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca atha kasyacid dvija-varasyāṅgiraḥ-pravarasya
GP10bhp1-12u:8865: nava sodaryā aṅgajā babhūvur mithunaṃ ca yavīyasyāṃ bhāryāyām //
GP10bhp1-12u:8866: yas tu tatra pumāṃs taṃ parama-bhāgavataṃ rājarṣi-pravaraṃ bharatam
GP10bhp1-12u:8867: utsṛṣṭa-mṛga-śarīraṃ carama-śarīreṇa vipratvaṃ gatam āhuḥ // BhP_05.09.002
GP10bhp1-12u:8868: tatrāpi svajana-saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvijamāno bhagavataḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8872: tasyāpi ha vā ātmajasya vipraḥ putra-snehānubaddha-manā āsamāvartanāt saṃskārān yathopadeśaṃ vidadhāna upanītasya ca punaḥ śaucācamanādīn karma-niyamān anabhipretān api samaśikṣayad anuśiṣṭena hi bhāvyaṃ pituḥ putreṇeti // BhP_05.09.004 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8873: sa cāpi tad u ha pitṛ-sannidhāv evāsadhrīcīnam iva sma karoti chandāṃsy adhyāpayiṣyan saha vyāhṛtibhiḥ sapraṇava-śiras tripadīṃ sāvitrīṃ graiṣma-vāsantikān māsān adhīyānam apy asamaveta-rūpaṃ grāhayām āsa //
GP10bhp1-12u:8876: anabhiyuktāny api samanuśiṣṭena bhāvyam ity asad-āgrahaḥ putram anuśāsya svayaṃ tāvad anadhigata-manorathaḥ kālenāpramattena svayaṃ gṛha eva pramatta upasaṃhṛtaḥ // BhP_05.09.006 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8877: atha yavīyasī dvija-satī sva-garbha-jātaṃ mithunaṃ sapatnyā upanyasya
GP10bhp1-12u:8879: pitary uparate bhrātara enam atat-prabhāva-vidas trayyāṃ vidyāyām eva
GP10bhp1-12u:8880: paryavasita-matayo na para-vidyāyāṃ jaḍa-matir iti bhrātur anuśāsana-nirbandhān nyavṛtsanta sa ca prākṛtair dvipada-paśubhir unmatta-jaḍa-badhira-mūkety
GP10bhp1-12u:8881: abhibhāṣyamāṇo yadā tad-anurūpāṇi prabhāṣate karmāṇi ca kāryamāṇaḥ parecchayā karoti viṣṭito vetanato vā yācñyā yadṛcchayā vopasāditam alpaṃ bahu mṛṣṭaṃ kadannaṃ vābhyavaharati paraṃ nendriya-prīti-nimittam
GP10bhp1-12u:8887: dvijātir iti brahma-bandhur iti saṃjñayātaj-jñajanāvamato vicacāra //
GP10bhp1-12u:8888: yadā tu parata āhāraṃ karma-vetanata īhamānaḥ sva-bhrātṛbhir api
GP10bhp1-12u:8889: kedāra-karmaṇi nirūpitas tad api karoti kintu na samaṃ viṣamaṃ nyūnam
GP10bhp1-12u:8890: adhikam iti veda kaṇa-piṇyāka-phalī-karaṇa-kulmāṣa-sthālīpurīṣādīny apy amṛtavad abhyavaharati atha kadācit kaścid vṛṣala-patir bhadra-kālyai puruṣa-paśum
GP10bhp1-12u:8892: tasya ha daiva-muktasya paśoḥ padavīṃ tad-anucarāḥ paridhāvanto niśi niśītha-samaye tamasāvṛtāyām anadhigata-paśava ākasmikena vidhinā kedārān
GP10bhp1-12u:8894: atha ta enam anavadya-lakṣaṇam avamṛśya bhartṛ-karma-niṣpattiṃ manyamānā baddhvā raśanayā caṇḍikā-gṛham upaninyur mudā vikasit a-vadanāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8899: atha vṛṣala-rāja-paṇiḥ puruṣa-paśor asṛg-āsavena devīṃ bhadra-kālīṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:8902: bhagavat-kalā-vīra-kulaṃ kadarthī-kṛtyotpathena svairaṃ viharatāṃ hiṃsā-vihārāṇāṃ karmāti-dāruṇaṃ yad brahma-bhūtasya sākṣād
GP10bhp1-12u:8903: brahmarṣi-sutasya nirvairasya sarva-bhūta-suhṛdaḥ sūnāyām apy ananumatam
GP10bhp1-12u:8904: ālambhanaṃ tad upalabhya brahma-tejasāti-durviṣaheṇa dandahyamānena vapuṣā sahasoccacāṭa saiva devī bhadra-kālī // BhP_05.09.017 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8907: hantu-kāmevedaṃ mahāṭṭa-hāsam ati-saṃrambheṇa vimuñcantī tata utpatya
GP10bhp1-12u:8908: pāpīyasāṃ duṣṭānāṃ tenaivāsinā vivṛkṇa-śīrṣṇāṃ galāt sravantam asṛg-āsavam
GP10bhp1-12u:8910: saha jagau nanarta ca vijahāra ca śiraḥ-kanduka-līlayā // BhP_05.09.018
GP10bhp1-12u:8911: evam eva khalu mahad-abhicārāti-kramaḥ kārtsnyenātmane phalati //
GP10bhp1-12u:8912: na vā etad viṣṇudatta mahad-adbhutaṃ yad asambhramaḥ sva-śiraś-chedana
GP10bhp1-12u:8914: sarva-sattva-suhṛd-ātmanāṃ nirvairāṇāṃ sākṣād bhagavatānimiṣāri-varāyudhenāpramattena tais tair bhāvaiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8917: BhP_05.10.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca atha sindhu-sauvīra-pate rahūgaṇasya vrajata ikṣumatyās taṭe
GP10bhp1-12u:8918: tat-kula-patinā śibikā-vāha-puruṣānveṣaṇa-samaye daivenopasāditaḥ sa dvija-vara upalabdha eṣa pīvā yuvā saṃhananāṅgo go-kharavad dhuraṃ voḍhum alam iti pūrva-viṣṭi-gṛhītaiḥ saha gṛhītaḥ prasabham atad-arha uvāha śibikāṃ sa mahānubhāvaḥ // BhP_05.10.001 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8919: yadā hi dvija-varasyeṣu-mātrāvalokānugater na samāhitā puruṣa-gatis tadā
GP10bhp1-12u:8920: viṣama-gatāṃ sva-śibikāṃ rahūgaṇa upadhārya puruṣān adhivahata āha he
GP10bhp1-12u:8921: voḍhāraḥ sādhv atikramata kim iti viṣamam uhyate yānam iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:8922: atha ta īśvara-vacaḥ sopālambham upākarṇyopāya-turīyāc chaṅkita-manasas
GP10bhp1-12u:8924: na vayaṃ nara-deva pramattā bhavan-niyamānupathāḥ sādhv eva vahāmaḥ ayam adhunaiva niyukto 'pi na drutaṃ vrajati nānena saha voḍhum u ha vayaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:8926: sāṃsargiko doṣa eva nūnam ekasyāpi sarveṣāṃ sāṃsargikāṇāṃ bhavitum arhatīti niścitya niśamya kṛpaṇa-vaco rājā rahūgaṇa upāsita-vṛddho 'pi
GP10bhp1-12u:8929: aho kaṣṭaṃ bhrātar vyaktam uru-pariśrānto dīrgham adhvānam eka eva ūhivān suciraṃ nāti-pīvā na saṃhananāṅgo jarasā copadruto bhavān sakhe no evāpara ete saṅghaṭṭina iti bahu-vipralabdho 'py avidyayā
GP10bhp1-12u:8931: 'haṃ mamety anadhyāropita-mithyā-pratyayo brahma-bhūtas tūṣṇīṃ śibikāṃ pūrvavad uvāha // atha punaḥ sva-śibikāyāṃ viṣama-gatāyāṃ prakupita uvāca rahūgaṇaḥ kim idam are tvaṃ jīvan-mṛto māṃ kadarthī-kṛtya bhartṛ-śāsanam aticarasi pramattasya ca te karomi cikitsāṃ daṇḍa-pāṇir iva janatāyā yathā prakṛtiṃ svāṃ bhajiṣyasa iti // BhP_05.10.007 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:8932: evaṃ bahv abaddham api bhāṣamāṇaṃ nara-devābhimānaṃ rajasā tamasānuviddhena madena tiraskṛtāśeṣa-bhagavat-priya-niketaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:8934: yogeśvara-caryāyāṃ nāti-vyutpanna-matiṃ smayamāna iva vigata-smaya idam āha // BhP_05.10.008
GP10bhp1-12u:8935: BhP_05.10.009/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca tvayoditaṃ vyaktam avipralabdhaṃ bhartuḥ sa me syād yadi vīra bhāraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8936: gantur yadi syād adhigamyam adhvā pīveti rāśau na vidāṃ pravādaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8937: sthaulyaṃ kārśyaṃ vyādhaya ādhayaś ca kṣut tṛḍ bhayaṃ kalir icchā jarā ca
GP10bhp1-12u:8938: nidrā ratir manyur ahaṃ madaḥ śuco dehena jātasya hi me na santi //
GP10bhp1-12u:8939: jīvan-mṛtatvaṃ niyamena rājan ādyantavad yad vikṛtasya dṛṣṭam /
GP10bhp1-12u:8940: sva-svāmya-bhāvo dhruva īḍya yatra tarhy ucyate 'sau vidhikṛtya-yogaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8941: viśeṣa-buddher vivaraṃ manāk ca paśyāma yan na vyavahārato 'nyat /
GP10bhp1-12u:8942: ka īśvaras tatra kim īśitavyaṃ tathāpi rājan karavāma kiṃ te //
GP10bhp1-12u:8943: unmatta-matta-jaḍavat sva-saṃsthāṃ gatasya me vīra cikitsitena /
GP10bhp1-12u:8944: arthaḥ kiyān bhavatā śikṣitena stabdha-pramattasya ca piṣṭapeṣaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8945: BhP_05.10.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca etāvad anuvāda-paribhāṣayā pratyudīrya muni-vara upaśama-śīla
GP10bhp1-12u:8946: uparatānātmya-nimitta upabhogena karmārabdhaṃ vyapanayan rāja-yānam api tathovāha // BhP_05.10.014
GP10bhp1-12u:8951: kas tvaṃ nigūḍhaś carasi dvijānāṃ bibharṣi sūtraṃ katamo 'vadhūtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8952: kasyāsi kutratya ihāpi kasmāt kṣemāya naś ced asi nota śuklaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8953: nāhaṃ viśaṅke sura-rāja-vajrān na tryakṣa-śūlān na yamasya daṇḍāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:8955: tad brūhy asaṅgo jaḍavan nigūḍha- vijñāna-vīryo vicarasy apāraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8956: vacāṃsi yoga-grathitāni sādho na naḥ kṣamante manasāpi bhettum //
GP10bhp1-12u:8957: ahaṃ ca yogeśvaram ātma-tattva- vidāṃ munīnāṃ paramaṃ guruṃ vai /
GP10bhp1-12u:8958: praṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ kim ihāraṇaṃ tat sākṣād dhariṃ jñāna-kalāvatīrṇam //
GP10bhp1-12u:8959: sa vai bhavā loka-nirīkṣaṇārtham avyakta-liṅgo vicaraty api svit /
GP10bhp1-12u:8960: yogeśvarāṇāṃ gatim andha-buddhiḥ kathaṃ vicakṣīta gṛhānubandhaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8961: dṛṣṭaḥ śramaḥ karmata ātmano vai bhartur gantur bhavataś cānumanye /
GP10bhp1-12u:8965: śāstābhigoptā nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ yaḥ kiṅkaro vai na pinaṣṭi piṣṭam /
GP10bhp1-12u:8966: sva-dharmam ārādhanam acyutasya yad īhamāno vijahāty aghaugham //
GP10bhp1-12u:8967: tan me bhavān nara-devābhimāna- madena tucchīkṛta-sattamasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:8968: kṛṣīṣṭa maitrī-dṛśam ārta-bandho yathā tare sad-avadhyānam aṃhaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8969: na vikriyā viśva-suhṛt-sakhasya sāmyena vītābhimates tavāpi /
GP10bhp1-12u:8970: mahad-vimānāt sva-kṛtād dhi mādṛṅ naṅkṣyaty adūrād api śūlapāṇiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8971: BhP_05.11.001/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca akovidaḥ kovida-vāda-vādān vadasy atho nāti-vidāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:8972: na sūrayo hi vyavahāram enaṃ tattvāvamarśena sahāmananti // BhP_05.11.001
GP10bhp1-12u:8974: na veda-vādeṣu hi tattva-vādaḥ prāyeṇa śuddho nu cakāsti sādhuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8975: na tasya tattva-grahaṇāya sākṣād varīyasīr api vācaḥ samāsan /
GP10bhp1-12u:8976: svapne niruktyā gṛhamedhi-saukhyaṃ na yasya heyānumitaṃ svayaṃ syāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:8977: yāvan mano rajasā pūruṣasya sattvena vā tamasā vānuruddham /
GP10bhp1-12u:8978: cetobhir ākūtibhir ātanoti niraṅkuśaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaraṃ vā // BhP_05.11.004
GP10bhp1-12u:8979: sa vāsanātmā viṣayoparakto guṇa-pravāho vikṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśātmā /
GP10bhp1-12u:8980: bibhrat pṛthaṅ-nāmabhi rūpa-bhedam antar-bahiṣṭvaṃ ca purais tanoti //
GP10bhp1-12u:8981: duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca tīvraṃ kālopapannaṃ phalam āvyanakti /
GP10bhp1-12u:8983: tāvān ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ sadāviḥ kṣetrajña-sākṣyo bhavati sthūla-sūkṣmaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8984: tasmān mano liṅgam ado vadanti guṇāguṇatvasya parāvarasya // BhP_05.11.007
GP10bhp1-12u:8985: guṇānuraktaṃ vyasanāya jantoḥ kṣemāya nairguṇyam atho manaḥ syāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:8986: yathā pradīpo ghṛta-vartim aśnan śikhāḥ sadhūmā bhajati hy anyadā svam /
GP10bhp1-12u:8987: padaṃ tathā guṇa-karmānubaddhaṃ vṛttīr manaḥ śrayate 'nyatra tattvam //
GP10bhp1-12u:8988: ekādaśāsan manaso hi vṛttaya ākūtayaḥ pañca dhiyo 'bhimānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8989: mātrāṇi karmāṇi puraṃ ca tāsāṃ vadanti haikādaśa vīra bhūmīḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8991: ekādaśaṃ svīkaraṇaṃ mameti śayyām ahaṃ dvādaśam eka āhuḥ // BhP_05.11.010
GP10bhp1-12u:8993: sahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaś ca kṣetrajñato na mitho na svataḥ syuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8994: kṣetrajña etā manaso vibhūtīr jīvasya māyā-racitasya nityāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8995: āvirhitāḥ kvāpi tirohitāś ca śuddho vicaṣṭe hy aviśuddha-kartuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:8996: kṣetrajña ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ sākṣāt svayaṃ jyotir ajaḥ pareśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:8997: nārāyaṇo bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sva-māyayātmany avadhīyamānaḥ // BhP_05.11.013
GP10bhp1-12u:8999: evaṃ paro bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kṣetrajña ātmedam anupraviṣṭaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9000: na yāvad etāṃ tanu-bhṛn narendra vidhūya māyāṃ vayunodayena /
GP10bhp1-12u:9002: na yāvad etan mana ātma-liṅgaṃ saṃsāra-tāpāvapanaṃ janasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:9004: bhrātṛvyam enaṃ tad adabhra-vīryam upekṣayādhyedhitam apramattaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9005: guror hareś caraṇopāsanāstro jahi vyalīkaṃ svayam ātma-moṣam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9006: BhP_05.12.001/0 rahūgaṇa uvāca namo namaḥ kāraṇa-vigrahāya svarūpa-tucchīkṛta-vigrahāya
GP10bhp1-12u:9008: jvarāmayārtasya yathāgadaṃ sat nidāgha-dagdhasya yathā himāmbhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9009: kudeha-mānāhi-vidaṣṭa-dṛṣṭeḥ brahman vacas te 'mṛtam auṣadhaṃ me //
GP10bhp1-12u:9010: tasmād bhavantaṃ mama saṃśayārthaṃ prakṣyāmi paścād adhunā subodham /
GP10bhp1-12u:9012: yad āha yogeśvara dṛśyamānaṃ kriyā-phalaṃ sad-vyavahāra-mūlam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9013: na hy añjasā tattva-vimarśanāya bhavān amuṣmin bhramate mano me //
GP10bhp1-12u:9014: BhP_05.12.005/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca ayaṃ jano nāma calan pṛthivyāṃ yaḥ pārthivaḥ pārthiva kasya hetoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9016: aṃse 'dhi dārvī śibikā ca yasyāṃ sauvīra-rājety apadeśa āste /
GP10bhp1-12u:9017: yasmin bhavān rūḍha-nijābhimāno rājāsmi sindhuṣv iti durmadāndhaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9018: śocyān imāṃs tvam adhikaṣṭa-dīnān viṣṭyā nigṛhṇan niranugraho 'si /
GP10bhp1-12u:9019: janasya goptāsmi vikatthamāno na śobhase vṛddha-sabhāsu dhṛṣṭaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9020: yadā kṣitāv eva carācarasya vidāma niṣṭhāṃ prabhavaṃ ca nityam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9022: evaṃ niruktaṃ kṣiti-śabda-vṛttam asan nidhānāt paramāṇavo ye /
GP10bhp1-12u:9023: avidyayā manasā kalpitās te yeṣāṃ samūhena kṛto viśeṣaḥ // BhP_05.12.009
GP10bhp1-12u:9024: evaṃ kṛśaṃ sthūlam aṇur bṛhad yad asac ca saj jīvam ajīvam anyat /
GP10bhp1-12u:9026: jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ paramārtham ekam anantaraṃ tv abahir brahma satyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9027: pratyak praśāntaṃ bhagavac-chabda-saṃjñaṃ yad vāsudevaṃ kavayo vadanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9028: rahūgaṇaitat tapasā na yāti na cejyayā nirvapaṇād gṛhād vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:9029: na cchandasā naiva jalāgni-sūryair vinā mahat-pāda-rajo-'bhiṣekam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9031: niṣevyamāṇo 'nudinaṃ mumukṣor matiṃ satīṃ yacchati vāsudeve //
GP10bhp1-12u:9032: ahaṃ purā bharato nāma rājā vimukta-dṛṣṭa-śruta-saṅga-bandhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9033: ārādhanaṃ bhagavata īhamāno mṛgo 'bhavaṃ mṛga-saṅgād dhatārthaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9034: sā māṃ smṛtir mṛga-dehe 'pi vīra kṛṣṇārcana-prabhavā no jahāti /
GP10bhp1-12u:9035: atho ahaṃ jana-saṅgād asaṅgo viśaṅkamāno 'vivṛtaś carāmi // BhP_05.12.015
GP10bhp1-12u:9037: hariṃ tad-īhā-kathana-śrutābhyāṃ labdha-smṛtir yāty atipāram adhvanaḥ //
