GP10bhp1-12u:9039: sa eṣa sārtho 'rtha-paraḥ paribhraman bhavāṭavīṃ yāti na śarma vindati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9040: yasyām ime ṣaṇ nara-deva dasyavaḥ sārthaṃ vilumpanti kunāyakaṃ balāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:9041: gomāyavo yatra haranti sārthikaṃ pramattam āviśya yathoraṇaṃ vṛkāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9043: kvacit tu gandharva-puraṃ prapaśyati kvacit kvacic cāśu-rayolmuka-graham
GP10bhp1-12u:9044: nivāsa-toya-draviṇātma-buddhis tatas tato dhāvati bho aṭavyām /
GP10bhp1-12u:9045: kvacic ca vātyotthita-pāṃsu-dhūmrā diśo na jānāti rajas-valākṣaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9047: apuṇya-vṛkṣān śrayate kṣudhārdito marīci-toyāny abhidhāvati kvacit //
GP10bhp1-12u:9048: kvacid vitoyāḥ sarito 'bhiyāti parasparaṃ cālaṣate nirandhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9049: āsādya dāvaṃ kvacid agni-tapto nirvidyate kva ca yakṣair hṛtāsuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9050: śūrair hṛta-svaḥ kva ca nirviṇṇa-cetāḥ śocan vimuhyann upayāti kaśmalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9051: kvacic ca gandharva-puraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pramodate nirvṛtavan muhūrtam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9052: calan kvacit kaṇṭaka-śarkarāṅghrir nagārurukṣur vimanā ivāste /
GP10bhp1-12u:9053: pade pade 'bhyantara-vahninārditaḥ kauṭumbikaḥ krudhyati vai janāya //
GP10bhp1-12u:9054: kvacin nigīrṇo 'jagarāhinā jano nāvaiti kiñcid vipine 'paviddhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9055: daṣṭaḥ sma śete kva ca danda-śūkair andho 'ndha-kūpe patitas tamisre //
GP10bhp1-12u:9056: karhi sma cit kṣudra-rasān vicinvaṃs tan-makṣikābhir vyathito vimānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9057: tatrāti-kṛcchrāt pratilabdhamāno balād vilumpanty atha taṃ tato 'nye //
GP10bhp1-12u:9058: kvacic ca śītātapa-vāta-varṣa- pratikriyāṃ kartum anīśa āste /
GP10bhp1-12u:9059: kvacin mitho vipaṇan yac ca kiñcid vidveṣam ṛcchaty uta vitta-śāṭhyāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:9060: kvacit kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanas tu tasmin śayyāsana-sthāna-vihāra-hīnaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9063: adhvany amuṣminn uru-kṛcchra-vitta- bādhopasargair viharan vipannaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9064: tāṃs tān vipannān sa hi tatra tatra vihāya jātaṃ parigṛhya sārthaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9065: āvartate 'dyāpi na kaścid atra vīrādhvanaḥ pāram upaiti yogam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9066: manasvino nirjita-dig-gajendrā mameti sarve bhuvi baddha-vairāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9067: mṛdhe śayīran na tu tad vrajanti yan nyasta-daṇḍo gata-vairo 'bhiyāti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9069: kvacit kadācid dhari-cakratas trasan sakhyaṃ vidhatte baka-kaṅka-gṛdhraiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9070: tair vañcito haṃsa-kulaṃ samāviśann arocayan śīlam upaiti vānarān /
GP10bhp1-12u:9072: drumeṣu raṃsyan suta-dāra-vatsalo vyavāya-dīno vivaśaḥ sva-bandhane /
GP10bhp1-12u:9073: kvacit pramādād giri-kandare patan vallīṃ gṛhītvā gaja-bhīta āsthitaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9074: ataḥ kathañcit sa vimukta āpadaḥ punaś ca sārthaṃ praviśaty arindama /
GP10bhp1-12u:9075: adhvany amuṣminn ajayā niveśito bhramañ jano 'dyāpi na veda kaścana //
GP10bhp1-12u:9076: rahūgaṇa tvam api hy adhvano 'sya sannyasta-daṇḍaḥ kṛta-bhūta-maitraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9077: asaj-jitātmā hari-sevayā śitaṃ jñānāsim ādāya tarāti-pāram //
GP10bhp1-12u:9078: BhP_05.13.021/0 rājovāca aho nṛ-janmākhila-janma-śobhanaṃ kiṃ janmabhis tv aparair apy amuṣmin
GP10bhp1-12u:9079: na yad dhṛṣīkeśa-yaśaḥ-kṛtātmanāṃ mahātmanāṃ vaḥ pracuraḥ samāgamaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9080: na hy adbhutaṃ tvac-caraṇābja-reṇubhir hatāṃhaso bhaktir adhokṣaje 'malā /
GP10bhp1-12u:9081: mauhūrtikād yasya samāgamāc ca me dustarka-mūlo 'pahato 'vivekaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9082: namo mahadbhyo 'stu namaḥ śiśubhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āvaṭubhyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9083: ye brāhmaṇā gām avadhūta-liṅgāś caranti tebhyaḥ śivam astu rājñām //
GP10bhp1-12u:9084: BhP_05.13.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca ity evam uttarā-mātaḥ sa vai brahmarṣi-sutaḥ sindhu-pataya
GP10bhp1-12u:9085: vigaṇayataḥ parānubhāvaḥ parama-kāruṇikatayopadiśya rahūgaṇena sakaruṇam abhivandita-caraṇa āpūrṇārṇava iva nibhṛta-karaṇormy-āśayo dharaṇim imāṃ vicacāra // BhP_05.13.024 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9086: sauvīra-patir api sujana-samavagata-paramātma-satattva ātmany avidyādhyāropitāṃ ca dehātma-matiṃ visasarja evaṃ hi nṛpa
GP10bhp1-12u:9088: BhP_05.13.026/0 rājovāca yo ha vā iha bahu-vidā mahā-bhāgavata tvayābhihitaḥ parokṣeṇa vacasā
GP10bhp1-12u:9092: BhP_05.14.001/0 sa hovāca sa eṣa dehātma-mānināṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9095: tasmin durgādhvavad asugame 'dhvany āpatita īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇor
GP10bhp1-12u:9100: yasyām u ha vā ete ṣaḍ-indriya-nāmānaḥ karmaṇā dasyava eva te tad yathā
GP10bhp1-12u:9101: puruṣasya dhanaṃ yat kiñcid dharmaupayikaṃ bahu-kṛcchrādhigataṃ sākṣāt
GP10bhp1-12u:9102: parama-puruṣārādhana-lakṣaṇo yo 'sau dharmas taṃ tu sāmparāya udāharanti tad-dharmyaṃ dhanaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9105: atha ca yatra kauṭumbikā dārāpatyādayo nāmnā karmaṇā vṛka-sṛgālā
GP10bhp1-12u:9106: evānicchato 'pi kadaryasya kuṭumbina uraṇakavat saṃrakṣyamāṇaṃ miṣato 'pi
GP10bhp1-12u:9108: yathā hy anuvatsaraṃ kṛṣyamāṇam apy adagdha-bījaṃ kṣetraṃ punar evāvapana-kāle gulma-tṛṇa-vīrudbhir gahvaram iva bhavaty evam eva gṛhāśramaḥ karma-kṣetraṃ yasmin na hi karmāṇy utsīdanti yad ayaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9111: śalabha-śakunta-taskara-mūṣakādibhir uparudhyamāna-bahiḥ-prāṇaḥ kvacit parivartamāno 'sminn adhvany avidyā-kāma-karmabhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9112: uparakta-manasānupapannārthaṃ nara-lokaṃ gandharva-nagaram upapannam iti mithyā-dṛṣṭir anupaśyati // BhP_05.14.005 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9113: tatra ca kvacid ātapodaka-nibhān viṣayān upadhāvati pāna-bhojana-vyavāyādi-vyasana-lolupaḥ kvacic cāśeṣa-doṣa-niṣadanaṃ purīṣa-viśeṣaṃ tad-varṇa-guṇa-nirmita-matiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9115: atha kadācin nivāsa-pānīya-draviṇādy-anekātmopajīvanābhiniveśa etasyāṃ saṃsārāṭavyām itas tataḥ paridhāvati // BhP_05.14.008 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9116: kvacic ca vātyaupamyayā pramadayāroham āropitas tat-kāla-rajasā
GP10bhp1-12u:9119: kvacit sakṛd avagata-viṣaya-vaitathyaḥ svayaṃ parābhidhyānena vibhraṃśita-smṛtis tayaiva marīci-toya-prāyāṃs tān evābhidhāvati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9120: kvacid ulūka-jhillī-svanavad ati-paruṣa-rabhasāṭopaṃ pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā ripu-rāja-kula-nirbhartsitenāti-vyathita-karṇa-mūla-hṛdayaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9126: yadā tu para-bādhayāndha ātmane nopanamati tadā hi pitṛ-putra-barhiṣmataḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9127: pitṛ-putrān vā sa khalu bhakṣayati // BhP_05.14.014 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9128: kvacid āsādya gṛhaṃ dāvavat priyārtha-vidhuram asukhodarkaṃ śokāgninā dahyamāno bhṛśaṃ nirvedam upagacchati // BhP_05.14.015 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9129: kvacit kāla-viṣa-mita-rāja-kula-rakṣasāpahṛta-priyatama-dhanāsuḥ pramṛtaka iva vigata-jīva-lakṣaṇa āste // BhP_05.14.016 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9134: kvacic ca duḥsahena kāyābhyantara-vahninā gṛhīta-sāraḥ sva-kuṭumbāya
GP10bhp1-12u:9136: sa eva punar nidrājagara-gṛhīto 'ndhe tamasi magnaḥ śūnyāraṇya iva śete nānyat-kiñcana veda śava ivāpaviddhaḥ // BhP_05.14.020 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9139: karhi sma cit kāma-madhu-lavān vicinvan yadā para-dāra-para-drav-yāṇy
GP10bhp1-12u:9140: avarundhāno rājñā svāmibhir vā nihataḥ pataty apāre niraye //
GP10bhp1-12u:9141: atha ca tasmād ubhayathāpi hi karmāsminn ātmanaḥ saṃsārāvapanam udāharanti
GP10bhp1-12u:9142: muktas tato yadi bandhād devadatta upācchinatti tasmād api viṣṇumitra ity anavasthitiḥ // kvacic ca śīta-vātādy-anekādhidaivika-bhautikātmīyānāṃ daśānāṃ pratinivāraṇe 'kalpo duranta-cintayā viṣaṇṇa āste // BhP_05.14.025 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9143: kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam anyebhyo vā kākiṇikā-mātram apy apaharan yat kiñcid vā vidveṣam eti vitta-śāṭhyāt // BhP_05.14.026 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9149: kadācid īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇoś cakrāt paramāṇv-ādi-dvi-parārdhāpavarga-kālopalakṣaṇāt parivartitena vayasā raṃhasā harata ābrahma-tṛṇa-stambādīnāṃ bhūtānām animiṣato miṣatāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9150: vitrasta-hṛdayas tam eveśvaraṃ kāla-cakra-nijāyudhaṃ sākṣād bhagavantaṃ yajña-puruṣam anādṛtya pākhaṇḍa-devatāḥ kaṅka-gṛdhra-baka-vaṭa-prāyā
GP10bhp1-12u:9152: yadā pākhaṇḍibhir ātma-vañcitais tair uru vañcito brahma-kulaṃ samāvasaṃs teṣāṃ śīlam upanayanādi-śrauta-smārta-karmānuṣṭhā-nena
GP10bhp1-12u:9153: yajña-puruṣasyārādhanam eva tad arocayan śūdra-kulaṃ bhajate nigamācāre 'śuddhito yasya mithunī-bhāvaḥ kuṭumba-bharaṇaṃ yathā vānara-jāteḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9156: kvacid drumavad aihikārtheṣu gṛheṣu raṃsyan yathā vānaraḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9158: evam adhvany avarundhāno mṛtyu-gaja-bhayāt tamasi giri-kandara-prāye //
GP10bhp1-12u:9159: kvacic chīta-vātādy-aneka-daivika-bhautikātmīyānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ pratinivāraṇe 'kalpo duranta-viṣaya-viṣaṇṇa āste // BhP_05.14.034 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9160: kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam upayāti vitta-śāṭhyena //
GP10bhp1-12u:9164: evaṃ vitta-vyatiṣaṅga-vivṛddha-vairānubandho 'pi pūrva-vāsanayā mitha udvahaty athāpavahati etasmin saṃsārādhvani nānā-kleśopasarga-bādhita āpanna-vipanno yatra yas tam u ha vāvetaras tatra visṛjya jātaṃ jātam upādāya śocan muhyan bibhyad-vivadan krandan saṃhṛṣyan gāyan nahyamānaḥ sādhu-varjito
GP10bhp1-12u:9165: naivāvartate 'dyāpi yata ārabdha eṣa nara-loka-sārtho yam adhvanaḥ pāram
GP10bhp1-12u:9167: yad idaṃ yogānuśāsanaṃ na vā etad avarundhate yan nyasta-daṇḍā munaya
GP10bhp1-12u:9169: yad api dig-ibha-jayino yajvino ye vai rājarṣayaḥ kiṃ tu paraṃ mṛdhe śayīrann asyām eva mameyam iti kṛta-vairānubandhāyāṃ visṛjya svayam upasaṃhṛtāḥ // BhP_05.14.040 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9170: karma-vallīm avalambya tata āpadaḥ kathañcin narakād vimuktaḥ punar apy evaṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamāno nara-loka-sārtham upayāti evam upari gato 'pi
GP10bhp1-12u:9174: yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9176: yo dustyajān kṣiti-suta-svajanārtha-dārān $ prārthyāṃ śriyaṃ sura-varaiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9178: naicchan nṛpas tad-ucitaṃ mahatāṃ madhudviṭ- % sevānurakta-manasām abhavo
GP10bhp1-12u:9182: nārāyaṇāya haraye nama ity udāraṃ % hāsyan mṛgatvam api yaḥ samudājahāra // BhP_05.14.045
GP10bhp1-12u:9183: ya idaṃ bhāgavata-sabhājitāvadāta-guṇa-karmaṇo rājarṣer bharatasyānucaritaṃ svasty-ayanam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9184: svargyāpavargyaṃ vānuśṛṇoty ākhyāsyaty abhinandati ca sarvā evāśiṣa ātmana āśāste na kāñcana parata iti // BhP_05.14.046 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9185: BhP_05.15.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca bharatasyātmajaḥ sumatir nāmābhihito yam u ha vāva kecit pākhaṇḍina
GP10bhp1-12u:9186: ṛṣabha-padavīm anuvartamānaṃ cānāryā aveda-samāmnātāṃ devatāṃ sva-manīṣayā
GP10bhp1-12u:9189: athāsuryāṃ tat-tanayo devadyumnas tato dhenumatyāṃ sutaḥ parameṣṭhī tasya
GP10bhp1-12u:9191: ya ātma-vidyām ākhyāya svayaṃ saṃśuddho mahā-puruṣam anusasmāra //
GP10bhp1-12u:9192: pratīhāt suvarcalāyāṃ pratihartrādayas traya āsann ijyā-kovidāḥ sūnavaḥ pratihartuḥ stutyām aja-bhūmānāv ajaniṣātām // BhP_05.15.005 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9193: bhūmna ṛṣikulyāyām udgīthas tataḥ prastāvo devakulyāyāṃ prastāvān niyutsāyāṃ hṛdayaja āsīd vibhur vibho ratyāṃ ca pṛthuṣeṇas tasmān nakta ākūtyāṃ jajñe naktād druti-putro gayo rājarṣi-pravara udāra-śravā ajāyata sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇor jagad-rirakṣiṣayā gṛhīta-sattvasya
GP10bhp1-12u:9196: prajā-pālana-poṣaṇa-prīṇanopalālanānuśāsana-lakṣaṇenejyādinā ca bhagavati mahā-puruṣe parāvare brahmaṇi sarvātmanārpita-paramārtha-lakṣaṇena
GP10bhp1-12u:9200: tasyemāṃ gāthāṃ pāṇḍaveya purāvida upagāyanti // BhP_05.15.008 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9201: gayaṃ nṛpaḥ kaḥ pratiyāti karmabhir yajvābhimānī bahuvid dharma-goptā /
GP10bhp1-12u:9202: samāgata-śrīḥ sadasas-patiḥ satāṃ sat-sevako 'nyo bhagavat-kalām ṛte //
GP10bhp1-12u:9203: yam abhyaṣiñcan parayā mudā satīḥ satyāśiṣo dakṣa-kanyāḥ saridbhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9204: yasya prajānāṃ duduhe dharāśiṣo nirāśiṣo guṇa-vatsa-snutodhāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9205: chandāṃsy akāmasya ca yasya kāmān dudūhur ājahrur atho baliṃ nṛpāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9206: pratyañcitā yudhi dharmeṇa viprā yadāśiṣāṃ ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ paretya //
GP10bhp1-12u:9207: yasyādhvare bhagavān adhvarātmā maghoni mādyaty uru-soma-pīthe /
GP10bhp1-12u:9210: prīyeta sadyaḥ sa ha viśva-jīvaḥ prītaḥ svayaṃ prītim agād gayasya //
GP10bhp1-12u:9211: gayād gayantyāṃ citrarathaḥ sugatir avarodhana iti trayaḥ putrā babhūvuś citrarathād ūrṇāyāṃ samrāḍ ajaniṣṭa tata utkalāyāṃ marīcir marīcer bindumatyāṃ bindum ānudapadyata tasmāt saraghāyāṃ madhur nāmābhavan madhoḥ sumanasi vīravratas tato bhojāyāṃ manthu-pramanthū jajñāte manthoḥ satyāyāṃ bhauvanas tato dūṣaṇāyāṃ tvaṣṭājaniṣṭa tvaṣṭur virocanāyāṃ virajo virajasya śatajit-pravaraṃ putra-śataṃ kanyā ca viṣūcyāṃ kila jātam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9212: BhP_05.15.015/0 tatrāyaṃ ślokaḥ praiyavrataṃ vaṃśam imaṃ virajaś caramodbhavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9213: akarod aty-alaṃ kīrtyā viṣṇuḥ sura-gaṇaṃ yathā // BhP_05.15.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9214: BhP_05.16.001/0 rājovāca uktas tvayā bhū-maṇḍalāyāma-viśeṣo yāvad ādityas tapati yatra cāsau jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaiś candramā vā saha dṛśyate // BhP_05.16.001 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9216: upakḷptā yata etasyāḥ sapta-dvīpa-viśeṣa-vikalpas tvayā bhagavan khalu
GP10bhp1-12u:9217: sūcita etad evākhilam ahaṃ mānato lakṣaṇataś ca sarvaṃ vi-jijñāsāmi //
GP10bhp1-12u:9218: bhagavato guṇamaye sthūla-rūpa āveśitaṃ mano hy aguṇe 'pi sūkṣmatama
GP10bhp1-12u:9219: ātma-jyotiṣi pare brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudevākhye kṣamam āveśituṃ tad u haitad guro 'rhasy anuvarṇayitum iti // BhP_05.16.003 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9220: BhP_05.16.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca na vai mahārāja bhagavato māyā-guṇa-vibhūteḥ kāṣṭhāṃ manasā
GP10bhp1-12u:9221: vādhigantum alaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi puruṣas tasmāt prādhān-yenaiva
GP10bhp1-12u:9225: yasmin nava varṣāṇi nava-yojana-sahasrāyāmāny aṣṭabhir maryādā-giribhiḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9227: eṣāṃ madhye ilāvṛtaṃ nāmābhyantara-varṣaṃ yasya nābhyām avasthitaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9230: sahasra-yojana-vitato mūle ṣoḍaśa-sahasraṃ tāvat āntar-bhūmyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9231: uttarottareṇelāvṛtaṃ nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān iti trayo
GP10bhp1-12u:9232: ramyaka-hiraṇmaya-kurūṇāṃ varṣāṇāṃ maryādā-girayaḥ prāg-āyatā ubhayataḥ kṣārodāvadhayo dvi-sahasra-pṛthava ekaikaśaḥ pūrvasmāt pūrvasmād uttara uttaro daśāṃśādhikāṃśena dairghya eva hrasanti // BhP_05.16.008 evaṃ dakṣiṇenelāvṛtaṃ niṣadho hemakūṭo himālaya iti prāg-āyatā yathā nīlādayo 'yuta-yojanotsedhā hari-varṣa-kimpuruṣa-bhāratānāṃ yathā-saṅkhyam
GP10bhp1-12u:9234: ānīla-niṣadhāyatau dvi-sahasraṃ paprathatuḥ ketumāla-bhadrāśvayoḥ sīmānaṃ vidadhāte // BhP_05.16.010
GP10bhp1-12u:9235: mandaro merumandaraḥ supārśvaḥ kumuda ity ayuta-yojana-vistāronnāhā meroś
GP10bhp1-12u:9242: devodyānāni ca bhavanti catvāri nandanaṃ caitrarathaṃ vaibhrājakaṃ sarvatobhadram iti // BhP_05.16.014
GP10bhp1-12u:9247: teṣāṃ viśīryamāṇānām ati-madhura-surabhi-sugandhi-bahulāruṇa-rasodenāruṇodā nāma nadī mandara-giri-śikharān nipatantī pūr-veṇelāvṛtam upaplāvayati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9251: ibha-kāya-nibhānāṃ rasena jambū nāma nadī meru-mandara-śikharād
GP10bhp1-12u:9252: ayuta-yojanād avani-tale nipatantī dakṣiṇenātmānaṃ yāvad ilāvṛtam upasyandayati // BhP_05.16.019
GP10bhp1-12u:9253: tāvad ubhayor api rodhasor yā mṛttikā tad-rasenānuvidhyamānā
GP10bhp1-12u:9254: vāyv-arka-saṃyoga-vipākena sadāmara-lokābharaṇaṃ jāmbū-nadaṃ nāma suvarṇaṃ bhavati // BhP_05.16.020
GP10bhp1-12u:9255: yad u ha vāva vibudhādayaḥ saha yuvatibhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9257: yas tu mahā-kadambaḥ supārśva-nirūḍho yās tasya koṭarebhyo viniḥsṛtāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9260: yā hy upayuñjānānāṃ mukha-nirvāsito vāyuḥ samantāc chata-yojanam
GP10bhp1-12u:9262: evaṃ kumuda-nirūḍho yaḥ śatavalśo nāma vaṭas tasya skandhebhyo nīcīnāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9263: payo-dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-guḍānnādy-ambara-śayyāsanābharaṇādayaḥ sarva eva kāma-dughā nadāḥ kumudāgrāt patantas tam uttareṇelāvṛtam upayojayanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9264: yān upajuṣāṇānāṃ na kadācid api prajānāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9266: tāpa-viśeṣā bhavanti yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ niratiśayam eva // BhP_05.16.025
GP10bhp1-12u:9268: viṃśati-girayo meroḥ karṇikāyā iva kesara-bhūtā mūla-deśe parita upakḷptāḥ // BhP_05.16.026
GP10bhp1-12u:9270: dvi-sahasraṃ pṛthu-tuṅgau bhavataḥ evam apareṇa pavana-pāriyātrau
GP10bhp1-12u:9271: dakṣiṇena kailāsa-karavīrau prāg-āyatāv evam uttaratas triśṛṅga-makarāv
GP10bhp1-12u:9272: aṣṭabhir etaiḥ parisṛto 'gnir iva paritaś cakāsti kāñcana-giriḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9273: meror mūrdhani bhagavata ātma-yoner madhyata upakḷptāṃ purīm
GP10bhp1-12u:9275: tām anuparito loka-pālānām aṣṭānāṃ yathā-diśaṃ yathā-rūpaṃ turīya-mānena
GP10bhp1-12u:9277: BhP_05.17.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca tatra bhagavataḥ sākṣād yajña-liṅgasya viṣṇor vikramato vāma-pādāṅguṣṭha-nakha-nirbhinnordhvāṇḍa-kaṭāha-vivareṇāntaḥ-praviṣṭā yā
GP10bhp1-12u:9281: yuga-sahasropalakṣaṇena divo mūrdhany avatatāra yat tad viṣṇu-padam āhuḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9282: yatra ha vāva vīra-vrata auttānapādiḥ parama-bhāgavato
GP10bhp1-12u:9287: tataḥ sapta ṛṣayas tat prabhāvābhijñā yāṃ nanu tapasa ātyantikī siddhir etāvatī bhagavati sarvātmani vāsudeve 'nuparata-bhakti-yoga-lābhenaivopekṣitānyārthātma-gatayo muktim ivāgatāṃ mumukṣava iva sabahu-mānam adyāpi jaṭā-jūṭair udvahanti // BhP_05.17.003
GP10bhp1-12u:9290: tatra caturdhā bhidyamānā caturbhir nāmabhiś catur-diśam abhispandantī
GP10bhp1-12u:9293: prasravantī gandhamādana-mūrdhasu patitvāntareṇa bhadrāśva-varṣaṃ prācyāṃ diśi kṣāra-samudram abhipraviśati // BhP_05.17.006 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9294: evaṃ mālyavac-chikharān niṣpatantī tato 'nuparata-vegā ketumālam abhi cakṣuḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi sarit-patiṃ praviśati // BhP_05.17.007 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9295: bhadrā cottarato meru-śiraso nipatitā giri-śikharād giri-śikharam atihāya śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgād avasyandamānā uttarāṃs tu kurūn abhita udīcyāṃ diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati // BhP_05.17.008 tathaivālakanandā dakṣiṇena brahma-sadanād bahūni giri-kūṭāny atikramya hemakūṭād dhaimakūṭāny ati-rabhasatara-raṃhasā luṭhayantī bhāratam abhivarṣaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati yasyāṃ snānārthaṃ cāgacchataḥ puṃsaḥ pade pade 'śvamedha-rājasūyādīnāṃ phalaṃ na durlabham
GP10bhp1-12u:9297: anye ca nadā nadyaś ca varṣe varṣe santi bahuśo merv-ādi-giri-duhitaraḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9299: tatrāpi bhāratam eva varṣaṃ karma-kṣetram anyāny aṣṭa varṣāṇi svargiṇāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9303: tatra tu tretā-yuga-samaḥ kālo vartate // BhP_05.17.012 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9304: yatra ha deva-patayaḥ svaiḥ svair gaṇa-nāyakair vihita-mahārhaṇāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9312: navasv api varṣeṣu bhagavān nārāyaṇo mahā-puruṣaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9314: ilāvṛte tu bhagavān bhava eka eva pumān na hy anyas tatrāparo nirviśati bhavānyāḥ śāpa-nimitta-jño yat-pravekṣyataḥ strī-bhāvas tat paścād vakṣyāmi // BhP_05.17.015 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9315: bhavānīnāthaiḥ strī-gaṇārbuda-sahasrair avarudhyamāno bhagavataś caturmūrter mahā-puruṣasya turīyāṃ tāmasīṃ mūrtiṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṃjñām ātma-samādhi-rūpeṇa sannidhāpyaitad abhigṛṇan bhava
GP10bhp1-12u:9317: BhP_05.17.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca oṃ namo bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya sarva-guṇa-saṅkhyānāyānantāyāvyaktāya nama iti // BhP_05.17.017_1 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9318: bhaje bhajanyāraṇa-pāda-paṅkajaṃ bhagasya kṛtsnasya paraṃ parāyaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9319: bhakteṣv alaṃ bhāvita-bhūta-bhāvanaṃ bhavāpahaṃ tvā bhava-bhāvam īśvaram
GP10bhp1-12u:9320: na yasya māyā-guṇa-citta-vṛttibhir nirīkṣato hy aṇv api dṛṣṭir ajyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:9321: īśe yathā no 'jita-manyu-raṃhasāṃ kas taṃ na manyeta jigīṣur ātmanaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9322: asad-dṛśo yaḥ pratibhāti māyayā kṣībeva madhv-āsava-tāmra-locanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9323: na nāga-vadhvo 'rhaṇa īśire hriyā yat-pādayoḥ sparśana-dharṣitendriyāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9324: yam āhur asya sthiti-janma-saṃyamaṃ tribhir vihīnaṃ yam anantam ṛṣayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9325: na veda siddhārtham iva kvacit sthitaṃ bhū-maṇḍalaṃ mūrdha-sahasra-dhāmasu
GP10bhp1-12u:9326: yasyādya āsīd guṇa-vigraho mahān vijñāna-dhiṣṇyo bhagavān ajaḥ kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:9327: yat-sambhavo 'haṃ tri-vṛtā sva-tejasā vaikārikaṃ tāmasam aindriyaṃ sṛje //
GP10bhp1-12u:9328: ete vayaṃ yasya vaśe mahātmanaḥ sthitāḥ śakuntā iva sūtra-yantritāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9329: mahān ahaṃ vaikṛta-tāmasendriyāḥ sṛjāma sarve yad-anugrahād idam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9330: yan-nirmitāṃ karhy api karma-parvaṇīṃ māyāṃ jano 'yaṃ guṇa-sarga-mohitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9331: na veda nistāraṇa-yogam añjasā tasmai namas te vilayodayātmane //
GP10bhp1-12u:9332: BhP_05.18.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca tathā ca bhadraśravā nāma dharma-sutas tat-kula-patayaḥ puruṣā
GP10bhp1-12u:9333: bhadrāśva-varṣe sākṣād bhagavato vāsudevasya priyāṃ tanuṃ dharmamayīṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9334: hayaśīrṣābhidhānāṃ parameṇa samādhinā sannidhāpyedam abhigṛṇanta upadhāvanti // BhP_05.18.001
GP10bhp1-12u:9335: BhP_05.18.002/0 bhadraśravasa ūcuḥ oṃ namo bhagavate dharmāyātma-viśodhanāya nama iti // aho vicitraṃ bhagavad-viceṣṭitaṃ ghnantaṃ jano 'yaṃ hi miṣan na paśyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:9336: dhyāyann asad yarhi vikarma sevituṃ nirhṛtya putraṃ pitaraṃ jijīviṣati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9337: vadanti viśvaṃ kavayaḥ sma naśvaraṃ paśyanti cādhyātmavido vipaścitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9338: tathāpi muhyanti tavāja māyayā suvismitaṃ kṛtyam ajaṃ nato 'smi tam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9339: viśvodbhava-sthāna-nirodha-karma te hy akartur aṅgīkṛtam apy apāvṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9340: yuktaṃ na citraṃ tvayi kārya-kāraṇe sarvātmani vyatirikte ca vastutaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9341: vedān yugānte tamasā tiraskṛtān rasātalād yo nṛ-turaṅga-vigrahaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9342: pratyādade vai kavaye 'bhiyācate tasmai namas te 'vitathehitāya iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9346: 'vyavadhānānanya-bhakti-yogena saha tad-varṣa-puruṣair upāste idaṃ codāharati // BhP_05.18.007
GP10bhp1-12u:9347: oṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namas tejas-tejase āvir-āvirbhava
GP10bhp1-12u:9348: vajra-nakha vajra-daṃṣṭra karmāśayān randhaya randhaya tamo grasa grasa oṃ svāhā abhayam abhayam ātmani bhūyiṣṭhā oṃ kṣraum // BhP_05.18.008 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9349: svasty astu viśvasya khalaḥ prasīdatāṃ dhyāyantu bhūtāni śivaṃ mitho dhiyā
GP10bhp1-12u:9350: manaś ca bhadraṃ bhajatād adhokṣaje āveśyatāṃ no matir apy ahaitukī //
GP10bhp1-12u:9351: māgāra-dārātmaja-vitta-bandhuṣu saṅgo yadi syād bhagavat-priyeṣu naḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9352: yaḥ prāṇa-vṛttyā parituṣṭa ātmavān siddhyaty adūrān na tathendriya-priyaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9353: yat-saṅga-labdhaṃ nija-vīrya-vaibhavaṃ tīrthaṃ muhuḥ saṃspṛśatāṃ hi mānasam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9354: haraty ajo 'ntaḥ śrutibhir gato 'ṅgajaṃ ko vai na seveta mukunda-vikramam
GP10bhp1-12u:9355: yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiñcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9356: harāv abhaktasya kuto mahad-guṇā manorathenāsati dhāvato bahiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9357: harir hi sākṣād bhagavān śarīriṇām ātmā jhaṣāṇām iva toyam īpsitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9358: hitvā mahāṃs taṃ yadi sajjate gṛhe tadā mahattvaṃ vayasā dampatīnām //
GP10bhp1-12u:9360: hitvā gṛhaṃ saṃsṛti-cakravālaṃ nṛsiṃha-pādaṃ bhajatākutobhayam iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9363: puruṣāyuṣāho-rātra-parisaṅkhyānānāṃ yāsāṃ garbhā mahā-puruṣa-mahāstra-tejasodvejita-manasāṃ vidhvastā vyasavaḥ saṃvatsarānte vinipatanti // BhP_05.18.015 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9366: tad bhagavato māyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ parama-samādhi-yogena ramā devī saṃvatsarasya rātriṣu prajāpater duhitṛbhir upetāhaḥsu ca tad-bhartṛbhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9368: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namo bhagavate hṛṣīkeśāya sarva-guṇa-viśeṣair
GP10bhp1-12u:9369: vilakṣitātmane ākūtīnāṃ cittīnāṃ cetasāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ cādhipataye
GP10bhp1-12u:9370: ṣoḍaśa-kalāya cchando-mayāyānna-mayāyāmṛta-mayāya sarva-mayāya sahase ojase balāya kāntāya kāmāya namas te ubhayatra bhūyāt // BhP_05.18.018
GP10bhp1-12u:9371: striyo vratais tvā hṛṣīkeśvaraṃ svato hy ārādhya loke patim āśāsate 'nyam
GP10bhp1-12u:9372: tāsāṃ na te vai paripānty apatyaṃ priyaṃ dhanāyūṃṣi yato 'sva-tantrāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9373: sa vai patiḥ syād akutobhayaḥ svayaṃ samantataḥ pāti bhayāturaṃ janam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9374: sa eka evetarathā mitho bhayaṃ naivātmalābhād adhi manyate param //
GP10bhp1-12u:9375: yā tasya te pāda-saroruhārhaṇaṃ nikāmayet sākhila-kāma-lampaṭā /
GP10bhp1-12u:9376: tad eva rāsīpsitam īpsito 'rcito yad-bhagna-yācñā bhagavan pratapyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:9377: mat-prāptaye 'jeśa-surāsurādayas tapyanta ugraṃ tapa aindriye dhiyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9378: ṛte bhavat-pāda-parāyaṇān na māṃ vindanty ahaṃ tvad-dhṛdayā yato 'jita //
GP10bhp1-12u:9379: sa tvaṃ mamāpy acyuta śīrṣṇi vanditaṃ karāmbujaṃ yat tvad-adhāyi sātvatām
GP10bhp1-12u:9380: bibharṣi māṃ lakṣma vareṇya māyayā ka īśvarasyehitam ūhituṃ vibhur iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9381: ramyake ca bhagavataḥ priyatamaṃ mātsyam avatāra-rūpaṃ tad-varṣa-puruṣasya
GP10bhp1-12u:9382: manoḥ prāk-pradarśitaṃ sa idānīm api mahatā bhakti-yogenārādhayatīdaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9384: oṃ namo bhagavate mukhyatamāya namaḥ sattvāya prāṇāyaujase sahase balāya
GP10bhp1-12u:9386: antar bahiś cākhila-loka-pālakair adṛṣṭa-rūpo vicarasy uru-svanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9387: sa īśvaras tvaṃ ya idaṃ vaśe 'nayan nāmnā yathā dārumayīṃ naraḥ striyam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9388: yaṃ loka-pālāḥ kila matsara-jvarā hitvā yatanto 'pi pṛthak sametya ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:9389: pātuṃ na śekur dvi-padaś catuṣ-padaḥ sarīsṛpaṃ sthāṇu yad atra dṛśyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:9390: bhavān yugāntārṇava ūrmi-mālini kṣoṇīm imām oṣadhi-vīrudhāṃ nidhim /
GP10bhp1-12u:9391: mayā sahoru kramate 'ja ojasā tasmai jagat-prāṇa-gaṇātmane nama iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9392: hiraṇmaye 'pi bhagavān nivasati kūrma-tanuṃ bibhrāṇas tasya tat priyatamāṃ tanum aryamā saha varṣa-puruṣaiḥ pitṛ-gaṇādhipatir upadhāvati mantram imaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9396: bhūmne namo namo 'vasthānāya namas te // BhP_05.18.030 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9398: saṅkhyā na yasyāsty ayathopalambhanāt tasmai namas te 'vyapadeśa-rūpiṇe //
GP10bhp1-12u:9399: jarāyujaṃ svedajam aṇḍajodbhidaṃ carācaraṃ devarṣi-pitṛ-bhūtam aindriyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9400: dyauḥ khaṃ kṣitiḥ śaila-sarit-samudra- dvīpa-graharkṣety abhidheya ekaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9402: saṅkhyā yayā tattva-dṛśāpanīyate tasmai namaḥ sāṅkhya-nidarśanāya te iti // BhP_05.18.033
GP10bhp1-12u:9403: uttareṣu ca kuruṣu bhagavān yajña-puruṣaḥ kṛta-varāha-rūpa āste taṃ tu
GP10bhp1-12u:9404: devī haiṣā bhūḥ saha kurubhir askhalita-bhakti-yogenopadhāvati imāṃ ca paramām upaniṣadam āvartayati // BhP_05.18.034 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9405: oṃ namo bhagavate mantra-tattva-liṅgāya yajña-kratave mahā-dhvarāvayavāya
GP10bhp1-12u:9406: mahā-puruṣāya namaḥ karma-śuklāya tri-yugāya namas te // BhP_05.18.035
GP10bhp1-12u:9407: yasya svarūpaṃ kavayo vipaścito guṇeṣu dāruṣv iva jāta-vedasam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9408: mathnanti mathnā manasā didṛkṣavo gūḍhaṃ kriyārthair nama īritātmane //
GP10bhp1-12u:9411: karoti viśva-sthiti-saṃyamodayaṃ yasyepsitaṃ nepsitam īkṣitur guṇaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9412: māyā yathāyo bhramate tad-āśrayaṃ grāvṇo namas te guṇa-karma-sākṣiṇe //
GP10bhp1-12u:9413: pramathya daityaṃ prativāraṇaṃ mṛdhe yo māṃ rasāyā jagad-ādi-sūkaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9414: kṛtvāgra-daṃṣṭre niragād udanvataḥ krīḍann ivebhaḥ praṇatāsmi taṃ vibhum iti // BhP_05.18.039
GP10bhp1-12u:9415: BhP_05.19.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca kimpuruṣe varṣe bhagavantam ādi-puruṣaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaṃ sītābhirāmaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9419: bhartṛ-bhagavat-kathāṃ samupaśṛṇoti svayaṃ cedaṃ gāyati // BhP_05.19.002
GP10bhp1-12u:9420: oṃ namo bhagavate uttamaślokāya nama ārya-lakṣaṇa-śīla-vratāya nama upaśikṣitātmana upāsita-lokāya namaḥ sādhu-vāda-nikaṣaṇāya namo
GP10bhp1-12u:9421: brahmaṇya-devāya mahā-puruṣāya mahā-rājāya nama iti // BhP_05.19.003 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9422: yat tad viśuddhānubhava-mātram ekaṃ sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-vyavastham /
GP10bhp1-12u:9423: pratyak praśāntaṃ sudhiyopalambhanaṃ hy anāma-rūpaṃ nirahaṃ prapadye //
GP10bhp1-12u:9424: martyāvatāras tv iha martya-śikṣaṇaṃ rakṣo-vadhāyaiva na kevalaṃ vibhoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9425: kuto 'nyathā syād ramataḥ sva ātmanaḥ sītā-kṛtāni vyasanānīśvarasya //
GP10bhp1-12u:9426: na vai sa ātmātmavatāṃ suhṛttamaḥ saktas tri-lokyāṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9427: na strī-kṛtaṃ kaśmalam aśnuvīta na lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi vihātum arhati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9428: na janma nūnaṃ mahato na saubhagaṃ na vāṅ na buddhir nākṛtis toṣa-hetuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9429: tair yad visṛṣṭān api no vanaukasaś cakāra sakhye bata lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9430: suro 'suro vāpy atha vānaro naraḥ sarvātmanā yaḥ sukṛtajñam uttamam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9431: bhajeta rāmaṃ manujākṛtiṃ hariṃ ya uttarān anayat kosalān divam iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9435: taṃ bhagavān nārado varṇāśramavatībhir bhāratībhiḥ prajābhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9439: ṛṣi-ṛṣabhāya nara-nārāyaṇāya paramahaṃsa-parama-gurave ātmārāmādhipataye namo nama iti // BhP_05.19.012/0 gāyati cedam kartāsya sargādiṣu yo na badhyate na hanyate deha-gato 'pi daihikaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9440: draṣṭur na dṛg yasya guṇair vidūṣyate tasmai namo 'sakta-vivikta-sākṣiṇe
GP10bhp1-12u:9441: idaṃ hi yogeśvara yoga-naipuṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbho bhagavāñ jagāda yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:9442: yad anta-kāle tvayi nirguṇe mano bhaktyā dadhītojjhita-duṣkalevaraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9444: śaṅketa vidvān kukalevarātyayād yas tasya yatnaḥ śrama eva kevalam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9445: tan naḥ prabho tvaṃ kukalevarārpitāṃ tvan-māyayāhaṃ-mamatām adhokṣaja /
GP10bhp1-12u:9446: bhindyāma yenāśu vayaṃ sudurbhidāṃ vidhehi yogaṃ tvayi naḥ svabhāvam iti
GP10bhp1-12u:9447: bhārate 'py asmin varṣe saric-chailāḥ santi bahavo malayo maṅgala-prastho
GP10bhp1-12u:9448: mainākas trikūṭa ṛṣabhaḥ kūṭakaḥ kollakaḥ sahyo devagirir ṛṣyamūkaḥ śrī-śailo veṅkaṭo mahendro vāridhāro vindhyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣagiriḥ pāriyātro droṇaś citrakūṭo govardhano raivatakaḥ kakubho nīlo gokāmukha indrakīlaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9449: kāmagirir iti cānye ca śata-sahasraśaḥ śailās teṣāṃ nitamba-prabhavā nadā nadyaś ca santy asaṅkhyātāḥ // BhP_05.19.016 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9450: etāsām apo bhāratyaḥ prajā nāmabhir eva punantīnām ātmanā copaspṛśanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9451: candravasā tāmraparṇī avaṭodā kṛtamālā vaihāyasī kāverī veṇī payasvinī śarkarāvartā tuṅgabhadrā kṛṣṇāveṇyā bhīmarathī godāvarī nirvindhyā payoṣṇī tāpī revā surasā narmadā carmaṇvatī sindhur andhaḥ śoṇaś ca nadau mahānadī vedasmṛtir ṛṣikulyā trisāmā kauśikī mandākinī yamunā sarasvatī dṛṣadvatī gomatī sarayū rodhasvatī saptavatī suṣomā śatadrūś candrabhāgā marudvṛdhā vitastā asiknī viśveti mahā-nadyaḥ // BhP_05.19.018 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9452: asminn eva varṣe puruṣair labdha-janmabhiḥ śukla-lohita-kṛṣṇa-varṇena
GP10bhp1-12u:9453: svārabdhena karmaṇā divya-mānuṣa-nāraka-gatayo bahvya ātmana ānupūrvyeṇa
GP10bhp1-12u:9454: sarvā hy eva sarveṣāṃ vidhīyante yathā-varṇa-vidhānam apavargaś cāpi bhavati // BhP_05.19.019
GP10bhp1-12u:9455: yo 'sau bhagavati sarva-bhūtātmany anātmye 'nirukte 'nilayane paramātmani vāsudeve 'nanya-nimitta-bhakti-yoga-lakṣaṇo
GP10bhp1-12u:9456: nānā-gati-nimittāvidyā-granthi-randhana-dvāreṇa yadā hi mahā-puruṣa-puruṣa-prasaṅgaḥ // BhP_05.19.021/0 etad eva hi devā gāyanti aho amīṣāṃ kim akāri śobhanaṃ prasanna eṣāṃ svid uta svayaṃ hariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9457: yair janma labdhaṃ nṛṣu bhāratājire mukunda-sevaupayikaṃ spṛhā hi naḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9458: kiṃ duṣkarair naḥ kratubhis tapo-vratair dānādibhir vā dyujayena phalgunā
GP10bhp1-12u:9460: kalpāyuṣāṃ sthānajayāt punar-bhavāt kṣaṇāyuṣāṃ bhārata-bhūjayo varam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9461: kṣaṇena martyena kṛtaṃ manasvinaḥ sannyasya saṃyānty abhayaṃ padaṃ hareḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9462: na yatra vaikuṇṭha-kathā-sudhāpagā na sādhavo bhāgavatās tadāśrayāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9463: na yatra yajñeśa-makhā mahotsavāḥ sureśa-loko 'pi na vai sa sevyatām //
GP10bhp1-12u:9464: prāptā nṛ-jātiṃ tv iha ye ca jantavo jñāna-kriyā-dravya-kalāpa-sambhṛtām /
GP10bhp1-12u:9465: na vai yaterann apunar-bhavāya te bhūyo vanaukā iva yānti bandhanam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9466: yaiḥ śraddhayā barhiṣi bhāgaśo havir niruptam iṣṭaṃ vidhi-mantra-vastutaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9467: ekaḥ pṛthaṅ-nāmabhir āhuto mudā gṛhṇāti pūrṇaḥ svayam āśiṣāṃ prabhuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9468: satyaṃ diśaty arthitam arthito nṛṇāṃ naivārthado yat punar arthitā yataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9469: svayaṃ vidhatte bhajatām anicchatām icchāpidhānaṃ nija-pāda-pallavam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9470: yady atra naḥ svarga-sukhāvaśeṣitaṃ sviṣṭasya sūktasya kṛtasya śobhanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:9471: tenājanābhe smṛtimaj janma naḥ syād varṣe harir yad-bhajatāṃ śaṃ tanoti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9472: BhP_05.19.029/0 śrī-śuka uvāca jambūdvīpasya ca rājann upadvīpān aṣṭau haika upadiśanti sagarātmajair
GP10bhp1-12u:9473: aśvānveṣaṇa imāṃ mahīṃ parito nikhanadbhir upakalpitān // BhP_05.19.029
GP10bhp1-12u:9474: tad yathā svarṇaprasthaś candraśukla āvartano ramaṇako mandarahariṇaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ siṃhalo laṅketi // BhP_05.19.030 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9475: evaṃ tava bhāratottama jambūdvīpa-varṣa-vibhāgo yathopadeśam upavarṇita iti // BhP_05.19.031
GP10bhp1-12u:9476: BhP_05.20.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca ataḥ paraṃ plakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇa-saṃsthānato varṣa-vibhāga
GP10bhp1-12u:9479: yathā merur jambv-ākhyena lavaṇodadhir api tato dvi-guṇa-viśālena
GP10bhp1-12u:9480: plakṣākhyena parikṣipto yathā parikhā bāhyopavanena plakṣo jambū-pramāṇo
GP10bhp1-12u:9481: dvīpākhyākaro hiraṇmaya utthito yatrāgnir upāste sapta-jihvas
GP10bhp1-12u:9482: tasyādhipatiḥ priyavratātmaja idhmajihvaḥ svaṃ dvīpaṃ sapta-varṣāṇi
GP10bhp1-12u:9485: śivaṃ yavasaṃ subhadraṃ śāntaṃ kṣemam amṛtam abhayam iti varṣāṇi teṣu girayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ maṇikūṭo vajrakūṭa indraseno jyotiṣmān suparṇo hiraṇyaṣṭhīvo meghamāla iti setu-śailāḥ aruṇā nṛmṇāṅgirasī sāvitrī suptabhātā ṛtambharā satyambharā
GP10bhp1-12u:9490: pratnasya viṣṇo rūpaṃ yat satyasyartasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:9491: amṛtasya ca mṛtyoś ca sūryam ātmānam īmahīti // BhP_05.20.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9492: plakṣādiṣu pañcasu puruṣāṇām āyur indriyam ojaḥ saho balaṃ buddhir vikrama iti ca sarveṣām autpattikī siddhir aviśeṣeṇa vartate // BhP_05.20.006 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9493: plakṣaḥ sva-samānenekṣu-rasodenāvṛto yathā tathā dvīpo 'pi śālmalo
GP10bhp1-12u:9495: yatra ha vai śālmalī plakṣāyāmā yasyāṃ vāva kila nilayam āhur bhagavataś chandaḥ-stutaḥ patattri-rājasya sā dvīpa-hūtaye upalakṣyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:9497: tan-nāmāni sapta-varṣāṇi vyabhajat surocanaṃ saumanasyaṃ ramaṇakaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9498: deva-varṣaṃ pāribhadram āpyāyanam avijñātam iti // BhP_05.20.009 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9499: teṣu varṣādrayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ svarasaḥ śataśṛṅgo vāmadevaḥ kundo mukundaḥ puṣpa-varṣaḥ sahasra-śrutir iti anumatiḥ sinīvālī sarasvatī kuhū rajanī nandā rāketi // BhP_05.20.010 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9501: bhagavantaṃ vedamayaṃ somam ātmānaṃ vedena yajante // BhP_05.20.011 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9503: prajānāṃ sarvāsāṃ rājā- ndhaḥ somo na āstv iti // BhP_05.20.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9504: evaṃ surodād bahis tad-dvi-guṇaḥ samānenāvṛto ghṛtodena yathā-pūrvaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9505: kuśa-dvīpo yasmin kuśa-stambo deva-kṛtas tad-dvīpākhyākaro jvalana ivāparaḥ sva-śaṣpa-rociṣā diśo virājayati // BhP_05.20.013 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9506: tad-dvīpa-patiḥ praiyavrato rājan hiraṇyaretā nāma svaṃ dvīpaṃ saptabhyaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9507: sva-putrebhyo yathā-bhāgaṃ vibhajya svayaṃ tapa ātiṣṭhata
GP10bhp1-12u:9509: teṣāṃ varṣeṣu sīmā-girayo nadyaś cābhijñātāḥ sapta saptaiva cakraś catuḥśṛṅgaḥ kapilaś citrakūṭo devānīka ūrdhvaromā draviṇa iti rasakulyā madhukulyā mitravindā śrutavindā devagarbhā ghṛtacyutā mantramāleti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9513: devānāṃ puruṣāṅgānāṃ yajñena puruṣaṃ yajeti // BhP_05.20.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9514: tathā ghṛtodād bahiḥ krauñcadvīpo dvi-guṇaḥ sva-mānena kṣīrodena parita upakḷpto vṛto yathā kuśadvīpo ghṛtodena yasmin krauñco nāma parvata-rājo
GP10bhp1-12u:9518: tasminn api praiyavrato ghṛtapṛṣṭho nāmādhipatiḥ sve dvīpe varṣāṇi sapta vibhajya teṣu putra-nāmasu sapta rikthādān varṣapān niveśya svayaṃ bhagavān bhagavataḥ parama-kalyāṇa-yaśasa ātma-bhūtasya hareś caraṇāravindam upajagāma // BhP_05.20.020 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9519: āmo madhuruho meghapṛṣṭhaḥ sudhāmā bhrājiṣṭho lohitārṇo vanaspatir iti ghṛtapṛṣṭha-sutās teṣāṃ varṣa-girayaḥ sapta saptaiva nadyaś cābhikhyātāḥ śuklo vardhamāno bhojana upabarhiṇo nando nandanaḥ sarvatobhadra iti
GP10bhp1-12u:9520: abhayā amṛtaughā āryakā tīrthavatī rūpavatī pavitravatī śukleti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9521: yāsām ambhaḥ pavitram amalam upayuñjānāḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha-draviṇa-devaka-saṃjñā varṣa-puruṣā āpomayaṃ devam apāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9524: tā naḥ punītāmīva-ghnīḥ spṛśatām ātmanā bhuva iti // BhP_05.20.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9525: evaṃ purastāt kṣīrodāt parita upaveśitaḥ śākadvīpo
GP10bhp1-12u:9526: dvātriṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāyāmaḥ samānena ca dadhi-maṇḍodena parīto yasmin śāko nāma mahīruhaḥ sva-kṣetra-vyapadeśako yasya ha mahā-surabhi-gandhas
GP10bhp1-12u:9528: tasyāpi praiyavrata evādhipatir nāmnā medhātithiḥ so 'pi vibhajya sapta varṣāṇi putra-nāmāni teṣu svātmajān purojava-manojava-pavamāna-dhūmrānīka-citrarepha-bahurūpa-viśvadhāra-saṃjñān
GP10bhp1-12u:9529: nidhāpyādhipatīn svayaṃ bhagavaty ananta ā-veśita-matis tapovanaṃ praviveśa // BhP_05.20.025
GP10bhp1-12u:9530: eteṣāṃ varṣa-maryādā-girayo nadyaś ca sapta saptaiva īśāna uruśṛṅgo
GP10bhp1-12u:9531: balabhadraḥ śatakesaraḥ sahasrasroto devapālo mahānasa iti anaghāyurdā ubhayaspṛṣṭir aparājitā pañcapadī sahasrasrutir nijadhṛtir iti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9535: antaryāmīśvaraḥ sākṣāt pātu no yad-vaśe sphuṭam // BhP_05.20.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9536: evam eva dadhi-maṇḍodāt parataḥ puṣkaradvīpas tato dvi-guṇāyāmaḥ samantata upakalpitaḥ samānena svādūdakena samudreṇa bahir āvṛto yasmin bṛhat-puṣkaraṃ jvalana-śikhāmala-kanaka-patrāyutāyutaṃ bhagavataḥ kamalāsanasyādhyāsanaṃ parikalpitam // BhP_05.20.029 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9538: maryādācalo 'yuta-yojanocchrāyāyāmo yatra tu catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri purāṇi
GP10bhp1-12u:9539: loka-pālānām indrādīnāṃ yad-upariṣṭāt sūrya-rathasya meruṃ paribhramataḥ saṃvatsarātmakaṃ cakraṃ devānām aho-rātrābhyāṃ paribhramati //
GP10bhp1-12u:9543: tad-varṣa-puruṣā bhagavantaṃ brahma-rūpiṇaṃ sakarmakeṇa karmaṇārādhayantīdaṃ codāharanti // yat tat karmamayaṃ liṅgaṃ brahma-liṅgaṃ jano 'rcayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:9544: ekāntam advayaṃ śāntaṃ tasmai bhagavate nama iti // BhP_05.20.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9545: tataḥ parastāl lokāloka-nāmācalo lokālokayor antarāle parita upakṣiptaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9546: yāvan mānasottara-mervor antaraṃ tāvatī bhūmiḥ kāñcany anyādarśa-talopamā
GP10bhp1-12u:9547: yasyāṃ prahitaḥ padārtho na kathañcit punaḥ pratyupalabhyate tasmāt sarva-sattva-parihṛtāsīt lokāloka iti samākhyā yad anenācalena lokālokasyāntarvar-tināvasthāpyate
GP10bhp1-12u:9548: sa loka-trayānte parita īśvareṇa vihito yasmāt sūryādīnāṃ dhruvāpavargāṇāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9549: jyotir-gaṇānāṃ gabhastayo 'rvācīnāṃs trīn lokān āvitanvānā na kadācit parācīnā bhavitum utsahante tāvad un-nahanāyāmaḥ // BhP_05.20.037 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9550: etāvān loka-vinyāso māna-lakṣaṇa-saṃsthābhir vicintitaḥ kavibhiḥ sa tu
GP10bhp1-12u:9555: teṣāṃ sva-vibhūtīnāṃ loka-pālānāṃ ca vividha-vīryopabṛṃhaṇāya bhagavān
GP10bhp1-12u:9559: nija-varāyudhopaśobhitair nija-bhuja-daṇḍaiḥ sandhārayamāṇas tasmin giri-vare samantāt sakala-loka-svastaya āste // BhP_05.20.040 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9560: ākalpam evaṃ veṣaṃ gata eṣa bhagavān ātma-yogamāyayā
GP10bhp1-12u:9562: yo 'ntar-vistāra etena hy aloka-parimāṇaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ yad bahir lokālokācalāt tataḥ parastād yogeśvara-gatiṃ viśuddhām udāharanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9564: sūryāṇḍa-golayor madhye koṭyaḥ syuḥ pañca-viṃśatiḥ // BhP_05.20.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9565: mṛte 'ṇḍa eṣa etasmin yad abhūt tato mārtaṇḍa iti vyapadeśaḥ hiraṇyagarbha
GP10bhp1-12u:9567: sūryeṇa hi vibhajyante diśaḥ khaṃ dyaur mahī bhidā /
GP10bhp1-12u:9568: svargāpavargau narakā rasaukāṃsi ca sarvaśaḥ // BhP_05.20.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:9571: BhP_05.21.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca etāvān eva bhū-valayasya sanniveśaḥ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇato vyākhyātaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9572: etena hi divo maṇḍala-mānaṃ tad-vida upadiśanti yathā dvi-dalayor
GP10bhp1-12u:9574: yan-madhya-gato bhagavāṃs tapatāṃ patis tapana ātapena tri-lokīṃ pratapaty avabhāsayaty ātma-bhāsā sa eṣa udagayana-dakṣiṇāyana-vaiṣuvata-saṃjñābhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9578: yadā meṣa-tulayor vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi samānāni bhavanti yadā
GP10bhp1-12u:9579: vṛṣabhādiṣu pañcasu ca rāśiṣu carati tadāhāny eva vardhante hrasati ca māsi māsy ekaikā ghaṭikā rātriṣu // BhP_05.21.004 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9580: yadā vṛścikādiṣu pañcasu vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi viparyayāṇi bhavanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9581: yāvad dakṣiṇāyanam ahāni vardhante yāvad udagayanaṃ rātrayaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9583: mānasottara-giri-parivartanasyopadiśanti tasminn aindrīṃ purīṃ pūrvasmān meror devadhānīṃ nāma dakṣiṇato yāmyāṃ saṃyamanīṃ nāma paścād vāruṇīṃ nimlocanīṃ nāma uttarataḥ saumyāṃ vibhāvarīṃ nāma
GP10bhp1-12u:9586: tatratyānāṃ divasa-madhyaṅgata eva sadādityas tapati savyenācalaṃ dakṣiṇena karoti // BhP_05.21.008
GP10bhp1-12u:9587: yatrodeti tasya ha samāna-sūtra-nipāte nimlocati yatra kvacana
GP10bhp1-12u:9588: syandenābhitapati tasya haiṣa samāna-sūtra-nipāte prasvāpayati tatra gataṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9589: na paśyanti ye taṃ samanupaśyeran // BhP_05.21.009 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9590: yadā caindryāḥ puryāḥ pracalate pañcadaśa-ghaṭikābhir yāmyāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9592: evaṃ tato vāruṇīṃ saumyām aindrīṃ ca punas tathānye ca grahāḥ somādayo nakṣatraiḥ saha jyotiś-cakre samabhyudyanti saha vā nimlo-canti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9593: evaṃ muhūrtena catus-triṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāny aṣṭa-śatādhikāni sauro rathas trayīmayo 'sau catasṛṣu parivartate purīṣu // BhP_05.21.012 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9594: yasyaikaṃ cakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ ṣaṇ-nemi tri-ṇābhi saṃvatsarātmakaṃ samāmananti tasyākṣo meror mūrdhani kṛto mānasottare kṛtetara-bhāgo yatra protaṃ ravi-ratha-cakraṃ taila-yantra-cakravad bhraman mānasottara-girau
GP10bhp1-12u:9596: tasminn akṣe kṛtamūlo dvitīyo 'kṣas turyamānena sammitas taila-yantrākṣavad dhruve kṛtopari-bhāgaḥ ratha-nīḍas tu ṣaṭ-triṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāyatas tat-turīya-bhāga-viśālas
GP10bhp1-12u:9597: tāvān ravi-ratha-yugo yatra hayāś chando-nāmānaḥ saptāruṇa-yojitā vahanti devam ādityam // purastāt savitur aruṇaḥ paścāc ca niyuktaḥ sautye karmaṇi kilāste //
GP10bhp1-12u:9598: tathā vālikhilyā ṛṣayo 'ṅguṣṭha-parva-mātrāḥ ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi purataḥ sūryaṃ sūkta-vākāya niyuktāḥ saṃstuvanti // BhP_05.21.017 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9599: tathānye ca ṛṣayo gandharvāpsaraso nāgā grāmaṇyo yātudhānā devā ity ekaikaśo gaṇāḥ sapta caturdaśa māsi māsi bhagavantaṃ sūryam ātmānaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9601: BhP_05.22.001/0 rājovāca yad etad bhagavata ādityasya meruṃ dhruvaṃ ca pradakṣiṇena parikrāmato rāśīnām abhimukhaṃ pracalitaṃ cāpradakṣiṇaṃ bhagavatopavarṇitam amuṣya vayaṃ katham anumimīmahīti BhP_05.22.002/0 sa hovāca yathā kulāla-cakreṇa bhramatā saha bhramatāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ gatir anyaiva pradeśāntareṣv apy upalabhyamānatvād evaṃ nakṣatra-rāśibhir
GP10bhp1-12u:9602: upalakṣitena kāla-cakreṇa dhruvaṃ meruṃ ca pradakṣiṇena paridhāvatā saha
GP10bhp1-12u:9603: paridhāvamānānāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ sūryādīnāṃ grahāṇāṃ gatir anyaiva nakṣatrāntare rāśy-antare copalabhyamānatvāt // BhP_05.22.002 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9604: sa eṣa bhagavān ādi-puruṣa eva sākṣān nārāyaṇo lokānāṃ svastaya ātmānaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9605: trayīmayaṃ karma-viśuddhi-nimittaṃ kavibhir api ca vedena vijijñāsyamāno dvādaśadhā vibhajya ṣaṭsu vasantādiṣv ṛtuṣu yathopa-joṣam ṛtu-guṇān
GP10bhp1-12u:9607: tam etam iha puruṣās trayyā vidyayā varṇāśramācārānupathā uccāvacaiḥ karmabhir āmnātair yoga-vitānaiś ca śraddhayā yajanto 'ñjasā śreyaḥ samadhigacchanti // BhP_05.22.004 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9608: atha sa eṣa ātmā lokānāṃ dyāv-āpṛthivyor antareṇa nabho-valayasya
GP10bhp1-12u:9609: kālacakra-gato dvādaśa māsān bhuṅkte rāśi-saṃjñān saṃvatsarāvayavān māsaḥ pakṣa-dvayaṃ divā naktaṃ ceti sapādarkṣa-dvayam upadiśanti yāvatā ṣaṣṭham
GP10bhp1-12u:9610: aṃśaṃ bhuñjīta sa vai ṛtur ity upadiśyate saṃvatsarāvayavaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9611: atha ca yāvatārdhena nabho-vīthyāṃ pracarati taṃ kālam ayanam ācakṣate //
GP10bhp1-12u:9612: atha ca yāvan nabho-maṇḍalaṃ saha dyāv-āpṛthivyor maṇḍalābhyāṃ kārtsnyena sa ha bhuñjīta taṃ kālaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ parivatsaram iḍāvatsaram anuvatsaraṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9614: evaṃ candramā arka-gabhastibhya upariṣṭāl lakṣa-yojanata upalabhyamāno
GP10bhp1-12u:9615: 'rkasya saṃvatsara-bhuktiṃ pakṣābhyāṃ māsa-bhuktiṃ sapādarkṣābhyāṃ dinenaiva pakṣa-bhuktim agracārī drutatara-gamano bhuṅkte // BhP_05.22.008
GP10bhp1-12u:9616: atha cāpūryamāṇābhiś ca kalābhir amarāṇāṃ kṣīyamāṇābhiś ca kalābhiḥ pit-ṇām aho-rātrāṇi pūrva-pakṣāpara-pakṣābhyāṃ vitanvānaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9617: sarva-jīva-nivaha-prāṇo jīvaś caikam ekaṃ nakṣatraṃ triṃśatā muhūrtair
GP10bhp1-12u:9619: ya eṣa ṣoḍaśa-kalaḥ puruṣo bhagavān manomayo 'nnamayo 'mṛtamayo
GP10bhp1-12u:9622: tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato nakṣatrāṇi meruṃ dakṣiṇenaiva kālāyana
GP10bhp1-12u:9624: tata upariṣṭād uśanā dvi-lakṣa-yojanata upalabhyate purataḥ paścāt sahaiva vārkasya śaighrya-māndya-sāmyābhir gatibhir arkavac carati lokānāṃ nityadānukūla eva prāyeṇa varṣayaṃś cāreṇānumīyate sa
GP10bhp1-12u:9626: uśanasā budho vyākhyātas tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato budhaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9627: soma-suta upalabhyamānaḥ prāyeṇa śubha-kṛd yadārkād vyatiricyeta tadātivātābhra-prāyānāvṛṣṭy-ādi-bhayam āśaṃsate // BhP_05.22.013 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9628: ata ūrdhvam aṅgārako 'pi yojana-lakṣa-dvitaya upalabhyamānas tribhis tribhiḥ pakṣair ekaikaśo rāśīn dvādaśānubhuṅkte yadi na vakreṇābhivartate prāyeṇāśubha-graho 'gha-śaṃsaḥ // BhP_05.22.014 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanāntara-gatā bhagavān bṛhaspatir ekaikasmin
GP10bhp1-12u:9629: rāśau parivatsaraṃ parivatsaraṃ carati yadi na vakraḥ syāt prāyeṇānukūlo
GP10bhp1-12u:9631: tata upariṣṭād yojana-lakṣa-dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścara ekaikasmin
GP10bhp1-12u:9632: rāśau triṃśan māsān vilambamānaḥ sarvān evānuparyeti tāvadbhir anuvatsaraiḥ prāyeṇa hi sarveṣām aśāntikaraḥ // BhP_05.22.016 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9633: tata uttarasmād ṛṣaya ekādaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntara upalabhyante ya eva
GP10bhp1-12u:9634: lokānāṃ śam anubhāvayanto bhagavato viṣṇor yat paramaṃ padaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ prakramanti // BhP_05.22.017
GP10bhp1-12u:9635: BhP_05.23.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca atha tasmāt paratas trayodaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntarato yat tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam abhivadanti yatra ha mahā-bhāgavato dhruva auttānapādir agninendreṇa
GP10bhp1-12u:9636: prajāpatinā kaśyapena dharmeṇa ca samakāla-yugbhiḥ sabahu-mānaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ kriyamāṇa idānīm api kalpa-jīvinām ājīvya upāste tasyehānubhāva
GP10bhp1-12u:9638: sa hi sarveṣāṃ jyotir-gaṇānāṃ graha-nakṣatrādīnām animiṣeṇāvyakta-raṃhasā
GP10bhp1-12u:9639: bhagavatā kālena bhrāmyamāṇānāṃ sthāṇur ivāvaṣṭambha īśvareṇa vihitaḥ śaśvad avabhāsate // yathā meḍhīstambha ākramaṇa-paśavaḥ saṃyojitās tribhis tribhiḥ savanair
GP10bhp1-12u:9640: yathā-sthānaṃ maṇḍalāni caranty evaṃ bhagaṇā grahādaya etasminn
GP10bhp1-12u:9641: antar-bahir-yogena kāla-cakra āyojitā dhruvam evāvalambya vāyunodīryamāṇā ākalpāntaṃ paricaṅ kramanti nabhasi yathā meghāḥ śyenādayo vāyu-vaśāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9644: kecanaitaj jyotir-anīkaṃ śiśumāra-saṃsthānena bhagavato vāsudevasya yoga-dhāraṇāyām anuvarṇayanti yasya pucchāgre 'vākśirasaḥ kuṇḍalī-bhūta-dehasya dhruva upakalpitas tasya
GP10bhp1-12u:9645: lāṅgūle prajāpatir agnir indro dharma iti puccha-mūle dhātā vidhātā ca
GP10bhp1-12u:9646: kaṭyāṃ saptarṣayaḥ tasya dakṣiṇāvarta-kuṇḍalī-bhūta-śarīrasya yāny udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśve tu nakṣatrāṇy upakalpayanti dakṣiṇāyanāni tu savye yathā śiśumārasya kuṇḍalā-bhoga-sanniveśasya pārśvayor ubhayor apy
GP10bhp1-12u:9647: avayavāḥ samasaṅkhyā bhavanti pṛṣṭhe tv ajavīthī ākāśa-gaṅgā codarataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9648: punarvasu-puṣyau dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ śroṇyor ārdrāśleṣe ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9650: yathā-saṅkhyaṃ śravaṇa-pūrvāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa-vāmayor locanayor dhaniṣṭhā mūlaṃ ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ karṇayor maghādīny aṣṭa nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇāyanāni vāma-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu yuñjīta tathaiva mṛga-śīrṣādīny udagayanāni
GP10bhp1-12u:9653: uttarā-hanāv agastir adharā-hanau yamo mukheṣu cāṅgārakaḥ śanaiścara upasthe bṛhaspatiḥ kakudi vakṣasy ādityo hṛdaye nārāyaṇo manasi candro nābhyām uśanā stanayor aśvinau budhaḥ prāṇāpānayo rāhur gale ketavaḥ sarvāṅgeṣu romasu sarve tārā-gaṇāḥ // BhP_05.23.007 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9654: etad u haiva bhagavato viṣṇoḥ sarva-devatāmayaṃ rūpam aharahaḥ sandhyāyāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9655: prayato vāgyato nirīkṣamāṇa upatiṣṭheta namo jyotir-lokāya
GP10bhp1-12u:9658: namasyataḥ smarato vā tri-kālaṃ naśyeta tat-kālajam āśu pāpam //
GP10bhp1-12u:9659: BhP_05.24.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca adhastāt savitur yojanāyute svarbhānur nakṣatravac caratīty eke yo 'sāv
GP10bhp1-12u:9660: amaratvaṃ grahatvaṃ cālabhata bhagavad-anukampayā svayam asurāpasadaḥ saiṃhikeyo hy atad-arhas tasya tāta janma karmāṇi copariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9661: yad adas taraṇer maṇḍalaṃ pratapatas tad vistarato yojanāyutam ācakṣate
GP10bhp1-12u:9662: dvādaśa-sahasraṃ somasya trayodaśa-sahasraṃ rāhor yaḥ parvaṇi
GP10bhp1-12u:9664: tan niśamyobhayatrāpi bhagavatā rakṣaṇāya prayuktaṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma bhāgavataṃ dayitam astraṃ tat tejasā durviṣahaṃ muhuḥ parivartamānam abhyavasthito muhūrtam udvijamānaś cakita-hṛdaya ārād eva nivartate tad uparāgam iti vadanti lokāḥ // BhP_05.24.003 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9665: tato 'dhastāt siddha-cāraṇa-vidyādharāṇāṃ sadanāni tāvan mātra eva //
GP10bhp1-12u:9666: tato 'dhastād yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-piśāca-preta-bhūta-gaṇānāṃ vihārājiram antarikṣaṃ yāvad vāyuḥ pravāti yāvan meghā upalabhyante // BhP_05.24.005
GP10bhp1-12u:9669: upavarṇitaṃ bhūmer yathā-sanniveśāvasthānam avaner apy adhastāt sapta
GP10bhp1-12u:9670: bhū-vivarā ekaikaśo yojanāyutāntareṇāyāma-vistāreṇopakḷptā atalaṃ vitalaṃ sutalaṃ talātalaṃ mahātalaṃ rasātalaṃ pātālam iti // BhP_05.24.007 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9674: īśvarād apy apratihata-kāmā māyā-vinodā nivasanti // BhP_05.24.008 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9675: yeṣu mahārāja mayena māyāvinā vinirmitāḥ puro
GP10bhp1-12u:9686: yatra ha vāva na bhayam aho-rātrādibhiḥ kāla-vibhāgair upalakṣyate //
GP10bhp1-12u:9687: yatra hi mahāhi-pravara-śiro-maṇayaḥ sarvaṃ tamaḥ prabādhante //
GP10bhp1-12u:9688: na vā eteṣu vasatāṃ divyauṣadhi-rasa-rasāyanānna-pāna-snānādibhir ādhayo vyādhayo valī-palita-jarādayaś
GP10bhp1-12u:9690: na hi teṣāṃ kalyāṇānāṃ prabhavati kutaścana mṛtyur vinā bhagavat-tejasaś
GP10bhp1-12u:9692: yasmin praviṣṭe 'sura-vadhūnāṃ prāyaḥ puṃsavanāni bhayād eva sravanti patanti ca // BhP_05.24.015
GP10bhp1-12u:9693: athātale maya-putro 'suro balo nivasati yena ha vā iha sṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṇ-ṇavatir
GP10bhp1-12u:9694: māyāḥ kāścanādyāpi māyāvino dhārayanti yasya ca jṛmbhamāṇasya mukhatas trayaḥ strī-gaṇā udapadyanta svairiṇyaḥ kāminyaḥ puṃścalya iti yā vai bilāyanaṃ praviṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ rasena hāṭakākhyena sādhayitvā
GP10bhp1-12u:9695: sva-vilāsāvalokanānurāga-smita-saṃlāpopagūhanādibhiḥ svairaṃ kila ramayanti yasminn upayukte puruṣa īśvaro 'haṃ siddho 'ham ity
GP10bhp1-12u:9696: ayuta-mahā-gaja-balam ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ katthate madāndha iva //
GP10bhp1-12u:9699: mithunī-bhūta āste yataḥ pravṛttā sarit-pravarā hāṭakī nāma bhavayor

GP10bhp1-12u:9708: puruṣaḥ karma-bandhanam añjasā vidhunoti yasya haiva pratibādhanaṃ mumukṣavo 'nyathaivopalabhante tad bhaktānām ātmavatāṃ sarveṣām ātmany ātmada ātmatayaiva //

GP10bhp1-12u:9716: yasyānudāsyam evāsmat-pitāmahaḥ kila vavre na tu sva-pitryaṃ yad utākutobhayaṃ padaṃ dīyamānaṃ bhagavataḥ param iti bhagavatoparate khalu

GP10bhp1-12u:9725: labdha-pado māyāvinām ācāryo mahādevena parirakṣito vigata-sudarśana-bhayo

GP10bhp1-12u:9728: patattri-rājādhipateḥ puruṣa-vāhād anavaratam udvijamānāḥ sva-kalatrāpatya-suhṛt-kuṭumba-saṅgena kvacit pramattā viharanti //

GP10bhp1-12u:9731: bhagavataḥ sakala-lokānubhāvasya harer eva tejasā pratihata-balāvalepā
GP10bhp1-12u:9732: bileśayā iva vasanti ye vai saramayendra-dūtyā vāgbhir mantra-varṇābhir

GP10bhp1-12u:9742: yasya ha vā idaṃ kālenopasañjihīrṣato 'marṣa-viracita-rucira-bhramad-bhruvor antareṇa sāṅkarṣaṇo nāma rudra

GP10bhp1-12u:9785: vaisādṛśyāt karma-phalaṃ visadṛśaṃ bhavati yā hy anādy-avidyayā
GP10bhp1-12u:9786: kṛta-kāmānāṃ tat-pariṇāma-lakṣaṇāḥ sṛtayaḥ sahasraśaḥ pravṛttās tāsāṃ prācuryeṇānuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ BhP_05.26.003/0 rājovāca narakā nāma bhagavan kiṃ deśa-viśeṣā athavā bahis tri-lokyā āhosvid antarāla iti // BhP_05.26.003 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9787: BhP_05.26.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca antarāla eva tri-jagatyās tu diśi dakṣiṇasyām adhastād bhūmer upariṣṭāc ca jalād yasyām agniṣvāttādayaḥ pitṛ-gaṇā diśi svānāṃ gotrāṇāṃ parameṇa samādhinā satyā evāśiṣa āśāsānā nivasanti // BhP_05.26.004 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9788: yatra ha vāva bhagavān pitṛ-rājo vaivasvataḥ sva-viṣayaṃ prāpiteṣu
GP10bhp1-12u:9791: tatra haike narakān eka-viṃśatiṃ gaṇayanti atha tāṃs te rājan nāma-rūpa-lakṣaṇato 'nukramiṣyāmas tāmisro 'ndhatāmisro rauravo mahārauravaḥ kumbhīpākaḥ kālasūtram asipatravanaṃ sūkaramukham andhakūpaḥ kṛmibhojanaḥ sandaṃśas taptasūrmir vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalī vaitaraṇī pūyodaḥ prāṇarodho viśasanaṃ lālābhakṣaḥ sārameyādanam avīcir ayaḥpānam iti kiñca kṣārakardamo rakṣogaṇa-bhojanaḥ śūlaproto dandaśūko 'vaṭa-nirodhanaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9792: paryāvartanaḥ sūcīmukham ity aṣṭā-viṃśatir narakā vividha-yātanā-bhūmayaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9793: tatra yas tu para-vittāpatya-kalatrāṇy apaharati sa hi kāla-pāśa-baddho
GP10bhp1-12u:9794: yama-puruṣair ati-bhayānakais tāmisre narake balān nipātyate
GP10bhp1-12u:9796: yatra kaśmalam āsādita ekadaiva mūrcchām upayāti tāmisra-prāye //
GP10bhp1-12u:9797: evam evāndhatāmisre yas tu vañcayitvā puruṣaṃ dārādīn upayuṅkte yatra śarīrī nipātyamāno yātanā-stho vedanayā naṣṭa-matir naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiś ca bhavati yathā vanaspatir vṛścyamāna-mūlas tasmād andhatāmisraṃ tam
GP10bhp1-12u:9799: yas tv iha vā etad aham iti mamedam iti bhūta-droheṇa kevalaṃ sva-kuṭumbam
GP10bhp1-12u:9800: evānudinaṃ prapuṣṇāti sa tad iha vihāya svayam eva tad-aśubhena raurave nipatati // BhP_05.26.009
GP10bhp1-12u:9801: ye tv iha yathaivāmunā vihiṃsitā jantavaḥ paratra yama-yātanām upagataṃ ta eva ruravo bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṃsanti tasmād rauravam ity āhū rurur
GP10bhp1-12u:9803: evam eva mahārauravo yatra nipatitaṃ puruṣaṃ kravyādā nāma ruravas taṃ kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalaṃ dehambharaḥ // BhP_05.26.011 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9804: yas tv iha vā ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇo vā prāṇata uparandhayati tam apakaruṇaṃ puruṣādair api vigarhitam amutra yamānucarāḥ kumbhīpāke tapta-taile
GP10bhp1-12u:9806: yas tv iha brahma-dhruk sa kālasūtra-saṃjñake narake
GP10bhp1-12u:9809: dahyamānāntar-bahiḥ-śarīra āste śete ceṣṭate 'vatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti paśu-romāṇi tāvad varṣa-sahasrāṇi // BhP_05.26.013 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9810: yas tv iha vai nija-veda-pathād anāpady apagataḥ pākhaṇḍaṃ copagatas tam asi-patravanaṃ praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra hāsāv itas tato dhāvamāna ubhayato dhārais tāla-vanāsi-patraiś chidyamāna-sarvāṅgo hā hato 'smīti
GP10bhp1-12u:9811: paramayā vedanayā mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati sva-dharmahā
GP10bhp1-12u:9813: yas tv iha vai rājā rāja-puruṣo vā adaṇḍye daṇḍaṃ praṇayati brāhmaṇe vā
GP10bhp1-12u:9814: śarīra-daṇḍaṃ sa pāpīyān narake 'mutra sūkaramukhe nipatati tatrātibalair
GP10bhp1-12u:9815: viniṣpiṣyamāṇāvayavo yathaivehekṣukhaṇḍa ārta-svareṇa svanayan kvacin mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagato yathaivehā-dṛṣṭa-doṣā uparuddhāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:9816: yas tv iha vai bhūtānām īśvaropakalpita-vṛttīnām avivikta-para-vyathānāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9817: svayaṃ puruṣopakalpita-vṛttir vivikta-para-vyatho vyathām ācarati sa
GP10bhp1-12u:9818: paratrāndhakūpe tad-abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra hāsau tair jantubhiḥ paśu-mṛga-pakṣi-sarīsṛpair maśaka-yūkā-matkuṇa-makṣikādibhir ye ke cābhidrugdhās taiḥ sarvato 'bhidruhyamāṇas tamasi vihata-nidrā-nirvṛtir
GP10bhp1-12u:9819: alabdhāvasthānaḥ parikrāmati yathā kuśarīre jīvaḥ // BhP_05.26.016 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9820: yas tv iha vā asaṃvibhajyāśnāti yat kiñcanopanatam anirmita-pañca-yajño
GP10bhp1-12u:9821: vāyasa-saṃstutaḥ sa paratra kṛmibhojane narakādhame nipatati tatra
GP10bhp1-12u:9822: śata-sahasra-yojane kṛmi-kuṇḍe kṛmi-bhūtaḥ svayaṃ kṛmibhir eva
GP10bhp1-12u:9823: bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi-bhojano yāvat tad aprattāprahūtādo 'nirveśam ātmānaṃ yātayate // BhP_05.26.017
GP10bhp1-12u:9824: yas tv iha vai steyena balād vā hiraṇya-ratnādīni brāhmaṇasya vāpaharaty anyasya vānāpadi puruṣas tam amutra rājan yama-puruṣā ayasmayair
GP10bhp1-12u:9826: yas tv iha vā agamyāṃ striyam agamyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ yoṣid abhigacchati tāv amutra kaśayā tāḍayantas tigmayā sūrmyā lohamayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyaṃ ca puruṣa-rūpayā sūrmyā // BhP_05.26.019 yas tv iha vai sarvābhigamas tam amutra niraye vartamānaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9828: ye tv iha vai rājanyā rāja-puruṣā vā apākhaṇḍā dharma-setūn bhindanti te samparetya vaitaraṇyāṃ nipatanti bhinna-maryādās tasyāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9829: niraya-parikhā-bhūtāyāṃ nadyāṃ yādo-gaṇair itas tato bhakṣyamāṇā ātmanā na viyujyamānāś cāsubhir uhyamānāḥ svāghena karma-pākam anusmaranto
GP10bhp1-12u:9831: ye tv iha vai vṛṣalī-patayo naṣṭa-śaucācāra-niyamās tyakta-lajjāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9832: paśu-caryāṃ caranti te cāpi pretya pūya-viṇ-mūtra-śleṣma-malā-pūrṇārṇave
GP10bhp1-12u:9834: ye tv iha vai śva-gardabha-patayo brāhmaṇādayo mṛgayā vihārā atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya-bhūtān yama-puruṣā iṣubhir vidhyanti // BhP_05.26.023 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9835: ye tv iha vai dāmbhikā dambha-yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya-patayo yātayitvā viśasanti // BhP_05.26.024
GP10bhp1-12u:9836: yas tv iha vai savarṇāṃ bhāryāṃ dvijo retaḥ pāyayati kāma-mohitas taṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9837: pāpa-kṛtam amutra retaḥ-kulyāyāṃ pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:9838: ye tv iha vai dasyavo 'gnidā garadā grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti rājāno
GP10bhp1-12u:9839: rāja-bhaṭā vā tāṃś cāpi hi paretya yamadūtā vajra-daṃṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9840: sapta-śatāni viṃśatiś ca sarabhasaṃ khādanti // BhP_05.26.026 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9841: yas tv iha vā anṛtaṃ vadati sākṣye dravya-vinimaye dāne vā kathañcit sa vai pretya narake 'vīcimaty adhaḥ-śirā niravakāśe yojana-śatocchrāyād
GP10bhp1-12u:9842: giri-mūrdhnaḥ sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma-pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tad avīcimat tilaśo viśīryamāṇa-śarīro na mriyamāṇaḥ punar āropito nipatati // BhP_05.26.027 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9843: yas tv iha vai vipro rājanyo vaiśyo vā soma-pīthas tat-kalatraṃ vā surāṃ vrata-stho 'pi vā pibati pramādatas teṣāṃ nirayaṃ nītānām urasi padākramyāsye vahninā dravamāṇaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ niṣiñcanti // BhP_05.26.028
GP10bhp1-12u:9844: atha ca yas tv iha vā ātma-sambhāvanena svayam adhamo janma-tapo-vidyācāra-varṇāśramavato varīyaso na bahu manyeta sa mṛtaka eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye 'vāk-śirā nipātito durantā yātanā hy aśnute //
GP10bhp1-12u:9845: ye tv iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣa-medhena yajante yāś ca striyo nṛ-paśūn
GP10bhp1-12u:9846: khādanti tāṃś ca te paśava iva nihatā yama-sadane yātayanto rakṣo-gaṇāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9847: saunikā iva svadhitināvadāyāsṛk pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇā yatheha puruṣādāḥ ye tv iha vā anāgaso 'raṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakair upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya jijīviṣūn śūla-sūtrādiṣūpaprotān krīḍanakatayā yātayanti te 'pi ca pretya yama-yātanāsu śūlādiṣu protātmānaḥ kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:9848: cābhihatāḥ kaṅka-vaṭādibhiś cetas tatas tigma-tuṇḍair āhanyamānā
GP10bhp1-12u:9850: ye tv iha vai bhūtāny udvejayanti narā ulbaṇa-svabhāvā yathā dandaśūkās te
GP10bhp1-12u:9851: 'pi pretya narake dandaśūkākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa dandaśūkāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:9852: pañca-mukhāḥ sapta-mukhā upasṛtya grasanti yathā bileśayān //
GP10bhp1-12u:9853: ye tv iha vā andhāvaṭa-kusūla-guhādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathāmutra teṣv evopaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti // BhP_05.26.033 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:9854: yas tv iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛha-patir asakṛd upagata-manyur
GP10bhp1-12u:9855: didhakṣur iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya cāpi niraye pāpa-dṛṣṭer
GP10bhp1-12u:9858: yas tv iha vā āḍhyābhimatir ahaṅkṛtis tiryak-prekṣaṇaḥ sarvato 'bhiviśaṅkī
