GP10bhp1-12u:10203: ātiṣṭhata satāṃ mārgaṃ kopaṃ yacchata dīpitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10204: pitrā pitāmahenāpi juṣṭaṃ vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ // BhP_06.04.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10205: tokānāṃ pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10206: patiḥ prajānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhy ajñānāṃ budhaḥ suhṛt // BhP_06.04.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10208: sarvaṃ taddhiṣṇyamīkṣadhvamevaṃ vastoṣito hy asau // BhP_06.04.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10210: ātmajijñāsayā yacchet sa guṇān ativartate // BhP_06.04.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10212: vārkṣī hy eṣā varā kanyā patnītve pratigṛhyatām // BhP_06.04.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10214: somo rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇopayemire // BhP_06.04.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10218: retasā manasā caiva tan mamāvahitaḥ śṛṇu // BhP_06.04.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10229: na yasya sakhyaṃ puruṣo 'vaiti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan saṃvasataḥ pure 'smin /
GP10bhp1-12u:10230: guṇo yathā guṇino vyaktadṛṣṭes tasmai maheśāya namaskaromi //
GP10bhp1-12u:10231: deho 'savo 'kṣā manavo bhūtamātrām ātmānamanyaṃ ca viduḥ paraṃ yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10232: sarvaṃ pumān veda guṇāṃśca tajjño na veda sarvajñamanantamīḍe //
GP10bhp1-12u:10234: ya īyate kevalayā svasaṃsthayā haṃsāya tasmai śucisadmane namaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10236: vahniṃ yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyaṃ manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti gūḍham //
GP10bhp1-12u:10238: sa sarvanāmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ prasīdatāmaniruktātmaśaktiḥ // BhP_06.04.028
GP10bhp1-12u:10239: yadyan niruktaṃ vacasā nirūpitaṃ dhiyākṣabhirvā manasota yasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:10240: mā bhūt svarūpaṃ guṇarūpaṃ hi tat tat sa vai guṇāpāyavisargalakṣaṇaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10241: yasmin yato yena ca yasya yasmai yadyo yathā kurute kāryate ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:10242: parāvareṣāṃ paramaṃ prāk prasiddhaṃ tadbrahma taddheturananyadekam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10243: yacchaktayo vadatāṃ vādināṃ vai vivādasaṃvādabhuvo bhavanti /
GP10bhp1-12u:10244: kurvanti caiṣāṃ muhurātmamohaṃ tasmai namo 'nantaguṇāya bhūmne //
GP10bhp1-12u:10246: avekṣitaṃ kiñcana yogasāṅkhyayoḥ samaṃ paraṃ hy anukūlaṃ bṛhat tat //
GP10bhp1-12u:10247: yo 'nugrahārthaṃ bhajatāṃ pādamūlam anāmarūpo bhagavān anantaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10248: nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janmakarmabhir bheje sa mahyaṃ paramaḥ prasīdatu //
GP10bhp1-12u:10250: yathānilaḥ pārthivamāśrito guṇaṃ sa īśvaro me kurutāṃ manoratham //
GP10bhp1-12u:10251: BhP_06.04.035/0 śrīśuka uvāca iti stutaḥ saṃstuvataḥ sa tasminnaghamarṣaṇe /
GP10bhp1-12u:10268: BhP_06.04.043/0 śrībhagavān uvāca prācetasa mahābhāga saṃsiddhastapasā bhavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:10269: yac chraddhayā matparayā mayi bhāvaṃ paraṃ gataḥ // BhP_06.04.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10270: prīto 'haṃ te prajānātha yat te 'syodbṛṃhaṇaṃ tapaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10273: vibhūtayo mama hy etā bhūtānāṃ bhūtihetavaḥ // BhP_06.04.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10275: aṅgāni kratavo jātā dharma ātmāsavaḥ surāḥ // BhP_06.04.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10279: yadāsīt tata evādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūdajaḥ // BhP_06.04.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10280: sa vai yadā mahādevo mama vīryopabṛṃhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10285: asiknī nāma patnītve prajeśa pratigṛhyatām // BhP_06.04.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10289: madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim // BhP_06.04.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10290: BhP_06.04.054/0 śrīśuka uvāca ity uktvā miṣatastasya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10292: BhP_06.05.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca tasyāṃ sa pāñcajanyāṃ vai viṣṇumāyopabṛṃhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10295: pitrā proktāḥ prajāsarge pratīcīṃ prayayurdiśam // BhP_06.05.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10299: dharme pāramahaṃsye ca protpannamatayo 'py uta // BhP_06.05.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10301: prajāvivṛddhaye yattān devarṣistān dadarśa ha // BhP_06.05.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10302: uvāca cātha haryaśvāḥ kathaṃ srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10303: adṛṣṭvāntaṃ bhuvo yūyaṃ bāliśā bata pālakāḥ // BhP_06.05.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10305: bahurūpāṃ striyaṃ cāpi pumāṃsaṃ puṃścalīpatim // BhP_06.05.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10307: kvaciddhaṃsaṃ citrakathaṃ kṣaurapavyaṃ svayaṃ bhrami // BhP_06.05.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10310: BhP_06.05.010/0 śrīśuka uvāca tan niśamyātha haryaśvā autpattikamanīṣayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10311: vācaḥ kūṭaṃ tu devarṣeḥ svayaṃ vimamṛśurdhiyā // BhP_06.05.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10316: pumān naivaiti yadgatvā bilasvargaṃ gato yathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10328: kālacakraṃ bhrami tīkṣṇaṃ sarvaṃ niṣkarṣayaj jagat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10330: śāstrasya piturādeśaṃ yo na veda nivartakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10335: akhaṇḍaṃ cittamāveśya lokān anucaran muniḥ // BhP_06.05.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10337: anvatapyata kaḥ śocan suprajastvaṃ śucāṃ padam // BhP_06.05.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10340: te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajāsarge dhṛtavratāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10343: japanto brahma paramaṃ tepustatra mahat tapaḥ // BhP_06.05.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10348: iti tān api rājendra prajāsargadhiyo muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10349: upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrvavat // BhP_06.05.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10353: sa puṇyabandhuḥ puruṣo marudbhiḥ saha modate // BhP_06.05.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10355: te 'pi cānvagaman mārgaṃ bhrātṝṇāmeva māriṣa // BhP_06.05.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10357: nādyāpi te nivartante paścimā yāminīriva // BhP_06.05.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10358: etasmin kāla utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10362: BhP_06.05.036/0 śrīdakṣa uvāca aho asādho sādhūnāṃ sādhuliṅgena nastvayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10365: vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayorubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ // BhP_06.05.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10369: ṛte tvāṃ sauhṛdaghnaṃ vai vairaṅkaramavairiṇām // BhP_06.05.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10370: netthaṃ puṃsāṃ virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10373: nirvidyate svayaṃ tasmān na tathā bhinnadhīḥ paraiḥ // BhP_06.05.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10375: kṛtavān asi durmarṣaṃ vipriyaṃ tava marṣitam // BhP_06.05.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10377: tasmāl lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavedbhramataḥ padam // BhP_06.05.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10378: BhP_06.05.044/0 śrīśuka uvāca pratijagrāha tadbāḍhaṃ nāradaḥ sādhusammataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10379: etāvān sādhuvādo hi titikṣeteśvaraḥ svayam // BhP_06.05.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10380: BhP_06.06.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca tataḥ prācetaso 'siknyāmanunītaḥ svayambhuvā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10383: bhūtāṅgiraḥkṛśāśvebhyo dve dve tārkṣyāya cāparāḥ // BhP_06.06.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10384: nāmadheyāny amūṣāṃ tvaṃ sāpatyānāṃ ca me śṛṇu /
GP10bhp1-12u:10387: vasurmuhūrtā saṅkalpā dharmapatnyaḥ sutāñ śṛṇu // BhP_06.06.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10391: bhuvo durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargo nandistato 'bhavat // BhP_06.06.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10395: jayanto vāsudevāṃśa upendra iti yaṃ viduḥ // BhP_06.06.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10397: ye vai phalaṃ prayacchanti bhūtānāṃ svasvakālajam // BhP_06.06.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10399: vasavo 'ṣṭau vasoḥ putrāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BhP_06.06.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10403: dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇirasūta vividhāḥ puraḥ // BhP_06.06.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10407: doṣasya śarvarīputraḥ śiśumāro hareḥ kalā // BhP_06.06.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10409: tato manuścākṣuṣo 'bhūdviśve sādhyā manoḥ sutāḥ // BhP_06.06.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10411: pañcayāmo 'tha bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu // BhP_06.06.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10413: raivato 'jo bhavo bhīmo vāma ugro vṛṣākapiḥ // BhP_06.06.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10417: atharvāṅgirasaṃ vedaṃ putratve cākarot satī // BhP_06.06.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10419: dhiṣaṇāyāṃ vedaśiro devalaṃ vayunaṃ manum // BhP_06.06.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10420: tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminīti ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:10421: pataṅgy asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha // BhP_06.06.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10426: punaḥ prasādya taṃ somaḥ kalā lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10427: śṛṇu nāmāni lokānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ śaṅkarāṇi ca // BhP_06.06.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10429: aditirditirdanuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā surasā ilā // BhP_06.06.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10430: muniḥ krodhavaśā tāmrā surabhiḥ saramā timiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10432: surabhermahiṣā gāvo ye cānye dviśaphā nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:10435: ilāyā bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāśca saurasāḥ // BhP_06.06.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10445: upadānavī hayaśirā pulomā kālakā tathā // BhP_06.06.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10447: pulomāṃ kālakāṃ ca dve vaiśvānarasute tu kaḥ // BhP_06.06.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10453: rāhujyeṣṭhaṃ ketuśataṃ grahatvaṃ ya upāgatāḥ // BhP_06.06.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10456: vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭātha savitā bhagaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10457: dhātā vidhātā varuṇo mitraḥ śatru urukramaḥ // BhP_06.06.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10459: mithunaṃ ca mahābhāgā yamaṃ devaṃ yamīṃ tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10460: saiva bhūtvātha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi // BhP_06.06.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10461: chāyā śanaiścaraṃ lebhe sāvarṇiṃ ca manuṃ tataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10462: kanyāṃ ca tapatīṃ yā vai vavre saṃvaraṇaṃ patim // BhP_06.06.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10464: yatra vai mānuṣī jātirbrahmaṇā copakalpitā // BhP_06.06.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10466: yo 'sau dakṣāya kupitaṃ jahāsa vivṛtadvijaḥ // BhP_06.06.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10471: BhP_06.07.001/0 śrīrājovāca kasya hetoḥ parityaktā ācāryeṇātmanaḥ surāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10488: āyayau svagṛhaṃ tūṣṇīṃ vidvān śrīmadavikriyām // BhP_06.07.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10491: aho bata mayāsādhu kṛtaṃ vai dabhrabuddhinā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10492: yan mayaiśvaryamattena guruḥ sadasi kātkṛtaḥ // BhP_06.07.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10496: pratyuttiṣṭhediti brūyurdharmaṃ te na paraṃ viduḥ // BhP_06.07.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10497: teṣāṃ kupathadeṣṭṝṇāṃ patatāṃ tamasi hy adhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10498: ye śraddadhyurvacaste vai majjanty aśmaplavā iva // BhP_06.07.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10500: prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā taccaraṇaṃ spṛśan // BhP_06.07.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10504: dhyāyan dhiyā surairyuktaḥ śarma nālabhatātmanaḥ // BhP_06.07.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10508: brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ sahendrā natakandharāḥ // BhP_06.07.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10510: kṛpayā parayā deva uvāca parisāntvayan // BhP_06.07.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10511: BhP_06.07.021/0 śrībrahmovāca aho bata suraśreṣṭhā hy abhadraṃ vaḥ kṛtaṃ mahat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10514: prakṣīṇebhyaḥ svavairibhyaḥ samṛddhānāṃ ca yat surāḥ // BhP_06.07.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10518: tripiṣṭapaṃ kiṃ gaṇayanty abhedya mantrā bhṛgūṇāmanuśikṣitārthāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10521: sabhājito 'rthān sa vidhāsyate vo yadi kṣamiṣyadhvamutāsya karma //
GP10bhp1-12u:10522: BhP_06.07.026/0 śrīśuka uvāca ta evamuditā rājan brahmaṇā vigatajvarāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10524: BhP_06.07.027/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ vayaṃ te 'tithayaḥ prāptā āśramaṃ bhadramastu te /
GP10bhp1-12u:10525: kāmaḥ sampādyatāṃ tāta pitṝṇāṃ samayocitaḥ // BhP_06.07.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10526: putrāṇāṃ hi paro dharmaḥ pitṛśuśrūṣaṇaṃ satām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10527: api putravatāṃ brahman kimuta brahmacāriṇām // BhP_06.07.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10528: ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10537: chandobhyo 'nyatra na brahman vayo jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam // BhP_06.07.033
GP10bhp1-12u:10538: BhP_06.07.034/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca abhyarthitaḥ suragaṇaiḥ paurahitye mahātapāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10539: sa viśvarūpastān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā // BhP_06.07.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10542: pratyākhyāsyati tacchiṣyaḥ sa eva svārtha ucyate // BhP_06.07.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10543: akiñcanānāṃ hi dhanaṃ śiloñchanaṃ teneha nirvartitasādhusatkriyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10544: kathaṃ vigarhyaṃ nu karomy adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasaṃ hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10545: tathāpi na pratibrūyāṃ gurubhiḥ prārthitaṃ kiyat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10546: bhavatāṃ prārthitaṃ sarvaṃ prāṇairarthaiśca sādhaye // BhP_06.07.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10547: BhP_06.07.038/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca tebhya evaṃ pratiśrutya viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10550: ācchidyādān mahendrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ // BhP_06.07.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10552: tāṃ prāha sa mahendrāya viśvarūpa udāradhīḥ // BhP_06.07.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10553: BhP_06.08.001/0 śrīrājovāca yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ savāhān ripusainikān /
GP10bhp1-12u:10554: krīḍanniva vinirjitya trilokyā bubhuje śriyam // BhP_06.08.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10556: yathātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena gupto 'jayan mṛdhe // BhP_06.08.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10559: BhP_06.08.004/0 śrīviśvarūpa uvāca dhautāṅghripāṇirācamya sapavitra udaṅmukhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10564: oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti viparyayamathāpi vā // BhP_06.08.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10568: ṣakāraṃ tu bhruvormadhye ṇakāraṃ śikhayā nyaset // BhP_06.08.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10575: oṃ harirvidadhyān mama sarvarakṣāṃ nyastāṅghripadmaḥ patagendrapṛṣṭhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:10577: jaleṣu māṃ rakṣatu matsyamūrtir yādogaṇebhyo varuṇasya pāśāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:10580: vimuñcato yasya mahāṭṭahāsaṃ diśo vinedurnyapataṃśca garbhāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10583: māmugradharmādakhilāt pramādān nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraśca hāsāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:10585: sanatkumāro 'vatu kāmadevād dhayaśīrṣā māṃ pathi devahelanāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:10588: yajñaśca lokādavatāj janāntād balo gaṇāt krodhavaśādahīndraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10590: kalkiḥ kaleḥ kālamalāt prapātu dharmāvanāyorukṛtāvatāraḥ // BhP_06.08.019
GP10bhp1-12u:10591: māṃ keśavo gadayā prātaravyād govinda āsaṅgavamāttaveṇuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10593: devo 'parāhṇe madhuhogradhanvā sāyaṃ tridhāmāvatu mādhavo mām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10594: doṣe hṛṣīkeśa utārdharātre niśītha eko 'vatu padmanābhaḥ // BhP_06.08.021
GP10bhp1-12u:10598: dandagdhi dandagdhy arisainyamāśu kakṣaṃ yathā vātasakho hutāśaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10603: tvaṃ tigmadhārāsivarārisainyam īśaprayukto mama chindhi chindhi /
GP10bhp1-12u:10604: cakṣūṃṣi carman chatacandra chādaya dviṣāmaghonāṃ hara pāpacakṣuṣām //
GP10bhp1-12u:10605: yan no bhayaṃ grahebhyo 'bhūt ketubhyo nṛbhya eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:10606: sarīsṛpebhyo daṃṣṭribhyo bhūtebhyo 'ṃhobhya eva ca // BhP_06.08.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10608: prayāntu saṅkṣayaṃ sadyo ye naḥ śreyaḥpratīpakāḥ // BhP_06.08.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10613: yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutaḥ sadasac ca yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10614: satyenānena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśamupadravāḥ // BhP_06.08.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10618: pātu sarvaiḥ svarūpairnaḥ sadā sarvatra sarvagaḥ // BhP_06.08.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10620: prahāpaya lokabhayaṃ svanena svatejasā grastasamastatejāḥ // BhP_06.08.034
GP10bhp1-12u:10624: padā vā saṃspṛśet sadyaḥ sādhvasāt sa vimucyate // BhP_06.08.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10625: na kutaścidbhayaṃ tasya vidyāṃ dhārayato bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:10627: imāṃ vidyāṃ purā kaścit kauśiko dhārayan dvijaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10628: yogadhāraṇayā svāṅgaṃ jahau sa marudhanvani // BhP_06.08.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10630: yayau citrarathaḥ strībhirvṛto yatra dvijakṣayaḥ // BhP_06.08.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10631: gaganān nyapatat sadyaḥ savimāno hy avākśirāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10633: prāsya prācīsarasvatyāṃ snātvā dhāma svamanvagāt // BhP_06.08.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10634: BhP_06.08.041/0 śrīśuka uvāca ya idaṃ śṛṇuyāt kāle yo dhārayati cādṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10635: taṃ namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvato bhayāt // BhP_06.08.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10638: BhP_06.09.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca tasyāsan viśvarūpasya śirāṃsi trīṇi bhārata /
GP10bhp1-12u:10640: sa vai barhiṣi devebhyo bhāgaṃ pratyakṣamuccakaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10641: adadadyasya pitaro devāḥ sapraśrayaṃ nṛpa // BhP_06.09.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10642: sa eva hi dadau bhāgaṃ parokṣamasurān prati /
GP10bhp1-12u:10646: somapīthaṃ tu yat tasya śira āsīt kapiñjalaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10647: kalaviṅkaḥ surāpīthamannādaṃ yat sa tittiriḥ // BhP_06.09.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10649: saṃvatsarānte tadaghaṃ bhūtānāṃ sa viśuddhaye // BhP_06.09.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10660: indraśatro vivardhasva mā ciraṃ jahi vidviṣam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10663: viṣvag vivardhamānaṃ tamiṣumātraṃ dine dine // BhP_06.09.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10667: nṛtyantamunnadantaṃ ca cālayantaṃ padā mahīm // BhP_06.09.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10671: vitrastā dudruvurlokā vīkṣya sarve diśo daśa // BhP_06.09.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10673: sa vai vṛtra iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ // BhP_06.09.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10678: BhP_06.09.021/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ vāyvambarāgnyapkṣitayastrilokā brahmādayo ye vayamudvijantaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:10679: harāma yasmai balimantako 'sau bibheti yasmādaraṇaṃ tato naḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10680: avismitaṃ taṃ paripūrṇakāmaṃ svenaiva lābhena samaṃ praśāntam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10681: vinopasarpaty aparaṃ hi bāliśaḥ śvalāṅgulenātititarti sindhum //
GP10bhp1-12u:10682: yasyoruśṛṅge jagatīṃ svanāvaṃ manuryathābadhya tatāra durgam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10683: sa eva nastvāṣṭrabhayāddurantāt trātāśritān vāricaro 'pi nūnam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10685: eko 'ravindāt patitastatāra tasmādbhayādyena sa no 'stu pāraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10686: ya eka īśo nijamāyayā naḥ sasarja yenānusṛjāma viśvam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10687: vayaṃ na yasyāpi puraḥ samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgaṃ pṛthag īśamāninaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10688: yo naḥ sapatnairbhṛśamardyamānān devarṣitiryaṅnṛṣu nitya eva /
GP10bhp1-12u:10689: kṛtāvatārastanubhiḥ svamāyayā kṛtvātmasāt pāti yuge yuge ca //
GP10bhp1-12u:10690: tameva devaṃ vayamātmadaivataṃ paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ viśvamanyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10691: vrajāma sarve śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ svānāṃ sa no dhāsyati śaṃ mahātmā //
GP10bhp1-12u:10692: BhP_06.09.028/0 śrīśuka uvāca iti teṣāṃ mahārāja surāṇāmupatiṣṭhatām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10697: daṇḍavat patitā rājañ chanairutthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ // BhP_06.09.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10698: BhP_06.09.031/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ namaste yajñavīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10699: namaste hy astacakrāya namaḥ supuruhūtaye // BhP_06.09.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10700: yat te gatīnāṃ tisṛṇāmīśituḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10702: oṃ namaste 'stu bhagavan nārāyaṇa vāsudevādipuruṣa mahāpuruṣa mahānubhāva paramamaṅgala paramakalyāṇa paramakāruṇika kevala jagadādhāra lokaikanātha
GP10bhp1-12u:10706: idamanavekṣitāsmatsamavāya ātmanaivāvikriyamāṇena saguṇamaguṇaḥ sṛjasi pāsi harasi // BhP_06.09.034
GP10bhp1-12u:10707: atha tatra bhavān kiṃ devadattavadiha guṇavisargapatitaḥ pāratantryeṇa svakṛtakuśalākuśalaṃ phalamupādadāty āhosvidātmārāma upaśamaśīlaḥ samañjasadarśana udāsta iti ha vāva na vidāmaḥ na hi virodha ubhayaṃ bhagavaty aparimitaguṇagaṇa īśvare
GP10bhp1-12u:10710: vivādānavasara uparatasamastamāyāmaye kevala evātmamāyāmantardhāya ko nvartho durghaṭa iva bhavati svarūpadvayābhāvāt // BhP_06.09.036 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:10712: sa eva hi punaḥ sarvavastuni vastusvarūpaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sakalajagatkāraṇakāraṇabhūtaḥ sarvapratyagātmatvāt sarvaguṇābhāsopalakṣita eka eva paryavaśeṣitaḥ // BhP_06.09.038 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:10713: atha ha vāva tava mahimāmṛtarasasamudravipruṣā sakṛdavalīḍhayā svamanasi niṣyandamānānavaratasukhena vismāritadṛṣṭaśrutaviṣayasukhaleśābhāsāḥ paramabhāgavatā ekāntino bhagavati sarvabhūtapriyasuhṛdi sarvātmani nitarāṃ nirantaraṃ nirvṛtamanasaḥ kathamu ha vā ete madhumathana punaḥ svārthakuśalā hy ātmapriyasuhṛdaḥ sādhavastvaccaraṇāmbujānusevāṃ visṛjanti na yatra punarayaṃ saṃsāraparyāvartaḥ tribhuvanātmabhavana trivikrama trinayana trilokamanoharānubhāva tavaiva vibhūtayo ditijadanujādayaścāpi teṣāmupakramasamayo 'yamiti svātmamāyayā suranaramṛgamiśritajalacarākṛtibhiryathāparādhaṃ daṇḍaṃ daṇḍadhara dadhartha evamenamapi bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭramuta yadi manyase //
GP10bhp1-12u:10714: asmākaṃ tāvakānāṃ tatatata natānāṃ hare tava caraṇanalinayugaladhyānānubaddhahṛdayanigaḍānāṃ svaliṅgavivaraṇenātmasātkṛtānāmanukampānurañjitaviśadaruciraśiśirasmitāvalokena vigalitamadhuramukharasāmṛtakalayā cāntastāpamanaghārhasi śamayitum //
GP10bhp1-12u:10715: atha bhagavaṃstavāsmābhirakhilajagadutpattisthitilayanimittāyamānadivyamāyāvinodasya sakalajīvanikāyānāmantarhṛdayeṣu bahirapi ca brahmapratyagātmasvarūpeṇa pradhānarūpeṇa ca yathādeśakāladehāvasthānaviśeṣaṃ tadupādānopalambhakatayānubhavataḥ sarvapratyayasākṣiṇa ākāśaśarīrasya sākṣāt parabrahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vārthaviśeṣo vijñāpanīyaḥ syādvisphuliṅgādibhiriva hiraṇyaretasaḥ ata eva svayaṃ tadupakalpayāsmākaṃ bhagavataḥ paramagurostava caraṇaśatapalāśacchāyāṃ vividhavṛjinasaṃsārapariśramopaśamanīmupasṛtānāṃ vayaṃ yatkāmenopasāditāḥ // BhP_06.09.043 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:10716: atho īśa jahi tvāṣṭraṃ grasantaṃ bhuvanatrayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10717: grastāni yena naḥ kṛṣṇa tejāṃsy astrāyudhāni ca // BhP_06.09.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10718: haṃsāya dahranilayāya nirīkṣakāya kṛṣṇāya mṛṣṭayaśase nirupakramāya /
GP10bhp1-12u:10719: satsaṅgrahāya bhavapānthanijāśramāptāv ante parīṣṭagataye haraye namaste
GP10bhp1-12u:10720: BhP_06.09.046/0 śrīśuka uvāca athaivamīḍito rājan sādaraṃ tridaśairhariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10722: BhP_06.09.047/0 śrībhagavān uvāca prīto 'haṃ vaḥ suraśreṣṭhā madupasthānavidyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10723: ātmaiśvaryasmṛtiḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktiścaiva yayā mayi // BhP_06.09.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10724: kiṃ durāpaṃ mayi prīte tathāpi vibudharṣabhāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10725: mayy ekāntamatirnānyan matto vāñchati tattvavit // BhP_06.09.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10726: na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreya ātmano guṇavastudṛk /
GP10bhp1-12u:10727: tasya tān icchato yacchedyadi so 'pi tathāvidhaḥ // BhP_06.09.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10728: svayaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ vidvān na vakty ajñāya karma hi /
GP10bhp1-12u:10729: na rāti rogiṇo 'pathyaṃ vāñchato 'pi bhiṣaktamaḥ // BhP_06.09.050 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10731: vidyāvratatapaḥsāraṃ gātraṃ yācata mā ciram // BhP_06.09.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10732: sa vā adhigato dadhyaṅṅ aśvibhyāṃ brahma niṣkalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10733: yadvā aśvaśiro nāma tayoramaratāṃ vyadhāt // BhP_06.09.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10735: viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvamadhāstataḥ // BhP_06.09.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10740: bhūyaḥ prāpsyatha bhadraṃ vo na hiṃsanti ca matparān // BhP_06.09.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10741: BhP_06.10.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca indramevaṃ samādiśya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10745: api vṛndārakā yūyaṃ na jānītha śarīriṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10748: ka utsaheta taṃ dātuṃ bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave // BhP_06.10.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10749: BhP_06.10.005/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ kiṃ nu taddustyajaṃ brahman puṃsāṃ bhūtānukampinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10751: nūnaṃ svārthaparo loko na veda parasaṅkaṭam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10752: yadi veda na yāceta neti nāha yadīśvaraḥ // BhP_06.10.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10753: BhP_06.10.007/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca dharmaṃ vaḥ śrotukāmena yūyaṃ me pratyudāhṛtāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10754: eṣa vaḥ priyamātmānaṃ tyajantaṃ santyajāmy aham // BhP_06.10.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10755: yo 'dhruveṇātmanā nāthā na dharmaṃ na yaśaḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:10756: īheta bhūtadayayā sa śocyaḥ sthāvarairapi // BhP_06.10.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10761: BhP_06.10.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca evaṃ kṛtavyavasito dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇastanum /
GP10bhp1-12u:10762: pare bhagavati brahmaṇy ātmānaṃ sannayan jahau // BhP_06.10.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10764: āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogaṃ na dehaṃ bubudhe gatam // BhP_06.10.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10770: paryastamojasā rājan kruddho rudra ivāntakam // BhP_06.10.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10775: dṛṣṭvā vajradharaṃ śakraṃ rocamānaṃ svayā śriyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10780: daiteyā dānavā yakṣā rakṣāṃsi ca sahasraśaḥ // BhP_06.10.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10789: na te śastrāstravarṣaughā hy āseduḥ surasainikān /
GP10bhp1-12u:10793: tān akṣatān svastimato niśāmya śastrāstrapūgairatha vṛtranāthāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10795: sarve prayāsā abhavan vimoghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtā devagaṇeṣu daityaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10796: kṛṣṇānukūleṣu yathā mahatsu kṣudraiḥ prayuktā ūṣatī rūkṣavācaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10797: te svaprayāsaṃ vitathaṃ nirīkṣya harāvabhaktā hatayuddhadarpāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10798: palāyanāyājimukhe visṛjya patiṃ manaste dadhurāttasārāḥ // BhP_06.10.029
GP10bhp1-12u:10799: vṛtro 'surāṃstān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat /
GP10bhp1-12u:10800: palāyitaṃ prekṣya balaṃ ca bhagnaṃ bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10801: kālopapannāṃ rucirāṃ manasvināṃ jagāda vācaṃ puruṣapravīraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10802: he vipracitte namuce puloman mayānarvan chambara me śṛṇudhvam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10803: jātasya mṛtyurdhruva eva sarvataḥ pratikriyā yasya na ceha kḷptā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10804: loko yaśaścātha tato yadi hy amuṃ ko nāma mṛtyuṃ na vṛṇīta yuktam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10805: dvau sammatāviha mṛtyū durāpau yadbrahmasandhāraṇayā jitāsuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10807: BhP_06.11.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca ta evaṃ śaṃsato dharmaṃ vacaḥ patyuracetasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10812: tān nivāryaujasā rājan nirbhartsyedamuvāca ha // BhP_06.11.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10814: na hi bhītavadhaḥ ślāghyo na svargyaḥ śūramāninām // BhP_06.11.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10815: yadi vaḥ pradhane śraddhā sāraṃ vā kṣullakā hṛdi /
GP10bhp1-12u:10816: agre tiṣṭhata mātraṃ me na cedgrāmyasukhe spṛhā // BhP_06.11.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10817: evaṃ suragaṇān kruddho bhīṣayan vapuṣā ripūn /
GP10bhp1-12u:10818: vyanadat sumahāprāṇo yena lokā vicetasaḥ // BhP_06.11.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:10822: gāṃ kampayannudyataśūla ojasā nālaṃ vanaṃ yūthapatiryathonmadaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10824: cikṣepa tāmāpatatīṃ suduḥsahāṃ jagrāha vāmena kareṇa līlayā //
GP10bhp1-12u:10825: sa indraśatruḥ kupito bhṛśaṃ tayā mahendravāhaṃ gadayoruvikramaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10826: jaghāna kumbhasthala unnadan mṛdhe tat karma sarve samapūjayan nṛpa //
GP10bhp1-12u:10829: na sannavāhāya viṣaṇṇacetase prāyuṅkta bhūyaḥ sa gadāṃ mahātmā /
GP10bhp1-12u:10831: sa taṃ nṛpendrāhavakāmyayā ripuṃ vajrāyudhaṃ bhrātṛhaṇaṃ vilokya /
GP10bhp1-12u:10832: smaraṃśca tatkarma nṛśaṃsamaṃhaḥ śokena mohena hasan jagāda //
GP10bhp1-12u:10833: BhP_06.11.014/0 śrīvṛtra uvāca diṣṭyā bhavān me samavasthito ripur yo brahmahā guruhā bhrātṛhā ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:10835: yo no 'grajasyātmavido dvijāter gurorapāpasya ca dīkṣitasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:10836: viśrabhya khaḍgena śirāṃsy avṛścat paśorivākaruṇaḥ svargakāmaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10839: anye 'nu ye tveha nṛśaṃsamajñā yadudyatāstrāḥ praharanti mahyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10841: atho hare me kuliśena vīra hartā pramathyaiva śiro yadīha /
GP10bhp1-12u:10842: tatrānṛṇo bhūtabaliṃ vidhāya manasvināṃ pādarajaḥ prapatsye //
GP10bhp1-12u:10843: sureśa kasmān na hinoṣi vajraṃ puraḥ sthite vairiṇi mayy amogham /
GP10bhp1-12u:10844: mā saṃśayiṣṭhā na gadeva vajraḥ syān niṣphalaḥ kṛpaṇārtheva yācñā //
GP10bhp1-12u:10845: nanveṣa vajrastava śakra tejasā harerdadhīcestapasā ca tejitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10846: tenaiva śatruṃ jahi viṣṇuyantrito yato harirvijayaḥ śrīrguṇāstataḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10847: ahaṃ samādhāya mano yathāha naḥ saṅkarṣaṇastaccaraṇāravinde /
GP10bhp1-12u:10849: puṃsāṃ kilaikāntadhiyāṃ svakānāṃ yāḥ sampado divi bhūmau rasāyām /
GP10bhp1-12u:10850: na rāti yaddveṣa udvega ādhir madaḥ kalirvyasanaṃ samprayāsaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10853: ahaṃ hare tava pādaikamūla dāsānudāso bhavitāsmi bhūyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10854: manaḥ smaretāsupaterguṇāṃste gṛṇīta vāk karma karotu kāyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10855: na nākapṛṣṭhaṃ na ca pārameṣṭhyaṃ na sārvabhaumaṃ na rasādhipatyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:10856: na yogasiddhīrapunarbhavaṃ vā samañjasa tvā virahayya kāṅkṣe //
GP10bhp1-12u:10857: ajātapakṣā iva mātaraṃ khagāḥ stanyaṃ yathā vatsatarāḥ kṣudhārtāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10858: priyaṃ priyeva vyuṣitaṃ viṣaṇṇā mano 'ravindākṣa didṛkṣate tvām //
GP10bhp1-12u:10861: BhP_06.12.001/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca evaṃ jihāsurnṛpa dehamājau mṛtyuṃ varaṃ vijayān manyamānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:10862: śūlaṃ pragṛhyābhyapatat surendraṃ yathā mahāpuruṣaṃ kaiṭabho 'psu //
GP10bhp1-12u:10864: kṣiptvā mahendrāya vinadya vīro hato 'si pāpeti ruṣā jagāda //
GP10bhp1-12u:10866: vajreṇa vajrī śataparvaṇācchinad bhujaṃ ca tasyoragarājabhogam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10867: chinnaikabāhuḥ parigheṇa vṛtraḥ saṃrabdha āsādya gṛhītavajram /
GP10bhp1-12u:10868: hanau tatāḍendramathāmarebhaṃ vajraṃ ca hastān nyapatan maghonaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:10870: apūjayaṃstat puruhūtasaṅkaṭaṃ nirīkṣya hā heti vicukruśurbhṛśam //
GP10bhp1-12u:10871: indro na vajraṃ jagṛhe vilajjitaś cyutaṃ svahastādarisannidhau punaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11310: na veda dharmaṃ kila padmayonir na brahmaputrā bhṛgunāradādyāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11317: yatheha bhūyo mahatāṃ na kartā putra kilbiṣam // BhP_06.17.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11318: BhP_06.17.016/0 śrīśuka uvāca evaṃ śaptaścitraketurvimānādavaruhya saḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11326: guṇapravāha etasmin kaḥ śāpaḥ ko nvanugrahaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11330: na tasya kaściddayitaḥ pratīpo na jñātibandhurna paro na ca svaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11336: BhP_06.17.025/0 śrīśuka uvāca iti prasādya giriśau citraketurarindama /

GP10bhp1-12u:11370: BhP_06.18.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca pṛśnistu patnī savituḥ sāvitrīṃ vyāhṛtiṃ trayīm /

GP10bhp1-12u:11462: BhP_06.18.047/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca na hiṃsyādbhūtajātāni na śapen nānṛtaṃ vadet /

GP10bhp1-12u:11499: bahudhā kuliśakṣuṇṇo drauṇyastreṇa yathā bhavān // BhP_06.18.065 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11539: oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahānubhāvāya mahāvibhūtipataye saha mahāvibhūtibhirbalimupaharāmīti anenāharaharmantreṇa viṣṇorāvāhanārghyapādyopasparśanasnānavāsaupavītavibhūṣaṇagandhapuṣpadhūpadīpopahārādyupacārān susamāhitopāharet // BhP_06.19.007 //_*
GP10bhp1-12u:11541: oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahāvibhūtipataye svāheti // BhP_06.19.008
GP10bhp1-12u:11543: bhaktyā sampūjayen nityaṃ yadīcchet sarvasampadaḥ // BhP_06.19.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11545: daśavāraṃ japen mantraṃ tataḥ stotramudīrayet // BhP_06.19.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11546: yuvāṃ tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param /

GP10bhp1-12u:11548: tasyā adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvameva puruṣaḥ paraḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11551: tvaṃ hi sarvaśarīry ātmā śrīḥ śarīrendriyāśayāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11555: ity abhiṣṭūya varadaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ śriyā saha /
GP10bhp1-12u:11561: bibhṛyāt sarvakarmāṇi patnyā uccāvacāni ca // BhP_06.19.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11575: praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tadanujñayā // BhP_06.19.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11577: dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣaṃ suprajāstvaṃ susaubhagam // BhP_06.19.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11578: etac caritvā vidhivadvrataṃ vibhor abhīpsitārthaṃ labhate pumān iha /
GP10bhp1-12u:11579: strī caitadāsthāya labheta saubhagaṃ śriyaṃ prajāṃ jīvapatiṃ yaśo gṛham //
GP10bhp1-12u:11580: kanyā ca vindeta samagralakṣaṇaṃ patiṃ tvavīrā hatakilbiṣāṃ gatim /
GP10bhp1-12u:11581: mṛtaprajā jīvasutā dhaneśvarī sudurbhagā subhagā rūpamagryam //
GP10bhp1-12u:11583: etat paṭhannabhyudaye ca karmaṇy anantatṛptiḥ pitṛdevatānām //
GP10bhp1-12u:11584: tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samastakāmān homāvasāne hutabhuk śrīhariśca /
GP10bhp1-12u:11585: rājan mahan marutāṃ janma puṇyaṃ ditervrataṃ cābhihitaṃ mahat te //
GP10bhp1-12u:11586: BhP_07.01.001/0 śrīrājovāca samaḥ priyaḥ suhṛdbrahman bhūtānāṃ bhagavān svayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:11587: indrasyārthe kathaṃ daityān avadhīdviṣamo yathā // BhP_07.01.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11592: BhP_07.01.004/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja hareścaritamadbhutam /
GP10bhp1-12u:11595: natvā kṛṣṇāya munaye kathayiṣye hareḥ kathām // BhP_07.01.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11599: na teṣāṃ yugapadrājan hrāsa ullāsa eva vā // BhP_07.01.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11604: yadā sisṛkṣuḥ pura ātmanaḥ paro rajaḥ sṛjatyeṣa pṛthak svamāyayā /

GP10bhp1-12u:11607: ya eṣa rājannapi kāla īśitā sattvaṃ surānīkamivaidhayatyataḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11616: vāsudeve pare tattve prāptiścaidyasya vidviṣaḥ // BhP_07.01.015 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11627: BhP_07.01.021/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca rājñastadvaca ākarṇya nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11628: tuṣṭaḥ prāha tamābhāṣya śṛṇvatyāstatsadaḥ kathāḥ // BhP_07.01.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11629: BhP_07.01.022/0 śrīnārada uvāca nindanastavasatkāra nyakkārārthaṃ kalevaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:11635: parasya damakarturhi hiṃsā kenāsya kalpyate // BhP_07.01.024 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11639: na tathā bhaktiyogena iti me niścitā matiḥ // BhP_07.01.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11645: āveśya tadaghaṃ hitvā bahavastadgatiṃ gatāḥ // BhP_07.01.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11646: gopyaḥ kāmādbhayāt kaṃso dveṣāc caidyādayo nṛpāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11648: katamo 'pi na venaḥ syāt pañcānāṃ puruṣaṃ prati /
GP10bhp1-12u:11649: tasmāt kenāpyupāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet // BhP_07.01.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11652: BhP_07.01.033/0 śrīyudhiṣṭhira uvāca kīdṛśaḥ kasya vā śāpo haridāsābhimarśanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11656: BhP_07.01.035/0 śrīnārada uvāca ekadā brahmaṇaḥ putrā viṣṇulokaṃ yadṛcchayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:11659: digvāsasaḥ śiśūn matvā dvāḥsthau tān pratyaṣedhatām // BhP_07.01.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11660: aśapan kupitā evaṃ yuvāṃ vāsaṃ na cārhathaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11663: evaṃ śaptau svabhavanāt patantau tau kṛpālubhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11668: hiraṇyākṣo dharoddhāre bibhratā śaukaraṃ vapuḥ // BhP_07.01.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11676: rāmavīryaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mārkaṇḍeyamukhāt prabho // BhP_07.01.044 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11683: BhP_07.02.001/0 śrīnārada uvāca bhrātaryevaṃ vinihate hariṇā kroḍamūrtinā /
GP10bhp1-12u:11690: śatabāho hayagrīva namuce pāka ilvala // BhP_07.02.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11692: śṛṇutānantaraṃ sarve kriyatāmāśu mā ciram // BhP_07.02.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11698: asṛkpriyaṃ tarpayiṣye bhrātaraṃ me gatavyathaḥ // BhP_07.02.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11700: viṭapā iva śuṣyanti viṣṇuprāṇā divaukasaḥ // BhP_07.02.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11705: yatra yatra dvijā gāvo vedā varṇāśramakriyāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11708: tathā prajānāṃ kadanaṃ vidadhuḥ kadanapriyāḥ // BhP_07.02.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11715: divaṃ devāḥ parityajya bhuvi ceruralakṣitāḥ // BhP_07.02.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11720: tanmātaraṃ ruṣābhānuṃ ditiṃ ca jananīṃ girā /
GP10bhp1-12u:11722: BhP_07.02.020/0 śrīhiraṇyakaśipuruvāca ambāmba he vadhūḥ putrā vīraṃ mārhatha śocitum /
GP10bhp1-12u:11723: riporabhimukhe ślāghyaḥ śūrāṇāṃ vadha īpsitaḥ // BhP_07.02.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11726: nitya ātmāvyayaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvavit paraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11727: dhatte 'sāvātmano liṅgaṃ māyayā visṛjan guṇān // BhP_07.02.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11729: cakṣuṣā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate calatīva bhūḥ // BhP_07.02.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11731: yāti tatsāmyatāṃ bhadre hyaliṅgo liṅgavān iva // BhP_07.02.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11735: avivekaśca cintā ca vivekāsmṛtireva ca // BhP_07.02.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11737: yamasya pretabandhūnāṃ saṃvādaṃ taṃ nibodhata // BhP_07.02.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11744: uśīnarendraṃ vidhinā tathā kṛtaṃ patiṃ mahiṣyaḥ prasamīkṣya duḥkhitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11745: hatāḥ sma nātheti karairuro bhṛśaṃ ghnantyo muhustatpadayorupāpatan //
GP10bhp1-12u:11747: visrastakeśābharaṇāḥ śucaṃ nṛṇāṃ sṛjantya ākrandanayā vilepire //
GP10bhp1-12u:11748: aho vidhātrākaruṇena naḥ prabho bhavān praṇīto dṛgagocarāṃ daśām /
GP10bhp1-12u:11749: uśīnarāṇāmasi vṛttidaḥ purā kṛto 'dhunā yena śucāṃ vivardhanaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:11750: tvayā kṛtajñena vayaṃ mahīpate kathaṃ vinā syāma suhṛttamena te /
GP10bhp1-12u:11751: tatrānuyānaṃ tava vīra pādayoḥ śuśrūṣatīnāṃ diśa yatra yāsyasi //
GP10bhp1-12u:11752: evaṃ vilapatīnāṃ vai parigṛhya mṛtaṃ patim /
GP10bhp1-12u:11755: āha tān bālako bhūtvā yamaḥ svayamupāgataḥ // BhP_07.02.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11756: BhP_07.02.037/0 śrīyama uvāca aho amīṣāṃ vayasādhikānāṃ vipaśyatāṃ lokavidhiṃ vimohaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11757: yatrāgatastatra gataṃ manuṣyaṃ svayaṃ sadharmā api śocantyapārtham //

GP10bhp1-12u:11763: jīvatyanātho 'pi tadīkṣito vane gṛhe 'bhigupto 'sya hato na jīvati //

GP10bhp1-12u:11766: idaṃ śarīraṃ puruṣasya mohajaṃ yathā pṛthag bhautikamīyate gṛham /
GP10bhp1-12u:11767: yathaudakaiḥ pārthivataijasairjanaḥ kālena jāto vikṛto vinaśyati //
GP10bhp1-12u:11768: yathānalo dāruṣu bhinna īyate yathānilo dehagataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11769: yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na sajjate tathā pumān sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ paraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:11771: yaḥ śrotā yo 'nuvakteha sa na dṛśyeta karhicit // BhP_07.02.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11772: na śrotā nānuvaktāyaṃ mukhyo 'pyatra mahān asuḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11775: bhajatyutsṛjati hyanyastac cāpi svena tejasā // BhP_07.02.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11779: yathā manorathaḥ svapnaḥ sarvamaindriyakaṃ mṛṣā // BhP_07.02.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11780: atha nityamanityaṃ vā neha śocanti tadvidaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11783: vitatya jālaṃ vidadhe tatra tatra pralobhayan // BhP_07.02.050 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11785: tayoḥ kuliṅgī sahasā lubdhakena pralobhitā // BhP_07.02.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11790: kṛpaṇaṃ māmanuśocantyā dīnayā kiṃ kariṣyati // BhP_07.02.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11791: kāmaṃ nayatu māṃ devaḥ kimardhenātmano hi me /

GP10bhp1-12u:11796: sa eva taṃ śākunikaḥ śareṇa vivyādha kālaprahito vilīnaḥ // BhP_07.02.056

GP10bhp1-12u:11799: BhP_07.02.058/0 śrīhiraṇyakaśipuruvāca bāla evaṃ pravadati sarve vismitacetasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11802: jñātayo hi suyajñasya cakruryat sāmparāyikam // BhP_07.02.059 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11803: ataḥ śocata mā yūyaṃ paraṃ cātmānameva vā /

GP10bhp1-12u:11807: putraśokaṃ kṣaṇāt tyaktvā tattve cittamadhārayat // BhP_07.02.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11815: tīryag ūrdhvamadho lokān prātapadviṣvag īritaḥ // BhP_07.03.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11817: nipetuḥ sagrahāstārā jajvaluśca diśo daśa // BhP_07.03.005 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11824: śrūyatāṃ kiṃ na viditastavāthāpi niveditam // BhP_07.03.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11834: bhavāya śreyase bhūtyai kṣemāya vijayāya ca // BhP_07.03.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11840: vilakṣya vismitaḥ prāha hasaṃstaṃ haṃsavāhanaḥ // BhP_07.03.016 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11846: niramburdhārayet prāṇān ko vai divyasamāḥ śatam // BhP_07.03.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11850: martasya te hyamartasya darśanaṃ nāphalaṃ mama // BhP_07.03.021 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11858: utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahva īkṣamāṇo dṛśā vibhum /
GP10bhp1-12u:11860: BhP_07.03.026/0 śrīhiraṇyakaśipuruvāca kalpānte kālasṛṣṭena yo 'ndhena tamasāvṛtam /

GP10bhp1-12u:11868: tvaṃ saptatantūn vitanoṣi tanvā trayyā caturhotrakavidyayā ca /

GP10bhp1-12u:11872: tvattaḥ paraṃ nāparamapyanejad ejac ca kiñcidvyatiriktamasti /
GP10bhp1-12u:11873: vidyāḥ kalāste tanavaśca sarvā hiraṇyagarbho 'si bṛhat tripṛṣṭhaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:11875: bhuṅkṣe sthito dhāmani pārameṣṭhye avyakta ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ //

GP10bhp1-12u:11883: apratidvandvatāṃ yuddhe aikapatyaṃ ca dehinām // BhP_07.03.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11885: tapoyogaprabhāvāṇāṃ yan na riṣyati karhicit // BhP_07.03.038 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11887: prādāt tattapasā prīto varāṃstasya sudurlabhān // BhP_07.04.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11888: BhP_07.04.002/0 śrībrahmovāca tāteme durlabhāḥ puṃsāṃ yān vṛṇīṣe varān mama /
GP10bhp1-12u:11889: tathāpi vitarāmyaṅga varān yadyapi durlabhān // BhP_07.04.002 //

GP10bhp1-12u:11908: ratnasthalīṣu paśyanti sudatīḥ sundaraṃ mukham // BhP_07.04.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11909: tasmin mahendrabhavane mahābalo mahāmanā nirjitaloka ekarāṭ /
GP10bhp1-12u:11916: ijyamāno havirbhāgān agrahīt svena tejasā // BhP_07.04.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11918: tathā kāmadughā gāvo nānāścaryapadaṃ nabhaḥ // BhP_07.04.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11922: dadhāra lokapālānāmeka eva pṛthag guṇān // BhP_07.04.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:11923: sa itthaṃ nirjitakakub ekarāḍ viṣayān priyān /

GP10bhp1-12u:11935: mā bhaiṣṭa vibudhaśreṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhadramastu vaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:11939: yadā deveṣu vedeṣu goṣu vipreṣu sādhuṣu /

GP10bhp1-12u:11943: BhP_07.04.029/0 śrīnārada uvāca ityuktā lokaguruṇā taṃ praṇamya divaukasaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:16085: brahmā tāṃ raha āhūya samaprākṣīc ca sāntvayan /
GP10bhp1-12u:16088: buddhyā gambhīrayā yena putreṇāpoḍurāṇ mudam // BhP_09.14.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16089: tataḥ purūravā jajñe ilāyāṃ ya udāhṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16095: dhṛtiṃ viṣṭabhya lalanā upatasthe tadantike // BhP_09.14.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16097: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā devīṃ hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ // BhP_09.14.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16098: BhP_09.14.019/0 śrīrājovāca svāgataṃ te varārohe āsyatāṃ karavāma kim /
GP10bhp1-12u:16099: saṃramasva mayā sākaṃ ratirnau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // BhP_09.14.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16100: BhP_09.14.020/0 urvaśyuvāca kasyāstvayi na sajjeta mano dṛṣṭiśca sundara /
GP10bhp1-12u:16102: etāv uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada /
GP10bhp1-12u:16103: saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākaṃ ślāghyaḥ strīṇāṃ varaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhP_09.14.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16104: ghṛtaṃ me vīra bhakṣyaṃ syān nekṣe tvānyatra maithunāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:16105: vivāsasaṃ tat tatheti pratipede mahāmanāḥ // BhP_09.14.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16107: ko na seveta manujo devīṃ tvāṃ svayamāgatām // BhP_09.14.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16115: urvaśyā uraṇau jahrurnyastau rājani jāyayā // BhP_09.14.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16119: yaḥ śete niśi santrasto yathā nārī divā pumān // BhP_09.14.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16122: te visṛjyoraṇau tatra vyadyotanta sma vidyutaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16123: ādāya meṣāv āyāntaṃ nagnamaikṣata sā patim // BhP_09.14.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16125: taccitto vihvalaḥ śocan babhrāmonmattavan mahīm // BhP_09.14.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16126: sa tāṃ vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyāṃ ca tatsakhīḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16127: pañca prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ prāha sūktaṃ purūravāḥ // BhP_09.14.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16128: aho jāye tiṣṭha tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktumarhasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:16132: BhP_09.14.036/0 urvaśyuvāca mā mṛthāḥ puruṣo 'si tvaṃ mā sma tvādyurvṛkā ime /
GP10bhp1-12u:16133: kvāpi sakhyaṃ na vai strīṇāṃ vṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ yathā // BhP_09.14.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16139: raṃsyatyapatyāni ca te bhaviṣyantyaparāṇi bhoḥ // BhP_09.14.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16142: upalabhya mudā yuktaḥ samuvāsa tayā niśām /
GP10bhp1-12u:16146: urvaśīṃ manyamānastāṃ so 'budhyata caran vane // BhP_09.14.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16147: sthālīṃ nyasya vane gatvā gṛhān ādhyāyato niśi /
GP10bhp1-12u:16150: tena dve araṇī kṛtvā urvaśīlokakāmyayā // BhP_09.14.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16152: ātmānamubhayormadhye yat tat prajananaṃ prabhuḥ // BhP_09.14.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16154: trayyā sa vidyayā rājñā putratve kalpitastrivṛt // BhP_09.14.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16157: eka eva purā vedaḥ praṇavaḥ sarvavāṅmayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16158: devo nārāyaṇo nānya eko 'gnirvarṇa eva ca // BhP_09.14.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16160: agninā prajayā rājā lokaṃ gāndharvameyivān // BhP_09.14.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16161: BhP_09.15.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca ailasya corvaśīgarbhāt ṣaḍ āsannātmajā nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:16162: āyuḥ śrutāyuḥ satyāyū rayo 'tha vijayo jayaḥ // BhP_09.15.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16164: rayasya suta ekaśca jayasya tanayo 'mitaḥ // BhP_09.15.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16166: tasya jahnuḥ suto gaṅgāṃ gaṇḍūṣīkṛtya yo 'pibat /
GP10bhp1-12u:16173: sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ śulkaṃ kanyāyāḥ kuśikā vayam // BhP_09.15.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16175: ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām // BhP_09.15.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16176: sa ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā śvaśrvā cāpatyakāmyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16178: tāvat satyavatī mātrā svacaruṃ yācitā satī /
GP10bhp1-12u:16179: śreṣṭhaṃ matvā tayāyacchan mātre māturadat svayam // BhP_09.15.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16181: ghoro daṇḍadharaḥ putro bhrātā te brahmavittamaḥ // BhP_09.15.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16185: reṇoḥ sutāṃ reṇukāṃ vai jamadagniruvāha yām // BhP_09.15.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16187: yavīyān jajña eteṣāṃ rāma ityabhiviśrutaḥ // BhP_09.15.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16189: triḥsaptakṛtvo ya imāṃ cakre niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīm // BhP_09.15.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16192: BhP_09.15.016/0 śrīrājovāca kiṃ tadaṃho bhagavato rājanyairajitātmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16193: kṛtaṃ yena kulaṃ naṣṭaṃ kṣatriyāṇāmabhīkṣṇaśaḥ // BhP_09.15.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16201: vaijayantīṃ srajaṃ bibhradrurodha saritaṃ bhujaiḥ // BhP_09.15.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16203: nāmṛṣyat tasya tadvīryaṃ vīramānī daśānanaḥ // BhP_09.15.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16205: māhiṣmatyāṃ sanniruddho mukto yena kapiryathā // BhP_09.15.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16206: sa ekadā tu mṛgayāṃ vicaran vijane vane /
GP10bhp1-12u:16210: sa vai ratnaṃ tu taddṛṣṭvā ātmaiśvaryātiśāyanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16213: te ca māhiṣmatīṃ ninyuḥ savatsāṃ krandatīṃ balāt // BhP_09.15.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16214: atha rājani niryāte rāma āśrama āgataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16215: śrutvā tat tasya daurātmyaṃ cukrodhāhirivāhataḥ // BhP_09.15.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16217: anvadhāvata durmarṣo mṛgendra iva yūthapam // BhP_09.15.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16221: akṣauhiṇīḥ saptadaśātibhīṣaṇās tā rāma eko bhagavān asūdayat //
GP10bhp1-12u:16226: athārjunaḥ pañcaśateṣu bāhubhir dhanuḥṣu bāṇān yugapat sa sandadhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:16228: punaḥ svahastairacalān mṛdhe 'ṅghripān utkṣipya vegādabhidhāvato yudhi /
GP10bhp1-12u:16229: bhujān kuṭhāreṇa kaṭhoraneminā ciccheda rāmaḥ prasabhaṃ tv aheriva //
GP10bhp1-12u:16231: hate pitari tatputrā ayutaṃ dudruvurbhayāt // BhP_09.15.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16234: svakarma tat kṛtaṃ rāmaḥ pitre bhrātṛbhya eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:16237: avadhīn naradevaṃ yat sarvadevamayaṃ vṛthā // BhP_09.15.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16240: kṣamayā rocate lakṣmīrbrāhmī saurī yathā prabhā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16244: BhP_09.16.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca pitropaśikṣito rāmastatheti kurunandana /
GP10bhp1-12u:16249: homavelāṃ na sasmāra kiñcic citrarathaspṛhā // BhP_09.16.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16251: āgatya kalaśaṃ tasthau purodhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ // BhP_09.16.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16253: ghnataināṃ putrakāḥ pāpāmityuktāste na cakrire // BhP_09.16.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16254: rāmaḥ sañcoditaḥ pitrā bhrāt-n mātrā sahāvadhīt /
GP10bhp1-12u:16255: prabhāvajño muneḥ samyak samādhestapasaśca saḥ // BhP_09.16.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16257: vavre hatānāṃ rāmo 'pi jīvitaṃ cāsmṛtiṃ vadhe // BhP_09.16.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16261: rāmavīryaparābhūtā lebhire śarma na kvacit // BhP_09.16.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16267: prasahya śira utkṛtya ninyuste kṣatrabandhavaḥ // BhP_09.16.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16269: rāma rāmeti tāteti vicukrośoccakaiḥ satī // BhP_09.16.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16273: hā tāta sādho dharmiṣṭha tyaktvāsmān svargato bhavān // BhP_09.16.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16275: pragṛhya paraśuṃ rāmaḥ kṣatrāntāya mano dadhe // BhP_09.16.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16277: teṣāṃ sa śīrṣabhī rājan madhye cakre mahāgirim // BhP_09.16.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16281: samantapañcake cakre śoṇitodān hradān nava // BhP_09.16.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16282: pituḥ kāyena sandhāya śira ādāya barhiṣi /
GP10bhp1-12u:16284: dadau prācīṃ diśaṃ hotre brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16285: adhvaryave pratīcīṃ vai udgātre uttarāṃ diśam // BhP_09.16.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16289: sarasvatyāṃ mahānadyāṃ reje vyabbhra ivāṃśumān // BhP_09.16.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16291: ṛṣīṇāṃ maṇḍale so 'bhūt saptamo rāmapūjitaḥ // BhP_09.16.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16293: āgāminyantare rājan vartayiṣyati vai bṛhat // BhP_09.16.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16297: avatīrya paraṃ bhāraṃ bhuvo 'han bahuśo nṛpān // BhP_09.16.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16299: tapasā kṣātramutsṛjya yo lebhe brahmavarcasam // BhP_09.16.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16301: madhyamastu madhucchandā madhucchandasa eva te // BhP_09.16.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16302: putraṃ kṛtvā śunaḥśephaṃ devarātaṃ ca bhārgavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16303: ājīgartaṃ sutān āha jyeṣṭha eṣa prakalpyatām // BhP_09.16.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16304: yo vai hariścandramakhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16305: stutvā devān prajeśādīn mumuce pāśabandhanāt // BhP_09.16.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16307: devarāta iti khyātaḥ śunaḥśephastu bhārgavaḥ // BhP_09.16.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16308: ye madhucchandaso jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalaṃ menire na tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:16309: aśapat tān muniḥ kruddho mlecchā bhavata durjanāḥ // BhP_09.16.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16310: sa hovāca madhucchandāḥ sārdhaṃ pañcāśatā tataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16311: yan no bhavān sañjānīte tasmiṃstiṣṭhāmahe vayam // BhP_09.16.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16312: jyeṣṭhaṃ mantradṛśaṃ cakrustvāmanvañco vayaṃ sma hi /
GP10bhp1-12u:16314: ye mānaṃ me 'nugṛhṇanto vīravantamakarta mām // BhP_09.16.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16319: BhP_09.17.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca yaḥ purūravasaḥ putra āyustasyābhavan sutāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16320: nahuṣaḥ kṣatravṛddhaśca rajī rābhaśca vīryavān // BhP_09.17.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16324: śunakaḥ śaunako yasya bahvṛcapravaro muniḥ // BhP_09.17.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16328: tatputraḥ ketumān asya jajñe bhīmarathastataḥ // BhP_09.17.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16333: nālarkādaparo rājan bubhuje medinīṃ yuvā // BhP_09.17.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16342: tataḥ śāntarajo jajñe kṛtakṛtyaḥ sa ātmavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:16345: indrastasmai punardattvā gṛhītvā caraṇau rajeḥ // BhP_09.17.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16347: pitaryuparate putrā yācamānāya no daduḥ // BhP_09.17.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16349: guruṇā hūyamāne 'gnau balabhit tanayān rajeḥ // BhP_09.17.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16351: kuśāt pratiḥ kṣātravṛddhāt sañjayastatsuto jayaḥ // BhP_09.17.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16352: tataḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtasyāpi jajñe haryabalo nṛpaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16355: kṣatravṛddhānvayā bhūpā ime śṛṇv atha nāhuṣān // BhP_09.17.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16356: BhP_09.18.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca yatiryayātiḥ saṃyātirāyatirviyatiḥ kṛtiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16359: yatra praviṣṭaḥ puruṣa ātmānaṃ nāvabudhyate // BhP_09.18.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16364: BhP_09.18.005/0 śrīrājovāca brahmarṣirbhagavān kāvyaḥ kṣatrabandhuśca nāhuṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16366: BhP_09.18.006/0 śrīśuka uvāca ekadā dānavendrasya śarmiṣṭhā nāma kanyakā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16371: tīre nyasya dukūlāni vijahruḥ siñcatīrmithaḥ // BhP_09.18.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16372: vīkṣya vrajantaṃ giriśaṃ saha devyā vṛṣasthitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16378: yairidaṃ tapasā sṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ puṃsaḥ parasya ye /
GP10bhp1-12u:16379: dhāryate yairiha jyotiḥ śivaḥ panthāḥ pradarśitaḥ // BhP_09.18.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16381: bhagavān api viśvātmā pāvanaḥ śrīniketanaḥ // BhP_09.18.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16382: vayaṃ tatrāpi bhṛgavaḥ śiṣyo 'syā naḥ pitāsuraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16387: kiṃ na pratīkṣase 'smākaṃ gṛhān balibhujo yathā // BhP_09.18.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16389: śarmiṣṭhā prākṣipat kūpe vāsaścādāya manyunā // BhP_09.18.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16391: prāpto yadṛcchayā kūpe jalārthī tāṃ dadarśa ha // BhP_09.18.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16395: rājaṃstvayā gṛhīto me pāṇiḥ parapurañjaya // BhP_09.18.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16397: eṣa īśakṛto vīra sambandho nau na pauruṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16398: yadidaṃ kūpamagnāyā bhavato darśanaṃ mama // BhP_09.18.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16399: na brāhmaṇo me bhavitā hastagrāho mahābhuja /
GP10bhp1-12u:16402: manastu tadgataṃ buddhvā pratijagrāha tadvacaḥ // BhP_09.18.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16403: gate rājani sā dhīre tatra sma rudatī pituḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16404: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvamuktaṃ śarmiṣṭhayā kṛtam // BhP_09.18.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16406: stuvan vṛttiṃ ca kāpotīṃ duhitrā sa yayau purāt // BhP_09.18.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16408: guruṃ prasādayan mūrdhnā pādayoḥ patitaḥ pathi // BhP_09.18.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16410: kāmo 'syāḥ kriyatāṃ rājan naināṃ tyaktumihotsahe // BhP_09.18.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16412: pitrā dattā yato yāsye sānugā yātu māmanu // BhP_09.18.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16413: pitrā dattā devayānyai śarmiṣṭhā sānugā tadā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16414: svānāṃ tat saṅkaṭaṃ vīkṣya tadarthasya ca gauravam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16417: tamāha rājan charmiṣṭhāmādhāstalpe na karhicit // BhP_09.18.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16419: tameva vavre rahasi sakhyāḥ patimṛtau satī // BhP_09.18.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16422: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata /
GP10bhp1-12u:16423: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // BhP_09.18.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16429: tvāṃ jarā viśatāṃ manda virūpakaraṇī nṛṇām // BhP_09.18.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16430: BhP_09.18.037/0 śrīyayātiruvāca atṛpto 'smyadya kāmānāṃ brahman duhitari sma te /
GP10bhp1-12u:16433: yado tāta pratīcchemāṃ jarāṃ dehi nijaṃ vayaḥ // BhP_09.18.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16434: mātāmahakṛtāṃ vatsa na tṛpto viṣayeṣv aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:16435: vayasā bhavadīyena raṃsye katipayāḥ samāḥ // BhP_09.18.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16436: BhP_09.18.040/0 śrīyaduruvāca notsahe jarasā sthātumantarā prāptayā tava /
GP10bhp1-12u:16437: aviditvā sukhaṃ grāmyaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ naiti pūruṣaḥ // BhP_09.18.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16442: BhP_09.18.043/0 śrīpūruruvāca ko nu loke manuṣyendra piturātmakṛtaḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:16443: pratikartuṃ kṣamo yasya prasādādvindate param // BhP_09.18.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16446: iti pramuditaḥ pūruḥ pratyagṛhṇāj jarāṃ pituḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16447: so 'pi tadvayasā kāmān yathāvaj jujuṣe nṛpa // BhP_09.18.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16451: preyasaḥ paramāṃ prītimuvāha preyasī rahaḥ // BhP_09.18.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16460: BhP_09.19.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca sa itthamācaran kāmān straiṇo 'pahnavamātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16468: sottīrya kūpāt suśroṇī tameva cakame kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:16469: tayā vṛtaṃ samudvīkṣya bahvyo 'jāḥ kāntakāminīḥ // BhP_09.19.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16480: lambantaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bhūyaḥ sandadhe 'rthāya yogavit // BhP_09.19.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16482: kālaṃ bahutithaṃ bhadre kāmairnādyāpi tuṣyati // BhP_09.19.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16485: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16486: na duhyanti manaḥprītiṃ puṃsaḥ kāmahatasya te // BhP_09.19.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16489: yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣv amaṅgalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16490: samadṛṣṭestadā puṃsaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ // BhP_09.19.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16491: yā dustyajā durmatibhirjīryato yā na jīryate /
GP10bhp1-12u:16492: tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ duḥkhanivahāṃ śarmakāmo drutaṃ tyajet // BhP_09.19.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16493: mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā nāviviktāsano bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:16500: saṃsṛtiṃ cātmanāśaṃ ca tatra vidvān sa ātmadṛk // BhP_09.19.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16501: ityuktvā nāhuṣo jāyāṃ tadīyaṃ pūrave vayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16506: abhiṣicyāgrajāṃstasya vaśe sthāpya vanaṃ yayau // BhP_09.19.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16508: kṣaṇena mumuce nīḍaṃ jātapakṣa iva dvijaḥ // BhP_09.19.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16510: pare 'male brahmaṇi vāsudeve lebhe gatiṃ bhāgavatīṃ pratītaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:16516: kṛṣṇe manaḥ samāveśya vyadhunol liṅgamātmanaḥ // BhP_09.19.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16519: BhP_09.20.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca pūrorvaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatra jāto 'si bhārata /
GP10bhp1-12u:16520: yatra rājarṣayo vaṃśyā brahmavaṃśyāśca jajñire // BhP_09.20.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16536: babhāṣe tāṃ varārohāṃ bhaṭaiḥ katipayairvṛtaḥ // BhP_09.20.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16538: papraccha kāmasantaptaḥ prahasañ ślakṣṇayā girā // BhP_09.20.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16540: kiṃ svic cikīrṣitaṃ tatra bhavatyā nirjane vane // BhP_09.20.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16542: na hi cetaḥ pauravāṇāmadharme ramate kvacit // BhP_09.20.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16543: BhP_09.20.013/0 śrīśakuntalovāca viśvāmitrātmajaivāhaṃ tyaktā menakayā vane /
GP10bhp1-12u:16544: vedaitadbhagavān kaṇvo vīra kiṃ karavāma te // BhP_09.20.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16546: bhujyatāṃ santi nīvārā uṣyatāṃ yadi rocate // BhP_09.20.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16547: BhP_09.20.015/0 śrīduṣmanta uvāca upapannamidaṃ subhru jātāyāḥ kuśikānvaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:16548: svayaṃ hi vṛṇute rājñāṃ kanyakāḥ sadṛśaṃ varam // BhP_09.20.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16552: śvobhūte svapuraṃ yātaḥ kālenāsūta sā sutam // BhP_09.20.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16553: kaṇvaḥ kumārasya vane cakre samucitāḥ kriyāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16554: baddhvā mṛgendraṃ tarasā krīḍati sma sa bālakaḥ // BhP_09.20.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16557: yadā na jagṛhe rājā bhāryāputrāv aninditau /
GP10bhp1-12u:16558: śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ khe vāg āhāśarīriṇī // BhP_09.20.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16559: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16560: bharasva putraṃ duṣmanta māvamaṃsthāḥ śakuntalām // BhP_09.20.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16562: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyamāha śakuntalā // BhP_09.20.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16564: mahimā gīyate tasya hareraṃśabhuvo bhuvi // BhP_09.20.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16568: māmateyaṃ purodhāya yamunāmanu ca prabhuḥ // BhP_09.20.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16571: sahasraṃ badvaśo yasmin brāhmaṇā gā vibhejire // BhP_09.20.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16575: adāt karmaṇi maṣṇāre niyutāni caturdaśa // BhP_09.20.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16576: bharatasya mahat karma na pūrve nāpare nṛpāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16577: naivāpurnaiva prāpsyanti bāhubhyāṃ tridivaṃ yathā // BhP_09.20.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16578: kirātahūṇān yavanān pauṇḍrān kaṅkān khaśān chakān /
GP10bhp1-12u:16580: jitvā purāsurā devān ye rasaukāṃsi bhejire /
GP10bhp1-12u:16581: devastriyo rasāṃ nītāḥ prāṇibhiḥ punarāharat // BhP_09.20.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16582: sarvān kāmān duduhatuḥ prajānāṃ tasya rodasī /
GP10bhp1-12u:16585: cakraṃ cāskhalitaṃ prāṇān mṛṣetyupararāma ha // BhP_09.20.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16588: tasyaivaṃ vitathe vaṃśe tadarthaṃ yajataḥ sutam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16591: pravṛtto vārito garbhaṃ śaptvā vīryamupāsṛjat // BhP_09.20.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16593: nāmanirvācanaṃ tasya ślokamenaṃ surā jaguḥ // BhP_09.20.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16594: mūḍhe bhara dvājamimaṃ bhara dvājaṃ bṛhaspate /
GP10bhp1-12u:16595: yātau yaduktvā pitarau bharadvājastatastv ayam // BhP_09.20.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16598: BhP_09.21.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca vitathasya sutān manyorbṛhatkṣatro jayastataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16599: mahāvīryo naro gargaḥ saṅkṛtistu narātmajaḥ // BhP_09.21.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16601: rantidevasya mahimā ihāmutra ca gīyate // BhP_09.21.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16609: hariṃ sarvatra sampaśyan sa bhuktvā prayayau dvijaḥ // BhP_09.21.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16611: vibhaktaṃ vyabhajat tasmai vṛṣalāya hariṃ smaran // BhP_09.21.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16613: rājan me dīyatāmannaṃ sagaṇāya bubhukṣate // BhP_09.21.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16615: tac ca dattvā namaścakre śvabhyaḥ śvapataye vibhuḥ // BhP_09.21.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16618: tasya tāṃ karuṇāṃ vācaṃ niśamya vipulaśramām /
GP10bhp1-12u:16620: na kāmaye 'haṃ gatimīśvarāt parām aṣṭarddhiyuktāmapunarbhavaṃ vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16623: sarve nivṛttāḥ kṛpaṇasya jantor jijīviṣorjīvajalārpaṇān me //
GP10bhp1-12u:16628: sa vai tebhyo namaskṛtya niḥsaṅgo vigataspṛhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16629: vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktyā cakre manaḥ param // BhP_09.21.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16631: māyā guṇamayī rājan svapnavat pratyalīyata // BhP_09.21.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16635: duritakṣayo mahāvīryāt tasya trayyāruṇiḥ kaviḥ // BhP_09.21.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16639: ajamīḍhasya vaṃśyāḥ syuḥ priyamedhādayo dvijāḥ // BhP_09.21.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16643: rucirāśvo dṛḍhahanuḥ kāśyo vatsaśca tatsutāḥ // BhP_09.21.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16645: pārasya tanayo nīpastasya putraśataṃ tv abhūt // BhP_09.21.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16647: yogī sa gavi bhāryāyāṃ viṣvaksenamadhāt sutam // BhP_09.21.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16653: kṛtī hiraṇyanābhādyo yogaṃ prāpya jagau sma ṣaṭ // BhP_09.21.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16655: tasya kṣemyaḥ suvīro 'tha suvīrasya ripuñjayaḥ // BhP_09.21.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16661: bharmyāśvaḥ prāha putrā me pañcānāṃ rakṣaṇāya hi // BhP_09.21.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16665: ahalyā kanyakā yasyāṃ śatānandastu gautamāt // BhP_09.21.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16670: kṛpaḥ kumāraḥ kanyā ca droṇapatnyabhavat kṛpī // BhP_09.21.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16671: BhP_09.22.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca mitrāyuśca divodāsāc cyavanastatsuto nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:16673: tasya putraśataṃ teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣataḥ sutaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16685: anyasyāmapi bhāryāyāṃ śakale dve bṛhadrathāt // BhP_09.22.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16687: jīva jīveti krīḍantyā jarāsandho 'bhavat sutaḥ // BhP_09.22.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16695: pitṛrājyaṃ parityajya devāpistu vanaṃ gataḥ // BhP_09.22.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16697: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ yauvanameti saḥ // BhP_09.22.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16699: samā dvādaśa tadrājye na vavarṣa yadā vibhuḥ // BhP_09.22.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16704: vedavādātivādān vai tadā devo vavarṣa ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:16713: yasyāṃ parāśarāt sākṣādavatīrṇo hareḥ kalā // BhP_09.22.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16715: hitvā svaśiṣyān pailādīn bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ // BhP_09.22.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16716: mahyaṃ putrāya śāntāya paraṃ guhyamidaṃ jagau /
GP10bhp1-12u:16721: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpyajījanat // BhP_09.22.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16723: tatra duryodhano jyeṣṭho duḥśalā cāpi kanyakā // BhP_09.22.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16727: draupadyāṃ pañca pañcabhyaḥ putrāste pitaro 'bhavan // BhP_09.22.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16731: yudhiṣṭhirāt tu pauravyāṃ devako 'tha ghaṭotkacaḥ // BhP_09.22.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16733: sahadevāt suhotraṃ tu vijayāsūta pārvatī // BhP_09.22.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16740: tvaṃ ca kṛṣṇānubhāvena sajīvo mocito 'ntakāt // BhP_09.22.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16744: sarpān vai sarpayāgāgnau sa hoṣyati ruṣānvitaḥ // BhP_09.22.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16746: samantāt pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ jitvā yakṣyati cādhvaraiḥ // BhP_09.22.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16747: tasya putraḥ śatānīko yājñavalkyāt trayīṃ paṭhan /
GP10bhp1-12u:16751: gajāhvaye hṛte nadyā kauśāmbyāṃ sādhu vatsyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:16761: kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau /
GP10bhp1-12u:16762: atha māgadharājāno bhāvino ye vadāmi te // BhP_09.22.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16768: dyumatseno 'tha sumatiḥ subalo janitā tataḥ // BhP_09.22.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16771: BhP_09.23.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca anoḥ sabhānaraścakṣuḥ pareṣṇuśca trayaḥ sutāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16776: vṛṣādarbhaḥ sudhīraśca madraḥ kekaya ātmavān // BhP_09.23.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16778: tato homo 'tha sutapā baliḥ sutapaso 'bhavat // BhP_09.23.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16780: jajñire dīrghatamaso baleḥ kṣetre mahīkṣitaḥ // BhP_09.23.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16781: cakruḥ svanāmnā viṣayān ṣaḍ imān prācyakāṃśca te /
GP10bhp1-12u:16784: romapāda iti khyātastasmai daśarathaḥ sakhā // BhP_09.23.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16788: sa tu rājño 'napatyasya nirūpyeṣṭiṃ marutvate // BhP_09.23.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16800: dhṛtasya durmadastasmāt pracetāḥ prācetasaḥ śatam // BhP_09.23.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16808: yadorvaṃśaṃ naraḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // BhP_09.23.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16810: yadoḥ sahasrajit kroṣṭā nalo ripuriti śrutāḥ // BhP_09.23.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16813: dharmastu haihayasuto netraḥ kunteḥ pitā tataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16816: kṛtāgniḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛtaujā dhanakātmajāḥ // BhP_09.23.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16819: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16827: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭho vītihotro vṛṣṇiḥ putro madhoḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16828: tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīdvṛṣṇijyeṣṭhaṃ yataḥ kulam // BhP_09.23.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16830: yaduputrasya ca kroṣṭoḥ putro vṛjinavāṃstataḥ // BhP_09.23.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16836: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ pradhānānāṃ pṛthuśravasa ātmajaḥ // BhP_09.23.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16842: rathasthāṃ tāṃ nirīkṣyāha śaibyā patimamarṣitā // BhP_09.23.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16845: ahaṃ bandhyāsapatnī ca snuṣā me yujyate katham /
GP10bhp1-12u:16847: anvamodanta tadviśve devāḥ pitara eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:16848: śaibyā garbhamadhāt kāle kumāraṃ suṣuve śubham /
GP10bhp1-12u:16849: sa vidarbha iti prokta upayeme snuṣāṃ satīm // BhP_09.23.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16850: BhP_09.24.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca tasyāṃ vidarbho 'janayat putrau nāmnā kuśakrathau /
GP10bhp1-12u:16855: tato daśārho nāmnābhūt tasya vyomaḥ sutastataḥ // BhP_09.24.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16857: tato navarathaḥ putro jāto daśarathastataḥ // BhP_09.24.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16863: bhajamānasya nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇo dhṛṣṭireva ca // BhP_09.24.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16869: puruṣāḥ pañcaṣaṣṭiśca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi cāṣṭa ca // BhP_09.24.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16875: anamitrasuto yo 'nyaḥ śinistasya ca satyakaḥ // BhP_09.24.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16879: akrūrapramukhā āsan putrā dvādaśa viśrutāḥ // BhP_09.24.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16883: teṣāṃ svasā sucārākhyā dvāv akrūrasutāv api // BhP_09.24.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16888: kapotaromā tasyānuḥ sakhā yasya ca tumburuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16893: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan dhṛtadevādayo nṛpa // BhP_09.24.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16895: sahadevā devakī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ // BhP_09.24.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16896: kaṃsaḥ sunāmā nyagrodhaḥ kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuḥ suhūstathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16901: śinistasmāt svayaṃ bhojo hṛdikastatsuto mataḥ // BhP_09.24.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16903: devamīḍhasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patnyabhūt // BhP_09.24.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16904: tasyāṃ sa janayāmāsa daśa putrān akalmaṣān /
GP10bhp1-12u:16906: sṛñjayaṃ śyāmakaṃ kaṅkaṃ śamīkaṃ vatsakaṃ vṛkam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16909: pṛthā ca śrutadevā ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // BhP_09.24.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16911: kunteḥ sakhyuḥ pitā śūro hyaputrasya pṛthāmadāt // BhP_09.24.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16915: pratyayārthaṃ prayuktā me yāhi deva kṣamasva me // BhP_09.24.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16917: yoniryathā na duṣyeta kartāhaṃ te sumadhyame // BhP_09.24.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16918: iti tasyāṃ sa ādhāya garbhaṃ sūryo divaṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16919: sadyaḥ kumāraḥ sañjajñe dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // BhP_09.24.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16920: taṃ sātyajan nadītoye kṛcchrāl lokasya bibhyatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:16931: bakaḥ kaṅkāt tu kaṅkāyāṃ satyajit purujit tathā // BhP_09.24.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16937: ānakaḥ karṇikāyāṃ vai ṛtadhāmājayāv api // BhP_09.24.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16938: pauravī rohiṇī bhadrā madirā rocanā ilā /
GP10bhp1-12u:16940: balaṃ gadaṃ sāraṇaṃ ca durmadaṃ vipulaṃ dhruvam /
GP10bhp1-12u:16942: subhadro bhadrabāhuśca durmado bhadra eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:16945: kauśalyā keśinaṃ tv ekamasūta kulanandanam // BhP_09.24.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16953: vasudevaḥ sutān aṣṭāv ādadhe sahadevayā // BhP_09.24.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16959: subhadrā ca mahābhāgā tava rājan pitāmahī // BhP_09.24.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16960: yadā yadā hi dharmasya kṣayo vṛddhiśca pāpmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16961: tadā tu bhagavān īśa ātmānaṃ sṛjate hariḥ // BhP_09.24.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16962: na hyasya janmano hetuḥ karmaṇo vā mahīpate /
GP10bhp1-12u:16979: nityotsavaṃ na tatṛpurdṛśibhiḥ pibantyo nāryo narāśca muditāḥ kupitā nimeśca // BhP_09.24.065
GP10bhp1-12u:16980: jāto gataḥ pitṛgṛhādvrajamedhitārtho hatvā ripūn sutaśatāni kṛtorudāraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16981: utpādya teṣu puruṣaḥ kratubhiḥ samīje ātmānamātmanigamaṃ prathayan janeṣu // BhP_09.24.066
GP10bhp1-12u:16982: pṛthvyāḥ sa vai gurubharaṃ kṣapayan kurūṇāmantaḥsamutthakalinā yudhi bhūpacamvaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:16983: dṛṣṭyā vidhūya vijaye jayamudvighoṣya procyoddhavāya ca paraṃ samagāt svadhāma // BhP_09.24.067
GP10bhp1-12u:16988: tatrāṃśenāvatīrṇasya viṣṇor vīryāṇi śaṃsa naḥ // BhP_10.01.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16990: kṛtavān yāni viśvātmā tāni no vada vistarāt // BhP_10.01.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:16992: ka uttamaśloka-guṇānuvādāt pumān virajyeta vinā paśughnāt // BhP_10.01.004
GP10bhp1-12u:16994: duratyayaṃ kaurava-sainya-sāgaraṃ kṛtvātaran vatsa-padaṃ sma yat-plavāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:16996: jugopa kukṣiṃ gata ātta-cakro mātuś ca me yaḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāyāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:16998: prayacchato mṛtyum utāmṛtaṃ ca māyā-manuṣyasya vadasva vidvan //
GP10bhp1-12u:16999: rohiṇyās tanayaḥ prokto rāmaḥ saṅkarṣaṇas tvayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:17000: devakyā garbha-sambandhaḥ kuto dehāntaraṃ vinā // BhP_10.01.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:17001: kasmān mukundo bhagavān pitur gehād vrajaṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:17002: kva vāsaṃ jñātibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ // BhP_10.01.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:17003: vraje vasan kim akaron madhupuryāṃ ca keśavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:17004: bhrātaraṃ cāvadhīt kaṃsaṃ mātur addhātad-arhaṇam // BhP_10.01.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:17005: dehaṃ mānuṣam āśritya kati varṣāṇi vṛṣṇibhiḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:17299: tṛtīye 'smin bhave 'haṃ vai tenaiva vapuṣātha vām /

GP10bhp1-12u:19040: prāṇair arthair dhiyā vācā śreya-ācaraṇaṃ sadā // BhP_10.22.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:19042: tarūṇāṃ namra-śākhānāṃ madhyato yamunāṃ gataḥ // BhP_10.22.036 //

GP10bhp1-12u:19067: taṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣād bhagavantam adhokṣajam /

GP10bhp1-12u:19069: na te yad om iti procur na neti ca parantapa /

GP10bhp1-12u:21482: varaiḥ pralobhitasyāpi na kāmair vihatā yataḥ // BhP_10.51.058 //

GP10bhp1-12u:21493: BhP_10.52.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca itthaṃ so 'nagrahīto 'nga kṛṣṇenekṣvāku nandanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:21494: taṃ parikramya sannamya niścakrāma guhā-mukhāt // BhP_10.52.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21496: matvā kali-yugaṃ prāptaṃ jagāma diśam uttarām // BhP_10.52.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21498: samādhāya manaḥ kṛṣṇe prāviśad gandhamādanam // BhP_10.52.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21502: hatvā mleccha-balaṃ ninye tadīyaṃ dvārakāṃ dhanam // BhP_10.52.005 //

GP10bhp1-12u:21509: palāyamānau tau dṛṣṭvā māgadhaḥ prahasan balī /
GP10bhp1-12u:21511: pradrutya dūraṃ saṃśrāntau tuṅgam āruhatāṃ girim /
GP10bhp1-12u:21512: pravarṣaṇākhyaṃ bhagavān nityadā yatra varṣati // BhP_10.52.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21513: girau nilīnāv ājñāya nādhigamya padaṃ nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:21514: dadāha girim edhobhiḥ samantād agnim utsṛjan // BhP_10.52.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21516: daśaika-yojanāt tuṅgān nipetatur adho bhuvi // BhP_10.52.012 //

GP10bhp1-12u:21526: paśyatāṃ sarva-lokānāṃ tārkṣya-putraḥ sudhām iva // BhP_10.52.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21529: rākṣasena vidhānena upayema iti śrutam // BhP_10.52.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21531: yathā māgadha-śālvādīn jitvā kanyām upāharat // BhP_10.52.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21533: ko nu tṛpyeta śṛṇvānaḥ śruta-jño nitya-nūtanāḥ // BhP_10.52.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21534: BhP_10.52.021/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca rājāsīd bhīṣmako nāma vidarbhādhipatir mahān /
GP10bhp1-12u:21535: tasya pancābhavan putrāḥ kanyaikā ca varānanā // BhP_10.52.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21537: rukmakeśo rukmamālī rukmiṇy eṣā svasā satī // BhP_10.52.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21539: gṛhāgatair gīyamānās taṃ mene sadṛśaṃ patim // BhP_10.52.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21541: kṛṣṇaś ca sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ samudvoḍhuṃ mano dadhe // BhP_10.52.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21542: bandhūnām icchatāṃ dātuṃ kṛṣṇāya bhaginīṃ nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:21543: tato nivārya kṛṣṇa-dviḍ rukmī caidyam amanyata // BhP_10.52.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21545: vicintyāptaṃ dvijaṃ kañcit kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇod drutam // BhP_10.52.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:21547: apaśyad ādyaṃ puruṣam āsīnaṃ kāñcanāsane // BhP_10.52.027 //

GP10bhp1-12u:22835: kiṃ nas tat-kathayā gopyaḥ kathāḥ kathayatāparāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:22838: gatiṃ prema-pariṣvaṅgaṃ smarantyo ruruduḥ striyaḥ // BhP_10.65.015 //

GP10bhp1-12u:22863: uvāca cakitā vācaṃ patitā pādayor nṛpa // BhP_10.65.027 //

GP10bhp1-12u:22871: bhūṣaṇāni mahārhāṇi dadau kāntiḥ śubhāṃ srajam // BhP_10.65.031 //

GP10bhp1-12u:22882: iti prastobhito bālair mena ātmānam acyutam // BhP_10.66.002 //
