GP10bhp1-12u:23968: atas tvāṃ gadayā manda haniṣye vajra-kalpayā // BhP_10.78.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23969: tarhy ānṛṇyam upaimy ajña mitrāṇāṃ mitra-vatsalaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:23970: bandhu-rūpam ariṃ hatvā vyādhiṃ deha-caraṃ yathā // BhP_10.78.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23971: evaṃ rūkṣais tudan vākyaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ totrair iva dvipam /
GP10bhp1-12u:23972: gadayātāḍayan mūrdhni siṃha-vad vyanadac ca saḥ // BhP_10.78.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23974: kṛṣṇo 'pi tam ahan gurvyā kaumodakyā stanāntare // BhP_10.78.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23976: prasārya keśa-bāhv-aṅghrīn dharaṇyāṃ nyapatad vyasuḥ // BhP_10.78.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23977: tataḥ sūkṣmataraṃ jyotiḥ kṛṣṇam āviśad adbhutam /
GP10bhp1-12u:23978: paśyatāṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ yathā caidya-vadhe nṛpa // BhP_10.78.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23982: śiro jahāra rājendra sa-kirīṭaṃ sa-kuṇḍalam // BhP_10.78.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23983: evaṃ saubhaṃ ca śālvaṃ ca dantavakraṃ sahānujam /
GP10bhp1-12u:23984: hatvā durviṣahān anyair īḍitaḥ sura-mānavaiḥ // BhP_10.78.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23988: vṛtaś ca vṛṣṇi-pravarair viveśālaṅkṛtāṃ purīm // BhP_10.78.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23990: īyate paśu-dṛṣṭīnāṃ nirjito jayatīti saḥ // BhP_10.78.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23991: śrutvā yuddhodyamaṃ rāmaḥ kurūṇāṃ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:23996: viśālaṃ brahma-tīrthaṃ ca cakraṃ prācīṃ sarasvatīm // BhP_10.78.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:23997: yamunām anu yāny eva gaṅgām anu ca bhārata /
GP10bhp1-12u:23998: jagāma naimiṣaṃ yatra ṛṣayaḥ satram āsate // BhP_10.78.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24002: romaharṣaṇam āsīnaṃ maharṣeḥ śiṣyam aikṣata // BhP_10.78.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24004: adhyāsīnaṃ ca tān viprāṃś cukopodvīkṣya mādhavaḥ // BhP_10.78.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24005: yasmād asāv imān viprān adhyāste pratiloma-jaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24006: dharma-pālāṃs tathaivāsmān vadham arhati durmatiḥ // BhP_10.78.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24007: ṛṣer bhagavato bhūtvā śiṣyo 'dhītya bahūni ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:24010: na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasyevājitātmanaḥ // BhP_10.78.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24011: etad-artho hi loke 'sminn avatāro mayā kṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24012: vadhyā me dharma-dhvajinas te hi pātakino 'dhikāḥ // BhP_10.78.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24014: bhāvitvāt taṃ kuśāgreṇa kara-sthenāhanat prabhuḥ // BhP_10.78.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24016: ūcuḥ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ devam adharmas te kṛtaḥ prabho // BhP_10.78.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24018: āyuś cātmāklamaṃ tāvad yāvat satraṃ samāpyate // BhP_10.78.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24023: BhP_10.78.033/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca cariṣye vadha-nirveśaṃ lokānugraha-kāmyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24024: niyamaḥ prathame kalpe yāvān sa tu vidhīyatām // BhP_10.78.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24025: dīrgham āyur bataitasya sattvam indriyam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:24026: āśāsitaṃ yat tad brūte sādhaye yoga-māyayā // BhP_10.78.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24027: BhP_10.78.035/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ astrasya tava vīryasya mṛtyor asmākam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:24028: yathā bhaved vacaḥ satyaṃ tathā rāma vidhīyatām // BhP_10.78.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24029: BhP_10.78.036/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca ātmā vai putra utpanna iti vedānuśāsanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:24030: tasmād asya bhaved vaktā āyur-indriya-sattva-vān // BhP_10.78.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24031: kiṃ vaḥ kāmo muni-śreṣṭhā brūtāhaṃ karavāṇy atha /
GP10bhp1-12u:24032: ajānatas tv apacitiṃ yathā me cintyatāṃ budhāḥ // BhP_10.78.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24033: BhP_10.78.038/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ilvalasya suto ghoro balvalo nāma dānavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24034: sa dūṣayati naḥ satram etya parvaṇi parvaṇi // BhP_10.78.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24035: taṃ pāpaṃ jahi dāśārha tan naḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:24037: tataś ca bhārataṃ varṣaṃ parītya su-samāhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24039: BhP_10.79.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca tataḥ parvaṇy upāvṛtte pracaṇḍaḥ pāṃśu-varṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24040: bhīmo vāyur abhūd rājan pūya-gandhas tu sarvaśaḥ // BhP_10.79.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24046: halaṃ ca daitya-damanaṃ te tūrṇam upatasthatuḥ // BhP_10.79.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24048: mūṣalenāhanat kruddho mūrdhni brahma-druhaṃ balaḥ // BhP_10.79.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24050: muñcann ārta-svaraṃ śailo yathā vajra-hato 'ruṇaḥ // BhP_10.79.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24052: abhyaṣiñcan mahā-bhāgā vṛtra-ghnaṃ vibudhā yathā // BhP_10.79.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24054: rāmāya vāsasī divye divyāny ābharaṇāni ca // BhP_10.79.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24055: atha tair abhyanujñātaḥ kauśikīm etya brāhmaṇaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24056: snātvā sarovaram agād yataḥ sarayūr āsravat // BhP_10.79.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24058: snātvā santarpya devādīn jagāma pulahāśramam // BhP_10.79.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24059: gomatīṃ gaṇḍakīṃ snātvā vipāśāṃ śoṇa āplutaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24060: gayāṃ gatvā pitṝn iṣṭvā gaṅgā-sāgara-saṅgame // BhP_10.79.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24062: sapta-godāvarīṃ veṇāṃ pampāṃ bhīmarathīṃ tataḥ // BhP_10.79.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24063: skandaṃ dṛṣṭvā yayau rāmaḥ śrī-śailaṃ giriśālayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:24064: draviḍeṣu mahā-puṇyaṃ dṛṣṭvādriṃ veṅkaṭaṃ prabhuḥ // BhP_10.79.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24065: kāma-koṣṇīṃ purīṃ kāñcīṃ kāverīṃ ca sarid-varām /
GP10bhp1-12u:24066: śrī-rangākhyaṃ mahā-puṇyaṃ yatra sannihito hariḥ // BhP_10.79.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24067: ṛṣabhādriṃ hareḥ kṣetraṃ dakṣiṇāṃ mathurāṃ tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24070: kṛtamālāṃ tāmraparṇīṃ malayaṃ ca kulācalam // BhP_10.79.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24073: dakṣiṇaṃ tatra kanyākhyāṃ durgāṃ devīṃ dadarśa saḥ // BhP_10.79.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24075: viṣṇuḥ sannihito yatra snātvāsparśad gavāyutam // BhP_10.79.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24077: gokarṇākhyaṃ śiva-kṣetraṃ sānnidhyaṃ yatra dhūrjaṭeḥ // BhP_10.79.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24078: āryāṃ dvaipāyanīṃ dṛṣṭvā śūrpārakam agād balaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24079: tāpīṃ payoṣṇīṃ nirvindhyām upaspṛśyātha daṇḍakam // BhP_10.79.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24080: praviśya revām agamad yatra māhiṣmatī purī /
GP10bhp1-12u:24081: manu-tīrtham upaspṛśya prabhāsaṃ punar āgamat // BhP_10.79.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24083: sarva-rājanya-nidhanaṃ bhāraṃ mene hṛtaṃ bhuvaḥ // BhP_10.79.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24086: yudhiṣṭhiras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā yamau kṛṣṇārjunāv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:24087: abhivādyābhavaṃs tuṣṇīṃ kiṃ vivakṣur ihāgataḥ // BhP_10.79.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24089: maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi carantāv idam abravīt // BhP_10.79.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24090: yuvāṃ tulya-balau vīrau he rājan he vṛkodara /
GP10bhp1-12u:24091: ekaṃ prāṇādhikaṃ manye utaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam // BhP_10.79.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24093: na lakṣyate jayo 'nyo vā viramatv aphalo raṇaḥ // BhP_10.79.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24095: anusmarantāv anyonyaṃ duruktaṃ duṣkṛtāni ca // BhP_10.79.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24096: diṣṭaṃ tad anumanvāno rāmo dvāravatīṃ yayau /
GP10bhp1-12u:24098: taṃ punar naimiṣaṃ prāptam ṛṣayo 'yājayan mudā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24100: tebhyo viśuddhaṃ vijñānaṃ bhagavān vyatarad vibhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24101: yenaivātmany ado viśvam ātmānaṃ viśva-gaṃ viduḥ // BhP_10.79.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24103: reje sva-jyotsnayevenduḥ su-vāsāḥ suṣṭhv alaṅkṛtaḥ // BhP_10.79.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24107: sāyaṃ prātar anantasya viṣṇoḥ sa dayito bhavet // BhP_10.79.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24110: vīryāṇy ananta-vīryasya śrotum icchāmi he prabho // BhP_10.80.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24113: sā vāg yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tat-karma-karau manaś ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:24114: smared vasantaṃ sthira-jaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tat-puṇya-kathāḥ sa karṇaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:24115: śiras tu tasyobhaya-liṅgam ānamet tad eva yat paśyati tad dhi cakṣuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24116: aṅgāni viṣṇor atha taj-janānāṃ pādodakaṃ yāni bhajanti nityam //
GP10bhp1-12u:24117: BhP_10.80.005/0 sūta uvāca viṣṇu-rātena sampṛṣṭo bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24119: BhP_10.80.006/0 śrī-śuka uvāca kṛṣṇasyāsīt sakhā kaścid brāhmaṇo brahma-vittamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24122: tasya bhāryā ku-cailasya kṣut-kṣāmā ca tathā-vidhā // BhP_10.80.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24123: pati-vratā patiṃ prāha mlāyatā vadanena sā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24124: daridraṃ sīdamānā vai vepamānābhigamya ca // BhP_10.80.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24125: nanu brahman bhagavataḥ sakhā sākṣāc chriyaḥ patiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24126: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca bhagavān sātvatarṣabhaḥ // BhP_10.80.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24127: tam upaihi mahā-bhāga sādhūnāṃ ca parāyaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:24128: dāsyati draviṇaṃ bhūri sīdate te kuṭumbine // BhP_10.80.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24131: kiṃ nv artha-kāmān bhajato nāty-abhīṣṭān jagad-guruḥ // BhP_10.80.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24132: sa evaṃ bhāryayā vipro bahuśaḥ prārthito muhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24133: ayaṃ hi paramo lābha uttamaḥśloka-darśanam // BhP_10.80.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24134: iti sañcintya manasā gamanāya matiṃ dadhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:24135: apy asty upāyanaṃ kiñcid gṛhe kalyāṇi dīyatām // BhP_10.80.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24137: caila-khaṇḍena tān baddhvā bhartre prādād upāyanam // BhP_10.80.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24138: sa tān ādāya viprāgryaḥ prayayau dvārakāṃ kila /
GP10bhp1-12u:24139: kṛṣṇa-sandarśanaṃ mahyaṃ kathaṃ syād iti cintayan // BhP_10.80.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24140: trīṇi gulmāny atīyāya tisraḥ kakṣāś ca sa-dvijaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24143: viveśaikatamaṃ śrīmad brahmānandaṃ gato yathā // BhP_10.80.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24145: sahasotthāya cābhyetya dorbhyāṃ paryagrahīn mudā // BhP_10.80.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24147: prīto vyamuñcad ab-bindūn netrābhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ // BhP_10.80.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24153: arcitvāvedya tāmbūlaṃ gāṃ ca svāgatam abravīt // BhP_10.80.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24155: devī paryacarat sākṣāc cāmara-vyajanena vai // BhP_10.80.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24158: kim anena kṛtaṃ puṇyam avadhūtena bhikṣuṇā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24159: śriyā hīnena loke 'smin garhitenādhamena ca // BhP_10.80.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24161: paryaṅka-sthāṃ śriyaṃ hitvā pariṣvakto 'gra-jo yathā // BhP_10.80.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24162: kathayāṃ cakratur gāthāḥ pūrvā guru-kule satoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24163: ātmanor lalitā rājan karau gṛhya parasparam // BhP_10.80.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24164: BhP_10.80.028/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca api brahman guru-kulād bhavatā labdha-dakṣiṇāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:24165: samāvṛttena dharma-jña bhāryoḍhā sadṛśī na vā // BhP_10.80.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24166: prāyo gṛheṣu te cittam akāma-vihitaṃ tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:24167: naivāti-prīyase vidvan dhaneṣu viditaṃ hi me // BhP_10.80.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24169: tyajantaḥ prakṛtīr daivīr yathāhaṃ loka-saṅgraham // BhP_10.80.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24170: kaccid guru-kule vāsaṃ brahman smarasi nau yataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24171: dvijo vijñāya vijñeyaṃ tamasaḥ pāram aśnute // BhP_10.80.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24172: sa vai sat-karmaṇāṃ sākṣād dvijāter iha sambhavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24173: ādyo 'ṅga yatrāśramiṇāṃ yathāhaṃ jñāna-do guruḥ // BhP_10.80.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24175: ye mayā guruṇā vācā taranty añjo bhavārṇavam // BhP_10.80.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24178: api naḥ smaryate brahman vṛttaṃ nivasatāṃ gurau /
GP10bhp1-12u:24181: vāta-varṣam abhūt tīvraṃ niṣṭhurāḥ stanayitnavaḥ // BhP_10.80.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24182: sūryaś cāstaṃ gatas tāvat tamasā cāvṛtā diśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24183: nimnaṃ kūlaṃ jala-mayaṃ na prājñāyata kiñcana // BhP_10.80.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24184: vayaṃ bhṛśam tatra mahānilāmbubhir nihanyamānā mahur ambu-samplave /
GP10bhp1-12u:24186: etad viditvā udite ravau sāndīpanir guruḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24187: anveṣamāṇo naḥ śiṣyān ācāryo 'paśyad āturān // BhP_10.80.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24189: ātmā vai prāṇinām preṣṭhas tam anādṛtya mat-parāḥ // BhP_10.80.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24190: etad eva hi sac-chiṣyaiḥ kartavyaṃ guru-niṣkṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:24191: yad vai viśuddha-bhāvena sarvārthātmārpaṇaṃ gurau // BhP_10.80.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24192: tuṣṭo 'haṃ bho dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ satyāḥ santu manorathāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24193: chandāṃsy ayāta-yāmāni bhavantv iha paratra ca // BhP_10.80.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24195: guror anugraheṇaiva pumān pūrṇaḥ praśāntaye // BhP_10.80.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24196: BhP_10.80.044/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca kim asmābhir anirvṛttaṃ deva-deva jagad-guro /
GP10bhp1-12u:24197: bhavatā satya-kāmena yeṣāṃ vāso guror abhūt // BhP_10.80.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24198: yasya cchando-mayaṃ brahma deha āvapanaṃ vibho /
GP10bhp1-12u:24200: BhP_10.81.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sa itthaṃ dvija-mukhyena saha saṅkathayan hariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24202: brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaṃ kṛṣṇo bhagavān prahasan priyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:24203: premṇā nirīkṣaṇenaiva prekṣan khalu satāṃ gatiḥ // BhP_10.81.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24204: BhP_10.81.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca kim upāyanam ānītaṃ brahman me bhavatā gṛhāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:24205: aṇv apy upāhṛtaṃ bhaktaiḥ premṇā bhury eva me bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:24206: bhūry apy abhaktopahṛtaṃ na me toṣāya kalpate // BhP_10.81.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24207: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati /
GP10bhp1-12u:24208: tad ahaṃ bhakty-upahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ // BhP_10.81.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24209: ity ukto 'pi dviyas tasmai vrīḍitaḥ pataye śriyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:24210: pṛthuka-prasṛtiṃ rājan na prāyacchad avāṅ-mukhaḥ // BhP_10.81.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24212: vijṅāyācintayan nāyaṃ śrī-kāmo mābhajat purā // BhP_10.81.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24214: prāpto mām asya dāsyāmi sampado 'martya-durlabhāḥ // BhP_10.81.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24216: svayaṃ jahāra kim idam iti pṛthuka-taṇḍulān // BhP_10.81.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24217: nanv etad upanītaṃ me parama-prīṇanaṃ sakhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:24218: tarpayanty aṅga māṃ viśvam ete pṛthuka-taṇḍulāḥ // BhP_10.81.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24219: iti muṣṭiṃ sakṛj jagdhvā dvitīyāṃ jagdhum ādade /
GP10bhp1-12u:24220: tāvac chrīr jagṛhe hastaṃ tat-parā parameṣṭhinaḥ // BhP_10.81.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:24222: asmin loke 'tha vāmuṣmin puṃsas tvat-toṣa-kāraṇam // BhP_10.81.011 //

GP10bhp1-12u:24998: sanandanam athānarcuḥ siddhā jñātvātmano gatim // BhP_10.87.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25002: dhārayaṃś cara gāṃ kāmaṃ kāmānāṃ bharjanaṃ nṛṇām // BhP_10.87.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25003: BhP_10.87.045/0 śrī-śuka uvāca evaṃ sa ṛṣiṇādiṣṭaṃ gṛhītvā śraddhayātmavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:25004: pūrṇaḥ śruta-dharo rājann āha vīra-vrato muniḥ // BhP_10.87.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25005: BhP_10.87.046/0 śrī-nārada uvāca namas tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāyāmala-kīrtaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:25006: yo dhatte sarva-bhūtānām abhavāyośatīḥ kalāḥ // BhP_10.87.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25007: ity ādyam ṛṣim ānamya tac-chiṣyāṃś ca mahātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25008: tato 'gād āśramaṃ sākṣāt pitur dvaipāyanasya me // BhP_10.87.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25010: tasmai tad varṇayām āsa nārāyaṇa-mukhāc chrutam // BhP_10.87.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25011: ity etad varṇitaṃ rājan yan naḥ praśnaḥ kṛtas tvayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25012: yathā brahmaṇy anirdeśye nīṛguṇe 'pi manaś caret // BhP_10.87.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25013: yo 'syotprekṣaka ādi-madhya-nidhane yo 'vyakta-jīveśvaro $ yaḥ sṛṣṭvedam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakre puraḥ śāsti tāḥ &
GP10bhp1-12u:25014: yaṃ sampadya jahāty ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyaṃ yathā % taṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:25015: kaivalya-nirasta-yonim abhayaṃ dhyāyed ajasraṃ harim // BhP_10.87.050 //*
GP10bhp1-12u:25018: prāyas te dhanino bhojā na tu lakṣmyāḥ patiṃ harim // BhP_10.88.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25019: etad veditum icchāmaḥ sandeho 'tra mahān hi naḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25020: viruddha-śīlayoḥ prabhvor viruddhā bhajatāṃ gatiḥ // BhP_10.88.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25021: BhP_10.88.003/0 śrī-śuka uvāca śivaḥ śakti-yutaḥ śaśvat tri-liṅgo guṇa-saṃvṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25022: vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tridhā // BhP_10.88.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25024: upadhāvan vibhūtīnāṃ sarvāsām aśnute gatim // BhP_10.88.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25025: harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25026: sa sarva-dṛg upadraṣṭā taṃ bhajan nirguṇo bhavet // BhP_10.88.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25028: śṛṇvan bhagavato dharmān apṛcchad idam acyutam // BhP_10.88.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25029: sa āha bhagavāṃs tasmai prītaḥ śuśrūṣave prabhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25030: nṛṇāṃ niḥśreyasārthāya yo 'vatīrṇo yadoḥ kule // BhP_10.88.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25031: BhP_10.88.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yasyāham anugṛhṇāmi hariṣye tad-dhanaṃ śanaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25032: tato 'dhanaṃ tyajanty asya svajanā duḥkha-duḥkhitam // BhP_10.88.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25033: sa yadā vitathodyogo nirviṇṇaḥ syād dhanehayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25035: tad brahma paramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ cin-mātraṃ sad anantakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:25037: ato māṃ su-durārādhyaṃ hitvānyān bhajate janaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25039: mattāḥ pramattā vara-dān vismayanty avajānate // BhP_10.88.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25042: sadyaḥ śāpa-prasādo 'ṅga śivo brahmā na cācyutaḥ // BhP_10.88.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25044: vṛkāsurāya giriśo varaṃ dattvāpa saṅkaṭam // BhP_10.88.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25045: vṛko nāmāsuraḥ putraḥ śakuneḥ pathi nāradam /
GP10bhp1-12u:25046: dṛṣṭvāśu-toṣaṃ papraccha deveṣu triṣu durmatiḥ // BhP_10.88.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25047: sa āha devaṃ giriśam upādhāvāśu siddhyasi /
GP10bhp1-12u:25048: yo 'lpābhyāṃ guṇa-doṣābhyām āśu tuṣyati kupyati // BhP_10.88.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25050: aiśvaryam atulaṃ dattvā tata āpa su-saṅkaṭam // BhP_10.88.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25051: ity ādiṣṭas tam asura upādhāvat sva-gātrataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25052: kedāra ātma-kravyeṇa juhvāno gni-mukhaṃ haram // BhP_10.88.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25055: tadā mahā-kāruṇiko sa dhūrjaṭir yathā vayaṃ cāgnir ivotthito 'nalāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:25056: nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ bhujayor nyavārayat tat-sparśanād bhūya upaskṛtākṛtiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:25057: tam āha cāṅgālam alaṃ vṛṇīṣva me yathābhikāmaṃ vitarāmi te varam /
GP10bhp1-12u:25058: prīyeya toyena nṛṇāṃ prapadyatām aho tvayātmā bhṛśam ardyate vṛthā //
GP10bhp1-12u:25059: devaṃ sa vavre pāpīyān varaṃ bhūta-bhayāvaham /
GP10bhp1-12u:25060: yasya yasya karaṃ śīrṣṇi dhāsye sa mriyatām iti // BhP_10.88.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25061: tac chrutvā bhagavān rudro durmanā iva bhārata /
GP10bhp1-12u:25062: oṃ iti prahasaṃs tasmai dade 'her amṛtaṃ yathā // BhP_10.88.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25064: sva-hastaṃ dhātum ārebhe so 'bibhyat sva-kṛtāc chivaḥ // BhP_10.88.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25066: yāvad antaṃ divo bhūmeḥ kaṣṭhānām udagād udak // BhP_10.88.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25068: tato vaikuṇṭham agamad bhāsvaraṃ tamasaḥ param // BhP_10.88.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25069: yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣān nyāsināṃ paramo gatiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25070: śāntānāṃ nyasta-daṇḍānāṃ yato nāvartate gataḥ // BhP_10.88.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25071: taṃ tathā vyasanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān vṛjinārdanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25072: dūrāt pratyudiyād bhūtvā baṭuko yoga-māyayā // BhP_10.88.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25074: abhivādayām āsa ca taṃ kuśa-pāṇir vinīta-vat // BhP_10.88.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25075: BhP_10.88.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca śākuneya bhavān vyaktaṃ śrāntaḥ kiṃ dūram āgataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25076: kṣaṇaṃ viśramyatāṃ puṃsa ātmāyaṃ sarva-kāma-dhuk // BhP_10.88.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25078: bhaṇyatāṃ prāyaśaḥ pumbhir dhṛtaiḥ svārthān samīhate // BhP_10.88.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25079: BhP_10.88.031/0 śrī-śuka uvāca evaṃ bhagavatā pṛṣṭo vacasāmṛta-varṣiṇā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25081: BhP_10.88.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca evaṃ cet tarhi tad-vākyaṃ na vayaṃ śraddadhīmahi /
GP10bhp1-12u:25082: yo dakṣa-śāpāt paiśācyaṃ prāptaḥ preta-piśāca-rāṭ // BhP_10.88.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25083: yadi vas tatra viśrambho dānavendra jagad-gurau /
GP10bhp1-12u:25084: tarhy aṅgāśu sva-śirasi hastaṃ nyasya pratīyatām // BhP_10.88.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25085: yady asatyaṃ vacaḥ śambhoḥ kathañcid dānavarṣabha /
GP10bhp1-12u:25086: tadainaṃ jahy asad-vācaṃ na yad vaktānṛtaṃ punaḥ // BhP_10.88.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25087: itthaṃ bhagavataś citrair vacobhiḥ sa su-peśalaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25088: bhinna-dhīr vismṛtaḥ śīrṣṇi sva-hastaṃ kumatir nyadhāt // BhP_10.88.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25094: aho deva mahā-deva pāpo 'yaṃ svena pāpmanā // BhP_10.88.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25095: hataḥ ko nu mahatsv īśa jantur vai kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25096: kṣemī syāt kim u viśveśe kṛtāgasko jagad-gurau // BhP_10.88.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25097: ya evam avyākṛta-śakty-udanvataḥ parasya sākṣāt paramātmano hareḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25098: giritra-mokṣaṃ kathayec chṛṇoti vā vimucyate saṃsṛtibhis tathāribhiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:25099: BhP_10.89.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sarasvatyās taṭe rājann ṛṣayaḥ satram āsata /
GP10bhp1-12u:25100: vitarkaḥ samabhūt teṣāṃ triṣv adhīśeṣu ko mahān // BhP_10.89.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25101: tasya jijñāsayā te vai bhṛguṃ brahma-sutaṃ nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:25102: taj-jñaptyai preṣayām āsuḥ so 'bhjagād brahmaṇaḥ sabhām // BhP_10.89.002
GP10bhp1-12u:25103: na tasmai prahvaṇaṃ stotraṃ cakre sattva-parīkṣayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25104: tasmai cukrodha bhagavān prajvalan svena tejasā // BhP_10.89.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25105: sa ātmany utthitam manyum ātmajāyātmanā prabhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25106: aśīśamad yathā vahniṃ sva-yonyā vāriṇātma-bhūḥ // BhP_10.89.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25107: tataḥ kailāsam agamat sa taṃ devo maheśvaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25108: parirabdhuṃ samārebha utthāya bhrātaraṃ mudā // BhP_10.89.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25109: naicchat tvam asy utpatha-ga iti devaś cukopa ha /
GP10bhp1-12u:25110: śūlam udyamya taṃ hantum ārebhe tigma-locanaḥ // BhP_10.89.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25111: patitvā pādayor devī sāntvayām āsa taṃ girā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25112: atho jagāma vaikuṇṭhaṃ yatra devo janārdanaḥ // BhP_10.89.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25113: śayānaṃ śriya utsaṅge padā vakṣasy atāḍayat /
GP10bhp1-12u:25114: tata utthāya bhagavān saha lakṣmyā satāṃ gatiḥ // BhP_10.89.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25116: āha te svāgataṃ brahman niṣīdātrāsane kṣaṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:25117: ajānatām āgatān vaḥ kṣantum arhatha naḥ prabho // BhP_10.89.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25118: punīhi saha-lokaṃ māṃ loka-pālāṃś ca mad-gatān /
GP10bhp1-12u:25121: vatsyaty urasi me bhūtir bhavat-pāda-hatāṃhasaḥ // BhP_10.89.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25122: BhP_10.89.012/0 śrī-śuka uvāca evaṃ bruvāṇe vaikuṇṭhe bhṛgus tan-mandrayā girā /
GP10bhp1-12u:25124: punaś ca satram āvrajya munīnāṃ brahma-vādinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:25125: svānubhūtam aśeṣeṇa rājan bhṛgur avarṇayat // BhP_10.89.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25127: bhūyāṃsaṃ śraddadhur viṣṇuṃ yataḥ śāntir yato 'bhayam // BhP_10.89.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25128: dharmaḥ sākṣād yato jñānaṃ vairāgyaṃ ca tad-anvitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:25129: aiśvaryaṃ cāṣṭadhā yasmād yaśaś cātma-malāpaham // BhP_10.89.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25131: akiñcanānāṃ sādhūnāṃ yam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim // BhP_10.89.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25132: sattvaṃ yasya priyā mūrtir brāhmaṇās tv iṣṭa-devatāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25133: bhajanty anāśiṣaḥ śāntā yaṃ vā nipuṇa-buddhayaḥ // BhP_10.89.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25135: guṇinyā māyayā sṛṣṭāḥ sattvaṃ tat tīrtha-sādhanam // BhP_10.89.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25136: BhP_10.89.019/0 śrī-śuka uvāca itthaṃ sārasvatā viprā nṛṇām saṃśaya-nuttaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:25137: puruṣasya padāmbhoja- sevayā tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ // BhP_10.89.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25138: BhP_10.89.020/0 śrī-sūta uvāca ity etan muni-tanayāsya-padma-gandha $ pīyūṣaṃ bhava-bhaya-bhit parasya puṃsaḥ &
GP10bhp1-12u:25141: BhP_10.89.021/0 śrī-śuka uvāca ekadā dvāravatyāṃ tu vipra-patnyāḥ kumārakaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25142: jāta-mātro bhuvaṃ spṛṣṭvā mamāra kila bhārata // BhP_10.89.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25143: vipro gṛhītvā mṛtakaṃ rāja-dvāry upadhāya saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25144: idaṃ provāca vilapann āturo dīna-mānasaḥ // BhP_10.89.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25146: kṣatra-bandhoḥ karma-doṣāt pañcatvaṃ me gato 'rbhakaḥ // BhP_10.89.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25148: prajā bhajantyaḥ sīdanti daridrā nitya-duḥkhitāḥ // BhP_10.89.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25149: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ viprarṣis tṛtīyaṃ tv evam eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:25150: visṛjya sa nṛpa-dvāri tāṃ gāthāṃ samagāyata // BhP_10.89.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25152: parete navame bāle brāhmaṇaṃ samabhāṣata // BhP_10.89.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25153: kiṃ svid brahmaṃs tvan-nivāse iha nāsti dhanur-dharaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25154: rājanya-bandhur ete vai brāhmaṇāḥ satram āsate // BhP_10.89.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25156: te vai rājanya-veṣeṇa naṭā jīvanty asum-bharāḥ // BhP_10.89.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25157: ahaṃ prajāḥ vāṃ bhagavan rakṣiṣye dīnayor iha /
GP10bhp1-12u:25159: BhP_10.89.030/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca saṅkarṣaṇo vāsudevaḥ pradyumno dhanvināṃ varaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25160: aniruddho 'prati-ratho na trātuṃ śaknuvanti yat // BhP_10.89.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25161: tat kathaṃ nu bhavān karma duṣkaraṃ jagad-īśvaraiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25162: tvaṃ cikīrṣasi bāliśyāt tan na śraddadhmahe vayam // BhP_10.89.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25163: BhP_10.89.032/0 śrī-arjuna uvāca nāhaṃ saṅkarṣaṇo brahman na kṛṣṇaḥ kārṣṇir eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:25164: ahaṃ vā arjuno nāma gāṇḍīvaṃ yasya vai dhanuḥ // BhP_10.89.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25166: mṛtyuṃ vijitya pradhane āneṣye te prajāḥ prabho // BhP_10.89.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25168: jagāma sva-gṛhaṃ prītaḥ pārtha-vīryaṃ niśāmayan // BhP_10.89.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25170: pāhi pāhi prajāṃ mṛtyor ity āhārjunam āturaḥ // BhP_10.89.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25171: sa upaspṛśya śucy ambho namaskṛtya maheśvaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:25172: divyāny astrāṇi saṃsmṛtya sajyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ādade // BhP_10.89.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25174: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaḥ pārthaś cakāra śara-pañjaram // BhP_10.89.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25175: tataḥ kumāraḥ sañjāto vipra-patnyā rudan muhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25178: mauḍhyaṃ paśyata me yo 'haṃ śraddadhe klība-katthanam // BhP_10.89.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25179: na pradyumno nāniruddho na rāmo na ca keśavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25180: yasya śekuḥ paritrātuṃ ko 'nyas tad-aviteśvaraḥ // BhP_10.89.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25181: dhig arjunaṃ mṛṣā-vādaṃ dhig ātma-ślāghino dhanuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25182: daivopasṛṣṭaṃ yo mauḍhyād āninīṣati durmatiḥ // BhP_10.89.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25183: evaṃ śapati viprarṣau vidyām āsthāya phālgunaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25184: yayau saṃyamanīm āśu yatrāste bhagavān yamaḥ // BhP_10.89.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25185: viprāpatyam acakṣāṇas tata aindrīm agāt purīm /
GP10bhp1-12u:25186: āgneyīṃ nairṛtīṃ saumyāṃ vāyavyāṃ vāruṇīm atha // BhP_10.89.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25189: agniṃ vivikṣuḥ kṛṣṇena pratyuktaḥ pratiṣedhatā // BhP_10.89.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25191: ye te naḥ kīrtiṃ vimalāṃ manuṣyāḥ sthāpayiṣyanti // BhP_10.89.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25193: divyaṃ sva-ratham āsthāya pratīcīṃ diśam āviśat // BhP_10.89.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25194: sapta dvīpān sa-sindhūṃś ca sapta sapta girīn atha /
GP10bhp1-12u:25195: lokālokaṃ tathātītya viveśa su-mahat tamaḥ // BhP_10.89.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:25200: tamaḥ su-ghoraṃ gahanaṃ kṛtaṃ mahad $ vidārayad bhūri-tareṇa rociṣā &
GP10bhp1-12u:25201: mano-javaṃ nirviviśe sudarśanaṃ % guṇa-cyuto rāma-śaro yathā camūḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:25202: dvāreṇa cakrānupathena tat tamaḥ paraṃ paraṃ jyotir ananta-pāram /
GP10bhp1-12u:25203: samaśnuvānaṃ prasamīkṣya phālgunaḥ pratāḍitākṣo pidadhe 'kṣiṇī ubhe //
GP10bhp1-12u:25217: vavanda ātmānam anantam acyuto jiṣṇuś ca tad-darśana-jāta-sādhvasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:25218: tāv āha bhūmā parameṣṭhināṃ prabhur beddhāñjalī sa-smitam ūrjayā girā //
GP10bhp1-12u:25219: dvijātmajā me yuvayor didṛkṣuṇā mayopanītā bhuvi dharma-guptaye /

GP10bhp1-12u:26012: tad vidvān na calen mārgād anvaśikṣaṃ kṣiter vratam // BhP_11.07.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26014: sādhuḥ śikṣeta bhū-bhṛtto naga-śiṣyaḥ parātmatām // BhP_11.07.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26016: jñānaṃ yathā na naśyeta nāvakīryeta vāṅ-manaḥ // BhP_11.07.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26020: guṇair na yujyate yogī gandhair vāyur ivātma-dṛk // BhP_11.07.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26022: vyāptyāvyavacchedam asaṅgam ātmano munir nabhastvaṃ vitatasya bhāvayet //
GP10bhp1-12u:26024: na spṛśyate nabhas tadvat kāla-sṛṣṭair guṇaiḥ pumān // BhP_11.07.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26025: svacchaḥ prakṛtitaḥ snigdho mādhuryas tīrtha-bhūr nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26026: muniḥ punāty apāṃ mitram īkṣopasparśa-kīrtanaiḥ // BhP_11.07.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26028: sarva-bhakṣyo 'pi yuktātmā nādatte malam agni-vat // BhP_11.07.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26029: kvacic channaḥ kvacit spaṣṭa upāsyaḥ śreya icchatām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26030: bhuṅkte sarvatra dātṛṇāṃ dahan prāg-uttarāśubham // BhP_11.07.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26032: praviṣṭa īyate tat-tat- svarūpo 'gnir ivaidhasi // BhP_11.07.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26036: nityāv api na dṛśyete ātmano 'gner yathārciṣām // BhP_11.07.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26038: na teṣu yujyate yogī gobhir gā iva go-patiḥ // BhP_11.07.050 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26039: budhyate sve na bhedena vyakti-stha iva tad-gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26041: nāti-snehaḥ prasaṅgo vā kartavyaḥ kvāpi kenacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:26042: kurvan vindeta santāpaṃ kapota iva dīna-dhīḥ // BhP_11.07.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26044: kapotyā bhāryayā sārdham uvāsa katicit samāḥ // BhP_11.07.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26046: dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭyāṅgam aṅgena buddhiṃ buddhyā babandhatuḥ // BhP_11.07.054 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26049: yaṃ yaṃ vāñchati sā rājan tarpayanty anukampitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26050: taṃ taṃ samanayat kāmaṃ kṛcchreṇāpy ajitendriyaḥ // BhP_11.07.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26051: kapotī prathamaṃ garbhaṃ gṛhṇantī kāla āgate /
GP10bhp1-12u:26052: aṇḍāni suṣuve nīḍe sta-patyuḥ sannidhau satī // BhP_11.07.057 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26056: śṛṇvantau kūjitaṃ tāsāṃ nirvṛtau kala-bhāṣitaiḥ // BhP_11.07.059 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26058: pratyudgamair adīnānāṃ pitarau mudam āpatuḥ // BhP_11.07.060 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26060: vimohitau dīna-dhiyau śiśūn pupuṣatuḥ prajāḥ // BhP_11.07.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26061: ekadā jagmatus tāsām annārthaṃ tau kuṭumbinau /
GP10bhp1-12u:26062: paritaḥ kānane tasminn arthinau ceratuś ciram // BhP_11.07.062 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26063: dṛṣṭvā tān lubdhakaḥ kaścid yadṛcchāto vane-caraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26064: jagṛhe jālam ātatya carataḥ svālayāntike // BhP_11.07.063 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26065: kapotaś ca kapotī ca prajā-poṣe sadotsukau /
GP10bhp1-12u:26066: gatau poṣaṇam ādāya sva-nīḍam upajagmatuḥ // BhP_11.07.064 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26068: tān abhyadhāvat krośantī krośato bhṛśa-duḥkhitā // BhP_11.07.065 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26070: svayaṃ cābadhyata śicā baddhān paśyanty apasmṛtiḥ // BhP_11.07.066 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26071: kapotaḥ svātmajān baddhān ātmano 'py adhikān priyān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26076: śūnye gṛhe māṃ santyajya putraiḥ svar yāti sādhubhiḥ // BhP_11.07.069 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26077: so 'haṃ śūnye gṛhe dīno mṛta-dāro mṛta-prajaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26078: jijīviṣe kim arthaṃ vā vidhuro duḥkha-jīvitaḥ // BhP_11.07.070 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26080: svayaṃ ca kṛpaṇaḥ śikṣu paśyann apy abudho 'patat // BhP_11.07.071 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26081: taṃ labdhvā lubdhakaḥ krūraḥ kapotaṃ gṛha-medhinam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26082: kapotakān kapotīṃ ca siddhārthaḥ prayayau gṛham // BhP_11.07.072 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26085: yaḥ prāpya mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ mukti-dvāram apāvṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26086: gṛheṣu khaga-vat saktas tam ārūḍha-cyutaṃ viduḥ // BhP_11.07.074 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26087: BhP_11.08.001/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca sukham aindriyakaṃ rājan svarge naraka eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26088: dehināṃ yad yathā duḥkhaṃ tasmān neccheta tad-budhaḥ // BhP_11.08.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26089: grāsaṃ su-mṛṣṭaṃ virasaṃ mahāntaṃ stokam eva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26092: yadi nopanayed grāso mahāhir iva diṣṭa-bhuk // BhP_11.08.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26094: śayāno vīta-nidraś ca nehetendriyavān api // BhP_11.08.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26096: ananta-pāro hy akṣobhyaḥ stimitoda ivārṇavaḥ // BhP_11.08.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26098: notsarpeta na śuṣyeta saridbhir iva sāgaraḥ // BhP_11.08.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26100: pralobhitaḥ pataty andhe tamasy agnau pataṅga-vat // BhP_11.08.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26102: pralobhitātmā hy upabhoga-buddhyā pataṅga-van naśyati naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26103: stokaṃ stokaṃ grased grāsaṃ deho varteta yāvatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26104: gṛhān ahiṃsann ātiṣṭhed vṛttiṃ mādhukarīṃ muniḥ // BhP_11.08.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26105: aṇubhyaś ca mahadbhyaś ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalo naraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26106: sarvataḥ sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpadaḥ // BhP_11.08.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26107: sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26109: sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣukaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26110: makṣikā iva saṅgṛhṇan saha tena vinaśyati // BhP_11.08.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26111: padāpi yuvatīṃ bhikṣur na spṛśed dāravīm api /
GP10bhp1-12u:26112: spṛśan karīva badhyeta kariṇyā aṅga-saṅgataḥ // BhP_11.08.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26113: nādhigacchet striyaṃ prājñaḥ karhicin mṛtyum ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26114: balādhikaiḥ sa hanyeta gajair anyair gajo yathā // BhP_11.08.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26115: na deyaṃ nopabhogyaṃ ca lubdhair yad duḥkha-sañcitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26116: bhuṅkte tad api tac cānyo madhu-hevārthavin madhu // BhP_11.08.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26118: madhu-hevāgrato bhuṅkte yatir vai gṛha-medhinām // BhP_11.08.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26119: grāmya-gītaṃ na śṛṇuyād yatir vana-caraḥ kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:26120: śikṣeta hariṇād baddhān mṛgayor gīta-mohitāt // BhP_11.08.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26122: āsāṃ krīḍanako vaśya ṛṣyaśṛṅgo mṛgī-sutaḥ // BhP_11.08.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26124: mṛtyum ṛcchaty asad-buddhir mīnas tu baḍiśair yathā // BhP_11.08.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26126: varjayitvā tu rasanaṃ tan nirannasya vardhate // BhP_11.08.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26127: tāvaj jitendriyo na syād vijitānyendriyaḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26128: na jayed rasanaṃ yāvaj jitaṃ sarvaṃ jite rase // BhP_11.08.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26130: tasyā me śikṣitaṃ kiñcin nibodha nṛpa-nandana // BhP_11.08.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26131: sā svairiṇy ekadā kāntaṃ saṅketa upaneṣyatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:26132: abhūt kāle bahir dvāre bibhratī rūpam uttamam // BhP_11.08.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26134: tān śulka-dān vittavataḥ kāntān mene 'rtha-kāmukī // BhP_11.08.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26136: apy anyo vittavān ko 'pi mām upaiṣyati bhūri-daḥ // BhP_11.08.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26137: evaṃ durāśayā dhvasta- nidrā dvāry avalambatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:26140: nirvedaḥ paramo jajñe cintā-hetuḥ sukhāvahaḥ // BhP_11.08.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26141: tasyā nirviṇṇa-cittāyā gītaṃ śṛṇu yathā mama /
GP10bhp1-12u:26142: nirveda āśā-pāśānāṃ puruṣasya yathā hy asiḥ // BhP_11.08.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26144: yathā vijñāna-rahito manujo mamatāṃ nṛpa // BhP_11.08.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26145: BhP_11.08.030/0 piṅgalovāca aho me moha-vitatiṃ paśyatāvijitātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26146: yā kāntād asataḥ kāmaṃ kāmaye yena bāliśā // BhP_11.08.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26147: santaṃ samīpe ramaṇaṃ rati-pradaṃ vitta-pradaṃ nityam imaṃ vihāya /
GP10bhp1-12u:26148: akāma-daṃ duḥkha-bhayādhi-śoka- moha-pradaṃ tuccham ahaṃ bhaje 'jñā //
GP10bhp1-12u:26150: straiṇān narād yārtha-tṛṣo 'nuśocyāt krītena vittaṃ ratim ātmanecchatī //
GP10bhp1-12u:26151: yad asthibhir nirmita-vaṃśa-vaṃsya- $ sthūṇaṃ tvacā roma-nakhaiḥ pinaddham
GP10bhp1-12u:26152: kṣaran-nava-dvāram agāram etad % viṇ-mūtra-pūrṇaṃ mad upaiti kānyā //
GP10bhp1-12u:26153: videhānāṃ pure hy asminn aham ekaiva mūḍha-dhīḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26154: yānyam icchanty asaty asmād ātma-dāt kāmam acyutāt // BhP_11.08.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26155: suhṛt preṣṭhatamo nātha ātmā cāyaṃ śarīriṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26156: taṃ vikrīyātmanaivāhaṃ rame 'nena yathā ramā // BhP_11.08.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26157: kiyat priyaṃ te vyabhajan kāmā ye kāma-dā narāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26158: ādy-antavanto bhāryāyā devā vā kāla-vidrutāḥ // BhP_11.08.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26159: nūnaṃ me bhagavān prīto viṣṇuḥ kenāpi karmaṇā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26160: nirvedo 'yaṃ durāśāyā yan me jātaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // BhP_11.08.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26162: yenānubandhaṃ nirhṛtya puruṣaḥ śamam ṛcchati // BhP_11.08.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26164: tyaktvā durāśāḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi tam adhīśvaram // BhP_11.08.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26166: viharāmy amunaivāham ātmanā ramaṇena vai // BhP_11.08.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26168: grastaṃ kālāhinātmānaṃ ko 'nyas trātum adhīśvaraḥ // BhP_11.08.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26169: ātmaiva hy ātmano goptā nirvidyeta yadākhilāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:26170: apramatta idaṃ paśyed grastaṃ kālāhinā jagat // BhP_11.08.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26171: BhP_11.08.043/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca evaṃ vyavasita-matir durāśāṃ kānta-tarṣa-jām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26172: chittvopaśamam āsthāya śayyām upaviveśa sā // BhP_11.08.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26173: āśā hi paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26174: yathā sañchidya kāntāśāṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa piṅgalā // BhP_11.08.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26175: BhP_11.09.001/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca parigraho hi duḥkhāya yad yat priyatamaṃ nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26176: anantaṃ sukham āpnoti tad vidvān yas tv akiñcanaḥ // BhP_11.09.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26178: tadāmiṣaṃ parityajya sa sukhaṃ samavindata // BhP_11.09.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26179: na me mānāpamānau sto na cintā geha-putriṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26181: dvāv eva cintayā muktau paramānanda āplutau /
GP10bhp1-12u:26182: yo vimugdho jaḍo bālo yo guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ gataḥ // BhP_11.09.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26183: kvacit kumārī tv ātmānaṃ vṛṇānān gṛham āgatān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26184: svayaṃ tān arhayām āsa kvāpi yāteṣu bandhuṣu // BhP_11.09.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26186: avaghnantyāḥ prakoṣṭha-sthāś cakruḥ śaṅkhāḥ svanaṃ mahat // BhP_11.09.006
GP10bhp1-12u:26187: sā taj jugupsitaṃ matvā mahatī vṛīḍitā tataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26188: babhañjaikaikaśaḥ śaṅkhān dvau dvau pāṇyor aśeṣayat // BhP_11.09.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26189: ubhayor apy abhūd ghoṣo hy avaghnantyāḥ sva-śaṅkhayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26190: tatrāpy ekaṃ nirabhidad ekasmān nābhavad dhvaniḥ // BhP_11.09.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26193: vāse bahūnāṃ kalaho bhaved vārtā dvayor api /
GP10bhp1-12u:26194: eka eva vaset tasmāt kumāryā iva kaṅkaṇaḥ // BhP_11.09.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26197: yasmin mano labdha-padaṃ yad etac chanaiḥ śanair muñcati karma-reṇūn /
GP10bhp1-12u:26198: sattvena vṛddhena rajas tamaś ca vidhūya nirvāṇam upaity anindhanam //
GP10bhp1-12u:26199: tadaivam ātmany avaruddha-citto na veda kiñcid bahir antaraṃ vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26200: yatheṣu-kāro nṛpatiṃ vrajantam iṣau gatātmā na dadarśa pārśve //
GP10bhp1-12u:26204: sarpaḥ para-kṛtaṃ veśma praviśya sukham edhate // BhP_11.09.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26213: saṅkṣobhayan sṛjaty ādau tayā sūtram arindama // BhP_11.09.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26215: yasmin protam idaṃ viśvaṃ yena saṃsarate pumān // BhP_11.09.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26217: tayā vihṛtya bhūyas tāṃ grasaty evaṃ maheśvaraḥ // BhP_11.09.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26218: yatra yatra mano dehī dhārayet sakalaṃ dhiyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26219: snehād dveṣād bhayād vāpi yāti tat-tat-svarūpatām // BhP_11.09.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26220: kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtaṃ dhyāyan kuḍyāṃ tena praveśitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26221: yāti tat-sātmatāṃ rājan pūrva-rūpam asantyajan // BhP_11.09.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26222: evaṃ gurubhya etebhya eṣā me śikṣitā matiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26223: svātmopaśikṣitāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu me vadataḥ prabho // BhP_11.09.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26224: deho gurur mama virakti-viveka-hetur $ bibhrat sma sattva-nidhanaṃ
GP10bhp1-12u:26226: tattvāny anena vimṛśāmi yathā tathāpi % pārakyam ity avasito vicarāmy asaṅgaḥ // BhP_11.09.025
GP10bhp1-12u:26229: svānte sa-kṛcchram avaruddha-dhanaḥ sa dehaḥ % sṛṣṭvāsya bījam avasīdati
GP10bhp1-12u:26231: jihvaikato 'mum apakarṣati karhi tarṣā $ śiśno 'nyatas tvag udaraṃ śravaṇaṃ kutaścit &
GP10bhp1-12u:26232: ghrāṇo 'nyataś capala-dṛk kva ca karma-śaktir % bahvyaḥ sapatnya iva
GP10bhp1-12u:26234: sṛṣṭvā purāṇi vividhāny ajayātma-śaktyā $ vṛkṣān sarīsṛpa-paśūn
GP10bhp1-12u:26236: tais tair atuṣṭa-hṛdayaḥ puruṣaṃ vidhāya % brahmāvaloka-dhiṣaṇaṃ mudam āpa devaḥ // BhP_11.09.028
GP10bhp1-12u:26237: labdhvā su-durlabham idaṃ bahu-sambhavānte $ mānuṣyam artha-dam anityam apīha dhīraḥ &
GP10bhp1-12u:26238: tūrṇaṃ yateta na pated anu-mṛtyu yāvan % niḥśreyasāya viṣayaḥ khalu
GP10bhp1-12u:26242: na hy ekasmād guror jñānaṃ su-sthiraṃ syāt su-puṣkalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26243: brahmaitad advitīyaṃ vai gīyate bahudharṣibhiḥ // BhP_11.09.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26244: BhP_11.09.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca ity uktvā sa yaduṃ vipras tam āmantrya gabhīra-dhīḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26245: vanditaḥ sv-arcito rājñā yayau prīto yathāgatam // BhP_11.09.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26246: avadhūta-vacaḥ śrutvā pūrveṣāṃ naḥ sa pūrva-jaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26248: BhP_11.10.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayoditeṣv avahitaḥ sva-dharmeṣu mad-āśrayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26253: nānātmakatvād viphalas tathā bhedātma-dhīr guṇaiḥ // BhP_11.10.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26254: nivṛttaṃ karma seveta pravṛttaṃ mat-paras tyajet /
GP10bhp1-12u:26256: yamān abhīkṣṇaṃ seveta niyamān mat-paraḥ kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:26257: mad-abhijñaṃ guruṃ śāntam upāsīta mad-ātmakam // BhP_11.10.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26261: udāsīnaḥ samaṃ paśyan sarveṣv artham ivātmanaḥ // BhP_11.10.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26263: yathāgnir dāruṇo dāhyād dāhako 'nyaḥ prakāśakaḥ // BhP_11.10.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26265: antaḥ praviṣṭa ādhatta evaṃ deha-guṇān paraḥ // BhP_11.10.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26266: yo 'sau guṇair viracito deho 'yaṃ puruṣasya hi /
GP10bhp1-12u:26267: saṃsāras tan-nibandho 'yaṃ puṃso vidyā cchid ātmanaḥ // BhP_11.10.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26269: saṅgamya nirased etad vastu-buddhiṃ yathā-kramam // BhP_11.10.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26273: gunāṃś ca sandahya yad-ātmam etat svayaṃ ca śāṃyaty asamid yathāgniḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26276: manyase sarva-bhāvānāṃ saṃsthā hy autpattikī yathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26277: tat-tad-ākṛti-bhedena jāyate bhidyate ca dhīḥ // BhP_11.10.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26278: evam apy aṅga sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ deha-yogataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26280: tatrāpi karmaṇāṃ kartur asvātantryaṃ ca lakṣyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:26281: bhoktuś ca duḥkha-sukhayoḥ ko nv artho vivaśaṃ bhajet // BhP_11.10.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26282: na dehināṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid vidyate viduṣām api /
GP10bhp1-12u:26283: tathā ca duḥkhaṃ mūḍhānāṃ vṛthāhaṅkaraṇaṃ param // BhP_11.10.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26284: yadi prāptiṃ vighātaṃ ca jānanti sukha-duḥkhayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26285: te 'py addhā na vidur yogaṃ mṛtyur na prabhaved yathā // BhP_11.10.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26286: ko 'nv arthaḥ sukhayaty enaṃ kāmo vā mṛtyur antike /
GP10bhp1-12u:26287: āghātaṃ nīyamānasya vadhyasyeva na tuṣṭi-daḥ // BhP_11.10.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26291: tenāpi nirjitaṃ sthānaṃ yathā gacchati tac chṛṇu // BhP_11.10.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26292: iṣṭveha devatā yajñaiḥ svar-lokaṃ yāti yājñikaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26293: bhuñjīta deva-vat tatra bhogān divyān nijārjitān // BhP_11.10.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26295: gandharvair viharan madhye devīnāṃ hṛdya-veṣa-dhṛk // BhP_11.10.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26297: krīḍan na vedātma-pātaṃ surākrīḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ // BhP_11.10.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26298: tāvat sa modate svarge yāvat puṇyaṃ samāpyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:26299: kṣīṇa-punyaḥ pataty arvāg anicchan kāla-cālitaḥ // BhP_11.10.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26301: kāmātmā kṛpaṇo lubdhaḥ straiṇo bhūta-vihiṃsakaḥ // BhP_11.10.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26303: narakān avaśo jantur gatvā yāty ulbaṇaṃ tamaḥ // BhP_11.10.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26304: karmāṇi duḥkhodarkāṇi kurvan dehena taiḥ punaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26305: deham ābhajate tatra kiṃ sukhaṃ martya-dharmiṇaḥ // BhP_11.10.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26309: jīvas tu guṇa-saṃyukto bhuṅkte karma-phalāny asau // BhP_11.10.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26310: yāvat syād guṇa-vaiṣamyaṃ tāvan nānātvam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26311: nānātvam ātmano yāvat pāratantryaṃ tadaiva hi // BhP_11.10.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26313: ya etat samupāsīraṃs te muhyanti śucārpitāḥ // BhP_11.10.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26314: kāla ātmāgamo lokaḥ svabhāvo dharma eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26315: iti māṃ bahudhā prāhur guṇa-vyatikare sati // BhP_11.10.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26316: BhP_11.10.035/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca guṇeṣu vartamāno 'pi deha-jeṣv anapāvṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26317: guṇair na badhyate dehī badhyate vā kathaṃ vibho // BhP_11.10.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26318: kathaṃ varteta viharet kair vā jñāyeta lakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26319: kiṃ bhuñjītota visṛjec chayītāsīta yāti vā // BhP_11.10.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26320: etad acyuta me brūhi praśnaṃ praśna-vidāṃ vara /
GP10bhp1-12u:26321: nitya-baddho nitya-mukta eka eveti me bhramaḥ // BhP_11.10.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26322: BhP_11.11.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca baddho mukta iti vyākhyā guṇato me na vastutaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26323: guṇasya māyā-mūlatvān na me mokṣo na bandhanam // BhP_11.11.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26324: śoka-mohau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dehāpattiś ca māyayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26325: svapno yathātmanaḥ khyātiḥ saṃsṛtir na tu vāstavī // BhP_11.11.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26326: vidyāvidye mama tanū viddhy uddhava śarīriṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26327: mokṣa-bandha-karī ādye māyayā me vinirmite // BhP_11.11.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26330: atha baddhasya muktasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ vadāmi te /
GP10bhp1-12u:26332: suparṇāv etau sadṛśau sakhāyau yadṛcchayaitau kṛta-nīḍau ca vṛkṣe /
GP10bhp1-12u:26333: ekas tayoḥ khādati pippalānnam anyo niranno 'pi balena bhūyān //
GP10bhp1-12u:26334: ātmānam anyaṃ ca sa veda vidvān apippalādo na tu pippalādaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26335: yo 'vidyayā yuk sa tu nitya-baddho vidyā-mayo yaḥ sa tu nitya-muktaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26336: deha-stho 'pi na deha-stho vidvān svapnād yathotthitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26337: adeha-stho 'pi deha-sthaḥ kumatiḥ svapna-dṛg yathā // BhP_11.11.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26338: indriyair indriyārtheṣu guṇair api guṇeṣu ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26339: gṛhyamāṇeṣv ahaṃ kuryān na vidvān yas tv avikriyaḥ // BhP_11.11.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26344: na tathā badhyate vidvān tatra tatrādayan guṇān // BhP_11.11.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26347: pratibuddha iva svapnān nānātvād vinivartate // BhP_11.11.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26349: vṛttayaḥ sa vinirmukto deha-stho 'pi hi tad-guṇaiḥ // BhP_11.11.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26350: yasyātmā hiṃsyate hiṃsrair yena kiñcid yadṛcchayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26351: arcyate vā kvacit tatra na vyatikriyate budhaḥ // BhP_11.11.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26352: na stuvīta na nindeta kurvataḥ sādhv asādhu vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26353: vadato guṇa-doṣābhyāṃ varjitaḥ sama-dṛṅ muniḥ // BhP_11.11.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26354: na kuryān na vadet kiñcin na dhyāyet sādhv asādhu vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26355: ātmārāmo 'nayā vṛttyā vicarej jaḍa-van muniḥ // BhP_11.11.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26356: śabda-brahmaṇi niṣṇāto na niṣṇāyāt pare yadi /
GP10bhp1-12u:26357: śramas tasya śrama-phalo hy adhenum iva rakṣataḥ // BhP_11.11.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26358: gāṃ dugdha-dohām asatīṃ ca bhāryāṃ dehaṃ parādhīnam asat-prajāṃ ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26359: vittaṃ tv atīrthī-kṛtam aṅga vācaṃ hīnāṃ mayā rakṣati duḥkha-duḥkhī //
GP10bhp1-12u:26360: yasyāṃ na me pāvanam aṅga karma sthity-udbhava-prāṇa-nirodham asya /
GP10bhp1-12u:26361: līlāvatārepsita-janma vā syād vandhyāṃ giraṃ tāṃ bibhṛyān na dhīraḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26363: upārameta virajaṃ mano mayy arpya sarva-ge // BhP_11.11.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26364: yady anīśo dhārayituṃ mano brahmaṇi niścalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26365: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirapekṣaḥ samācara // BhP_11.11.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26367: gāyann anusmaran karma janma cābhinayan muhuḥ // BhP_11.11.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26369: labhate niścalāṃ bhaktiṃ mayy uddhava sanātane // BhP_11.11.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26370: sat-saṅga-labdhayā bhaktyā mayi māṃ sa upāsitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26371: sa vai me darśitaṃ sadbhir añjasā vindate padam // BhP_11.11.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26372: BhP_11.11.026/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca sādhus tavottama-śloka mataḥ kīdṛg-vidhaḥ prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:26373: bhaktis tvayy upayujyeta kīdṛśī sadbhir ādṛtā // BhP_11.11.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26376: tvaṃ brahma paramaṃ vyoma puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26378: BhP_11.11.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca kṛpālur akṛta-drohas titikṣuḥ sarva-dehinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26380: kāmair ahata-dhīr dānto mṛduḥ śucir akiñcanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26381: anīho mita-bhuk śāntaḥ sthiro mac-charaṇo muniḥ // BhP_11.11.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26383: amānī māna-daḥ kalyo maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ kaviḥ // BhP_11.11.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26384: ājñāyaivaṃ guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26385: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajeta sa tu sattamaḥ // BhP_11.11.032
GP10bhp1-12u:26386: jñātvājñātvātha ye vai māṃ yāvān yaś cāsmi yādṛśaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26387: bhajanty ananya-bhāvena te me bhaktatamā matāḥ // BhP_11.11.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26399: gṛha-śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ dāsa-vad yad amāyayā // BhP_11.11.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26401: api dīpāvalokaṃ me nopayuñjyān niveditam // BhP_11.11.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26402: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26403: tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // BhP_11.11.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26404: sūryo 'gnir brāhmaṇā gāvo vaiṣṇavaḥ khaṃ maruj jalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26405: bhūr ātmā sarva-bhūtāni bhadra pūjā-padāni me // BhP_11.11.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26406: sūrye tu vidyayā trayyā haviṣāgnau yajeta mām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26407: ātithyena tu viprāgrye goṣv aṅga yavasādinā // BhP_11.11.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26409: vāyau mukhya-dhiyā toye dravyais toya-puraḥsaraiḥ // BhP_11.11.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26411: kṣetra-jñaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu samatvena yajeta mām // BhP_11.11.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26413: yuktaṃ catur-bhujaṃ śāntaṃ dhyāyann arcet samāhitaḥ // BhP_11.11.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26414: iṣṭā-pūrtena mām evaṃ yo yajeta samāhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26415: labhate mayi sad-bhaktiṃ mat-smṛtiḥ sādhu-sevayā // BhP_11.11.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26417: nopāyo vidyate samyak prāyaṇaṃ hi satām aham // BhP_11.11.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26419: su-gopyam api vakṣyāmi tvaṃ me bhṛtyaḥ suhṛt sakhā // BhP_11.11.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26420: BhP_11.12.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca na rodhayati māṃ yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26421: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo neṣṭā-pūrtaṃ na dakṣiṇā // BhP_11.12.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26422: vratāni yajñaś chandāṃsi tīrthāni niyamā yamāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26423: yathāvarundhe sat-saṅgaḥ sarva-saṅgāpaho hi mām // BhP_11.12.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26424: sat-saṅgena hi daiteyā yātudhānā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26427: rajas-tamaḥ-prakṛtayas tasmiṃs tasmin yuge yuge // BhP_11.12.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26429: vṛṣaparvā balir bāṇo mayaś cātha vibhīṣaṇaḥ // BhP_11.12.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26430: sugrīvo hanumān ṛkṣo gajo gṛdhro vaṇikpathaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26431: vyādhaḥ kubjā vraje gopyo yajña-patnyas tathāpare // BhP_11.12.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26434: kevalena hi bhāvena gopyo gāvo nagā mṛgāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26435: ye 'nye mūḍha-dhiyo nāgāḥ siddhā mām īyur añjasā // BhP_11.12.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26438: rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ mathurāṃ praṇīte śvāphalkinā mayy anurakta-cittāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26439: vigāḍha-bhāvena na me viyoga- tīvrādhayo 'nyaṃ dadṛśuḥ sukhāya //
GP10bhp1-12u:26440: tās tāḥ kṣapāḥ preṣṭhatamena nītā mayaiva vṛndāvana-gocareṇa /
GP10bhp1-12u:26441: kṣaṇārdha-vat tāḥ punar aṅga tāsāṃ hīnā mayā kalpa-samā babhūvuḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26442: tā nāvidan mayy anuṣaṅga-baddha- dhiyaḥ svam ātmānam adas tathedam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26443: yathā samādhau munayo 'bdhi-toye nadyaḥ praviṣṭā iva nāma-rūpe //
GP10bhp1-12u:26445: brahma māṃ paramaṃ prāpuḥ saṅgāc chata-sahasraśaḥ // BhP_11.12.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26447: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca śrotavyaṃ śrutam eva ca // BhP_11.12.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26448: mām ekam eva śaraṇam ātmānaṃ sarva-dehinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26449: yāhi sarvātma-bhāvena mayā syā hy akuto-bhayaḥ // BhP_11.12.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26450: BhP_11.12.016/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca saṃśayaḥ śṛṇvato vācaṃ tava yogeśvareśvara /
GP10bhp1-12u:26451: na nivartata ātma-stho yena bhrāmyati me manaḥ // BhP_11.12.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26452: BhP_11.12.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca sa eṣa jīvo vivara-prasūtiḥ prāṇena ghoṣeṇa guhāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:26453: mano-mayaṃ sūkṣmam upetya rūpaṃ mātrā svaro varṇa iti sthaviṣṭhaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:26454: yathānalaḥ khe 'nila-bandhur uṣmā balena dāruṇy adhimathyamānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26455: aṇuḥ prajāto haviṣā samedhate tathaiva me vyaktir iyaṃ hi vāṇī //
GP10bhp1-12u:26456: evaṃ gadiḥ karma gatir visargo ghrāṇo raso dṛk sparśaḥ śrutiś ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26458: ayaṃ hi jīvas tri-vṛd abja-yonir avyakta eko vayasā sa ādyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26459: viśliṣṭa-śaktir bahudheva bhāti bījāni yoniṃ pratipadya yadvat //
GP10bhp1-12u:26460: yasminn idaṃ protam aśeṣam otaṃ paṭo yathā tantu-vitāna-saṃsthaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26461: ya eṣa saṃsāra-taruḥ purāṇaḥ karmātmakaḥ puṣpa-phale prasūte //
GP10bhp1-12u:26462: dve asya bīje śata-mūlas tri-nālaḥ pañca-skandhaḥ pañca-rasa-prasūtiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26464: adanti caikaṃ phalam asya gṛdhrā grāme-carā ekam araṇya-vāsāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26465: haṃsā ya ekaṃ bahu-rūpam ijyair māyā-mayaṃ veda sa veda vedam //
GP10bhp1-12u:26467: vivṛścya jīvāśayam apramattaḥ sampadya cātmānam atha tyajāstram //
GP10bhp1-12u:26468: BhP_11.13.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā buddher na cātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26469: sattvenānyatamau hanyāt sattvaṃ sattvena caiva hi // BhP_11.13.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26470: sattvād dharmo bhaved vṛddhāt puṃso mad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26471: sāttvikopāsayā sattvaṃ tato dharmaḥ pravartate // BhP_11.13.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26472: dharmo rajas tamo hanyāt sattva-vṛddhir anuttamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26473: āśu naśyati tan-mūlo hy adharma ubhaye hate // BhP_11.13.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26474: āgamo 'paḥ prajā deśaḥ kālaḥ karma ca janma ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26475: dhyānaṃ mantro 'tha saṃskāro daśaite guṇa-hetavaḥ // BhP_11.13.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26476: tat tat sāttvikam evaiṣāṃ yad yad vṛddhāḥ pracakṣate /
GP10bhp1-12u:26477: nindanti tāmasaṃ tat tad rājasaṃ tad-upekṣitam // BhP_11.13.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26479: tato dharmas tato jñānaṃ yāvat smṛtir apohanam // BhP_11.13.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26481: evaṃ guṇa-vyatyaya-jo dehaḥ śāmyati tat-kriyaḥ // BhP_11.13.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26482: BhP_11.13.008/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca vidanti martyāḥ prāyeṇa viṣayān padam āpadām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26483: tathāpi bhuñjate kṛṣṇa tat kathaṃ śva-kharāja-vat // BhP_11.13.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26484: BhP_11.13.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca aham ity anyathā-buddhiḥ pramattasya yathā hṛdi /
GP10bhp1-12u:26485: utsarpati rajo ghoraṃ tato vaikārikaṃ manaḥ // BhP_11.13.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26487: tataḥ kāmo guṇa-dhyānād duḥsahaḥ syād dhi durmateḥ // BhP_11.13.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26490: rajas-tamobhyāṃ yad api vidvān vikṣipta-dhīḥ punaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26491: atandrito mano yuñjan doṣa-dṛṣṭir na sajjate // BhP_11.13.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26495: sarvato mana ākṛṣya mayy addhāveśyate yathā // BhP_11.13.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26496: BhP_11.13.015/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca yadā tvaṃ sanakādibhyo yena rūpeṇa keśava /
GP10bhp1-12u:26497: yogam ādiṣṭavān etad rūpam icchāmi veditum // BhP_11.13.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26498: BhP_11.13.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca putrā hiraṇyagarbhasya mānasāḥ sanakādayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26499: papracchuḥ pitaraṃ sūkṣmāṃ yogasyaikāntikīm gatim // BhP_11.13.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26500: BhP_11.13.017/0 sanakādaya ūcuḥ guṇeṣv āviśate ceto guṇāś cetasi ca prabho /

GP10bhp1-12u:26516: guṇeṣv āviśate ceto guṇāś cetasi ca prajāḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:26529: gatayo hetavaś cāsya mṛṣā svapna-dṛśo yathā // BhP_11.13.031 //

GP10bhp1-12u:26549: mayaitad uktaṃ vo viprā guhyaṃ yat sāṅkhya-yogayoḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:26562: nirasya sarvataḥ saṅgaṃ yena tvayy āviśen manaḥ // BhP_11.14.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26563: BhP_11.14.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca kālena naṣṭā pralaye vāṇīyaṃ veda-saṃjñitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26564: mayādau brahmaṇe proktā dharmo yasyāṃ mad-ātmakaḥ // BhP_11.14.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26565: tena proktā sva-putrāya manave pūrva-jāya sā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26571: yābhir bhūtāni bhidyante bhūtānāṃ patayas tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26572: yathā-prakṛti sarveṣāṃ citrā vācaḥ sravanti hi // BhP_11.14.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26576: śreyo vadanty anekāntaṃ yathā-karma yathā-ruci // BhP_11.14.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26577: dharmam eke yaśaś cānye kāmaṃ satyaṃ damaṃ śamam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26578: anye vadanti svārthaṃ vā aiśvaryaṃ tyāga-bhojanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26579: kecid yajñaṃ tapo dānaṃ vratāni niyamān yamān // BhP_11.14.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26581: duḥkhodarkās tamo-niṣṭhāḥ kṣudrā mandāḥ śucārpitāḥ // BhP_11.14.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26583: mayātmanā sukhaṃ yat tat kutaḥ syād viṣayātmanām // BhP_11.14.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26585: mayā santuṣṭa-manasaḥ sarvāḥ sukha-mayā diśaḥ // BhP_11.14.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26586: na pārameṣṭhyaṃ na mahendra-dhiṣṇyaṃ $ na sārvabhaumaṃ na rasādhipatyam &
GP10bhp1-12u:26587: na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā % mayy arpitātmecchati mad vinānyat //
GP10bhp1-12u:26588: na tathā me priyatama ātma-yonir na śaṅkaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26589: na ca saṅkarṣaṇo na śrīr naivātmā ca yathā bhavān // BhP_11.14.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26591: anuvrajāmy ahaṃ nityaṃ pūyeyety aṅghri-reṇubhiḥ // BhP_11.14.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26593: kāmair anālabdha-dhiyo juṣanti te yan nairapekṣyaṃ na viduḥ sukhaṃ mama //
GP10bhp1-12u:26595: prāyaḥ pragalbhayā bhaktyā viṣayair nābhibhūyate // BhP_11.14.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26597: tathā mad-viṣayā bhaktir uddhavaināṃsi kṛtsnaśaḥ // BhP_11.14.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26598: na sādhayati māṃ yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava /
GP10bhp1-12u:26599: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā // BhP_11.14.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26600: bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ śraddhayātmā priyaḥ satām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26601: bhaktiḥ punāti man-niṣṭhā śva-pākān api sambhavāt // BhP_11.14.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26603: mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi // BhP_11.14.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26604: kathaṃ vinā roma-harṣaṃ dravatā cetasā vinā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26606: vāg gadgadā dravate yasya cittaṃ rudaty abhīkṣṇaṃ hasati kvacic ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26607: vilajja udgāyati nṛtyate ca mad-bhakti-yukto bhuvanaṃ punāti //
GP10bhp1-12u:26608: yathāgninā hema malaṃ jahāti dhmātaṃ punaḥ svaṃ bhajate ca rūpam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26609: ātmā ca karmānuśayaṃ vidhūya mad-bhakti-yogena bhajaty atho mām //
GP10bhp1-12u:26611: tathā tathā paśyati vastu sūkṣmaṃ cakṣur yathaivāñjana-samprayuktam //
GP10bhp1-12u:26613: mām anusmarataś cittaṃ mayy eva pravilīyate // BhP_11.14.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26615: hitvā mayi samādhatsva mano mad-bhāva-bhāvitam // BhP_11.14.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26616: strīṇāṃ strī-saṅgināṃ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dūrata ātmavān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26617: kṣeme vivikta āsīnaś cintayen mām atandritaḥ // BhP_11.14.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26618: na tathāsya bhavet kleśo bandhaś cānya-prasaṅgataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26619: yoṣit-saṅgād yathā puṃso yathā tat-saṅgi-saṅgataḥ // BhP_11.14.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26620: BhP_11.14.031/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca yathā tvām aravindākṣa yādṛśaṃ vā yad-ātmakam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26621: dhyāyen mumukṣur etan me dhyānaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // BhP_11.14.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26622: BhP_11.14.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca sama āsana āsīnaḥ sama-kāyo yathā-sukham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26627: prāṇenodīrya tatrātha punaḥ saṃveśayet svaram // BhP_11.14.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26629: daśa-kṛtvas tri-ṣavaṇaṃ māsād arvāg jitānilaḥ // BhP_11.14.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26633: vahni-madhye smared rūpaṃ mamaitad dhyāna-maṅgalam // BhP_11.14.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26644: buddhyā sārathinā dhīraḥ praṇayen mayi sarvataḥ // BhP_11.14.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26646: nānyāni cintayed bhūyaḥ su-smitaṃ bhāvayen mukham // BhP_11.14.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26647: tatra labdha-padaṃ cittam ākṛṣya vyomni dhārayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:26648: tac ca tyaktvā mad-āroho na kiñcid api cintayet // BhP_11.14.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26650: vicaṣṭe mayi sarvātman jyotir jyotiṣi saṃyutam // BhP_11.14.045 //

GP10bhp1-12u:26654: mayi dhārayataś ceta upatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ // BhP_11.15.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26655: BhP_11.15.002/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca kayā dhāraṇayā kā svit kathaṃ vā siddhir acyuta /
GP10bhp1-12u:26656: kati vā siddhayo brūhi yogināṃ siddhi-do bhavān // BhP_11.15.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26657: BhP_11.15.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca siddhayo 'ṣṭādaśa proktā dhāraṇā yoga-pāra-gaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26658: tāsām aṣṭau mat-pradhānā daśaiva guṇa-hetavaḥ // BhP_11.15.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26659: aṇimā mahimā mūrter laghimā prāptir indriyaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26661: guṇeṣv asaṅgo vaśitā yat-kāmas tad avasyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:26662: etā me siddhayaḥ saumya aṣṭāv autpattikā matāḥ // BhP_11.15.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26670: yayā dhāraṇayā yā syād yathā vā syān nibodha me // BhP_11.15.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26674: mahimānam avāpnoti bhūtānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // BhP_11.15.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26678: sarvendriyāṇām ātmatvaṃ prāptiṃ prāpnoti man-manāḥ // BhP_11.15.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26679: mahaty ātmani yaḥ sūtre dhārayen mayi mānasam /

GP10bhp1-12u:26685: nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadaṃ manaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26688: dhārayañ chvetatāṃ yāti ṣaḍ-ūrmi-rahito naraḥ // BhP_11.15.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26689: mayy ākāśātmani prāṇe manasā ghoṣam udvahan /
