GP10bhp1-12u:26691: cakṣus tvaṣṭari saṃyojya tvaṣṭāram api cakṣuṣi /
GP10bhp1-12u:26692: māṃ tatra manasā dhyāyan viśvaṃ paśyati dūrataḥ // BhP_11.15.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26694: mad-dhāraṇānubhāvena tatrātmā yatra vai manaḥ // BhP_11.15.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26695: yadā mana upādāya yad yad rūpaṃ bubhūṣati /
GP10bhp1-12u:26696: tat tad bhaven mano-rūpaṃ mad-yoga-balam āśrayaḥ // BhP_11.15.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26697: para-kāyaṃ viśan siddha ātmānaṃ tatra bhāvayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:26698: piṇḍaṃ hitvā viśet prāṇo vāyu-bhūtaḥ ṣaḍaṅghri-vat // BhP_11.15.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26700: āropya brahma-randhreṇa brahma nītvotsṛjet tanum // BhP_11.15.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26703: yathā saṅkalpayed buddhyā yadā vā mat-paraḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26704: mayi satye mano yuñjaṃs tathā tat samupāśnute // BhP_11.15.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26705: yo vai mad-bhāvam āpanna īśitur vaśituḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26706: kutaścin na vihanyeta tasya cājñā yathā mama // BhP_11.15.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26709: agny-ādibhir na hanyeta muner yoga-mayaṃ vapuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26716: mad-dhāraṇāṃ dhārayataḥ kā sā siddhiḥ su-durlabhā // BhP_11.15.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26717: antarāyān vadanty etā yuñjato yogam uttamam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26720: yogenāpnoti tāḥ sarvā nānyair yoga-gatiṃ vrajet // BhP_11.15.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26721: sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ hetuḥ patir ahaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26722: ahaṃ yogasya sāṅkhyasya dharmasya brahma-vādinām // BhP_11.15.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26724: yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu bahir antaḥ svayaṃ tathā // BhP_11.15.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26725: BhP_11.16.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca tvaṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣād anādy-antam apāvṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26728: upāsate tvāṃ bhagavan yāthā-tathyena brāhmaṇāḥ // BhP_11.16.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26729: yeṣu yeṣu ca bhūteṣu bhaktyā tvāṃ paramarṣayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26730: upāsīnāḥ prapadyante saṃsiddhiṃ tad vadasva me // BhP_11.16.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26732: na tvāṃ paśyanti bhūtāni paśyantaṃ mohitāni te // BhP_11.16.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26733: yāḥ kāś ca bhūmau divi vai rasāyāṃ vibhūtayo dikṣu mahā-vibhūte /
GP10bhp1-12u:26734: tā mahyam ākhyāhy anubhāvitās te namāmi te tīrtha-padāṅghri-padmam //
GP10bhp1-12u:26735: BhP_11.16.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca evam etad ahaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ praśnaṃ praśna-vidāṃ vara /
GP10bhp1-12u:26736: yuyutsunā vinaśane sapatnair arjunena vai // BhP_11.16.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26738: tato nivṛtto hantāhaṃ hato 'yam iti laukikaḥ // BhP_11.16.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26739: sa tadā puruṣa-vyāghro yuktyā me pratibodhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26740: abhyabhāṣata mām evaṃ yathā tvaṃ raṇa-mūrdhani // BhP_11.16.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26742: ahaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni teṣāṃ sthity-udbhavāpyayaḥ // BhP_11.16.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26743: ahaṃ gatir gatimatāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26744: gunāṇāṃ cāpy ahaṃ sāmyaṃ guṇiny autpattiko guṇaḥ // BhP_11.16.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26745: guṇinām apy ahaṃ sūtraṃ mahatāṃ ca mahān aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26746: sūkṣmāṇām apy ahaṃ jīvo durjayānām ahaṃ manaḥ // BhP_11.16.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26748: akṣarāṇām a-kāro 'smi padāni cchandusām aham // BhP_11.16.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26750: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇū rudrāṇāṃ nīla-lohitaḥ // BhP_11.16.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26751: brahmarṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ rājarṣīṇām ahaṃ manuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26752: devarṣīṇāṃ nārado 'haṃ havirdhāny asmi dhenuṣu // BhP_11.16.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26754: prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣo 'haṃ pitṝṇām aham aryamā // BhP_11.16.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26755: māṃ viddhy uddhava daityānāṃ prahlādam asureśvaram /
GP10bhp1-12u:26758: tapatāṃ dyumatāṃ sūryaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhū-patim // BhP_11.16.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26760: yamaḥ saṃyamatāṃ cāham sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ // BhP_11.16.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26762: āśramāṇām ahaṃ turyo varṇānāṃ prathamo 'nagha // BhP_11.16.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26763: tīrthānāṃ srotasāṃ gaṅgā samudraḥ sarasām aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26764: āyudhānāṃ dhanur ahaṃ tripura-ghno dhanuṣmatām // BhP_11.16.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26765: dhiṣṇyānām asmy ahaṃ merur gahanānāṃ himālayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26766: vanaspatīnām aśvattha oṣadhīnām ahaṃ yavaḥ // BhP_11.16.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26768: skando 'haṃ sarva-senānyām agraṇyāṃ bhagavān ajaḥ // BhP_11.16.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26770: vāyv-agny-arkāmbu-vāg-ātmā śucīnām apy ahaṃ śuciḥ // BhP_11.16.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26773: strīṇāṃ tu śatarūpāhaṃ puṃsāṃ svāyambhuvo manuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26774: nārāyaṇo munīnāṃ ca kumāro brahmacāriṇām // BhP_11.16.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26776: guhyānāṃ su-nṛtaṃ maunaṃ mithunānām ajas tv aham // BhP_11.16.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26779: ahaṃ yugānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ devalo 'sitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26780: dvaipāyano 'smi vyāsānāṃ kavīnāṃ kāvya ātmavān // BhP_11.16.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26781: vāsudevo bhagavatāṃ tvaṃ tu bhāgavateṣv aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:26784: kuśo 'smi darbha-jātīnāṃ gavyam ājyaṃ haviḥṣv aham // BhP_11.16.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26786: titikṣāsmi titikṣūṇāṃ sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham // BhP_11.16.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26787: ojaḥ saho balavatāṃ karmāhaṃ viddhi sātvatām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26788: sātvatāṃ nava-mūrtīnām ādi-mūrtir ahaṃ parā // BhP_11.16.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26790: bhūdharāṇām ahaṃ sthairyaṃ gandha-mātram ahaṃ bhuvaḥ // BhP_11.16.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26791: apāṃ rasaś ca paramas tejiṣṭhānāṃ vibhāvasuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26792: prabhā sūryendu-tārāṇāṃ śabdo 'haṃ nabhasaḥ paraḥ // BhP_11.16.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26793: brahmaṇyānāṃ balir ahaṃ vīrāṇām aham arjunaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26794: bhūtānāṃ sthitir utpattir ahaṃ vai pratisaṅkramaḥ // BhP_11.16.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26797: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotir ahaṃ mahān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26798: vikāraḥ puruṣo 'vyaktaṃ rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaḥ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:26799: aham etat prasaṅkhyānaṃ jñānaṃ tattva-viniścayaḥ // BhP_11.16.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26801: sarvātmanāpi sarveṇa na bhāvo vidyate kvacit // BhP_11.16.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26803: na tathā me vibhūtīnāṃ sṛjato 'ṇḍāni koṭiśaḥ // BhP_11.16.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26804: tejaḥ śrīḥ kīrtir aiśvaryaṃ hrīs tyāgaḥ saubhagaṃ bhagaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26805: vīryaṃ titikṣā vijñānaṃ yatra yatra sa me 'ṃśakaḥ // BhP_11.16.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26806: etās te kīrtitāḥ sarvāḥ saṅkṣepeṇa vibhūtayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26808: vācaṃ yaccha mano yaccha prāṇān yacchedriyāṇi ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:26809: ātmānam ātmanā yaccha na bhūyaḥ kalpase 'dhvane // BhP_11.16.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26810: yo vai vāṅ-manasī saṃyag asaṃyacchan dhiyā yatiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26811: tasya vrataṃ tapo dānaṃ sravaty āma-ghaṭāmbu-vat // BhP_11.16.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26812: tasmād vaco manaḥ prāṇān niyacchen mat-parāyaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26814: BhP_11.17.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca yas tvayābhihitaḥ pūrvaṃ dharmas tvad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26818: purā kila mahā-bāho dharmaṃ paramakaṃ prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:26819: yat tena haṃsa-rūpeṇa brahmaṇe 'bhyāttha mādhava // BhP_11.17.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26821: na prāyo bhavitā martya- loke prāg anuśāsitaḥ // BhP_11.17.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26822: vaktā kartāvitā nānyo dharmasyācyuta te bhuvi /
GP10bhp1-12u:26823: sabhāyām api vairiñcyāṃ yatra mūrti-dharāḥ kalāḥ // BhP_11.17.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26825: tyakte mahī-tale deva vinaṣṭaṃ kaḥ pravakṣyati // BhP_11.17.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26826: tat tvaṃ naḥ sarva-dharma-jña dharmas tvad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26827: yathā yasya vidhīyeta tathā varṇaya me prabho // BhP_11.17.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26828: BhP_11.17.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca itthaṃ sva-bhṛtya-mukhyena pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān hariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26829: prītaḥ kṣemāya martyānāṃ dharmān āha sanātanān // BhP_11.17.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26830: BhP_11.17.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca dharmya eṣa tava praśno naiḥśreyasa-karo nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:26831: varṇāśramācāravatāṃ tam uddhava nibodha me // BhP_11.17.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26832: ādau kṛta-yuge varṇo nṛṇāṃ haṃsa iti smṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26833: kṛta-kṛtyāḥ prajā jātyā tasmāt kṛta-yugaṃ viduḥ // BhP_11.17.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26835: upāsate tapo-niṣṭhā haṃsaṃ māṃ mukta-kilbiṣāḥ // BhP_11.17.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26836: tretā-mukhe mahā-bhāga prāṇān me hṛdayāt trayī /
GP10bhp1-12u:26837: vidyā prādurabhūt tasyā aham āsaṃ tri-vṛn makhaḥ // BhP_11.17.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26839: vairājāt puruṣāj jātā ya ātmācāra-lakṣaṇāḥ // BhP_11.17.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26841: vakṣaḥ-sthalād vane-vāsaḥ sannyāsaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ // BhP_11.17.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26843: āsan prakṛtayo nṝnāṃ nīcair nīcottamottamāḥ // BhP_11.17.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26844: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ santoṣaḥ kṣāntir ārjavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26845: mad-bhaktiś ca dayā satyaṃ brahma-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ // BhP_11.17.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26846: tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ śauryaṃ titikṣaudāryam udyamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26847: sthairyaṃ brahmanyam aiśvaryaṃ kṣatra-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ // BhP_11.17.017
GP10bhp1-12u:26849: atuṣṭir arthopacayair vaiśya-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ // BhP_11.17.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26851: tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdra-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ // BhP_11.17.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26853: kāmaḥ krodhaś ca tarṣaś ca sa bhāvo 'ntyāvasāyinām // BhP_11.17.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26857: vasan guru-kule dānto brahmādhīyīta cāhūtaḥ // BhP_11.17.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26861: na cchindyān nakha-romāṇi kakṣopastha-gatāny api // BhP_11.17.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26865: samāhita upāsīta sandhye dve yata-vāg japan // BhP_11.17.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26868: sāyaṃ prātar upānīya bhaikṣyaṃ tasmai nivedayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:26869: yac cānyad apy anujñātam upayuñjīta saṃyataḥ // BhP_11.17.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26873: vidyā samāpyate yāvad bibhrad vratam akhaṇḍitam // BhP_11.17.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26874: yady asau chandasāṃ lokam ārokṣyan brahma-viṣṭapam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26875: gurave vinyased dehaṃ svādhyāyārthaṃ bṛhad-vrataḥ // BhP_11.17.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26876: agnau gurāv ātmani ca sarva-bhūteṣu māṃ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:26887: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā snāyād gurv-anumoditaḥ // BhP_11.17.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26888: gṛhaṃ vanaṃ vopaviśet pravrajed vā dvijottamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26889: āśramād āśramaṃ gacchen nānyathāmat-paraś caret // BhP_11.17.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26891: yavīyasīṃ tu vayasā yaṃ sa-varṇām anu kramāt // BhP_11.17.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26895: anyābhyām eva jīveta śilair vā doṣa-dṛk tayoḥ // BhP_11.17.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26897: kṛcchrāya tapase ceha pretyānanta-sukhāya ca // BhP_11.17.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26898: śiloñcha-vṛttyā parituṣṭa-citto dharmaṃ mahāntaṃ virajaṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26899: mayy arpitātmā gṛha eva tiṣṭhan nāti-prasaktaḥ samupaiti śāntim //
GP10bhp1-12u:26901: tān uddhariṣye na cirād āpadbhyo naur ivārṇavāt // BhP_11.17.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26902: sarvāḥ samuddhared rājā piteva vyasanāt prajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26903: ātmānam ātmanā dhīro yathā gaja-patir gajān // BhP_11.17.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26905: vidhūyehāśubhaṃ kṛtsnam indreṇa saha modate // BhP_11.17.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26906: sīdan vipro vaṇig-vṛttyā paṇyair evāpadaṃ taret /
GP10bhp1-12u:26907: khaḍgena vāpadākrānto na śva-vṛttyā kathañcana // BhP_11.17.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26909: cared vā vipra-rūpeṇa na śva-vṛttyā kathañcana // BhP_11.17.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26911: kṛcchrān mukto na garhyeṇa vṛttiṃ lipseta karmaṇā // BhP_11.17.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26916: kuṭumbeṣu na sajjeta na pramādyet kuṭumby api /
GP10bhp1-12u:26917: vipaścin naśvaraṃ paśyed adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat // BhP_11.17.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26919: anu-dehaṃ viyanty ete svapno nidrānugo yathā // BhP_11.17.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26920: itthaṃ parimṛśan mukto gṛheṣv atithi-vad vasan /
GP10bhp1-12u:26921: na gṛhair anubadhyeta nirmamo nirahaṅkṛtaḥ // BhP_11.17.054 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26922: karmabhir gṛha-medhīyair iṣṭvā mām eva bhaktimān /
GP10bhp1-12u:26923: tiṣṭhed vanaṃ vopaviśet prajāvān vā parivrajet // BhP_11.17.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26925: straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇa-dhīr mūḍho mamāham iti badhyate // BhP_11.17.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26926: aho me pitarau vṛddhau bhāryā bālātmajātmajāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26927: anāthā mām ṛte dīnāḥ kathaṃ jīvanti duḥkhitāḥ // BhP_11.17.057 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26929: atṛptas tān anudhyāyan mṛto 'ndhaṃ viśate tamaḥ // BhP_11.17.058 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26930: BhP_11.18.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca vanaṃ vivikṣuḥ putreṣu bhāryāṃ nyasya sahaiva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:26931: vana eva vasec chāntas tṛtīyaṃ bhāgam āyuṣaḥ // BhP_11.18.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26933: vasīta valkalaṃ vāsas tṛṇa-parṇājināni vā // BhP_11.18.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26935: na dhāved apsu majjeta tri kālaṃ sthaṇḍile-śayaḥ // BhP_11.18.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26936: grīṣme tapyeta pañcāgnīn varṣāsv āsāra-ṣāḍ jale /
GP10bhp1-12u:26937: ākaṇtha-magnaḥ śiśira evaṃ vṛttas tapaś caret // BhP_11.18.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26939: ulūkhalāśma-kuṭṭo vā dantolūkhala eva vā // BhP_11.18.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26943: na tu śrautena paśunā māṃ yajeta vanāśramī // BhP_11.18.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26944: agnihotraṃ ca darśaś ca paurṇamāsaś ca pūrva-vat /
GP10bhp1-12u:26945: cāturmāsyāni ca muner āmnātāni ca naigamaiḥ // BhP_11.18.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26947: māṃ tapo-mayam ārādhya ṛṣi-lokād upaiti mām // BhP_11.18.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26948: yas tv etat kṛcchrataś cīrṇaṃ tapo niḥśreyasaṃ mahat /
GP10bhp1-12u:26949: kāmāyālpīyase yuñjyād bāliśaḥ ko 'paras tataḥ // BhP_11.18.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26951: ātmany agnīn samāropya mac-citto 'gniṃ samāviśet // BhP_11.18.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26953: virāgo jāyate samyaṅ nyastāgniḥ pravrajet tataḥ // BhP_11.18.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26954: iṣṭvā yathopadeśaṃ māṃ dattvā sarva-svam ṛtvije /
GP10bhp1-12u:26955: agnīn sva-prāṇa āveśya nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet // BhP_11.18.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26957: vighnān kurvanty ayaṃ hy asmān ākramya samiyāt param // BhP_11.18.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26958: bibhṛyāc cen munir vāsaḥ kaupīnācchādanaṃ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:26959: tyaktaṃ na daṇḍa-pātrābhyām anyat kiñcid anāpadi // BhP_11.18.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26960: dṛṣṭi-pūtaṃ nyaset pādaṃ vastra-pūtaṃ pibej jalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:26961: satya-pūtāṃ vaded vācaṃ manaḥ-pūtaṃ samācaret // BhP_11.18.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26963: na hy ete yasya santy aṅga veṇubhir na bhaved yatiḥ // BhP_11.18.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26964: bhikṣāṃ caturṣu varṇeṣu vigarhyān varjayaṃś caret /
GP10bhp1-12u:26965: saptāgārān asaṅkḷptāṃs tuṣyel labdhena tāvatā // BhP_11.18.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26967: vibhajya pāvitaṃ śeṣaṃ bhuñjītāśeṣam āhṛtam // BhP_11.18.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26968: ekaś caren mahīm etāṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26971: ātmānaṃ cintayed ekam abhedena mayā muniḥ // BhP_11.18.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26973: bandha indriya-vikṣepo mokṣa eṣāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ // BhP_11.18.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26974: tasmān niyamya ṣaḍ-vargaṃ mad-bhāvena caren muniḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26975: viraktaḥ kṣudra-kāmebhyo labdhvātmani sukhaṃ mahat // BhP_11.18.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26979: saṃsidhyaty āśv asammohaḥ śuddha-sattvaḥ śilāndhasā // BhP_11.18.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26983: sarvaṃ māyeti tarkeṇa sva-sthas tyaktvā na tat smaret // BhP_11.18.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26985: sa-liṅgān āśramāṃs tyaktvā cared avidhi-gocaraḥ // BhP_11.18.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26986: budho bālaka-vat krīḍet kuśalo jaḍa-vac caret /
GP10bhp1-12u:26987: vaded unmatta-vad vidvān go-caryāṃ naigamaś caret // BhP_11.18.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26988: veda-vāda-rato na syān na pāṣaṇḍī na haitukaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26989: śuṣka-vāda-vivāde na kañcit pakṣaṃ samāśrayet // BhP_11.18.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26990: nodvijeta janād dhīro janaṃ codvejayen na tu /
GP10bhp1-12u:26992: deham uddiśya paśu-vad vairaṃ kuryān na kenacit // BhP_11.18.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26993: eka eva paro hy ātmā bhūteṣv ātmany avasthitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:26994: yathendur uda-pātreṣu bhūtāny ekātmakāni ca // BhP_11.18.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26995: alabdhvā na viṣīdeta kāle kāle 'śanaṃ kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:26996: labdhvā na hṛṣyed dhṛtimān ubhayaṃ daiva-tantritam // BhP_11.18.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:26998: tattvaṃ vimṛśyate tena tad vijñāya vimucyate // BhP_11.18.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27000: tathā vāsas tathā śayyāṃ prāptaṃ prāptaṃ bhajen muniḥ // BhP_11.18.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27001: śaucam ācamanaṃ snānaṃ na tu codanayā caret /
GP10bhp1-12u:27002: anyāṃś ca niyamāñ jñānī yathāhaṃ līlayeśvaraḥ // BhP_11.18.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27003: na hi tasya vikalpākhyā yā ca mad-vīkṣayā hatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27004: ā-dehāntāt kvacit khyātis tataḥ sampadyate mayā // BhP_11.18.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27008: yāvad brahma vijānīyān mām eva gurum ādṛtaḥ // BhP_11.18.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27011: surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27013: bhikṣor dharmaḥ śamo 'hiṃsā tapa īkṣā vanaukasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27016: gṛhasthasyāpy ṛtau gantuḥ sarveṣāṃ mad-upāsanam // BhP_11.18.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27017: iti māṃ yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa bhajen nityam ananya-bhāk /
GP10bhp1-12u:27018: sarva-bhūteṣu mad-bhāvo mad-bhaktiṃ vindate dṛḍhām // BhP_11.18.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27020: sarvotpatty-apyayaṃ brahma kāraṇaṃ mopayāti saḥ // BhP_11.18.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27022: jñāna-vijñāna-sampanno na cirāt samupaiti mām // BhP_11.18.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27024: sa eva mad-bhakti-yuto niḥśreyasa-karaḥ paraḥ // BhP_11.18.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27025: etat te 'bhihitaṃ sādho bhavān pṛcchati yac ca mām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27026: yathā sva-dharma-saṃyukto bhakto māṃ samiyāt param // BhP_11.18.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27027: BhP_11.19.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yo vidyā-śruta-sampannaḥ ātmavān nānumānikaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27028: mayā-mātram idaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset // BhP_11.19.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27029: jñāninas tv aham eveṣṭaḥ svārtho hetuś ca sammataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27030: svargaś caivāpavargaś ca nānyo 'rtho mad-ṛte priyaḥ // BhP_11.19.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27032: jñānī priyatamo 'to me jñānenāsau bibharti mām // BhP_11.19.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27033: tapas tīrthaṃ japo dānaṃ pavitrāṇītarāṇi ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27034: nālaṃ kurvanti tāṃ siddhiṃ yā jñāna-kalayā kṛtā // BhP_11.19.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27035: tasmāj jñānena sahitaṃ jñātvā svātmānam uddhava /
GP10bhp1-12u:27038: sarva-yajña-patiṃ māṃ vai saṃsiddhiṃ munayo 'gaman // BhP_11.19.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27039: tvayy uddhavāśrayati yas tri-vidho vikāro $ māyāntarāpatati
GP10bhp1-12u:27041: janmādayo 'sya yad amī tava tasya kiṃ syur % ādy-antayor yad asato 'sti
GP10bhp1-12u:27043: BhP_11.19.008/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ vipulaṃ yathaitad vairāgya-vijñāna-yutaṃ purāṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27044: ākhyāhi viśveśvara viśva-mūrte tvad-bhakti-yogaṃ ca mahad-vimṛgyam //
GP10bhp1-12u:27046: paśyāmi nānyac charaṇaṃ tavāṅghri- dvandvātapatrād amṛtābhivarṣāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:27047: daṣṭaṃ janaṃ sampatitaṃ bile 'smin kālāhinā kṣudra-sukhoru-tarṣam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27049: BhP_11.19.011/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca ittham etat purā rājā bhīṣmaṃ dharma-bhṛtāṃ varam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27052: śrutvā dharmān bahūn paścān mokṣa-dharmān apṛcchata // BhP_11.19.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27055: navaikādaśa pañca trīn bhāvān bhūteṣu yena vai /
GP10bhp1-12u:27056: īkṣetāthāikam apy eṣu taj jñānaṃ mama niścitam // BhP_11.19.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27057: etad eva hi vijñānaṃ na tathaikena yena yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27059: ādāv ante ca madhye ca sṛjyāt sṛjyaṃ yad anviyāt /
GP10bhp1-12u:27060: punas tat-pratisaṅkrāme yac chiṣyeta tad eva sat // BhP_11.19.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27062: pramāṇeṣv anavasthānād vikalpāt sa virajyate // BhP_11.19.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27064: vipaścin naśvaraṃ paśyed adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat // BhP_11.19.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27066: punaś ca kathayiṣyāmi mad-bhakteḥ kāraṇaṃ paraṃ // BhP_11.19.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27068: pariniṣṭhā ca pūjāyāṃ stutibhiḥ stavanaṃ mama // BhP_11.19.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27072: mayy arpaṇaṃ ca manasaḥ sarva-kāma-vivarjanam // BhP_11.19.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27074: iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ mad-arthaṃ yad vrataṃ tapaḥ // BhP_11.19.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27078: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ sa vairāgyam aiśvaryaṃ cābhipadyate // BhP_11.19.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27079: yad arpitaṃ tad vikalpe indriyaiḥ paridhāvati /
GP10bhp1-12u:27080: rajas-valaṃ cāsan-niṣṭhaṃ cittaṃ viddhi viparyayam // BhP_11.19.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27082: guṇesv asaṅgo vairāgyam aiśvaryaṃ cāṇimādayaḥ // BhP_11.19.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27084: niyamo vāri-karṣaṇa kaḥ śamaḥ ko damaḥ kṛṣṇa // BhP_11.19.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27085: kā titikṣā dhṛtiḥ prabho kiṃ dānaṃ kiṃ tapaḥ śauryaṃ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27086: kim satyam ṛtam ucyate kas tyāgaḥ kiṃ dhanaṃ ceṣṭaṃ // BhP_11.19.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27087: ko yajñaḥ kā ca dakṣiṇā puṃsaḥ kiṃ svid balaṃ śrīman /
GP10bhp1-12u:27088: bhago lābhaś ca keśava kā vidyā hrīḥ parā kā śrīḥ // BhP_11.19.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27089: kiṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham eva ca kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kaś ca mūrkhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27090: kaḥ panthā utpathaś ca kaḥ kaḥ svargo narakaḥ kaḥ svit // BhP_11.19.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27091: ko bandhur uta kiṃ gṛham ka āḍhyaḥ ko daridro vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27092: kṛpaṇaḥ kaḥ ka īśvaraḥ etān praśnān mama brūhi /
GP10bhp1-12u:27093: viparītāṃś ca sat-pate śrī-bhagavān uvāca // BhP_11.19.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27094: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam asaṅgo hrīr asañcayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27095: āstikyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca maunaṃ sthairyaṃ kṣamābhayam // BhP_11.19.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27096: śaucaṃ japas tapo homaḥ śraddhātithyaṃ mad-arcanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27098: ete yamāḥ sa-niyamā ubhayor dvādaśa smṛtāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27099: puṃsām upāsitās tāta yathā-kāmaṃ duhanti hi // BhP_11.19.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27102: daṇḍa-nyāsaḥ paraṃ dānaṃ kāma-tyāgas tapaḥ smṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27103: svabhāva-vijayaḥ śauryaṃ satyaṃ ca sama-darśanam // BhP_11.19.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27104: anyac ca sunṛtā vāṇī kavibhiḥ parikīrtitā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27105: karmasv asaṅgamaḥ śaucaṃ tyāgaḥ sannyāsa ucyate // BhP_11.19.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27106: dharma iṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ yajño 'haṃ bhagavattamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27107: dakṣiṇā jñāna-sandeśaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ paraṃ balam // BhP_11.19.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27108: bhago ma aiśvaro bhāvo lābho mad-bhaktir uttamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27109: vidyātmani bhidā-bādho jugupsā hrīr akarmasu // BhP_11.19.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27114: narakas tama-unnāho bandhur gurur ahaṃ sakhe /
GP10bhp1-12u:27115: gṛhaṃ śarīraṃ mānuṣyaṃ guṇāḍhyo hy āḍhya ucyate // BhP_11.19.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27116: daridro yas tv asantuṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇo yo 'jitendriyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27117: guṇeṣv asakta-dhīr īśo guṇa-saṅgo viparyayaḥ // BhP_11.19.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27118: eta uddhava te praśnāḥ sarve sādhu nirūpitāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27121: BhP_11.20.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca vidhiś ca pratiṣedhaś ca nigamo hīśvarasya te /
GP10bhp1-12u:27122: avekṣate 'raviṇḍākṣa guṇaṃ doṣaṃ ca karmaṇām // BhP_11.20.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27124: dravya-deśa-vayaḥ-kālān svargaṃ narakam eva ca // BhP_11.20.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27128: śreyas tv anupalabdhe 'rthe sādhya-sādhanayor api // BhP_11.20.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27129: guṇa-doṣa-bhidā-dṛṣṭir nigamāt te na hi svataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27130: nigamenāpavādaś ca bhidāyā iti ha bhramaḥ // BhP_11.20.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27131: BhP_11.20.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yogās trayo mayā proktā nṝṇāṃ śreyo-vidhitsayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27132: jñānaṃ karma ca bhaktiś ca nopāyo 'nyo 'sti kutracit // BhP_11.20.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27134: teṣv anirviṇṇa-cittānāṃ karma-yogas tu kāminām // BhP_11.20.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27135: yadṛcchayā mat-kathādau jāta-śraddhas tu yaḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27136: na nirviṇṇo nāti-sakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhi-daḥ // BhP_11.20.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27137: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27138: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate // BhP_11.20.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27140: na yāti svarga-narakau yady anyan na samācaret // BhP_11.20.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27142: jñānaṃ viśuddham āpnoti mad-bhaktiṃ vā yadṛcchayā // BhP_11.20.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27143: svargiṇo 'py etam icchanti lokaṃ nirayiṇas tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27145: na naraḥ svar-gatiṃ kāṅkṣen nārakīṃ vā vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27146: nemaṃ lokaṃ ca kāṅkṣeta dehāveśāt pramādyati // BhP_11.20.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27147: etad vidvān purā mṛtyor abhavāya ghaṭeta saḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27148: apramatta idaṃ jñātvā martyam apy artha-siddhi-dam // BhP_11.20.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27150: khagaḥ sva-ketam utsṛjya kṣemaṃ yāti hy alampaṭaḥ // BhP_11.20.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27152: mukta-saṅgaḥ paraṃ buddhvā nirīha upaśāmyati // BhP_11.20.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27153: nṛ-deham ādyaṃ su-labhaṃ su-durlabhaṃ $ plavaṃ su-kalpaṃ guru-karṇadhāram
GP10bhp1-12u:27154: mayānukūlena nabhasvateritaṃ % pumān bhavābdhiṃ na taret sa ātma-hā //
GP10bhp1-12u:27156: abhyāsenātmano yogī dhārayed acalaṃ manaḥ // BhP_11.20.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27157: dhāryamāṇaṃ mano yarhi bhrāmyad aśv anavasthitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27160: sattva-sampannayā buddhyā mana ātma-vaśaṃ nayet // BhP_11.20.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27161: eṣa vai paramo yogo manasaḥ saṅgrahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27164: bhavāpyayāv anudhyāyen mano yāvat prasīdati // BhP_11.20.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27168: mamārcopāsanābhir vā nānyair yogyaṃ smaren manaḥ // BhP_11.20.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27169: yadi kuryāt pramādena yogī karma vigarhitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27170: yogenaiva dahed aṃho nānyat tatra kadācana // BhP_11.20.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27171: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27175: veda duḥkhātmakān kāmān parityāge 'py anīśvaraḥ // BhP_11.20.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27176: tato bhajeta māṃ prītaḥ śraddhālur dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27177: juṣamāṇaś ca tān kāmān duḥkhodarkāṃś ca garhayan // BhP_11.20.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27179: kāmā hṛdayyā naśyanti sarve mayi hṛdi sthite // BhP_11.20.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27181: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi mayi dṛṣṭe 'khilātmani // BhP_11.20.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27183: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha // BhP_11.20.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27184: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27185: yogena dāna-dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api // BhP_11.20.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27187: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // BhP_11.20.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27188: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama /
GP10bhp1-12u:27189: vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam // BhP_11.20.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27191: tasmān nirāśiṣo bhaktir nirapekṣasya me bhavet // BhP_11.20.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27193: sādhūnāṃ sama-cittānāṃ buddheḥ param upeyuṣām // BhP_11.20.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27194: evam etān mayā diṣṭān anutiṣṭhanti me pathaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27195: kṣemaṃ vindanti mat-sthānaṃ yad brahma paramaṃ viduḥ // BhP_11.20.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27196: BhP_11.21.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca ya etān mat-patho hitvā bhakti-jñāna-kriyātmakān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27197: kṣudrān kāmāṃś calaiḥ prāṇair juṣantaḥ saṃsaranti te // BhP_11.21.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27198: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27199: viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ // BhP_11.21.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27203: darśito 'yaṃ mayācāro dharmam udvahatāṃ dhuram // BhP_11.21.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27209: guṇa-doṣau vidhīyete niyamārthaṃ hi karmaṇām // BhP_11.21.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27212: karmaṇyo guṇavān kālo dravyataḥ svata eva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27213: yato nivartate karma sa doṣo 'karmakaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhP_11.21.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27214: dravyasya śuddhy-aśuddhī ca dravyeṇa vacanena ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27216: śaktyāśaktyātha vā buddhyā samṛddhyā ca yad ātmane /
GP10bhp1-12u:27217: aghaṃ kurvanti hi yathā deśāvasthānusārataḥ // BhP_11.21.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27221: bhajate prakṛtiṃ tasya tac chaucaṃ tāvad iṣyate // BhP_11.21.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27223: mat-smṛtyā cātmanaḥ śaucaṃ śuddhaḥ karmācared dvijaḥ // BhP_11.21.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27225: dharmaḥ sampadyate ṣaḍbhir adharmas tu viparyayaḥ // BhP_11.21.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27226: kvacid guṇo 'pi doṣaḥ syād doṣo 'pi vidhinā guṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27229: autpattiko guṇaḥ saṅgo na śayānaḥ pataty adhaḥ // BhP_11.21.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27230: yato yato nivarteta vimucyeta tatas tataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27231: eṣa dharmo nṛṇāṃ kṣemaḥ śoka-moha-bhayāpahaḥ // BhP_11.21.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27232: viṣayeṣu guṇādhyāsāt puṃsaḥ saṅgas tato bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27233: saṅgāt tatra bhavet kāmaḥ kāmād eva kalir nṛṇām // BhP_11.21.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27234: kaler durviṣahaḥ krodhas tamas tam anuvartate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27235: tamasā grasyate puṃsaś cetanā vyāpinī drutam // BhP_11.21.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27236: tayā virahitaḥ sādho jantuḥ śūnyāya kalpate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27237: tato 'sya svārtha-vibhraṃśo mūrcchitasya mṛtasya ca // BhP_11.21.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27239: vṛkṣa jīvikayā jīvan vyarthaṃ bhastreva yaḥ śvasan // BhP_11.21.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27240: phala-śrutir iyaṃ nṝṇāṃ na śreyo rocanaṃ param /
GP10bhp1-12u:27242: utpattyaiva hi kāmeṣu prāṇeṣu sva-janeṣu ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27245: kathaṃ yuñjyāt punas teṣu tāṃs tamo viśato budhaḥ // BhP_11.21.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27247: phala-śrutiṃ kusumitāṃ na veda-jñā vadanti hi // BhP_11.21.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27249: agni-mugdhā dhūma-tāntāḥ svaṃ lokaṃ na vidanti te // BhP_11.21.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27250: na te mām aṅga jānanti hṛdi-sthaṃ ya idaṃ yataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27251: uktha-śastrā hy asu-tṛpo yathā nīhāra-cakṣuṣaḥ // BhP_11.21.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27252: te me matam avijñāya parokṣaṃ viṣayātmakāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27253: hiṃsāyāṃ yadi rāgaḥ syād yajña eva na codanā // BhP_11.21.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27255: yajante devatā yajñaiḥ pitṛ-bhūta-patīn khalāḥ // BhP_11.21.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27257: āśiṣo hṛdi saṅkalpya tyajanty arthān yathā vaṇik // BhP_11.21.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27259: upāsata indra-mukhyān devādīn na yathaiva mām // BhP_11.21.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27260: iṣṭveha devatā yajñair gatvā raṃsyāmahe divi /
GP10bhp1-12u:27261: tasyānta iha bhūyāsma mahā-śālā mahā-kulāḥ // BhP_11.21.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27263: mānināṃ cāti-lubdhānāṃ mad-vārtāpi na rocate // BhP_11.21.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27265: parokṣa-vādā ṛṣayaḥ parokṣaṃ mama ca priyam // BhP_11.21.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27271: ākāśād ghoṣavān prāṇo manasā sparśa-rūpiṇā // BhP_11.21.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27275: ananta-pārāṃ bṛhatīṃ sṛjaty ākṣipate svayam // BhP_11.21.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27276: gāyatry uṣṇig anuṣṭup ca bṛhatī paṅktir eva ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27277: triṣṭub jagaty aticchando hy atyaṣṭy-atijagad-virāṭ // BhP_11.21.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27278: kiṃ vidhatte kim ācaṣṭe kim anūdya vikalpayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27279: ity asyā hṛdayaṃ loke nānyo mad veda kaścana // BhP_11.21.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27280: māṃ vidhatte 'bhidhatte māṃ vikalpyāpohyate tv aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:27281: etāvān sarva-vedārthaḥ śabda āsthāya māṃ bhidām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27283: BhP_11.22.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca kati tattvāni viśveśa saṅkhyātāny ṛṣibhiḥ prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:27284: navaikādaśa pañca trīṇy āttha tvam iha śuśruma // BhP_11.22.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27286: saptaike nava ṣaṭ kecic catvāry ekādaśāpare /
GP10bhp1-12u:27287: kecit saptadaśa prāhuḥ ṣoḍaśaike trayodaśa // BhP_11.22.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27289: gāyanti pṛthag āyuṣmann idaṃ no vaktum arhasi // BhP_11.22.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27290: BhP_11.22.004/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca yuktaṃ ca santi sarvatra bhāṣante brāhmaṇā yathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27291: māyāṃ madīyām udgṛhya vadatāṃ kiṃ nu durghaṭam // BhP_11.22.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27292: naitad evaṃ yathāttha tvaṃ yad ahaṃ vacmi tat tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27293: evaṃ vivadatāṃ hetuṃ śaktayo me duratyayāḥ // BhP_11.22.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27294: yāsāṃ vyatikarād āsīd vikalpo vadatāṃ padam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27295: prāpte śama-dame 'pyeti vādas tam anu śāmyati // BhP_11.22.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27299: pūrvasmin vā parasmin vā tattve tattvāni sarvaśaḥ // BhP_11.22.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27301: yathā viviktaṃ yad-vaktraṃ gṛhṇīmo yukti-sambhavāt // BhP_11.22.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27303: svato na sambhavād anyas tattva-jño jñāna-do bhavet // BhP_11.22.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27304: puruṣeśvarayor atra na vailakṣaṇyam aṇv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:27305: tad-anya-kalpanāpārthā jñānaṃ ca prakṛter guṇaḥ // BhP_11.22.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27306: prakṛtir guṇa-sāmyaṃ vai prakṛter nātmano guṇāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27307: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti sthity-utpatty-anta-hetavaḥ // BhP_11.22.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27308: sattvaṃ jñānaṃ rajaḥ karma tamo 'jñānam ihocyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27309: guṇa-vyatikaraḥ kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sūtram eva ca // BhP_11.22.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27311: jyotir āpaḥ kṣitir iti tattvāny uktāni me nava // BhP_11.22.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27312: śrotraṃ tvag darśanaṃ ghrāṇo jihveti jñāna-śaktayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27314: śabdaḥ sparśo raso gandho rūpaṃ cety artha-jātayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27317: sattvādibhir guṇair dhatte puruṣo 'vyakta īkṣate // BhP_11.22.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27319: labdha-vīryāḥ sṛjanty aṇḍaṃ saṃhatāḥ prakṛter balāt // BhP_11.22.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27320: saptaiva dhātava iti tatrārthāḥ pañca khādayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27322: ṣaḍ ity atrāpi bhūtāni pañca ṣaṣṭhaḥ paraḥ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27323: tair yuita ātma-sambhūtaiḥ sṛṣṭvedaṃ samapāviśat // BhP_11.22.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27324: catvāry eveti tatrāpi teja āpo 'nnam ātmanaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27325: jātāni tair idaṃ jātaṃ janmāvayavinaḥ khalu // BhP_11.22.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27327: pañca pañcaika-manasā ātmā saptadaśaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhP_11.22.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27329: bhūtendriyāṇi pañcaiva mana ātmā trayodaśa // BhP_11.22.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27331: aṣṭau prakṛtayaś caiva puruṣaś ca navety atha // BhP_11.22.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27333: sarvaṃ nyāyyaṃ yuktimattvād viduṣāṃ kim aśobhanam // BhP_11.22.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27334: BhP_11.22.026/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś cobhau yady apy ātma-vilakṣaṇau /
GP10bhp1-12u:27335: anyonyāpāśrayāt kṛṣṇa dṛśyate na bhidā tayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27336: prakṛtau lakṣyate hy ātmā prakṛtiś ca tathātmani // BhP_11.22.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27337: evaṃ me puṇḍarīkākṣa mahāntaṃ saṃśayaṃ hṛdi /
GP10bhp1-12u:27338: chettum arhasi sarva-jña vacobhir naya-naipuṇaiḥ // BhP_11.22.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27339: tvatto jñānaṃ hi jīvānāṃ pramoṣas te 'tra śaktitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27340: tvam eva hy ātma-māyāyā gatiṃ vettha na cāparaḥ // BhP_11.22.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27341: BhP_11.22.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś ceti vikalpaḥ puruṣarṣabha /
GP10bhp1-12u:27343: mamāṅga māyā guṇa-mayy anekadhā vikalpa-buddhīś ca guṇair vidhatte /
GP10bhp1-12u:27344: vaikārikas tri-vidho 'dhyātmam ekam athādhidaivam adhibhūtam anyat //
GP10bhp1-12u:27345: dṛg rūpam ārkaṃ vapur atra randhre parasparaṃ sidhyati yaḥ svataḥ khe /
GP10bhp1-12u:27346: ātmā yad eṣām aparo ya ādyaḥ svayānubhūtyākhila-siddha-siddhiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27347: evaṃ tvag-ādi śravaṇādi cakṣur jihvādi nāsādi ca citta-yuktam //
GP10bhp1-12u:27348: yo 'sau guṇa-kṣobha-kṛto vikāraḥ pradhāna-mūlān mahataḥ prasūtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27349: ahaṃ tri-vṛn moha-vikalpa-hetur vaikārikas tāmasa aindriyaś ca //
GP10bhp1-12u:27350: ātmāparijñāna-mayo vivādo hy astīti nāstīti bhidārtha-niṣṭhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27351: vyartho 'pi naivoparameta puṃsāṃ mattaḥ parāvṛtta-dhiyāṃ sva-lokāt //
GP10bhp1-12u:27352: BhP_11.22.035/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca tvattaḥ parāvṛtta-dhiyaḥ sva-kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ prabho /
GP10bhp1-12u:27353: uccāvacān yathā dehān gṛhṇanti visṛjanti ca // BhP_11.22.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27355: na hy etat prāyaśo loke vidvāṃsaḥ santi vañcitāḥ // BhP_11.22.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27356: BhP_11.22.037/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca manaḥ karma-mayaṃ ṇṝṇām indriyaiḥ pañcabhir yutam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27357: lokāl lokaṃ prayāty anya ātmā tad anuvartate // BhP_11.22.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27358: dhyāyan mano 'nu viṣayān dṛṣṭān vānuśrutān atha /
GP10bhp1-12u:27359: udyat sīdat karma-tantraṃ smṛtis tad anu śāmyati // BhP_11.22.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27361: jantor vai kasyacid dhetor mṛtyur atyanta-vismṛtiḥ // BhP_11.22.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27362: janma tv ātmatayā puṃsaḥ sarva-bhāvena bhūri-da /
GP10bhp1-12u:27364: svapnaṃ manorathaṃ cetthaṃ prāktanaṃ na smaraty asau /
GP10bhp1-12u:27365: tatra pūrvam ivātmānam apūrvam cānupaśyati // BhP_11.22.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27368: nityadā hy aṅga bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27369: kālenālakṣya-vegena sūkṣmatvāt tan na dṛśyate // BhP_11.22.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27370: yathārciṣāṃ srotasāṃ ca phalānāṃ vā vanaspateḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27372: so 'yaṃ dīpo 'rciṣāṃ yadvat srotasāṃ tad idaṃ jalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27373: so 'yaṃ pumān iti nṛṇāṃ mṛṣā gīr dhīr mṛṣāyuṣām // BhP_11.22.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27374: mā svasya karma-bījena jāyate so 'py ayaṃ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27375: mriyate vāmaro bhrāntyā yathāgnir dāru-saṃyutaḥ // BhP_11.22.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27377: vayo-madhyaṃ jarā mṛtyur ity avasthās tanor nava // BhP_11.22.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27379: guṇa-saṅgād upādatte kvacit kaścij jahāti ca // BhP_11.22.048 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27383: taror vilakṣaṇo draṣṭā evaṃ draṣṭā tanoḥ pṛthak // BhP_11.22.050 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27387: tamasā bhūta-tiryaktvaṃ bhrāmito yāti karmabhiḥ // BhP_11.22.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27389: evaṃ buddhi-guṇān paśyann anīho 'py anukāryate // BhP_11.22.053 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27391: cakṣusā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate bhramatīva bhūḥ // BhP_11.22.054 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27393: svapna-dṛṣṭāś ca dāśārha tathā saṃsāra ātmanaḥ // BhP_11.22.055 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27394: arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27395: dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā // BhP_11.22.056 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27396: tasmād uddhava mā bhuṅkṣva viṣayān asad-indriyaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27399: tāḍitaḥ sanniruddho vā vṛttyā vā parihāpitaḥ // BhP_11.22.058 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27402: BhP_11.22.060/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca yathaivam anubudhyeyaṃ vada no vadatāṃ vara /
GP10bhp1-12u:27403: su-duḥṣaham imaṃ manya ātmany asad-atikramam // BhP_11.22.060 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27404: viduṣām api viśvātman prakṛtir hi balīyasī /
GP10bhp1-12u:27405: ṛte tvad-dharma-niratān śāntāṃs te caraṇālayān // BhP_11.22.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27406: BhP_11.23.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca sa evam āśaṃsita uddhavena bhāgavata-mukhyena dāśārha-mukhyaḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:27407: sabhājayan bhṛtya-vaco mukundas tam ābabhāṣe śravaṇīya-vīryaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27408: BhP_11.23.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca bārhaspatya sa nāsty atra sādhur vai durjaneritaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27409: duraktair bhinnam ātmānaṃ yaḥ samādhātum īśvaraḥ // BhP_11.23.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27410: na tathā tapyate viddhaḥ pumān bāṇais tu marma-gaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27411: yathā tudanti marma-sthā hy asatāṃ paruṣeṣavaḥ // BhP_11.23.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27413: tam ahaṃ varṇayiṣyāmi nibodha su-samāhitaḥ // BhP_11.23.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27416: avantiṣu dvijaḥ kaścid āsīd āḍhyatamaḥ śriyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27417: vārtā-vṛttiḥ kadaryas tu kāmī lubdho 'ti-kopanaḥ // BhP_11.23.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27419: śūnyāvasatha ātmāpi kāle kāmair anarcitaḥ // BhP_11.23.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27421: dārā duhitaro bhṛtyā viṣaṇṇā nācaran priyam // BhP_11.23.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27426: jñātyo jagṛhuḥ kiñcit kiñcid dasyava uddhava /
GP10bhp1-12u:27427: daivataḥ kālataḥ kiñcid brahma-bandhor nṛ-pārthivāt // BhP_11.23.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27429: upekṣitaś ca sva-janaiś cintām āpa duratyayām // BhP_11.23.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27431: khidyato bāṣpa-kaṇṭhasya nirvedaḥ su-mahān abhūt // BhP_11.23.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27432: sa cāhedam aho kaṣṭaṃ vṛthātmā me 'nutāpitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27433: na dharmāya na kāmāya yasyārthāyāsa īdṛśaḥ // BhP_11.23.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27435: iha cātmopatāpāya mṛtasya narakāya ca // BhP_11.23.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27436: yaśo yaśasvināṃ śuddhaṃ ślāghyā ye guṇināṃ guṇāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27437: lobhaḥ sv-alpo 'pi tān hanti śvitro rūpam ivepsitam // BhP_11.23.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27438: arthasya sādhane siddhe utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye /
GP10bhp1-12u:27439: nāśopabhoga āyāsas trāsaś cintā bhramo nṛṇām // BhP_11.23.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27440: steyaṃ hiṃsānṛtaṃ dambhaḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ smayo madaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27441: bhedo vairam aviśvāsaḥ saṃspardhā vyasanāni ca // BhP_11.23.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27442: ete pañcadaśānarthā hy artha-mūlā matā nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27443: tasmād anartham arthākhyaṃ śreyo-'rthī dūratas tyajet // BhP_11.23.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27444: bhidyante bhrātaro dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdas tathā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27445: ekāsnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyaḥ sarve 'rayaḥ kṛtāḥ // BhP_11.23.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27447: tyajanty āśu spṛdho ghnanti sahasotsṛjya sauhṛdam // BhP_11.23.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27449: tad anādṛtya ye svārthaṃ ghnanti yānty aśubhāṃ gatim // BhP_11.23.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27450: svargāpavargayor dvāraṃ prāpya lokam imaṃ pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27453: asaṃvibhajya cātmānaṃ yakṣa-vittaḥ pataty adhaḥ // BhP_11.23.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27455: kuśalā yena sidhyanti jaraṭhaḥ kiṃ nu sādhaye // BhP_11.23.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27457: kasyacin māyayā nūnaṃ loko 'yaṃ su-vimohitaḥ // BhP_11.23.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27458: kiṃ dhanair dhana-dair vā kiṃ kāmair vā kāma-dair uta /
GP10bhp1-12u:27459: mṛtyunā grasyamānasya karmabhir vota janma-daiḥ // BhP_11.23.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27460: nūnaṃ me bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ sarva-deva-mayo hariḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27461: yena nīto daśām etāṃ nirvedaś cātmanaḥ plavaḥ // BhP_11.23.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27463: apramatto 'khila-svārthe yadi syāt siddha ātmani // BhP_11.23.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27466: BhP_11.23.031/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca ity abhipretya manasā hy āvantyo dvija-sattamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27467: unmucya hṛdaya-granthīn śānto bhikṣur abhūn muniḥ // BhP_11.23.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27470: taṃ vai pravayasaṃ bhikṣum avadhūtam asaj-janāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27471: dṛṣṭvā paryabhavan bhadra bahvībhiḥ paribhūtibhiḥ // BhP_11.23.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27472: kecit tri-veṇuṃ jagṛhur eke pātraṃ kamaṇḍalum /
GP10bhp1-12u:27473: pīṭhaṃ caike 'kṣa-sūtraṃ ca kanthāṃ cīrāṇi kecana /
GP10bhp1-12u:27474: pradāya ca punas tāni darśitāny ādadur muneḥ // BhP_11.23.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27476: mūtrayanti ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ ṣṭhīvanty asya ca mūrdhani // BhP_11.23.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27477: yata-vācaṃ vācayanti tāḍayanti na vakti cet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27478: tarjayanty apare vāgbhiḥ steno 'yam iti vādinaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27479: badhnanti rajjvā taṃ kecid badhyatāṃ badhyatām iti // BhP_11.23.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27481: kṣīṇa-vitta imāṃ vṛttim agrahīt sva-janojjhitaḥ // BhP_11.23.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27482: aho eṣa mahā-sāro dhṛtimān giri-rāḍ iva /
GP10bhp1-12u:27483: maunena sādhayaty arthaṃ baka-vad dṛḍha-niścayaḥ // BhP_11.23.038 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27484: ity eke vihasanty enam eke durvātayanti ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27485: taṃ babandhur nirurudhur yathā krīḍanakaṃ dvijam // BhP_11.23.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27486: evaṃ sa bhautikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daivikaṃ daihikaṃ ca yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27487: bhoktavyam ātmano diṣṭaṃ prāptaṃ prāptam abudhyata // BhP_11.23.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27489: pātayadbhiḥ sva dharma-stho dhṛtim āsthāya sāttvikīm // BhP_11.23.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27490: BhP_11.23.042/0 dvija uvāca nāyaṃ jano me sukha-duḥkha-hetur na devatātmā graha-karma-kālāḥ
GP10bhp1-12u:27491: manaḥ paraṃ kāraṇam āmananti saṃsāra-cakraṃ parivartayed yat //
GP10bhp1-12u:27492: mano guṇān vai sṛjate balīyas tataś ca karmāṇi vilakṣaṇāni /
GP10bhp1-12u:27493: śuklāni kṛṣṇāny atha lohitāni tebhyaḥ sa-varṇāḥ sṛtayo bhavanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:27494: anīha ātmā manasā samīhatā hiraṇ-mayo mat-sakha udvicaṣṭe /
GP10bhp1-12u:27495: manaḥ sva-liṅgaṃ parigṛhya kāmān juṣan nibaddho guṇa-saṅgato 'sau //
GP10bhp1-12u:27496: dānaṃ sva-dharmo niyamo yamaś ca śrutaṃ ca karmāṇi ca sad-vratāni /
GP10bhp1-12u:27497: sarve mano-nigraha-lakṣaṇāntāḥ paro hi yogo manasaḥ samādhiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27498: samāhitaṃ yasya manaḥ praśāntaṃ dānādibhiḥ kiṃ vada tasya kṛtyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27499: asaṃyataṃ yasya mano vinaśyad dānādibhiś ced aparaṃ kim ebhiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27500: mano-vaśe 'nye hy abhavan sma devā manaś ca nānyasya vaśaṃ sameti /
GP10bhp1-12u:27501: bhīṣmo hi devaḥ sahasaḥ sahīyān yuñjyād vaśe taṃ sa hi deva-devaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27502: tam durjayaṃ śatrum asahya-vegam arun-tudaṃ tan na vijitya kecit /
GP10bhp1-12u:27503: kurvanty asad-vigraham atra martyair mitrāṇy udāsīna-ripūn vimūḍhāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27504: dehaṃ mano-mātram imaṃ gṛhītvā mamāham ity andha-dhiyo manuṣyāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27505: eṣo 'ham anyo 'yam iti bhrameṇa duranta-pāre tamasi bhramanti //
GP10bhp1-12u:27506: janas tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanaś cātra hi bhaumayos tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27507: jihvāṃ kvacit sandaśati sva-dadbhis tad-vedanāyāṃ katamāya kupyet //
GP10bhp1-12u:27508: duḥkhasya hetur yadi devatās tu kim ātmanas tatra vikārayos tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27509: yad aṅgam aṅgena nihanyate kvacit krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ sva-dehe //
GP10bhp1-12u:27510: ātmā yadi syāt sukha-duḥkha-hetuḥ kim anyatas tatra nija-svabhāvaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27511: na hy ātmano 'nyad yadi tan mṛṣā syāt krudhyeta kasmān na sukhaṃ na
GP10bhp1-12u:27513: grahā nimittaṃ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmano 'jasya janasya te vai /
GP10bhp1-12u:27514: grahair grahasyaiva vadanti pīḍāṃ krudhyeta kasmai puruṣas tato 'nyaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27515: karmāstu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanas tad dhi jaḍājaḍatve /
GP10bhp1-12u:27516: dehas tv acit puruṣo 'yaṃ suparṇaḥ krudhyeta kasmai na hi karma mūlam //
GP10bhp1-12u:27517: kālas tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanas tatra tad-ātmako 'sau /
GP10bhp1-12u:27518: nāgner hi tāpo na himasya tat syāt krudhyeta kasmai na parasya dvandvam //
GP10bhp1-12u:27519: na kenacit kvāpi kathañcanāsya dvandvoparāgaḥ parataḥ parasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:27520: yathāhamaḥ saṃsṛti-rūpiṇaḥ syād evaṃ prabuddho na bibheti bhūtaiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27521: etāṃ sa āsthāya parātma-niṣṭhām adhyāsitāṃ pūrvatamair maharṣibhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27523: BhP_11.23.058/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca nirvidya naṣṭa-draviṇe gata-klamaḥ pravrajya gāṃ paryaṭamāna ittham /
GP10bhp1-12u:27524: nirākṛto 'sadbhir api sva-dharmād akampito 'mūṃ munir āha gāthām //
GP10bhp1-12u:27527: tasmāt sarvātmanā tāta nigṛhāṇa mano dhiyā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27528: mayy āveśitayā yukta etāvān yoga-saṅgrahaḥ // BhP_11.23.060 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27529: ya etāṃ bhikṣuṇā gītāṃ brahma-niṣṭhāṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27530: dhārayañ chrāvayañ chṛṇvan dvandvair naivābhibhūyate // BhP_11.23.061 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27531: BhP_11.24.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca atha te sampravakṣyāmi sāṅkhyaṃ pūrvair viniścitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27532: yad vijñāya pumān sadyo jahyād vaikalpikaṃ bhramam // BhP_11.24.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27533: āsīj jñānam atho artha ekam evāvikalpitam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27536: vāṅ-mano-'gocaraṃ satyaṃ dvidhā samabhavad bṛhat // BhP_11.24.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27537: tayor ekataro hy arthaḥ prakṛtiḥ sobhayātmikā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27538: jñānaṃ tv anyatamo bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'bhidhīyate // BhP_11.24.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27539: tamo rajaḥ sattvam iti prakṛter abhavan guṇāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27541: tebhyaḥ samabhavat sūtraṃ mahān sūtreṇa saṃyutaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27542: tato vikurvato jāto yo 'haṅkāro vimohanaḥ // BhP_11.24.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27543: vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tri-vṛt /
GP10bhp1-12u:27545: arthas tan-mātrikāj jajñe tāmasād indriyāṇi ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:27546: taijasād devatā āsann ekādaśa ca vaikṛtāt // BhP_11.24.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27548: aṇḍam utpādayām āsur mamāyatanam uttamam // BhP_11.24.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27550: mama nābhyām abhūt padmaṃ viśvākhyaṃ tatra cātma-bhūḥ // BhP_11.24.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27552: lokān sa-pālān viśvātmā bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti tridhā // BhP_11.24.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27553: devānām oka āsīt svar bhūtānāṃ ca bhuvaḥ padam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27554: martyādīnāṃ ca bhūr lokaḥ siddhānāṃ tritayāt param // BhP_11.24.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27556: tri-lokyāṃ gatayaḥ sarvāḥ karmaṇāṃ tri-guṇātmanām // BhP_11.24.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27558: mahar janas tapaḥ satyaṃ bhakti-yogasya mad-gatiḥ // BhP_11.24.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27559: mayā kālātmanā dhātrā karma-yuktam idaṃ jagat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27561: aṇur bṛhat kṛśaḥ sthūlo yo yo bhāvaḥ prasidhyati /
GP10bhp1-12u:27562: sarvo 'py ubhaya-saṃyuktaḥ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca // BhP_11.24.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27563: yas tu yasyādir antaś ca sa vai madhyaṃ ca tasya san /
GP10bhp1-12u:27565: yad upādāya pūrvas tu bhāvo vikurute 'param /
GP10bhp1-12u:27566: ādir anto yadā yasya tat satyam abhidhīyate // BhP_11.24.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27568: sato 'bhivyañjakaḥ kālo brahma tat tritayaṃ tv aham // BhP_11.24.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27570: mahān guṇa-visargārthaḥ sthity-anto yāvad īkṣaṇam // BhP_11.24.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27572: pañcatvāya viśeṣāya kalpate bhuvanaiḥ saha // BhP_11.24.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27573: anne pralīyate martyam annaṃ dhānāsu līyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27574: dhānā bhūmau pralīyante bhūmir gandhe pralīyate // BhP_11.24.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27575: apsu pralīyate gandha āpaś ca sva-guṇe rase /
GP10bhp1-12u:27576: līyate jyotiṣi raso jyotī rūpe pralīyate // BhP_11.24.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27577: rūpaṃ vāyau sa ca sparśe līyate so 'pi cāmbare /
GP10bhp1-12u:27580: śabdo bhūtādim apyeti bhūtādir mahati prabhuḥ // BhP_11.24.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27581: sa līyate mahān sveṣu guṇesu guṇa-vattamaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27582: te 'vyakte sampralīyante tat kāle līyate 'vyaye // BhP_11.24.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27583: kālo māyā-maye jīve jīva ātmani mayy aje /
GP10bhp1-12u:27586: manaso hṛdi tiṣṭheta vyomnīvārkodaye tamaḥ // BhP_11.24.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27589: BhP_11.25.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca guṇānām asammiśrāṇāṃ pumān yena yathā bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27590: tan me puruṣa-varyedam upadhāraya śaṃsataḥ // BhP_11.25.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27591: śamo damas titikṣekṣā tapaḥ satyaṃ dayā smṛtiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27592: tuṣṭis tyāgo 'spṛhā śraddhā hrīr dayādiḥ sva-nirvṛtiḥ // BhP_11.25.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27593: kāma īhā madas tṛṣṇā stambha āśīr bhidā sukham /
GP10bhp1-12u:27594: madotsāho yaśaḥ-prītir hāsyaṃ vīryaṃ balodyamaḥ // BhP_11.25.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27595: krodho lobho 'nṛtaṃ hiṃsā yācñā dambhaḥ klamaḥ kaliḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27596: śoka-mohau viṣādārtī nidrāśā bhīr anudyamaḥ // BhP_11.25.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27598: vṛttayo varṇita-prāyāḥ sannipātam atho śṛṇu // BhP_11.25.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27599: sannipātas tv aham iti mamety uddhava yā matiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27601: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca yadāsau pariniṣṭhitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27604: sva-dharme cānu tiṣṭheta guṇānāṃ samitir hi sā // BhP_11.25.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27606: kāmādibhī rajo-yuktaṃ krodhādyais tamasā yutam // BhP_11.25.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27607: yadā bhajati māṃ bhaktyā nirapekṣaḥ sva-karmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27608: taṃ sattva-prakṛtiṃ vidyāt puruṣaṃ striyam eva vā // BhP_11.25.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27609: yadā āśiṣa āśāsya māṃ bhajeta sva-karmabhiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27610: taṃ rajaḥ-prakṛtiṃ vidyāt hiṃsām āśāsya tāmasam // BhP_11.25.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27611: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā jīvasya naiva me /
GP10bhp1-12u:27612: citta-jā yais tu bhūtānāṃ sajjamāno nibadhyate // BhP_11.25.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27613: yadetarau jayet sattvaṃ bhāsvaraṃ viśadaṃ śivam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27614: tadā sukhena yujyeta dharma-jñānādibhiḥ pumān // BhP_11.25.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27615: yadā jayet tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ saṅgaṃ bhidā calam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27616: tadā duḥkhena yujyeta karmaṇā yaśasā śriyā // BhP_11.25.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27617: yadā jayed rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamo mūḍhaṃ layaṃ jaḍam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27619: yadā cittaṃ prasīdeta indriyāṇāṃ ca nirvṛtiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27620: dehe 'bhayaṃ mano-'saṅgaṃ tat sattvaṃ viddhi mat-padam // BhP_11.25.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27621: vikurvan kriyayā cā-dhīr anivṛttiś ca cetasām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27622: gātrāsvāsthyaṃ mano bhrāntaṃ raja etair niśāmaya // BhP_11.25.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27624: mano naṣṭaṃ tamo glānis tamas tad upadhāraya // BhP_11.25.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27625: edhamāne guṇe sattve devānāṃ balam edhate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27626: asurāṇāṃ ca rajasi tamasy uddhava rakṣasām // BhP_11.25.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27627: sattvāj jāgaraṇaṃ vidyād rajasā svapnam ādiśet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27628: prasvāpaṃ tamasā jantos turīyaṃ triṣu santatam // BhP_11.25.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27629: upary upari gacchanti sattvena brāhmaṇā janāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27631: sattve pralīnāḥ svar yānti nara-lokaṃ rajo-layāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27632: tamo-layās tu nirayaṃ yānti mām eva nirguṇāḥ // BhP_11.25.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27633: mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma tat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27635: kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ ca yat /
GP10bhp1-12u:27636: prākṛtaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ man-niṣṭhaṃ nirguṇaṃ smṛtam // BhP_11.25.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27637: vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27638: tāmasaṃ dyūta-sadanaṃ man-niketaṃ tu nirguṇam // BhP_11.25.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27641: sāttviky ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma-śraddhā tu rājasī /
GP10bhp1-12u:27642: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā // BhP_11.25.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27643: pathyaṃ pūtam anāyastam āhāryaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27645: sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27647: dravyaṃ deśaḥ phalaṃ kālo jñānaṃ karma ca kārakaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27648: śraddhāvasthākṛtir niṣṭhā trai-guṇyaḥ sarva eva hi // BhP_11.25.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27650: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ anudhyātaṃ buddhyā vā puruṣarṣabha // BhP_11.25.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27652: yeneme nirjitāḥ saumya guṇā jīvena citta-jāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27655: guṇa-saṅgaṃ vinirdhūya māṃ bhajantu vicakṣaṇāḥ // BhP_11.25.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27656: niḥsaṅgo māṃ bhajed vidvān apramatto jitendriyaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27657: rajas tamaś cābhijayet sattva-saṃsevayā muniḥ // BhP_11.25.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27659: sampadyate guṇair mukto jīvo jīvaṃ vihāya mām // BhP_11.25.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27661: mayaiva brahmaṇā pūrṇo na bahir nāntaraś caret // BhP_11.25.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27663: mal-lakṣaṇam imaṃ kāyaṃ labdhvā mad-dharma āsthitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27664: ānandaṃ paramātmānam ātma-sthaṃ samupaiti mām // BhP_11.26.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27667: vartamāno 'pi na pumān yujyate 'vastubhir guṇaiḥ // BhP_11.26.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27668: saṅgaṃ na kuryād asatāṃ śiśnodara-tṛpāṃ kvacit /
GP10bhp1-12u:27669: tasyānugas tamasy andhe pataty andhānugāndha-vat // BhP_11.26.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27670: ailaḥ samrāḍ imāṃ gāthām agāyata bṛhac-chravāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27672: tyaktvātmānaṃ vrayantīṃ tāṃ nagna unmatta-van nṛpaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27673: vilapann anvagāj jāye ghore tiṣṭheti viklavaḥ // BhP_11.26.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27675: na veda yāntīr nāyāntīr urvaśy-ākṛṣṭa-cetanaḥ // BhP_11.26.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27676: BhP_11.26.007/0 aila uvāca aho me moha-vistāraḥ kāma-kaśmala-cetasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27677: devyā gṛhīta-kaṇṭhasya nāyuḥ-khaṇḍā ime smṛtāḥ // BhP_11.26.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27679: mūṣito varṣa-pūgānāṃ batāhāni gatāny uta // BhP_11.26.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27680: aho me ātma-sammoho yenātmā yoṣitāṃ kṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27683: yāntīṃ striyaṃ cānvagamaṃ nagna unmatta-vad rudan // BhP_11.26.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27684: kutas tasyānubhāvaḥ syāt teja īśatvam eva vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27685: yo 'nvagacchaṃ striyaṃ yāntīṃ khara-vat pāda-tāḍitaḥ // BhP_11.26.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27686: kiṃ vidyayā kiṃ tapasā kiṃ tyāgena śrutena vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:27687: kiṃ viviktena maunena strībhir yasya mano hṛtam // BhP_11.26.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27689: yo 'ham īśvaratāṃ prāpya strībhir go-khara-vaj jitaḥ // BhP_11.26.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27691: na tṛpyaty ātma-bhūḥ kāmo vahnir āhutibhir yathā // BhP_11.26.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27692: puṃścalyāpahṛtaṃ cittaṃ ko nv anyo mocituṃ prabhuḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27696: kim etayā no 'pakṛtaṃ rajjvā vā sarpa-cetasaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27697: draṣṭuḥ svarūpāviduṣo yo 'haṃ yad ajitendriyaḥ // BhP_11.26.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27699: kva guṇāḥ saumanasyādyā hy adhyāso 'vidyayā kṛtaḥ // BhP_11.26.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27700: pitroḥ kiṃ svaṃ nu bhāryāyāḥ svāmino 'gneḥ śva-gṛdhrayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27701: kim ātmanaḥ kiṃ suhṛdām iti yo nāvasīyate // BhP_11.26.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27703: aho su-bhadraṃ su-nasaṃ su-smitaṃ ca mukhaṃ striyaḥ // BhP_11.26.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27705: viṇ-mūtra-pūye ramatāṃ kṛmīṇāṃ kiyad antaram // BhP_11.26.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27708: adṛṣṭād aśrutād bhāvān na bhāva upajāyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27709: asamprayuñjataḥ prāṇān śāmyati stimitaṃ manaḥ // BhP_11.26.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27710: tasmāt saṅgo na kartavyaḥ strīṣu straiṇeṣu cendriyaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27711: viduṣāṃ cāpy avisrabdhaḥ ṣaḍ-vargaḥ kim u mādṛśām // BhP_11.26.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27712: BhP_11.26.025/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca evaṃ pragāyan nṛpa-deva-devaḥ sa urvaśī-lokam atho vihāya
GP10bhp1-12u:27713: ātmānam ātmany avagamya māṃ vai upāramaj jñāana-vidhūta-mohaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27714: tato duḥsaṅgam utsṛjya satsu sajjeta buddhimān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27715: santa evāsya chindanti mano-vyāsaṅgam uktibhiḥ // BhP_11.26.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27719: sambhavanti hi tā nṝṇāṃ juṣatāṃ prapunanty agham // BhP_11.26.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27720: tā ye śṛṇvanti gāyanti hy anumodanti cādṛtāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27721: mat-parāḥ śraddadhānāś ca bhaktiṃ vindanti te mayi // BhP_11.26.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27722: bhaktiṃ labdhavataḥ sādhoḥ kim anyad avaśiṣyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:27725: śītaṃ bhayaṃ tamo 'pyeti sādhūn saṃsevatas tathā // BhP_11.26.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27727: santo brahma-vidaḥ śāntā naur dṛḍhevāpsu majjatām // BhP_11.26.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27728: annaṃ hi prāṇināṃ prāṇa ārtānāṃ śaraṇaṃ tv aham /
GP10bhp1-12u:27729: dharmo vittaṃ nṛṇāṃ pretya santo 'rvāg bibhyato 'raṇam // BhP_11.26.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27730: santo diśanti cakṣūṃsi bahir arkaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27731: devatā bāndhavāḥ santaḥ santa ātmāham eva ca // BhP_11.26.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27733: mukta-saṅgo mahīm etām ātmārāmaś cacāra ha // BhP_11.26.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27736: yasmāt tvāṃ ye yathārcanti sātvatāḥ sātvatarṣabha // BhP_11.27.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27737: etad vadanti munayo muhur niḥśreyasaṃ nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27738: nārado bhagavān vyāsa ācāryo 'ṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ // BhP_11.27.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27739: niḥsṛtaṃ te mukhāmbhojād yad āha bhagavān ajaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27740: putrebhyo bhṛgu-mukhyebhyo devyai ca bhagavān bhavaḥ // BhP_11.27.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27741: etad vai sarva-varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca sammatam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27742: śreyasām uttamaṃ manye strī-śūdrāṇāṃ ca māna-da // BhP_11.27.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27745: BhP_11.27.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca na hy anto 'nanta-pārasya karma-kāṇḍasya coddhava /
GP10bhp1-12u:27747: vaidikas tāntriko miśra iti me tri-vidho makhaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27748: trayāṇām īpsitenaiva vidhinā māṃ samarcaret // BhP_11.27.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27750: yathā yajeta māṃ bhaktyā śraddhayā tan nibodha me // BhP_11.27.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27751: arcāyāṃ sthaṇḍile 'gnau vā sūrye vāpsu hṛdi dvijaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27752: dravyeṇa bhakti-yukto 'rcet sva-guruṃ mām amāyayā // BhP_11.27.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27754: ubhayair api ca snānaṃ mantrair mṛd-grahaṇādinā // BhP_11.27.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27756: pūjāṃ taiḥ kalpayet samyak- saṅkalpaḥ karma-pāvanīm // BhP_11.27.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27757: śailī dāru-mayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:27760: udvāsāvāhane na staḥ sthirāyām uddhavārcane // BhP_11.27.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27761: asthirāyāṃ vikalpaḥ syāt sthaṇḍile tu bhaved dvayam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27762: snapanaṃ tv avilepyāyām anyatra parimārjanam // BhP_11.27.014 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27849: sa āśu bhraśyate svārthād asaty abhiniveśataḥ // BhP_11.28.002 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27862: na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūrya-vat // BhP_11.28.008 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27865: BhP_11.28.010/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca naivātmano na dehasya saṃsṛtir draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27866: anātma-sva-dṛśor īśa kasya syād upalabhyate // BhP_11.28.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27868: agni-vad dāru-vad acid dehaḥ kasyeha saṃsṛtiḥ // BhP_11.28.011 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27870: saṃsāraḥ phalavāṃs tāvad apārtho 'py avivekinaḥ // BhP_11.28.012 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27874: sa eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate // BhP_11.28.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27876: ahaṅkārasya dṛśyante janma-mṛtyuś ca nātmanaḥ // BhP_11.28.015 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27880: jñānāsinopāsanayā śitena cchittvā munir gāṃ vicaraty atṛṣṇaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:27881: jñānaṃ viveko nigamas tapaś ca pratyakṣam aitihyam athānumānam /

GP10bhp1-12u:27883: yathā hiraṇyaṃ sv-akṛtaṃ purastāt paścāc ca sarvasya hiraṇ-mayasya /
GP10bhp1-12u:27884: tad eva madhye vyavahāryamāṇaṃ nānāpadeśair aham asya tadvat //
GP10bhp1-12u:27885: vijñānam etat triy-avastham aṅga guṇa-trayaṃ kāraṇa-karya-kartṛ /
GP10bhp1-12u:27886: samanvayena vyatirekataś ca yenaiva turyeṇa tad eva satyam //
GP10bhp1-12u:27887: na yat purastād uta yan na paścān madhye ca tan na vyapadeśa-mātram /
GP10bhp1-12u:27888: bhūtaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca pareṇa yad yat tad eva tat syād iti me manīṣā //
GP10bhp1-12u:27889: avidyamāno 'py avabhāsate yo vaikāriko rājasa-sarga esaḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:27899: tathāpi saṅgaḥ parivarjanīyo guṇeṣu māyā-raciteṣu tāvat /

GP10bhp1-12u:27901: yathāmayo 'sādhu cikitsito nṛṇāṃ punaḥ punaḥ santudati prarohan /

GP10bhp1-12u:27906: na tatra vidvān prakṛtau sthito 'pi nivṛtta-tṛṣṇaḥ sva-sukhānubhūtyā //

GP10bhp1-12u:27917: etāvān ātma-sammoho yad vikalpas tu kevale /

GP10bhp1-12u:27954: BhP_11.29.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama dharmān su-maṅgalān /
GP10bhp1-12u:27955: yān śraddhayācaran martyo mṛtyuṃ jayati durjayam // BhP_11.29.008 //

GP10bhp1-12u:27965: sabhājayan manyamāno jñānaṃ kevalam āśritaḥ // BhP_11.29.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27967: akrūre krūrake caiva sama-dṛk paṇḍito mataḥ // BhP_11.29.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27970: visṛjya smayamānān svān dṛśaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca daihikīm /

GP10bhp1-12u:27978: na hy aṅgopakrame dhvaṃso mad-dharmasyoddhavāṇv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:27979: mayā vyavasitaḥ samyaṅ nirguṇatvād anāśiṣaḥ // BhP_11.29.020 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27980: yo yo mayi pare dharmaḥ kalpyate niṣphalāya cet /

GP10bhp1-12u:27982: eṣā buddhimatāṃ buddhir manīṣā ca manīṣiṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:27983: yat satyam anṛteneha martyenāpnoti māmṛtam // BhP_11.29.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27987: etad vijñāya mucyeta puruṣo naṣṭa-saṃśayaḥ // BhP_11.29.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27988: su-viviktaṃ tava praśnaṃ mayaitad api dhārayet /
GP10bhp1-12u:27990: ya etan mama bhakteṣu sampradadyāt su-puṣkalam /
GP10bhp1-12u:27991: tasyāhaṃ brahma-dāyasya dadāmy ātmānam ātmanā // BhP_11.29.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:27992: ya etat samadhīyīta pavitraṃ paramaṃ śuci /

GP10bhp1-12u:27994: ya etac chraddhayā nityam avyagraḥ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /

GP10bhp1-12u:27996: apy uddhava tvayā brahma sakhe samavadhāritam /

GP10bhp1-12u:27998: naitat tvayā dāmbhikāya nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca /

GP10bhp1-12u:28001: sādhave śucaye brūyād bhaktiḥ syāc chūdra-yoṣitām // BhP_11.29.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28003: pītvā pīyūṣam amṛtaṃ pātavyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate // BhP_11.29.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28004: jñāne karmaṇi yoge ca vārtāyāṃ daṇḍa-dhāraṇe /

GP10bhp1-12u:28006: martyo yadā tyakta-samasta-karmā niveditātmā vicikīrṣito me /
GP10bhp1-12u:28007: tadāmṛtatvaṃ pratipadyamāno mayātma-bhūyāya ca kalpate vai //
GP10bhp1-12u:28008: BhP_11.29.035/0 śrī-śuka uvāca sa evam ādarśita-yoga-mārgas tadottamaḥśloka-vaco niśamya /
GP10bhp1-12u:28010: viṣṭabhya cittaṃ praṇayāvaghūrṇaṃ dhairyeṇa rājan bahu-manyamānaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28011: kṛtāñjaliḥ prāha yadu-pravīraṃ śīrṣṇā spṛśaṃs tac-caraṇāravindam //
GP10bhp1-12u:28012: BhP_11.29.037/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca vidrāvito moha-mahāndhakāro ya āśrito me tava sannidhānāt
GP10bhp1-12u:28013: vibhāvasoḥ kiṃ nu samīpa-gasya śītaṃ tamo bhīḥ prabhavanty ajādya //
GP10bhp1-12u:28014: pratyarpito me bhavatānukampinā bhṛtyāya vijñāna-mayaḥ pradīpaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28015: hitvā kṛta-jñas tava pāda-mūlaṃ ko 'nyaṃ samīyāc charaṇaṃ tvadīyam //
GP10bhp1-12u:28016: vṛkṇaś ca me su-dṛḍhaḥ sneha-pāśo dāśārha-vṛṣṇy-andhaka-sātvateṣu /
GP10bhp1-12u:28017: prasāritaḥ sṛṣṭi-vivṛddhaye tvayā sva-māyayā hy ātma-subodha-hetinā //
GP10bhp1-12u:28018: namo 'stu te mahā-yogin prapannam anuśādhi mām /
GP10bhp1-12u:28019: yathā tvac-caraṇāmbhoje ratiḥ syād anapāyinī // BhP_11.29.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28020: BhP_11.29.041/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca gacchoddhava mayādiṣṭo badary-ākhyaṃ mamāśramam /

GP10bhp1-12u:28293: kālena balinā rājan naṅkṣyaty āyur balaṃ smṛtiḥ // BhP_12.02.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28295: dharma-nyāya-vyavasthāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ balam eva hi // BhP_12.02.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28297: strītve puṃstve ca hi ratir vipratve sūtram eva hi // BhP_12.02.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28299: avṛttyā nyāya-daurbalyaṃ pāṇḍitye cāpalaṃ vacaḥ // BhP_12.02.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28301: svīkāra eva codvāhe snānam eva prasādhanam // BhP_12.02.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28303: udaraṃ-bharatā svārthaḥ satyatve dhārṣṭyam eva hi // BhP_12.02.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28305: evaṃ prajābhir duṣṭābhir ākīrṇe kṣiti-maṇḍale // BhP_12.02.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28307: prajā hi lubdhai rājanyair nirghṛṇair dasyu-dharmabhiḥ // BhP_12.02.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28312: kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ vyādhibhiś caiva santapsyante ca cintayā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28313: triṃśad viṃśati varṣāṇi paramāyuḥ kalau nṛṇām // BhP_12.02.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28315: varṇāśramavatāṃ dharme naṣṭe veda-pathe nṛṇām // BhP_12.02.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28332: atha teṣāṃ bhaviṣyanti manāṃsi viśadāni vai /
GP10bhp1-12u:28336: vāsudeve bhagavati sattva-mūrtau hṛdi sthite // BhP_12.02.022 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28338: kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tadā prajā-sūtiś ca sāttvikī // BhP_12.02.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28339: yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca tathā tiṣya-bṛhaspatī /
GP10bhp1-12u:28340: eka-rāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam // BhP_12.02.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28341: ye 'tītā vartamānā ye bhaviṣyanti ca pārthivāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28342: te ta uddeśataḥ proktā vaṃśīyāḥ soma-sūryayoḥ // BhP_12.02.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28344: etad varṣa-sahasraṃ tu śataṃ pañcadaśottaram // BhP_12.02.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28345: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi /
GP10bhp1-12u:28346: tayos tu madhye nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yat samaṃ niśi // BhP_12.02.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28347: tenaiva ṛṣayo yuktās tiṣṭhanty abda-śataṃ nṛṇām /
GP10bhp1-12u:28348: te tvadīye dvijāḥ kāla adhunā cāśritā maghāḥ // BhP_12.02.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28349: viṣṇor bhagavato bhānuḥ kṛṣṇākhyo 'sau divaṃ gataḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28350: tadāviśat kalir lokaṃ pāpe yad ramate janaḥ // BhP_12.02.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28351: yāvat sa pāda-padmābhyāṃ spṛśan āste ramā-patiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28352: tāvat kalir vai pṛthivīṃ parākrantuṃ na cāśakat // BhP_12.02.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28353: yadā devarṣayaḥ sapta maghāsu vicaranti hi /
GP10bhp1-12u:28354: tadā pravṛttas tu kalir dvādaśābda-śatātmakaḥ // BhP_12.02.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28356: tadā nandāt prabhṛty eṣa kalir vṛddhiṃ gamiṣyati // BhP_12.02.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28357: yasmin kṛṣṇo divaṃ yātas tasminn eva tadāhani /
GP10bhp1-12u:28358: pratipannaṃ kali-yugam iti prāhuḥ purā-vidaḥ // BhP_12.02.033 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28359: divyābdānāṃ sahasrānte caturthe tu punaḥ kṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28360: bhaviṣyati tadā nṝṇāṃ mana ātma-prakāśakam // BhP_12.02.034 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28361: ity eṣa mānavo vaṃśo yathā saṅkhyāyate bhuvi /
GP10bhp1-12u:28362: tathā viṭ-śūdra-viprāṇāṃ tās tā jñeyā yuge yuge // BhP_12.02.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28364: kathā-mātrāvaśiṣṭānāṃ kīrtir eva sthitā bhuvi // BhP_12.02.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28369: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti catur-yugam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28370: anena krama-yogena bhuvi prāṇiṣu vartate // BhP_12.02.039 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28371: rājann ete mayā proktā nara-devās tathāpare /
GP10bhp1-12u:28372: bhūmau mamatvaṃ kṛtvānte hitvemāṃ nidhanaṃ gatāḥ // BhP_12.02.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28374: bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte svārthaṃ kiṃ veda nirayo yataḥ // BhP_12.02.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28375: kathaṃ seyam akhaṇḍā bhūḥ pūrvair me puruṣair dhṛtā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28376: mat-putrasya ca pautrasya mat-pūrvā vaṃśa-jasya vā // BhP_12.02.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28378: mahīṃ mamatayā cobhau hitvānte 'darśanaṃ gatāḥ // BhP_12.02.043 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28379: ye ye bhū-patayo rājan bhuñjate bhuvam ojasā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28380: kālena te kṛtāḥ sarve kathā-mātrāḥ kathāsu ca // BhP_12.02.044 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28381: BhP_12.03.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca dṛṣṭvātmani jaye vyagrān nṛpān hasati bhūr iyam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28382: aho mā vijigīṣanti mṛtyoḥ krīḍanakā nṛpāḥ // BhP_12.03.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28383: kāma eṣa narendrāṇāṃ moghaḥ syād viduṣām api /
GP10bhp1-12u:28384: yena phenopame piṇḍe ye 'ti-viśrambhitā nṛpāḥ // BhP_12.03.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28386: tataḥ saciva-paurāpta- karīndrān asya kaṇṭakān // BhP_12.03.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28388: ity āśā-baddha-hṛdayā na paśyanty antike 'ntakam // BhP_12.03.004 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28389: samudrāvaraṇāṃ jitvā māṃ viśanty abdhim ojasā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28390: kiyad ātma-jayasyaitan muktir ātma-jaye phalam // BhP_12.03.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28391: yāṃ visṛjyaiva manavas tat-sutāś ca kurūdvaha /
GP10bhp1-12u:28392: gatā yathāgataṃ yuddhe tāṃ māṃ jeṣyanty abuddhayaḥ // BhP_12.03.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28394: jāyate hy asatāṃ rājye mamatā-baddha-cetasām // BhP_12.03.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28395: mamaiveyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā na te mūḍheti vādinaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28396: spardhamānā mitho ghnanti mriyante mat-kṛte nṛpāḥ // BhP_12.03.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28398: māndhātā sagaro rāmaḥ khaṭvāṅgo dhundhuhā raghuḥ // BhP_12.03.009 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28399: tṛṇabindur yayātiś ca śaryātiḥ śantanur gayaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28400: bhagīrathaḥ kuvalayāśvaḥ kakutstho naiṣadho nṛgaḥ // BhP_12.03.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28402: namuciḥ śambaro bhaumo hiraṇyākṣo 'tha tārakaḥ // BhP_12.03.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28403: anye ca bahavo daityā rājāno ye maheśvarāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28404: sarve sarva-vidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve sarva-jito 'jitāḥ // BhP_12.03.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28406: kathāvaśeṣāḥ kālena hy akṛtārthāḥ kṛtā vibho // BhP_12.03.013 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28407: kathā imās te kathitā mahīyasāṃ vitāya lokeṣu yaśaḥ pareyuṣām /
GP10bhp1-12u:28408: vijñāna-vairāgya-vivakṣayā vibho vaco-vibhūtīr na tu pāramārthyam //
GP10bhp1-12u:28410: tam eva nityaṃ śṛṇuyād abhīkṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇe 'malāṃ bhaktim abhīpsamānaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:28412: kenopāyena bhagavan kaler doṣān kalau janāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28413: vidhamiṣyanty upacitāṃs tan me brūhi yathā mune // BhP_12.03.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28416: BhP_12.03.018/0 śrī-śuka uvāca kṛte pravartate dharmaś catuṣ-pāt taj-janair dhṛtaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28417: satyaṃ dayā tapo dānam iti pādā vibhor nṛpa // BhP_12.03.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28418: santuṣṭāḥ karuṇā maitrāḥ śāntā dāntās titikṣavaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28419: ātmārāmāḥ sama-dṛśaḥ prāyaśaḥ śramaṇā janāḥ // BhP_12.03.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28423: trai-vargikās trayī-vṛddhā varṇā brahmottarā nṛpa // BhP_12.03.021 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28427: ādhyāḥ kuṭumbino hṛṣṭā varṇāḥ kṣatra-dvijottarāḥ // BhP_12.03.023 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28429: edhamānaiḥ kṣīyamāṇo hy ante so 'pi vinaṅkṣyati // BhP_12.03.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28431: durbhagā bhūri-tarṣāś ca śūdra-dāsottarāḥ prajāḥ // BhP_12.03.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28432: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28433: kāla-sañcoditās te vai parivartanta ātmani // BhP_12.03.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28435: tadā kṛta-yugaṃ vidyāj jñāne tapasi yad ruciḥ // BhP_12.03.027 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28436: yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu bhaktir yaśasi dehinām /
GP10bhp1-12u:28437: tadā tretā rajo-vṛttir iti jānīhi buddhiman // BhP_12.03.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28438: yadā lobhas tv asantoṣo māno dambho 'tha matsaraḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28439: karmaṇāṃ cāpi kāmyānāṃ dvāparaṃ tad rajas-tamaḥ // BhP_12.03.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28440: yadā māyānṛtaṃ tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣādanam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28441: śoka-mohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhP_12.03.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28443: kāmino vitta-hīnāś ca svairiṇyaś ca striyo 'satīḥ // BhP_12.03.031 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28445: rājānaś ca prajā-bhakṣāḥ śiśnodara-parā dvijāḥ // BhP_12.03.032 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28451: anāpady api maṃsyante vārtāṃ sādhu jugupsitām // BhP_12.03.035 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28452: patiṃ tyakṣyanti nirdravyaṃ bhṛtyā apy akhilottamam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28453: bhṛtyaṃ vipannaṃ patayaḥ kaulaṃ gāś cāpayasvinīḥ // BhP_12.03.036 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28455: nanāndṛ-śyāla-saṃvādā dīnāḥ straiṇāḥ kalau narāḥ // BhP_12.03.037 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28461: hīnāḥ piśāca-sandarśā bhaviṣyanti kalau prajāḥ // BhP_12.03.040 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28463: tyakṣyanti ca priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svakān api // BhP_12.03.041 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28464: na rakṣiṣyanti manujāḥ sthavirau pitarāv api /
GP10bhp1-12u:28465: putrān bhāryāṃ ca kula-jāṃ kṣudrāḥ śiśnodaraṃ-bharāḥ // BhP_12.03.042 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28466: kalau na rājan jagatāṃ paraṃ guruṃ tri-loka-nāthānata-pāda-paṅkajam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28467: prāyeṇa martyā bhagavantam acyutaṃ yakṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa-vibhinna-cetasaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:28468: yan-nāmadheyaṃ mriyamāṇa āturaḥ patan skhalan vā vivaśo gṛṇan pumān /
GP10bhp1-12u:28469: vimukta-karmārgala uttamāṃ gatiṃ prāpnoti yakṣyanti na taṃ kalau janāḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:28471: sarvān harati citta-stho bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ // BhP_12.03.045 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28472: śrutaḥ saṅkīrtito dhyātaḥ pūjitaś cādṛto 'pi vā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28473: nṛṇāṃ dhunoti bhagavān hṛt-stho janmāyutāśubham // BhP_12.03.046 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28474: yathā hemni sthito vahnir durvarṇaṃ hanti dhātu-jam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28475: evam ātma-gato viṣṇur yoginām aśubhāśayam // BhP_12.03.047 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28477: nātyanta-śuddhiṃ labhate 'ntarātmā yathā hṛdi-sthe bhagavaty anante //
GP10bhp1-12u:28478: tasmāt sarvātmanā rājan hṛdi-sthaṃ kuru keśavam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28479: mriyamāṇo hy avahitas tato yāsi parāṃ gatim // BhP_12.03.049 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28481: ātma-bhāvaṃ nayaty aṅga sarvātmā sarva-saṃśrayaḥ // BhP_12.03.050 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28482: kaler doṣa-nidhe rājann asti hy eko mahān guṇaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28483: kīrtanād eva kṛṣṇasya mukta-saṅgaḥ paraṃ vrajet // BhP_12.03.051 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28484: kṛte yad dhyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ yajato makhaiḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28485: dvāpare paricaryāyāṃ kalau tad dhari-kīrtanāt // BhP_12.03.052 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28486: BhP_12.04.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca kālas te paramāṇv-ādir dvi-parārdhāvadhir nṛpa /
GP10bhp1-12u:28487: kathito yuga-mānaṃ ca śṛṇu kalpa-layāv api // BhP_12.04.001 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28489: sa kalpo yatra manavaś caturdaśa viśām-pate // BhP_12.04.002 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28490: tad-ante pralayas tāvān brāhmī rātrir udāhṛtā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28491: trayo lokā ime tatra kalpante pralayāya hi // BhP_12.04.003 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28492: eṣa naimittikaḥ proktaḥ pralayo yatra viśva-sṛk /
GP10bhp1-12u:28495: tadā prakṛtayaḥ sapta kalpante pralayāya vai // BhP_12.04.005 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28496: eṣa prākṛtiko rājan pralayo yatra līyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:28497: aṇḍa-koṣas tu saṅghāto vighāṭa upasādite // BhP_12.04.006 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28498: parjanyaḥ śata-varṣāṇi bhūmau rājan na varṣati /
GP10bhp1-12u:28499: tadā niranne hy anyonyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ kṣudhārditāḥ // BhP_12.04.007 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28501: sāmudraṃ daihikaṃ bhaumaṃ rasaṃ sāṃvartako raviḥ // BhP_12.04.008 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28502: raśmibhiḥ pibate ghoraiḥ sarvaṃ naiva vimuñcati /
GP10bhp1-12u:28505: upary adhaḥ samantāc ca śikhābhir vahni-sūryayoḥ // BhP_12.04.010 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28507: tataḥ pracaṇḍa-pavano varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // BhP_12.04.011 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28508: paraḥ sāṃvartako vāti dhūmraṃ khaṃ rajasāvṛtam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28509: tato megha-kulāny aṅga citra varṇāny anekaśaḥ // BhP_12.04.012 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28512: tadā bhūmer gandha-guṇaṃ grasanty āpa uda-plave /
GP10bhp1-12u:28513: grasta-gandhā tu pṛthivī pralayatvāya kalpate // BhP_12.04.014 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28514: apāṃ rasam atho tejas tā līyante 'tha nīrasāḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28515: grasate tejaso rūpaṃ vāyus tad-rahitaṃ tadā // BhP_12.04.015 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28516: līyate cānile tejo vāyoḥ khaṃ grasate guṇam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28517: sa vai viśati khaṃ rājaṃs tataś ca nabhaso guṇam // BhP_12.04.016 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28518: śabdaṃ grasati bhūtādir nabhas tam anu līyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:28519: taijasaś cendriyāṇy aṅga devān vaikāriko guṇaiḥ // BhP_12.04.017 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28520: mahān grasaty ahaṅkāraṃ guṇāḥ sattvādayaś ca tam /
GP10bhp1-12u:28521: grasate 'vyākṛtaṃ rājan guṇān kālena coditam // BhP_12.04.018 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28523: anādy anantam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ kāraṇam avyayam // BhP_12.04.019 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28524: na yatra vāco na mano na sattvaṃ tamo rajo vā mahad-ādayo 'mī /
GP10bhp1-12u:28525: na prāṇa-buddhīndriya-devatā vā na sanniveśaḥ khalu loka-kalpaḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:28526: na svapna-jāgran na ca tat suṣuptaṃ na khaṃ jalaṃ bhūr anilo 'gnir arkaḥ /
GP10bhp1-12u:28527: saṃsupta-vac chūnya-vad apratarkyaṃ tan mūla-bhūtaṃ padam āmananti //
GP10bhp1-12u:28528: layaḥ prākṛtiko hy eṣa puruṣāvyaktayor yadā /
GP10bhp1-12u:28532: dīpaś cakṣuś ca rūpaṃ ca jyotiṣo na pṛthag bhavet /
GP10bhp1-12u:28533: evaṃ dhīḥ khāni mātrāś ca na syur anyatamād ṛtāt // BhP_12.04.024 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28534: buddher jāgaraṇaṃ svapnaḥ suṣuptir iti cocyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:28535: māyā-mātram idaṃ rājan nānātvaṃ pratyag-ātmani // BhP_12.04.025 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28536: yathā jala-dharā vyomni bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
GP10bhp1-12u:28537: brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā viśvam avayavy udayāpyayāt // BhP_12.04.026 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28538: satyaṃ hy avayavaḥ proktaḥ sarvāvayavinām iha /
GP10bhp1-12u:28541: anyonyāpāśrayāt sarvam ādy-antavad avastu yat // BhP_12.04.028 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28543: na nirūpyo 'sty aṇur api syāc cec cit-sama ātma-vat // BhP_12.04.029 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28544: na hi satyasya nānātvam avidvān yadi manyate /
GP10bhp1-12u:28545: nānātvaṃ chidrayor yadvaj jyotiṣor vātayor iva // BhP_12.04.030 //
GP10bhp1-12u:28546: yathā hiraṇyaṃ bahudhā samīyate nṛbhiḥ kriyābhir vyavahāra-vartmasu /
GP10bhp1-12u:28547: evaṃ vacobhir bhagavān adhokṣajo vyākhyāyate laukika-vaidikair janaiḥ //
GP10bhp1-12u:28548: yathā ghano 'rka-prabhavo 'rka-darśito $ hy arkāṃśa-bhūtasya ca cakṣuṣas tamaḥ &
GP10bhp1-12u:28549: evaṃ tv ahaṃ brahma-guṇas tad-īkṣito % brahmāṃśakasyātmana ātma-bandhanaḥ
